name: 1 Acre Log Home - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Suite: King, Full Size Futon, Full Bathroom

description:
Location, Location, Location! Less than one mile from the ski slopes (three minute drive), four blocks to the Village (two minute drive), three blocks to the lake, and just one block to National Forest (right at the end of the street). It’s the perfect place to feel like you are getting away while being close to everything Big Bear has to offer. 

This beautiful four bedroom log home is on a full acre of beautiful land with over 100 mature trees and 10,000 square feet of grass, big enough for a football game in the backyard!  The property is fully fenced with a six foot wood fence, perfect for dogs and children. 

Enjoy the mountain features of this log style home including real oak wood floors, knotty pine cathedral ceilings, a river rock wood burning fireplace, and open floor plan.  Relax in front of the large flat screen TV over the fireplace with Google Chromecast or surf the internet with complimentary high speed WiFi.  

The kitchen is stocked with all the basics for preparing a meal with granite counters, stainless steel appliances, gas stove top, wall oven, microwave, dishwasher and Keurig coffee pot.  A large, solid wood dining table with additional seating available at the kitchen counter.

Step out to the 1,000 square foot back deck for the ultimate in outdoor relaxation and soak in the hot tub, sip a glass of wine in the shade or grill on the stainless steel barbecue (propane provided).  The kids will love the huge, grassy, one acre lot with plenty of space to run around.  

A good night's sleep can be had by all in one of four bedrooms.  The master suite has a king bed, futon, outdoor access, TV with Google Chromecast for all your cell, iPad, laptop, etc., private bathroom with double sinks, shower and jacuzzi tub.  

Bedroom two has a queen, twin over twin bunk, TV with Google Chromecast, VHS movie player and hundreds of films to pick from, and a plug-in classic video game console. Remember Pac-Man?

Bedroom three has a queen bed and twin over twin bunk, and bedroom four has a queen bed, two twin beds, and TV with cable & DVD/VHS player with a bookshelf full of films to pick from. A full bathroom and laundry room with dart board, games, and 3-in-1 game table (Pool Table, Air Hockey, and Foosball table) is available for your convenience.

Features:  Ten Minute Walk to Lake and Village, One Mile to Snow Summit, Hot Tub, Game Tables, One Acre of Beautiful Land, Mature Trees, Stainless Steel Propane Barbecue, Wood Burning Fireplace, Google Chromecast, DVD, Very Fast Internet, Updated Kitchen, Granite Counters, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Stove Top, Wall Oven, Dishwasher, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Dining Table, Master Suite, Laundry Room, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations. Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, log home features and updated appliances.

name: 42 Wrens Nest - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Cozy up in 42 Wrens Nest on your next Big Bear vacation!  This cabin is centrally located and walking distance to Meadow Park, the lake, and just minutes from the Village, Snow Summit and the shuttle lots.

The great room features wood floors, a wood fireplace, TV with DVD player, Foosball table and comfortable sofa and love seat.  The dining area has table and seating for everyone to gather around for a meal or game night.  Coffee can be enjoyed at the log breakfast bar overlooking the beautiful kitchen with granite counters, stainless steel appliances including gas range, dishwasher, microwave and coffee pot.

Down the hallway you will find a washer and dryer, full bathroom and three bedrooms.  The master bedroom has a king bed, sliding door to the back yard and a private full bathroom with double vanity.  The second bedroom has a queen and door to the back yard, and the third bedroom has a queen and twin over twin bunk.

The back yard has room for the kids to run and play under the mature trees. The flat parking is ideal for all four seasons.

Features: Centrally Located, Walk to Meadow Park and Lake, Close to Snow Summit, Wood Floors, Wood Fireplace, Foosball Table, Stainless Steel Appliances, Granite Counters, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: 360 Panorama - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
When you see the views from this Big Bear cabin rental, you will be amazed at how peaceful life can be. This beautifully decorated home at the top of Castle Glenn Estates, is a high end estate in Big Bear Lake. This home is close to the Bear Mountain and Snow Summit Resort, the Big Bear Village, the Convention Center and so much more!

There are four bedrooms and three and a half bathrooms; as well as a game room with a pool table and flat screen TV with a DVD player and Cable. The master bedroom is just off the living area on the main level, with no steps; and the bathroom has a sunken whirlpool tub (jets not currently working) and a separate shower. The panoramic views of the mountains and tree tops are so breathtaking; you will never want to leave.

Enjoy sitting back and taking in the views! This is an incredible view and one of the best in all of Big Bear Lake!

Note: No indoor fireplace. Ice maker and water dispenser does not work on fridge.

DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

Features: Propane Barbecue, Huge Wrap Around Decks, Internet, Open Kitchen and Living Room, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Cable, Dishwasher, Linens and Towels Provided, 3 Car Garage, Washer and Dryer

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances. Some areas of this home may be showing wear and tear.

name: 3 Legged Moose - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Super cute comfortable modern amenities such as a shuffleboard, Foosball,  and an outdoor hot tub at this very nice cabin located close to Bear Mountain slopes, the golf course and the zoo. Walk to the driving range or to the shuttles that take you to Bear Mountain and Snow Summit slopes.

No hills to climb by car with three car parking and fantastic ski slope and mountain views as well as golf course views. An outdoor hot tub is also featured on the front deck for your ultimate mountain viewing pleasure!

You will enjoy a higher quality rental experience in this 4 bedroom, 3 bathrooms home with very nice decor and completely remodeled in the past year. Sit back and relax next to one of two wood burning fireplaces.

Note: Downstairs area has a forced air heater and upstairs is central heating. The house heats up fast and will get warm and cozy. We do not provide jugs for water dispenser. Charcoal barbecue works but the propane barbecue does not.

Features: Foosball, Shuffleboard, Hot Tub, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Linens and Towels Provided, Two Cozy Wood Burning Fireplaces, Internet, Flat Screen TVs, DVD Players, Netflix Optional TV Capabilities, Great Room, Charcoal Barbecue, Washer, Dryer,  Fenced Backyard, Two Decks for Ultimate Views of the Ski Slopes

This is a luxury property which includes the finest furnishings, luxury building materials, and a highly consistent design theme. Luxury properties range from elegant and formal to relaxed and chic, but all appeal to guests who appreciate first-class accommodations with a designer flair.

name: 2 Coyotes Crossing - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 4: Queen, Twin over Twin Bunk (Lower Level)

description:
Walk to gorgeous Big Bear Lake at Meadow Park where there are volleyball courts, tennis courts, baseball fields, and a picnic area in just a few minutes! A bit longer of a walk will bring you to the Village from this very large 3,600 square foot four bedroom, three bath home.

Sit back on the wrap around deck with your friends and family while enjoying a barbecue and the peaceful tree views. Relax in the outdoor hot tub after a long day on the slopes or at the lake. Kids and parents will love the fenced backyard to build a snowman or run around!

This split level cabin was totally remodeled November 2016.  Inside you can get comfortable on the large sofa in the spacious living room with lots of natural light dispersed through the skylights and windows. Watch a movie on the large flat screen with cable and DVD player. The central natural stone wood burning fireplace makes this large open space feel cozy and relaxing. There is plenty of seating at the dining table or breakfast bar. The newly remodeled kitchen boasts plenty of counter space for meals with slab granite counters as well as stainless steel appliances which include a gas range, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot.

Down the hallway you will find a full bathroom and two bedrooms.  The master bedroom has two queen beds, back deck access and a full bathroom with large walk-in shower.  The second bedroom also has two queen beds.

Downstairs you will find the game room where the group can enjoy a game of pool or switch the convertible table top to a game of ping pong! There is also a couch for seating for cheering on your family and friends or just watching your favorite show on the TV with cable.  A full bathroom with double sinks, a laundry room and two more bedrooms are also on this level.  The third bedroom has two queen beds, and the fourth bedroom has a TV with cable and DVD player, a queen bed, twin over twin bunk and extra mattress for flexible sleeping arrangements or lounging.

This cabin is great for entertaining as there is so much room outdoors and indoors with parking for six cars, including two spaces in the garage. Explore Big Bear from this great cabin with just a short drive to the ski resorts, golf course and zoo, grocery stores and hiking.

Features: Remodeled November 2016, Walking Distance to Lake/Park, Hot Tub, Propane Barbecue, Pool Table, Ping Pong Table Top, Updated Large Kitchen, Dining Area, Laundry Room, Wood Burning Fireplace, Fenced Backyard, Internet, Local Phone Calls, Cable, DVD Players, Flat Screens Throughout, Towels and Linens Provided.

DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: A Knight to Remember - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
A Knight to Remember is a cozy two bedroom, two bathroom Big Bear cabin rental featuring a bonus room. This cabin is centrally located in Big Bear Lake and is close enough to walk to the lake at Meadow Park and Big Bear Village, where there are stores for shopping, dining, and other entertainment. In a short drive, you can enjoy snowboarding or skiing at Bear Mountain or Snow Summit Resort or warm weather adventures on Big Bear Lake.

This single level home has an open floor plan. The kitchen comes fully stocked and has a dishwasher. Dining has seating for four; and there is also extra seats at the bar. The wood burning fireplace provides a warm area to sit back and relax with a good book after a cold winter day.

The master bedroom has a queen bed and a private full bath. The guest room has a full bed with a guest bathroom in the hall. The bonus room is great for family time or extra sleeping arrangements. There is a pull out couch for two. This room has a TV with cable, Wi-Fi, and a DVD player. The owner has supplied books and board games for guest use. This home offers free long distance and internal calls with the home phone; and laundry use is also available.

In the warm summer months, there is a large deck for grilling on the charcoal barbeque. Kids and parents will enjoy the fenced backyard with a treed lot of Big Bear pines and Manzanita. There is also a small hill for possible sledding during the winter season for the little ones. Enjoy the colors of the mountain skies at sunset or gazing at stars for A Knight to Remember.

Features: Centrally Located, Single Level, Cable, DVD, Wi-Fi, Dishwasher, Laundry Use, Deck, Fenced Yard, Charcoal Barbecue

This property is perfect for the guest who is looking for a cabin rental that won't break the bank. Generally simple decor and filled with basic furnishings and amenities that will meet most of your needs for an enjoyable vacation.

name: Accent in the Woods - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Game Room: Queen, Twin with Twin Trundle(Over Garage-Separate Entrance)

description:
Accent your Big Bear trip with awesome amenities including a hot tub, horseshoe pit, game room and more!  Accent In the Woods is a great family cabin for those looking for fun and outdoor space.  Enjoy the convenient location being within 2 blocks from the marina to the lake, close to the Village and hiking trails and a 5 minute drive from Snow Summit Ski Resort.

This gambrel style cabin boasts floor to ceiling windows letting in plenty of natural light for the great room and loft.  The living room has a extra spacious sofa for lounging in front of the flat screen TV and wood burning fireplace.  When it's time for a snack or meal, the kitchen is just steps away and includes a small table, bar seating, gas range, microwave and coffee pot.  A full bathroom and stacked washer and dryer are located in the hallway on your way to the two main floor bedrooms, each with queen beds.

Upstairs you can curl up with your favorite book in the loft.  A 3/4 bathroom and the master bedroom with a king bed and TV  are also on this level.

For a breath of fresh mountain air, head out to the deck and large yard where you will find a Weber charcoal barbecue, table seating, a hot tub, horseshoe pit, swing set and plenty of room for the kids to run around exploring. Kids will enjoy playing in the tree house and parents and pet owners will love the fully fenced yard!

For an evening of fun and games, head to the separate game room over the garage and challenge each other to a game of Foosball or pool!  Flexible sleeping arrangements can be made on the queen and twin bed with a twin trundle. Equipped with a brand new heater, the game room is nice and cozy! 

There is room for RV or boat parking in the spacious driveway. This cabin is the perfect place for your next family getaway!

Note: No garage parking.

Features: Wood Floors, Game Room, Small Pool Table, Foosball Table, Hot Tub, Fenced Yard, RV & Boat Parking, Horseshoe Pit, Close to Hiking Trails, the Village and Lake, Charcoal Barbecue, Wood Burning Fireplace, Internet, Gas Range, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Laminate, Carpet, Ceiling Fans, Central Heat, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances. NO CABLE, ROKU Only

name: 8 Eagles Flight - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Suite: King with TV and Full Bath (Main Level)
arrangements.Master Bedroom: Queen with TV and 3/4 Bath (Main Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 4: Queen, Twin Trundle and Twin (Lower Level)

description:
This custom designed home is located in one of the best neighborhoods we have here in Big Bear, Eagle Mountain Estates. This home is located just a 15 minute walk from the Convention Center where many events are held such as Oktoberfest and the Farmers Market.

Enjoy over 3,650 square feet of spacious living. 8 Eagles Flight is perfect for spending time with family and friends with an open, elevated main floor living space connecting the kitchen, dining room and living rooms. Sit back and relax next to the cozy wood burning fireplace or watch TV with cable and Blu-Ray player.  The dining room has views of the mountains from the large family style dining table with seating for 8 and additional seating at the breakfast bar.  The kitchen features granite counters, a gas cooktop, wall oven, dishwasher, garbage disposal, microwave and coffee pot. A laundry room is available for your convenience, as well as 1/2 bath. Just outside the main living room on the back deck is a propane barbecue and large hot tub situated in a private backyard with a seasonal running stream and wooded hill.

The main level features a large master suite and additional master bedroom.  The master suite has a king bed, gas fireplace to snuggle up on those chilly nights, large smart TV and private bathroom with large separate tub, shower and double sink. The second master bedroom has a queen bed, smart TV and private 3/4 bathroom.  

The lower level is divided into two living spaces (separate access from the main floor).  One half features a game room with pool table, TV with cable and mini fridge, along with a bedroom with a queen and twin bed.  The other half of the downstairs has two more bedrooms, one with a queen with twin trundle and twin bed, and the last bedroom with 2 twin over twin bunks.  A full bathroom is located in the hall.

Note: The driveway has a steep transition from the road; high clearance vehicles recommended. The driveway is steep and during the winter can be very difficult to get up and get down, especially if ice or snow is present.  ALWAYS carry chains in winter months. Please make sure the driveway is safe to exit and remember to use salt. If it has snowed recently or during your stay do not attempt to use the driveway without chains. If you need our help, please call us and we can help you at no charge.

DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs!

Features: Walking Distance to Convention Center and Restaurants, 2 Car Garage, Pool Table, Large TV, Internet, Cable, Hot Tub, Propane Barbecue, Wood Burning Fireplace, Updated Kitchen, Gas Cooktop, Oven, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Granite Counters, 2 Master Bedrooms, Washer and Dryer, Central Heat, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, updated appliances with a bit of wear and tear.
address: 42824 Eagle Flight Place Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: Alpenweg Cabin - Big Bear City, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: Full Over Queen Bunk, Bathroom (Upper Level)

description:
Alpenweg Cabin is a well appointed classic Big Bear cabin with all the modern amenities your family is looking for.  This split-level floor plan offers a variety of places to relax or all get together to make new vacation memories and share stories.

The entry level living space is divided by a two-sided wood burning fireplace that is a feature in both the living room and kitchen.  The living room has a large flat screen TV with cable, plenty of seating and lots of windows for natural light.  The kitchen has expansive granite counters with bar seating, gas stove top, double wall oven, dishwasher, large fridge, microwave and coffee pot.  Just around the corner is the dining room with table and chairs for a family meal or game night.  Step out to the back deck and relax in the fresh mountain air or grill on the gas barbecue.  The kids will love exploring the large landscaped backyard.

The upper level has an open family room overlooking the main living space with a large flat screen TV with cable, a sofa and access to the small front deck.  There are three bedrooms on this level as well.  The master bedroom has a king bed, TV with cable, private bathroom and access to the upper back deck with the hot tub.  Bedroom two has a full over queen bunk, TV with cable, front deck access and private bathroom.  Bedroom three has a full over queen bunk.  There is also a stacked washer and dryer for your convenience.

Head all the way downstairs to the game room for a few hours of fun playing pool or just watching your friends while you lounge on the sofas and watch cable TV or a DVD.  A 3/4 bathroom is also on this level.

This cabin has it all, including a great location in a quiet neighborhood that is just a few minutes from grocery stores, restaurants, the slopes and more!

Features: 2 Car Garage, Wood Burning Fireplace, Game Room with Pool Table, Outdoor Hot Tub, Wireless Internet, Huge Deck with Chairs and Table, High Ceilings, DVD Player, Cable, Gas Stove Top, Double Oven, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Dining for 8 with 3 Additional Bar Stools, Gas Barbecue, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable, newer furnishing, desirable amenities, with updated kitchen, and possibly a few original features.

name: All About the Views - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bdrm 1: Queen Bed w/ TV, Private Bath w/ Jetted Spa Tub, Private Lake View Balcony (Entry level)
arrangements.Lake-View Master: King with TV, Gas Stove, Private Bath w/ Jetted Spa Tub, Deck Access (2nd floor)
arrangements.Bdrm 4: Queen, Full Futon with TV, Deck Access (2nd floor)
arrangements.Master 2: King w/ TV, Private Bath w/ Jetted Spa Tub d/s
arrangements.Bdrm 8: 2 Fulls, Twin w/ TV, Foosball d/s

description:
All About The Views lives up to it's name being an extravagant  luxury tri-level custom estate which features amazing panoramic lake  views from almost every room, yet is located right above the downtown  Village so it is within a short walk or drive to all that Big Bear has to  offer! 

This stunning one-of-a-kind property features all new furnishings  and decor throughout including new flat screen TVs, multiple jetted spa  tubs, and an expansive lake-view deck wrapping around the property and  offering patio furnishings and a relaxing private outdoor hot tub. The open  and spacious gourmet kitchen offers all of the essentials for cooking,  high-end appliances and a dishwasher, plus counter bar and formal dining  area seating. 

There is a media/game room with a full size pool table,  additional couch seating, and a TV/DVD player for your enjoyment. 

All  About The Views offers everything needed for the ultimate Big Bear  experience. Being fully furnished, packed with entertainment, and in a  fabulous location, this stunning estate makes for the perfect destination  for your mountain vacation!

Features: Jetted Spa Tub, Deck, Central Heat, Cable, WiFi, Pool Table, Foosball, Charcoal BBQ, Dishwasher, Garage, Hot Tub, Gas Fireplace, Washer/Dryer, Lakeview, Walk to Lake, Marina, & Village, Linens & Towels Provided

name: Almost Summit - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Make your trip to the mountains memorable in this adorable chalet.  Located near Snow Summit, this cabin is perfect for any time of year. Kids will have fun exploring in the semi-flat yard with Manzanita trees and plenty of fresh air.

Relax after a day outdoors in the open living room with corner gas fireplace, large flat screen TV with cable, DVD player and huge windows.  Open the sliding glass doors and step out to the patio to soak in the hot tub or grill on the charcoal barbeque.  The kitchen has plenty of counter space, a gas range, microwave and coffee pot.  A full bathroom is just around the corner, as well as a large bedroom with two queen beds and a TV with cable and DVD player.

Upstairs you can enjoy the tree views from the loft on your way to the half bathroom or one of two separate bedrooms, both with queen beds, TVs and cable access.

Features: Close to Snow Summit, Hot Tub, Charcoal Barbeque, All TVs with Cable Access, Internet, Gas Fireplace, Microwave, Gas Range, Towels and Linens Provided.

This property is perfect for the guest who is looking for a cabin rental that won't break the bank. Generally simple decor and filled with basic furnishings and amenities that will meet most of your needs for an enjoyable vacation.
address: 741 St Moritz Dr. Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: Angels Haven - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Nestled in the pines, this warm and welcoming, dog friendly Big Bear getaway invites comfort, stress relief and relaxation. Families and couples fall in love with Angels Haven and adopt it as their home-away-from-home, returning time after time. This 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom home has a great layout for larger groups.

Enjoy a flat driveway and an an enclosed 2 car garage for your use, a rare and much appreciated feature, with additional off-street parking for 2 more cars. 

This open and airy space has a comfortable, homey feeling, perfect for gathering together on the sofa and love seat in front of the wood burning rock fireplace and huge 55" flat screen HDTV with DirecTV for sports enthusiasts and Blu-Ray DVD player for movie watchers. Pine plank ceilings and knotty pine wainscoting lend a rustic cabin feel throughout the home. The expansive dining table has enough seating for 6-8 people for meals, sharing stories, and bonding over board games or jigsaw puzzles.

Just off the living room is the recently renovated full kitchen with a breakfast nook.  Enjoy granite counters, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, refrigerator, gas range, and microwave, and stocked with a toaster, coffee maker, dishes, flatware, pots and pans. A washer and dryer is available for your use and is perfect for longer stays.

The main level has two bedrooms and a full bathroom.  The first bedroom has a queen bed, and the second bedroom has a queen bed and private half bathroom. 
Parents and couples are ensured a private space in the upstairs master suite with sitting area complete with sofa, recliners and TV with DirecTV and Blu-Ray player. The bedroom features vaulted ceilings and has a king-sized brass bed, private full bathroom with separate shower and tub, and a wood burning stove, perfect for cozy winter nights. When the weather warms up enjoy a small private balcony for enjoying the fresh air and sipping on a cup of coffee or tea.

Breathe deep and fill your lungs with clean, fresh mountain air, pine-scented with a hint of vanilla from the Jeffrey pines in the large, fenced back yard that is perfect for kids.  When snow is present, have fun building a snowman or sledding down the gentle slope.  The summer months are the perfect time to enjoy the covered deck with table and chairs and propane barbecue (not pictured). The covered front porch is lovely place to sit and sip your coffee.

Angel's Haven is situated in a quiet neighborhood with a short drive to Big Bear Village for shopping, dining, and entertainment. A 5 minute stroll to the lake at nearby beautiful Boulder Bay Park with kayak, standup paddle board and bicycle rentals. A great location for peaceful walks enjoying the surrounding natural beauty.

Note: This home only has beds for 8 people.

Features: Flat Parking, 2 Car Garage, Covered Decks, Two Wood-Burning Fireplaces, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Wood/Carpet Floors, 3 Bedrooms, 2 Full Bathrooms, 1/2 Bathroom, Central Heating, 55" Flat Screen TV w/ DirecTV and DVD Player (Main Floor), Flat screen HDTVs w/ DirecTV and DVD Player in Master Suite, Internet, Fenced Backyard, Mature Pines, Propane Grill (Not Pictured), Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This dog-friendly property is perfect for guests or small groups looking for a cabin rental that won't break the bank, making multiple visits affordable to experience all of Big Bear's four seasons. Tasteful and pleasing decor throughout, newly renovated kitchen and well-appointed with comfortable furnishings and desirable amenities that will meet your needs for an enjoyable and relaxing weekend getaway or vacation.

name: Alpine Woods Lodge - Big Bear City, CA

arrangements.Master Suite 2: King, Queen over Queen Bunk, Bathroom w/ Tub/Shower, TV w/cable (Upper Level)
arrangements.Master Suite 4: 2 Queens, Bathroom with Double Shower, Tub and 46" Flat Screen TV (Upper Level)

description:
Experience beautiful Big Bear at Alpine Woods Lodge. Your family and friends are sure to enjoy this spacious, luxury cabin complete with a hot tub, pool table and bathroom attached to all four master suites! Close to Bear Mountain, you'll love the location for year round activities!

Sit back and relax in the family room in front of the cozy fire while watching TV on the  46" flat screen TV, or the main great room living room with wood burning fireplace, 70" flat screen TV, cable and open to the gorgeous kitchen.  Sit around the solid log dining table for family game night or a meal.  The kitchen is complete with expansive granite counters, stainless steel appliances including extra large refrigerator with bottom freezer, gas stove, microwave and dishwasher.  A pass through kitchen window is perfect for grilling out on the covered deck in the large, flat fenced in yard or open up the sliding doors for fresh air. Sit back and relax under the shade of the mature trees in the hot tub.  A pool table is centrally located in the great room for maximum fun!

A laundry room and half bath is conveniently located on the main level as well as the first bedroom with king bed and attached bathroom with a shower.

Upstairs are three bedrooms. The largest bedroom has a king bed, queen over queen bunk and attached bathroom with double sink and large shower/soaking tub. This room is great for the kids with flat screen TV, cable.  The next bedroom has a king bed, and attached bathroom with a shower.  The last bedroom has two queen beds, 46" flat screen TV, and attached bathroom with double sinks, huge double shower and Jacuzzi tub.

This cabin is perfect for families and friends looking for the option of private spaces or gathering together with beautiful updated features, a large lot for the kids to run and play and a location within easy distance to everything in Big Bear.

Features: Close to Bear Mountain, 4 Master Suites, Luxury Finishes, Stainless Steel Appliances, Microwave, Gas Stove, Dishwasher, Hot Tub, Pool Table, Flat Yard, Propane Barbeque, Cable, Internet, Flat Screen TVs, Bedroom Suites, Laundry, Towels and Linens Provided

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or  completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a  pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated  fixtures and appliances.

DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

name: Adventure Lodge - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 6: Twin over Twin Bunk, Queen over Queen Bunk, Full Bath (Upper Level)

description:
This luxury mountain retreat is a family vacation dream home!  Located just steps from the resort shuttle lots, restaurants and conveniences.

This custom log home features beautiful pine log walls, ceiling, furnishings and architectural elements that create a cozy, mountain lodge atmosphere.  The great room centers around the wood burning fireplace with a wrap around leather sofa, large TV with cable and DVD player, and a desk.  The dining area has seating for ten people at the expansive log table.  Additional seating is at the kitchen counter.  The kitchen has plenty of counter space for preparing a meal and is stocked with all the basics including stainless steel appliances, gas range, microwave, coffee pot, oversized sink, and side-by-side fridge.  For some fresh air you can step out to the back covered deck and watch the kids play in the large yard.

Back inside you will find plenty of entertainment options.  The upstairs loft has a pool table, there is a Foosball table, and games in the main floor closet.  The laundry room is ideal for storing your winter adventure gear.

When night falls you can have your choice of six bedrooms.  The master suite is on the main level and has a king bed, sofa, and private bathroom with corner tub, double sinks and separate shower.  On the opposite side of the house you will find a full bathroom, a bedroom with a queen bed, and the third bedroom with queen bed and sitting area in front of the electric fireplace.  Upstairs is another full bathroom and two bedrooms with queen beds.  The last bedroom is a kid's dream with a twin over twin bunk, queen over queen bunk, love seat, Foosball table, TV with cable and private bathroom with tub, shower and double vanity.

This cabin is perfect for your family and friends during your next retreat to Big Bear!

Features: Log Home, Across from Shuttle Lots, Walk to Restaurants, Luxury Furnishings, Wood Burning Fireplace, Cable, Internet, DVD, Pool Table, Foosball Table, Games, Stainless Steel Appliances, Master Suite, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided.

name: Amazing Grace - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Bedroom: King,Twin over Full Bunk w/ TV and Blue Ray Player, and Shared Bathroom (Upper Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 2: Queen with TV and Shared Bathroom (Upper Level)

description:
Amazing Grace is a revitalized, large 3,600 square foot, five bedroom cabin which is an easy ten minute walk to Meadow Park, the gorgeous lake, a little longer walk to the Village, and only a mile from the  slopes. Sit back on the gigantic deck with your friends and family while enjoying a barbecue and the private, peaceful tree views..

This home features a rustic, "cabin in the woods" feeling with spacious rooms, leather sofas, wood accents, three gas fireplaces, and high vaulted ceilings. Enjoy the indoor hot tub and additional shower for after hot tubbing for a great way to relax. Have fun playing a game of pool while you watch the game on the large flat screen or kick back in the living or family room, each with their own large flat screen TV and blue ray player. The spacious, beautifully updated kitchen has plenty of counter space, natural light and all the desired amenities for an enjoyable stay. A laundry room with washer and dryer is available for your convenience along with Wi-Fi to stay connected.

All five bedrooms are upstairs with beds to sleep 16 people. Each bedroom has TV with cable access and game connections available. There is plenty of space to enjoy everyone's company or get away for your own time alone. The master bedroom has a king bed plus a twin over full bunk. The attached bathroom has separate double sinks and large shower, and is shared with bedroom 2 which has a queen bed. Bedrooms 3 and 5 each have one queen and one full bed, and bedroom 4 has one queen and one twin bed.  A nice bathroom is located in the hall close to the other three bedrooms, and a half bathroom is located downstairs.

There is plenty of parking for larger parties, and you can rent the cabin 2 Coyotes Crossing next door (combined sleeping is up to 32 people).

name: Bear Loop Castle - Big Bear City, CA
description:
This castle in the mountains will have you feeling like royalty!  Located along the north shore just a short drive from the Discovery Center, airport and the lake.  This 5 bedroom cabin boasts wood and stone accents throughout, mountain decor and luxury finishes.

The living room features a two story window for views of the beautiful blue Big Bear sky.  A large sofa has space for all in front of the wood burning fireplace, TV with cable, Blu-Ray, streaming and surround sound stereo.  Steps away is the open kitchen with granite counters and stainless steel Viking appliances.  The chef in the family will appreciate the gas stove top, double ovens, microwave, wine fridge, Keurig and coffee pot. Step out to the back deck for grilling on the propane barbecue. Gather around the table for a meal or fun night of games in the dining/game room with pool table, TV with cable and DVD.  The main floor also has a half bathroom and garage access.

The first bedroom is on the main level.  Enjoy the comforts of a king bed, sofa, TV with cable and DVD, and a full bathroom with double sinks.  Step out to the back deck and soak in the hot tub!

Upstairs you will find the spacious master suite that stretches from the front to back of the house and includes a king bed, pull-out sofa, TV with cable and Blu-Ray with 3D.  The bathroom is a retreat destination of it's own with corner tub, large shower, separate toilet, double bowl style sinks and small private back deck. On the other side of the upstairs is a laundry room, full bath and three bedrooms.  One bedroom has a queen bed, small deck and full bathroom.  The next bedroom has a queen bed, and the last bedroom has a king bed, pull-out sofa and small private back deck.

For a little fresh air enjoy strolling through the neighborhood or let the kids run around the back yard (not fully fenced).

This is a grand cabin for your next Big Bear Lake vacation!

Features: Wood and Stone Features, Luxury Finishes, Pool Table, Hot Tub, Wood Burning Fireplace, Cable, Blu-Ray, Gourmet Kitchen, Viking Appliances, Gas Stove Top, Double Oven, Keurig, Coffee Pot, Dishwasher, Microwave, Propane Barbecue, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Bear House - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
A golfer's dream! This two bedroom, two story town home is located in Bear Meadows right on the golf course overlooking the 9th hole. Easy walking distance to Bear Mountain Golf and Ski Resort and the Moonridge Zoo.

The entry level has both bedrooms, each with a queen bed, full bathroom, and access to the lower patio overlooking the t-box.  A washer and dryer are also on this level.

Upstairs is the main living area and a half bathroom.  The living room focuses around the gas fireplace and TV with DVD player.  The dining area has plenty of seating with additional seating at the counter.  The kitchen is stocked with all the basics and includes a gas range, microwave, dishwasher, and coffee pot.  Step out to the covered deck for grilling on the propane barbecue while you watch the golfers down below or winter sports in the distance.

Get out and enjoy the town with a short drive to the lake and the Village.

Book this one and "Bear Meadows Retreat" for larger parties, up to 12 people, located just next door to this condo.

name: Bear Flint - Big Bear City, CA
description:
This comfortable cabin is a great choice for a simple getaway to Big Bear Lake!  Situated on a nice flat lot in the quiet neighborhood of Upper Moonridge, this single story two bedroom 2 bath home is perfect for a small family and is just a short drive to Bear Mountain.

The living room and kitchen share the main space and features a wood burning fireplace, knotty pine walls, vaulted ceiling and tile floors throughout.  The kitchen has bar seating at the natural log counter, granite counters for meal prep, gas range, dishwasher, microwave, coffee pot and nice view to the beautiful backyard.  The family and dining room are just steps away and has a table for a meal or game night, spacious sofa and large screen TV with Blu-Ray and cable.  Step out to the back deck for relaxing in on the deck under the shade of the mature trees, or sip a cup of tea on the covered front porch.  The kids will love running around the large flat backyard.

Off a short hallway is a full bathroom and two bedrooms.  The master suite has a queen bed, TV, back deck access, 3/4 bathroom with large walk-in shower, and a bonus room with twin bed.  The second bedroom has a queen and twin bed.
NOTE: No BBQ.  3rd bedroom is the bonus room with twin bed that is walked through to get to the master bedroom.

Features:  Short Drive to Bear Mountain, Covered Front Porch, Large Back Deck, Flat Yard, Wood Burning Fireplace, TV, Cable, Internet, Blu-Ray, Upgraded Bathrooms, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Bear Creek - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 1: King and Twin Floor Sleeper (Middle Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 3: Twin over Twin Bunk and Twin over Full Bunk (Middle Level)

description:
Great family amenities! No pets allowed!

If you are planning a mountain retreat for the whole family, keeping the wishes of everyone in mind, Bear Creek has it all! Spa, horseshoes, game room, and even a playground area for the kids on a beautifully landscaped yard with a seasonal creek. Choose your own pleasure here.

Bear Creek is only a 15 minute walk to Bear Mountain Resort, Moonridge Zoo and Bear Mountain Golf Course for nearby fun. Driving just minutes, you can enjoy the Village's shops and dining, hiking, boating and many other activities Big Bear Lake has to offer. Snow Summit Ski Resort and the lake are less than a five mile drive.

This four bedroom, three and a half bath home has all amenities needed for a comfortable vacation and relaxing time. The entry level living room has a wood burning fireplace,  large flat screen TV with DirecTV and internet. Adjoining is the kitchen and dining room with large table seating eight. The kitchen comes fully equipped, has a dishwasher, all stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops and seats two at the bar. Access the upper deck from both rooms to enjoy peek-a-boo mountain views while cooking on the gas or charcoal barbeque. The house has many special touches. A pack-n-play crib is provided for the little ones to ensure a great vacation. These features make this the perfect family home.

The middle level master bedroom has a king bed, full bath including a bath tub and shower,  and a twin sleeper chair. Access the second level deck and enjoy your favorite book or nap under the sun on the hammock. Guest rooms on this level include one queen bed. The kids room has a twin over full and twin over twin bunks, sleeping five. This room also has deck access. There is also another full bathroom on this level with a bath tub/shower.

In the lower level bedroom there is a queen along with an additional twin bed and a full bath with a steam shower and laundry. There is fun to be had making memories in the game room with a pool table, pinball and another large flat screen TV with cable and wood burning fireplace. There is also a sleeper sofa for additional sleeping arrangements.

Enjoy the outdoor surroundings with a game of horseshoes, native mountain flowers in the landscaped yard. Children will love the play set with slides, swings and a mini climbing wall on the private front lawn. A covered front walkway will keep you dry in any weather the mountains have to offer. Winter, summer, spring and fall, Bear Creek can provide you and your family with endless fun, relaxation and quality family time.

Note: The home does have outdoor security cameras. Sorry, we do not accept pets at this property.

DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

description:
All Seasons on the Hill, located in the coveted Castle Glen Estates neighborhood, is a wonderful blend of scenery, luxury and comfort for your family and friends. Spend hours lounging in front of the fireplace, sharing memories in the kitchen, soaking in the hot tub or laughing over a game of pool.

This reverse floor plan cabin has plenty of room to spread out or get together.  The entry level family room has a flat screen TV with DVD player and DirecTV access.  The first bedroom has a queen log style bed, full bathroom with double sink, TV with DVD and DirecTV and front deck access with views of the lake.  Bedroom two has a queen bed and TV with DirecTV. Bedroom three has a queen bed. Bedroom four has a twin over twin bunk and pull out sofa for flexible sleeping and lounging.  A full bathroom and laundry room is also on the entry level.

Upstairs in the expansive great room you will marvel over the beautiful views of Big Bear Lake and the surrounding forest and mountains. The living room has an L-Style leather sofa and chairs, wood burning fireplace, and TV with DVD player and DirecTV.  Head over to the pool table for hours of fun or step out to the deck for fresh air, grilling on the gas barbecue or just taking in the view while you relax at the table and chairs. The kitchen features a solid log breakfast bar, log accents and beautiful honey pine cabinets with built in refrigerator, stainless steel appliances, gas stove, microwave, dishwasher, traditional coffee pot and Keurig machine. A dining area and breakfast nook offer plenty of seating for everyone.

The upper level master suite has it all.  Relax in the king bed or pull up a chair in front of the gas fireplace. Watch DirecTV or a movie on the DVD player.  Step out to the deck and soak in the hot tub, or fill up the jet tub in the master bathroom with separate toilet, large shower and double sinks.

description:
Does the hustle and bustle of city life weigh on you? Do you feel the stress of work heaping more on top? It’s probably time to just get away and we have the perfect place for you…

Clean air, starry nights, the sounds of nature, a world away from the usual city life. And the best part of the Big Bear Lake area is there is plenty to do in this serenity. You can enjoy the peace and quiet by taking a stroll along the lake, hiking or biking. Or enjoy the lake (para-sailing, boating, jet skiing, fishing, alpine slide, etc…). During the winter, Snow Summit is just a couple miles away with plenty of places to sled nearby...

Great Weekend availability - The property is great for multiple families travelling together. And with kitchens and dining area's on both floors, it's perfect for those groups on different internal clocks...

Lake view. One street up from the lake, easy walk to lakeshore, Boulder Bay Park, general store and restaurants... close to Big Bear village...a couple miles to ski resorts. Romantic views, cozy, kid friendly, pet friendly.

Ideal year-round/holiday property with full kitchen upstairs, 2 floor-to-ceiling stone fireplaces (one on each floor), living room/kitchen with stunning views. Downstairs is a full Bar area which can be used as a second kitchen [dishwasher, frig, double sink, microwave, stemware racks, cooktop, toaster oven, blender, coffee maker].

Also has an ice machine (no need to get bags of ice), game room with billiard/ping-pong table.

Hot tub – 6 person (over 100 jets)

All rooms have 2 windows to view property, with front rooms having lake views.

Features: (2) Baths (1 per floor), Microwaves, double sinks and dishwashers on each floor - perfect for extended or 2 families vacationing together! Washer and dryer in downstairs laundry room, ceiling fans in the master bedroom. Free WiFi and cable. 47” HD Smart TVs in living room and game room , DVD/BluRay players.

name: Big Bear Bungalow - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Welcome home to Big Bear Bungalow, located in the beautiful neighborhood of Fox Farm in Big Bear Lake.  This single story 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom cabin is within minutes of the slopes, lake, recreation areas, shopping, and dining.  This traditional home is ideal for a family getaway with kid friendly features, mountain decor, large living room, luxury finishes, and flat fenced yard for the little ones to run around while the adults enjoy time in the shade of the covered deck.

The open great room features a large sofa for lounging in front of the big flat screen Smart TV with Dish Network and a DVD player. The wood burning fireplace is sure to keep you warm and cozy on a snowy winter day.  For entertainment spend some time challenging each other to one of the 5 games on the convertible game table.  Two high tables and breakfast bar seating provides a good place to enjoy a home cooked meal.  The kitchen has ample counter space and desired finishes including granite counters, stainless steel appliances, a gas range with double oven, dishwasher, coffee pot and microwave.  The back yard will be a favorite hangout for everyone with the covered deck, gas barbecue, seating options, and privacy with the adjoining open back lot (private property  and not for tenant use). A washer and dryer are available for your convenience.

Down the hallway you will find a full bathroom and three bedrooms. The master suite has a king bed, electric fireplace, TV with Dish Network, back deck access, and private bathroom with double sinks and separate room with the toilet and shower that features a multi-sprayer option.  The second bedroom has a queen bed and TV with Dish.  The last bedroom has a twin with twin trundle and TV with Dish and built-in DVD player.  A Pack & Play, highchair and one bed rail are available for the little ones.

This is a great family vacation option for your next trip to beautiful Big Bear Lake!

Features: Short Drive to Conveniences, Quiet Neighborhood, Family Friendly, Wood Burning Fireplace, Multi-Option Game Table, Smart TV, Dish Network, Internet, DVD, Gas Barbecue, Covered Deck, Fenced Yard, Flat Parking, Luxury Finishes, Granite Counters, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Range, Double Oven, Dishwasher, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Bar Seating, Master Suite, Pack & Play, Highchair, Bed Rail, Central Heat, Ceiling Fans, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Birdsong Terrace - Big Bear city, CA

arrangements.Guest Room: Twin over Full Futon and Full Sleeper Sofa (Lower Level)

description:
Birdsong Terrace is a perfect place to relax in the mountains, listening to the birds. Located in upper Moonridge, just a short drive to skiing, the zoo, golf and anything else you'd like to do in Big Bear Lake. This coveted area puts the ridge in Moonridge.  Winding roads, mountain views and steep lots create a unique neighborhood for cabin rentals in Big Bear. A small cluster of restaurants, shops and businesses are at the base of the mountain offering conveniences to guests in the area.

This peaceful setting is suitable for those who are looking to get away from it all. Enjoy multiple decks nestled between the trees for wonderful outdoor living. This home features two living spaces, making ideal for multiple families, friends and couples.

The main level features and open, airy floorplan with vaulted ceilings over the living room, dining and kitchen.  Access the deck from one of two sliding patio doors for grilling on the propane barbeque, gathering around the large outdoor table or relaxing on the covered swing. Enjoy the flat screen TV with Direct TV, Playstation 2, Xbox, Wii,  and a smart Blu-Ray player with Netflix, Hulu, etc. and DVD collection of 300 DVDs in the living room. Warm up in front of the wood burning fireplace while you surf the internet with Wi-Fi capabilities.

The kitchen is stocked with all of the basic small appliances, dishes and utensils to make your stay comfortable including coffee pot, microwave, gas stove and dishwasher.

A full bathroom is conveniently located just outside the two bedrooms.  Bedroom 1 has access to the deck, queen bed, TV and stacked washer and dryer.  The second bedroom has a twin over full bunk and TV with DVD.

The downstairs bonus suite (accessed through outdoor entrance) is both functional and fun as it features a kitchenette with a small refrigerator, microwave, dining table that converts to a poker/bumper pool table, bathroom with corner shower, twin over full futon bunk, and pull-out love seat for flexible sleeping arrangements. It can be a game room or a third bedroom. Any way you use it, it is a welcoming and convenient space.

Enjoy being nestled behind trees on the lower deck. To top it off, three cars fit on the level parking pad. Birdsong Terrace has it all!

Features: 2 Living Spaces, Internet/Wi-Fi, Game Table, Stand Up Paddleboards, 2 Bikes, Guitar, Washer/Dryer, Wood Fireplace, Propane Barbeque, Decks, Tree Views, Close to Bear Mountain, Local Phone, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few dated features or appliances.

name: Blue Jay Glen Villa - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: Twin over Twin Bunks, plus extra Twin

description:
You'll feel welcome as soon as you arrive at Blue Jay Glen Villa. Pull up to this log cabin, single-story home in Moonridge and you'll find a bear statue holding a fish to greet you. Walk a few steps down and along a short bridge to meet another bear statue and to see a welcome sign with blue jays near the front door. Notice the wood porch swing, a wonderful place to relax and enjoy the quiet neighborhood.

Enter Blue Jay Glen Villa to find yourself in the open-plan living space. Notice the high wood ceilings and the mix of wood and tile floor. The interior of this home has recently undergone a major rennovation and you can be among the first to enjoy its brand new features. 


The kitchen is to your left and it comes stocked with all the tools that you'll need to create a home cooked meal. There is plenty of granite counter space, making it easy to host a holiday meal or to spend an afternoon baking. Views of the front yard can be seen through the kitchen window. Kitchen features include a microwave, gas oven, coffee pot, toaster oven, and dishwasher. Bar seating for two can be found at the kitchen island.

A large gas fireplace with a stone hearth and wood mantle will bring you warmth on a chilly night. Relax on the reclining leather sofas and watch your favorite movie on the flat-screen television with HDTV Cable.

Challenge your friends and family to a friendly game of pool. The pool table is located in the main living space. You'll also find a high-top table, a great spot for a game of cards.

Access to the back yard is through a door in the living area. The back yard is fully-fenced and has a large, tiered wood deck. The deck has recently been expanded to allow guests the opportunity to feel more submersed in nature. After a day spent on the slopes or hiking in the mountains, you'll love soaking your sore muscles in the hot tub. Grill up a feast on the propane BBQ. Enjoy your meal Al fresco on your choice of two different outdoor dining tables.

The master bedroom is located all the way down the hall to the left. The master bedroom includes a king bed with a beautiful, knotty pine bed frame. The room is spacious with high ceilings and a ceiling fan to keep you cool during the warm summer months. Views of the back yard can be seen from the master bedroom. Keep entertained with a flat-screen television with HDTV Cable and DVD player. The 3/4 en suite bathroom has double sinks.

Across from the master, is the second bedroom. This bedroom has a twin over twin bunk bed. The bunk is also a trundle, revealing an additional twin bed, for a total of three twin beds. This room has a window with views of the front of the house.

A third bedroom is found at the start of this hall, immediately to the right of the main entry door. This room has a queen bed and a window with views of the front yard.

A full size bathroom for the second and third bedroom, is located in the hall. This bathroom has a skylight and cute wildlife theme.

If the need to do laundry should arise, look inside the hall closet for a stacked washer and dryer.

Blue Jay Glen Villa is a cozy cabin that is just minutes from Bear Mountain Ski Resort and the Moonridge Alpine Zoo. It's less than a ten minute drive to Big Bear's shops, restaurants, and activities. Make Blue Jay Glen Villa your destination for your Big Bear vacation.

Features: Hot Tub, Propane BBQ, Deck, Fenced-Yard, Pool Table, Gas Fireplace, HDTV Cable, DVD Player, Microwave, Gas Oven, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Toaster Oven, Washer and Dryer.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.
address: 43259 Bow Canyon Road Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: Black Diamond Lodge - Big Bear Lake , CA
description:
Perfect for a year round getaway!  This single level cabin is located just 5 minute walk from Skyline and 2N10 trailheads for hiking and mountain biking, and is at the base of Bear Mountain Ski Resort for winter fun, the Zoo and golf course with breathtaking views of the slopes.

Enjoy a game of Foosball while you chat with family and friends in the open concept living area.  The kitchen includes a dishwasher, gas stove, large stainless steel refrigerator and counter seating at the island.  An expansive log dining table and chairs brings out the rustic cabin feel and has enough seating for 6 people.  Relax on the comfortable sofa and watch cable TV or a movie on the DVD player while you warm up after a day on the slopes in front of the wood burning fireplace.   Take in the breathtaking  panoramic vistas outside on the large back deck while you grill on the propane or charcoal barbecues or soak in the hot tub overlooking the slopes.

You will sleep comfortably in one of three bedrooms.  The spacious master bedroom has a king bed, TV with DVD player and cable and an attached bathroom with double sinks and large tub.  The second bedroom features a beautiful queen bed, while the third bedroom has extra sleeping space on a twin over full, solid log bunk bed and TV with NFL PACKAGE with DVD player.  A large, full bathroom is conveniently located in the hall, as well as a washer and dryer.

Features: Fully Stocked Kitchen, Fully Furnished, Foosball Table,Hot Tub,  Close to Bear Mountain, Charcoal & Propane Barbeques, Pet Friendly, Wood Burning Fireplace, Internet, Flat Screen TVs (Bunk Bed Room DVD player, No Cable), Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Front Loading Washer & Dryer, Central Heating, Linens and Towels Provided.

Note: Always carry tire chains in the winter.  Driveway is fairly steep.  There are several stairs leading down to the front door.

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with high quality interior design. Enjoy a pleasing and upscale decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Big Bear Lake Haven - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 4: King and Twin over Twin Bunk (Main Level)

description:
Enjoy beautiful Bear Mountain Resort views from this 2,600 square foot cabin, close enough to walk to Bear Mountain Resort, golfing, hiking, biking trails and the zoo.  Plus, it's only a short drive to grocery stores, the Village's shops, Oktoberfest, sledding and many other fun events Big Bear has to offer!.

Sit and relax in the hot tub while watching skiers on Bear Mountain or star gazing. Enjoy football games and movies on the flat screen TV with cable or cozy up to the large rock wood burning fireplace while enjoying the views from all the main living areas and master bedroom. Internet is also available.  The kitchen is stocked with all the basics and includes a gas range, dishwasher, microwave, and coffee pot. The laundry room is just off the kitchen. Outside you will find both propane and charcoal barbecues..

This spacious home sleeps up to 14 people and is kid and pet friendly. The rates are better than most for the number it accommodates! Enjoy playing a game of pool, shuffleboard and ping pong in the game room, with cable TV and movies available for all ages. There are two card tables as well!

The main level has a full bathroom and two bedrooms.  The first bedroom has a queen and twin bed.  The second bedroom has a king and twin over twin bunk and allows access to the lower level game room.  Upstairs is the master bedroom with a full bathroom, and a king and full bed.  The last bedroom has two queens and a twin bed.  A bathroom is located in the hallway.

This fully equipped and furnished cabin is available nightly, weekly or monthly at various seasonal rates.

Note: The driveway is medium steep and during the winter can be very  difficult to get up an get down. During the winter, overnight light snow  can make the driveway dangerous. Please make sure the driveway is safe  to exit and remember to use salt. If it has snowed recently or during  your stay do not attempt to use the driveway without chains. If you need  our help, please call us and we can help you at no charge.

DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

Features: Internet, Cable TV, HDTV, DVD Players, VHS Players, Movies, Shuffelboard, Pool Table, Ping Pong, Washer, Dryer, Charcoal & Gas Propane BBQ, Mountain and Slope Views, Walk to Slopes, Zoo, Hiking, Biking, Golf, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Linens and Towels Provided, Parking for 5 Cars, Hot Tub

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishings and desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances..

name: Boulder Bay Cove Lakefront - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Queen and Twin Over a Twin Trundle (Upper Level)

description:
As of September 26, 2018, the water depth for dock use about 5 feet to 6 feet deep. Please be aware there is an abundance of lake weeds at this dock.

Location: 10 minute drive to the Village, 13 minute drive to Snow Summit Resort, 15 minute drive to Bear Mountain Resort

This lakefront cabin is sure to bring back memories of your childhood vacations, while being a great location for making new ones!  Situated in a quiet neighborhood on the shore of Boulder Bay, this rustic mountain retreat has historic features and panoramic lake and mountain views from almost all of the rooms, or spend time on the private dock. Kick back and relax  in the fresh air under the aspen and pine trees. Has separate guest suite.  

This property is perfect for the guest who is looking for a cabin rental that won't break the bank. Generally simple decor and filled with basic furnishings and amenities that will meet most of your needs for an enjoyable vacation.

Living Room: Sofa, Over size Wood Burning Fireplace, Flat Screen TV, Cable, DVD, Family Games, Lake Views, Knotty Pine Accents, Deck Access

Kitchen: Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Stove, Oven, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Dining Area, Patio Access

Bathrooms: 3/4 Bathroom on Main Level, Full Bathroom on Upper Level, 3/4 Bathroom in Lower Level Guest Suite

Outdoor Features:  Propane Barbeque, Hot Tub, Lakefront, Large Deck, Dock, 2 Parking Areas

General Features: Internet, Foosball Table (Upper Level), Dog Friendly, Towels and Linens Provided

Guest Suite is located through outdoor entrance and ideal for couples desiring a private space of their own.  Features a King bed, Wood Burning Stove, TV, Bathroom, Lake Views

Note: Lower parking area is steep and chains are recommended during times of snow. Outdoor cameras present in the community area.

Lake levels vary throughout the year and boat docks availability  is not guaranteed at the time of your arrival. Destination Big Bear is  not responsible for the level of water in the lake during the course of  guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most up-to-date  lake levels for lakefront properties.

name: Boulder Birdhouse - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
***DUE TO DROUGHT CONDITIONS AND EXTREMELY LOW WATER LEVELS, THE BOAT DOCK IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.***

Live the lakefront cabin life for your next Big Bear Lake vacation! Boulder Birdhouse is perfect for your next family getaway.  Spend your days on the private dock overlooking Boulder Bay, or relax on one of the two large decks enjoying the fabulous views, listening to the birds while you grill on the propane barbeque or soak in the hot tub.  Fresh mountain air and sunshine await!

The reverse floor plan features two spacious bedrooms on the entry level with a shared bathroom with shower.  One bedroom has a king bed and twin bed that is perfect for lounging while watching cable TV or just looking out the window.  The second bedroom has a queen bed, pack-n-play and European style washer/dryer tucked away in the closet for your convenience.

Upstairs is the main living area with full views of the lake from the open kitchen and living room with updated furnishings and gas fireplace.  When night falls the group can relax on the sofa watching movies or cable TV on the large flat screen, or play a game at the table in the dining area featuring a brick wall and skylight.  The kitchen has beautiful solid surface countertops, updated appliances, gas stove, microwave, dishwasher and unbeatable views of Boulder Bay.

Upstairs you will also find the third bedroom with full sized bed and a full bathroom with tub conveniently located just off the main living area.

***DUE TO DROUGHT CONDITIONS AND EXTREMELY LOW WATER LEVELS, THE BOAT DOCK IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.***

Note: Lake levels vary throughout the year and boat docks availability is not guaranteed at the time of your arrival. Destination Big Bear is not responsible for the level of water in the lake during the course of guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most up-to-date lake levels for lakefront properties.

Features: Hot Tub, Recently Updated, Lakefront, Views of Boulder Bay, Propane Barbeque, Cable TV, Internet, Flat Screen TVs, European Washer/Dryer, Gas Fireplace, Central Heat, Linens and Towels Provided

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or  completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a  pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated  fixtures and appliances.
