name: Buckland Coffey Haus - Big Bear City, CA

arrangements.Master Bedroom: King, Full Bath, Fireplace, TV (Upper Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 2: Twin, Twin over Full, Game Tables, TV (Upper Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 3: Queen, Twin over Twin, TV (Upper Level)

description:
Enjoy a delightful stay in Big Bear at this wonderful cabin located in the upper Moonridge area!  Take a leisurely stroll around the quiet neighborhood, sit out on the back deck and take in the fresh mountain air, or cozy up inside in front of the wood burning fireplace.

The living room has a charming mountain feel with knotty pine accents, tile floor and fireplace.  Relax and watch your favorite shows or a movie on the flat screen TV with cable, or one of the DVD in the extensive collection.  A full bathroom is right around the corner for your convenience.  Step through to the dining room and kitchen for a hot plate of pancakes in the morning. There is plenty of counter space as well as stainless steel appliances including a gas range, dishwasher, microwave, coffee pot and toaster oven.

The back deck and fenced yard is sure to be a popular hang out spot while enjoying a soak in the hot tub.

Upstairs you will find the bedrooms and a full bathroom.  The master suite has a king bed, wood fireplace, TV with cable and DVD, private deck and a full bathroom with tub, double sinks, and separate room with the toilet and shower.  Down the hall are two more bedrooms.  One bedroom doubles as a game room for hours of entertainment on the shuffleboard and Foosball tables as well as a TV with cable.  A twin size day bed and twin over full bunk provide comfortable places to sleep or lounge.  The last bedroom has a queen bed, twin over twin bunk and TV with cable. There is a air hockey table located in the garage and a game table for hours of friendly competition!

This cabin is sure to be the perfect spot to create new vacation memories in Big Bear!

Features: Shuffleboard, Foosball, AIr Hockey, Wood Fireplace, Deck, Fenced Backyard, TV, Cable, Internet, DVD, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Dining Table, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Broken Arrow Lodge - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Situated in the lovely Fox Farm neighborhood of Big Bear Lake, enjoy an evening stroll, bring your bikes or head over to the resorts!  You are just a few minutes from Bear Mountain and everything Big Bear has to offer!

This cabin sits on a large corner lot with beautiful mature trees.  The knotty pine cathedral ceiling highlights the open and airy great room.  Get cozy in front of the river rock gas fireplace on one of the two leather sofas.  Tune into your favorite show on the large flat screen TV with cable.  The dining area has seating for 8 with extra seating at the breakfast bar.  The kitchen has all the upgrades you are looking for including granite counters, stainless steel appliances, gas range with double oven, dishwasher, microwave and coffee pot.  The front deck has a propane barbecue and plenty of shade for a pleasant afternoon of grilling.

Down the hall you will find a washer and dryer, a full bathroom and three bedrooms.  The master suite has a queen bed, futon, private 3/4 bathroom with large shower and back deck access that features an elevated deck tucked in among the trees.  The second bedroom has a queen bed and futon.  The third bedroom has a full bed with twin trundle and TV with cable.

This cabin is sure to make your Big Bear Lake vacation memorable!
Note: This single story cabin has an elevated front door with stairs, and ground level back entrance through master bedroom.

Features: Close to Bear Mountain, Decks, Yard, Propane Barbecue, Gas Fireplace, Flat Screen TV, Cable, Internet, Stainless Steel Appliances, Granite Counters, Gas Range with Double Oven, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Dishwasher, Washer and Dryer, Central Heat, Towels and Linens Provided.

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Blue Moon - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
The mountain skyline view from this home seems close enough to touch. Enjoy a hot cup of cocoa on a fresh winter morning, while watching the busy slopes of Bear Mountain Resort. Gaze at the summer skies just as the Blue Moon sets behind the horizon. From a beautifully landscaped yard, you can relax and take in the mountain scenery or barbeque for the family on the propane grill. Or enjoy a game of pool located in the garage!

This three bedroom home offers a timber lodge feeling from strong, rugged beams to wooden floors with earthy tiles and rustic decor for warmth and harmony. Having the master bedroom downstairs with it's own bathroom and patio entrance to a secluded deck ensures great privacy.

Create meals and memories in the spacious, fully equipped kitchen. Laugh amongst those memories while serving at the family sized dining table, perfect for holidays. This cabin offers internet, flat screen TV's, and a custom built lodge pole pine desk to catch up on work in a quiet atmosphere with a great view for inspiration.

Features: Internet, Flat screen TV's, Cable,  Pool Table, Large Dining Table, Dishwasher,  Propane BBQ, 2 Decks, 2 Driveways, Spa, 2 Fireplaces (living room is wood burning, bedroom is gas), Pet Friendly Home, Washer & Dryer


This is a luxury property which includes the finest furnishings, luxury building materials, and a highly consistent design theme. Luxury properties range from elegant and formal to relaxed and chic, but all appeal to guests who appreciate first-class accommodations with a designer flair.

name: Cabin in the Pines - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Loft: Twin and Queen and Couch with TV (Upper Level)

description:
Experience a true cabin feeling and a short walk to Snow Summit Resort!

This adorable cabin has been in the family for years. Rustic features, a cozy fireplace and open floor plan are perfect for a mountain vacation.

Surrounded by tall pine trees, you can't beat the location of this cabin for seasonal fun all year round.

Features: Wood Burning Fireplace, Open Floor Plan, Bonus Loft, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Linens and Towels Provided, 2 TV's, DVD Player, Flat Yard

Note: NO BBQ AT THE PROPERTY, washer or dryer.

This cabin is one of the best deals for guests on a budget. The property may be showing a bit of wear and tear on the inside, but all of the basic furnishings are present. The property is ideal for those who value location instead of décor, are on a tight budget, or are simply less concerned with the appearance of the property or amenities.

name: Bond Chateau - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: Twin over Twin Bunk, Queen (Upper Level)

description:
Located near it all, Bond Chateau is a great location for all of your Big Bear needs! Close to dining, shopping, and just a short drive to the Village, this two story home will keep you close to all the action! This home away from home has ample parking and ton of deck space for all of your summer outdoor needs!

When you enter the living area, you’ll notice gorgeous large windows and double sliding glass doors, which allows plenty of beautiful Big Bear sunshine! The living area features comfy seating, a wood burning  fireplace and a large flat screen TV for catching the big game or movie night! Leading into the kitchen is bar seating for four. The kitchen has beautiful wood floors and is equipped with everything you need to have a lovely dinner night in! There is a dining area with seating for five for the family to gather around. Just off the dining area is a game room with a foosball table for a little friendly fun and competition! There is also a full size washer and dryer for your convenience. 

The master bedroom is on the first level and features a king size bed and private deck access. There is plenty of storage and a full bath with a tub, shower and dual sinks. Head upstairs for more sleeping options! Bedroom two has a twin size bunk bed as well as a queen size bed. Great for the little ones or guests! Bedroom three features a king size bed and plenty of dressers for storage. There is a bath that opens to both bedrooms with a shower. Perfect for a steam after a long day of Big Bear fun!

The fenced back yard features a deck and plenty of shade for outdoor fun! Head to the front deck to relax in the hot tub or fire up the propane grill. Great for those long summer days!

For a convenient location, a comfy home away from home, and plenty of parking for your group, Bond Chateau is the Big Bear getaway for you!

Features: Hot Tub, WiFi, Flat Screen TV, Wood Burning Fireplace, Foosball Table, Full Size Washer and Dryer, Decks, Propane Grill
address: 470 Crystal Lake Rd. Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: Camp Runamuck - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Stay close to Bear Mountain in this beautiful cabin that has been finished in a cozy, log cabin style.  The open floor plan is spacious and welcoming with wood floors, pine wood accents throughout and a natural stone fireplace.

The living room features an extra large sofa with room for everyone to enjoy the wood burning stove while watching TV with cable and Blu-Ray player.  The dining room is highlighted by the wood burning fireplace and vaulted ceilings.  The kitchen has extra seating at the breakfast bar so you can keep the cook in the family company.  The kitchen has a large stainless steel refrigerator, gas cook top, wall oven, coffee pot, microwave and dishwasher.

The front deck is set up for entertaining with a high top bar, table and propane barbecue. Bring a basketball and shoot some hoops in the driveway. The backyard has a hot tub for enjoying after a day full of adventure.

Through a small hallway you will find a full bathroom as well as two bedrooms.  The first bedroom has a queen bed and front deck access.  The second bedroom has a queen bed, private full bathroom and access to the back yard. A laundry room is available for your convenience.  Upstairs is a lovely master suite with king bed, TV with cable, small private deck and full bathroom with large tub and separate shower.

Your family will have fun in Big Bear Lake at Camp Runamuk!

Features: Close to Bear Mountain, Wood Burning Fireplaces, Hot Tub, Propane Barbecue, Deck, Basketball Hoop, Flat Screen TVs, Blu-Ray, Cable, Internet, Gas Stove Top, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Master Suite, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing cabin themed decor, newer furniture, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.

name: Canyon Retreat - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 1: King with Private Bathroom and Jetted tub
arrangements.Bedroom 2: Full over Full Bunk and Trundle
arrangements.Bedroom 3: Full over Full Bunk and Trundle

description:
Few Big Bear cabin rentals exude luxury in the middle of nature in the same manner as Canyon Retreat. From the stainless steel appliances and flat screen televisions inside to the large hot tub outside on the patio, this cabin is made for luxurious relaxation.

The feeling of being in nature is not lost at this rental cabin as you might think, considering its luxurious qualities. It is easy to feel like a part of the wilderness around you because the front of the cabin has big window panes. The natural light just pours in throughout the entire day and you can observe the forest that surrounds you and feel completely at peace.

Canyon Retreat will undoubtedly give you everything that you require to have a thoroughly relaxing vacation, away from the non-stop, hectic pace of life back in the real world. That is one of the most valued aspects of this cabin, and Big Bear as a whole, along with being a calming breath of fresh air in this frantic world. So, when you are planning your next vacation, be sure you plan to stay here in Big Bear at Canyon Retreat so you can relax, explore, and accomplish whatever your heart may desire.

Features: TV/DVD/CD Player, Cable, Apple TV, WiFI, Outdoor Hot Tub, Fully Equipped Kitchen, Wood Burning Rock Fireplace, Large Outdoor Deck, Propane BBQ, Washer/Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided
address: 43241 Bow Canyon Road Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: Bungalow at Rathbun Creek - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Grab a few friends, load up the pups!  This place is perfect for your mountain getaway! It's all about the location for this classic Big Bear cabin. Walking distance to the Bear Mountain shuttles.

Nestled in the pines, this quaint cabin is sure to satisfy your craving for fresh mountain air. The living room area features a wood burning fireplace. Relax in front of the fire, enjoy the large flat screen TV and stream your device on the home's WIFI.  This cabin has plenty of room for enjoying your mountain escape!. Have a cup of coffee at the kitchen bar or play a friendly board game at the rustic kitchen table. Bake fresh cookies in the cabin's super-cute vintage oven.  With it's well-stocked kitchen including a standard coffee maker, microwave, gas range and refrigerator, you won't need to head out for a single meal.

You will find two bedrooms to accomodate your group, both located on the north and south side of the cabin. The north facing bedroom features a Twin over Full bunk, flat screen TV and a DVD/VCR combo. The south facing bedroom features a Queen size bed and a flat screen TV that is HDMI compatible. This room is a great place to rest after your mountain excursions!

Enjoy the warm sun on the front porch or head to the large flat back yard area to enjoy the charcoal BBQ and serene private setting. This cabin is the perfect little getaway.

Features: Near Bear Mountain, Wood Burning Fireplace, Internet, Standard Coffee Maker, Charcoal BBQ,  Pet friendly, Towels and Linens Provided

Note: This property is perfect for the guest who is looking for a cabin rental that won't break the bank. Generally simple decor and filled with basic furnishings and amenities that will meet most of your needs for an enjoyable vacation.

name: Carefree Cottage - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Your trip to Big Bear will be carefree when you stay at this cabin that is all about relaxing and enjoying your vacation.  Whether it's winter, spring, summer or fall, there are ways to enjoy every season in comfort. The large covered back patio has seating, ceiling fans and a TV to watch the game while you grill at the gas barbecue. If catching some rays is more your style you can lounge in the sun or pop up the umbrella and take a nap in the shade. The garage can be used for parking or fold out the ping pong table for hours of entertainment.  You can even set up the corn hole set indoors or out! The property is all gated for additional privacy and security!

Inside you will find the living space warm and welcoming with wood floors, wood burning fireplace, TV with streaming capabilities and cable, and comfortable sofas for gathering.  The dining table can be used for your family meal or game night.  The kitchen boasts bar seating and upgraded amenities including granite counters and stainless steel appliances.

Down the hallway is a stacked washer and dryer, a 3/4 bathroom and two bedrooms.  The master bedroom has a king bed and private full bathroom.  The second bedroom has a twin over queen bunk.

For those looking for a bit of privacy but want to be close to everyone you can stay in the suite located above the garage.  This space includes its own living room, bathroom, wood floors, sofa, TV, small deck, kitchen with gas range, microwave and fridge, table and chairs and bedroom with a queen bed.

Come up to Big Bear for a stay at Carefree Cottage and leave your worries at home!

Note: Central A/C available at an additional charge.

Outside entrance to suite above the garage. No dishwasher.

Features: Close to Marina, Covered Patio, Gas Barbecue, Ping Pong Table, Wood Burning Fireplace, TV, Cable, Streaming, Granite Counters, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Range, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Cedarhaus Rules - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: Queen, Twin, and Twin Trundle (Upper Level)

description:
This cozy cabin is great for anyone looking to be close to the slopes!  Enjoy the outdoors with a very spacious fenced, flat backyard that's wonderful for children. Sorry, this cabin is no longer pet friendly.  The cabin features two beautiful decks with a smaller deck in front and a back deck with table seating and a hot tub to view the stars after a fun day at the lake or on the slopes.

Nestled in a great location within walking distance to the National Forest for a hike or sledding, one block walk to the driving range, or just a little further stroll to Bear Mountain Resort, the Golf Course and Moonridge Zoo.  Or take a short drive to the lake and the Village.

The main level has comfortable seating in the living room with wood burning fireplace, large flat screen TV, and Foosball table for indoor fun.  The kitchen has all the basic necessities with gas stove and microwave.  A full bathroom is off the hallway leading to the downstairs bedroom with king bed, and a short flight of stairs leads up to the loft for additional sleeping on a queen or two twin beds.

Note: We ask that you not smoke in the house. No pets. Extra cleaning  fees will apply. No cable TV but Roku and internet for entertainment.

Features: 46” Samsung LCD Flat Screen TV, Wi-Fi, Outdoor Hot Tub, Wood Burning Fireplace, Internet, Roku with HBO, DVD player, PlayStation 2, Linens and Towels Provided, Stocked Kitchen, Microwave, Board Games, Foosball Table, Charcoal Barbecue, Smoker Grill, Stereo featuring Wireless I-Tunes, Washer/Dryer, Local Telephone

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few  dated features or appliances.

name: Classic Bear - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Game Room: Twin Over Queen Bunk, Sleeper Sofa (Lower Level)

description:
Feel right at home at this ideally located getaway! This multi-level home has everything you need to enjoy your Big Bear vacation! Located in lower Moonridge, Classic Bear will keep you close to skiing, golf, dining and the zoo. With gorgeous views of the mountains, you will surely love spending time at this home away from home!

You will enter into a beautifully tiled and decorated kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, oven, coffee maker, toaster oven, and microwave. Whip up a delicious meal in with all the tools provided! Just off kitchen is a dining area with seating for six. Step into the open living and dining area with formal seating for six. Have a seat and relax in front of the wood burning fireplace on the large leather sofa and oversized arm chairs. The living area also features a small dining area with seating for three. Enjoy the game or movie night on the large flat screen TV with HDTV Dish and a DVD player!

Dine al fresco with amazing views of the mountains out on the deck with seating for six! There is also a propane grill for the BBQ master in your group!

Level one features a full bath and three bedrooms. The master bedroom has a king size bed, a flat screen TV, as well as a private master bath. Bedroom two has a full size bed with incredible views. (Please note: The fireplace in this bedroom isn’t functional.) Bedroom three has a queen size bed.

Head downstairs to the third level and find the game room! It features a large flat screen TV, a pool table, and a Foosball table for some friendly competition! Level three also features a powder room, a sleeper sofa, and a twin over queen size bunk bed. Great for the kiddos!

There’s plenty of room for everyone, so get your friends and family and come enjoy your stay at Classic Bear!

Features:  Mountain Views, Propane Grill, Wood Burning Fireplace, Stainless Steel Appliances, HDTV Dish, DVD Player, Full Size Washer and Dryer, Foosball Table, Pool Table, Flat Screen TVs

name: Castle Glen Gem - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
This Castle Glen Estates  property is the perfect mountain getaway. Located in a quiet  area of Big Bear, this home is sure to provide  for a relaxing stay with family and friends, and is sure to evoke a new yearly tradition.

Entering into this gorgeous custom built home, you are greeted in the entry by a custom wrought iron chandelier. To the right is an eat in breakfast nook with seating up to 10 guests. The custom cooks kitchen will be sure to provide the perfect place to prepare a gourmet meal or simple charcuterie spread.  Complete with upgraded stainless steel appliances including a side by side fridge/freezer combo, double wall oven, dishwasher, microwave and counter top stove. The large picture window provides the perfect amount of direct sunlight.

Making your way into the dining area you will find a large rustic style table with seating for 6 guests and additional seating at the kitchen counter. The expansive floor to ceiling windows and doors provide the most excellent wooded forest view. The high vaulted ceilings give an open feel to the space. Sit around the wood burning fireplace and enjoy your favorite movie or show on the large flat screen TV with VHS/ DVD player provided, or use the homes cable or WIFI internet to stream your favorite device.

Head out onto the deck to enjoy a nice barbecue on the homes propane grill with seating and that gorgeous view.

In the main living area you will find a half bath with a laundry area complete with a full size washer and dryer for your use.

You will also find the master suite just off the living area. The room provides for a very relaxing setting with a king size bed, antique chandeliers with drippy crystal prisms and warm wood used throughout. Watch a movie on the flat screen TV or relax in the oversized bathtub. The master bath area has dual sinks, a shower stall and extensive custom travertine tile.

Head downstairs where you will find outdoor access just at the landing. Head out to the backyard area where you will find a park like setting with a seating area. Perfect for an outdoor picnic lunch or gathering.

Step back inside where you will find an open concept bedroom with a large workspace, deck access a twin over full bunk with twin trundle and TV with VCR.

Down the hall you will find two additional bedrooms both complete with queen size beds, gorgeous views and deck access. At the end of the hall you will find a full jack and jill style bathroom with double sinks and a private toilet area.

Lastly you will find the game room of the home. Complete with a pool table, dart board and a lounging area. There is a pub style table and a large flat screen TV with a VCR/DVD combo provided for your use.

Features: Central Heat, Wood Burning Fireplace, Upgraded Stainless Steel Appliances, Breakfast Nook, Dining Room, Pool Table, Dart Board, Cable, Internet, WIFI, Flat Screen TVs, VCR/DVD Players, Washer and Dryer, Propane Barbecue, Outdoor Seating Garden Area, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Chalet d' Aspet - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
If you are looking for a cabin with a view, look no further than Chalet d'Aspet!  Located in the hills of the upper Moonridge neighborhood, this cabin has sweeping views of the slopes and lake.

This reverse floor plan cabin features the master suite with indoor hot tub, private 3/4 bath, king bed and small deck with views on the entry level.  The second bedroom is across the hall and has a queen bed and private full bath.

Head upstairs to the main living area with plenty of windows and doors leading out to the deck with a natural gas grill and table and chairs for relaxing.  The living room has a wood burning fireplace, TV with cable and DVD player and internet.  The dining area joins the living room and updated kitchen with has granite counters, stainless steel appliances, gas range, microwave, coffee pot and dishwasher.  The third bedroom is on the upper level and has a queen bed and private full bath.
NOTE: You are renting a home with an INDOOR HOT TUB.  Chlorine vapors may exist.

Features: Slope and Lake Views, Wood Burning Fireplace, Indoor Hot Tub, Cable, Internet, DVD, Updated Kitchen, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Deck, Central Heat, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Comfy Cabin - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Get "Comfy" in this Big Bear cabin located just blocks from Snow Summit, the Village, the lake and conveniences.  Comfy Cabin is a great family cabin with desired amenities including a hot tub, updated kitchen, wood burning fireplace, and two barbecues.

Step inside this welcoming home where the living room has seating for all on the wrap-around leather sofa in front of the TV with Dish Network.  The kitchen is just steps away and has granite counters, gas range, dishwasher, microwave, and coffee pot.  For outdoor cooking the fenced backyard has a charcoal and propane barbecue.  The hot tub is the perfect place to relax after a day on the slopes or time spent out on the water.  Kick back in the shade of the many pine trees and enjoy a glass or wine or your morning cup of Joe.

Off the living room is a washer and dryer, full bathroom and master bedroom.  The master has a king bed, TV with Dish Network, private full bathroom and backyard access. Down the hallway is two more bedrooms.  One bedroom has a queen bed, and the last bedroom has a queen and TV with Dish Network.

This cabin is sure to please everyone during your comfy stay in Big Bear!

Features:  Blocks From Snow Summit and Lake, Hot Tub, Wood Burning Fireplace, Barbecues, Dish Network, Internet, Updated Kitchen, Granite Counters, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Colusa Star - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Suite: King with Fireplace, Master Bathroom, Private Deck with Spa and Outside Fireplace, Sitting Area with Wet Bar, Wine Cooler & Coffee Station, Gorgeous Views of Ski Slopes
arrangements.Bedroom 2 (JR Suite): Queen, 2 Twin Trundle with Private Bathroom with Jacuzzi Jet Tub, and Deck

description:
Colusa Star is a mountain masterpiece! No expense was spared in the construction of the home or the amenities and design elements. With cascading mountain and lake views, this multi level property defines luxury mountain living. 

The expansive open floor plan provides enough room for all of your family and friends. Enter into the home where you will find  mosaic pebble stone and tile artwork that continues throughout the home. To the right of the entrance is a seating area with a gas log fireplace, and front porch access. The perfect area to read a book. 

Entering the gourmet kitchen is an aspiring chefs dream with six burner gas stove top, double wall oven, dishwasher, microwave, high end appliances, and plenty of counter space for entertaining. Holiday meals are sure to be remembered at the dining table overlooking the mountains. For the coffee enthusiast, there is also an espresso machine, Keurig, and standard coffee maker. For the wine enthusiast, there are wine coolers on each level including the master suite. Stay entertained indoors with a shuffleboard table and arcade console.

The impressive dining area has floor to ceiling windows, massive vaulted wood beam ceilings and a large farmhouse syle dining table with seating for 14 guests. There are an additional 6 seats and the kitchen counter. The seating area in the dining room provides the perfect place to relax and enjoy the gas log fireplace and cascading mountain and ski slope views. 

A beautiful seasonal waterfall feature can be enjoyed from the front deck. Fantastic back decks with views of the ski slopes and lake are the ideal location for enjoying Big Bear's famous sunsets or relax and star gaze in the eight person outdoor hot tub. Grill on the propane barbecue or soak up the sun on one of the many seating areas. 

Found on the upper floor, the master bedroom is fit for royalty with ski slope views and private sitting area with wet bar and a Keurig. It has a flatscreen TV,  gas log fireplace, and a King size bed. The bathroom has radiant heating and a heated towel rack to ensure you stay nice and toasty after a soak in the tub.  

Head down the lighted staircase to the bottom floor where you will find a cozy sleeping nook, a laundry room with a full size washer and dryer available for your use.

Here you will also find a bedroom with a Queen bed, flatscreen TV and deck access. Across the hall you will find a Jr Suite with a Queen bed, full size bathroom and deck access. The third bedroom is complete with a Queen bed and a flat screen TV. You will find an additional full size bathroom down the hall. 

The quality and attention to detail of this property is second to none.  Every fixture in the home is high end from heated restroom floors, copper sinks and high end tile, flooring and furnishings you are sure to impress your guests. 

Features: Custom Woodwork, Luxury Finishes, Slope and Lake Views, Heated Driveway, Wine Coolers, Hot Tub, Multiple Decks,  Propane Barbecue, Shuffleboard, Arcade Console, Gourmet Kitchen, Multiple Fireplaces, Flat Screen TVs, Master Suite, Heated Bathroom Floors, Bamboo Wood Floors, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Chateau Sasquatch - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Your family will appreciate this adorable updated cabin centrally located within minutes of the grocery stores, restaurants, Bear Mountain, convention center and lake!

The cabin features wood floors on the main level and an open floor plan.  The living room has comfortable sofa seating in front of the flat screen TV with streaming and the wood burning fireplace, perfect for chilly winter nights.  Step into the kitchen with stainless steel appliances, granite counters and stocked with all the basics to make cooking on vacation easy.  The corner dining table is ideal for a meal or game night.  A full bathroom is on the main level for your convenience.

For entertainment you can head into the game room complete with pool table, game console, laundry and TV with streaming.  Spend time in the great outdoors on the large deck while the kids play below in the fenced back yard.  A propane grill will have you cooking steaks and burgers in no time!

When evening falls, head upstairs to one of the two bedrooms.  One has a twin and queen bed and the other has a full and queen bed.  A 3/4 bathroom is in the upstairs hall.

This cabin is perfect for your next family getaway!

Note: Absolutely NO open fires (wood or charcoal) allowed!

Features: Close to Bear Mountain, Grocery and Lake, Updated Kitchen, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Range, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Dishwasher, Pool Table, Washer and Dryer, Fenced Back Yard, Wood Fireplace, Propane Barbecue, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Cozy Bear Haven - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Absolutely NO SMOKING - inside or outside
Head up to the mountains and get comfortable in Cozy Bear Haven, located in the beautiful neighborhood of Upper Moonridge, just 3 miles from Bear Mountain and conveniences.

This single story, 3 bedroom, 3 bath cabin features an open floor plan, river rock wood burning fireplace for cozy nights and a hot tub.  The living room boasts comfortable seating, large flat screen TV with cable and DVD player with a selection of movies for you to enjoy.  A solid log table and benches are perfect for the kids to play games.  The dining area has a table and chairs with additional seating at the breakfast bar.  The kitchen has ample counter space making meal prep a breeze along with the gas range, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot.  The back yard is nicely landscaped and the deck is ideal for relaxing, grilling on the natural gas barbecue or soaking in the hot tub.

Down the hallway is a full bathroom, laundry room and three bedrooms.  The master bedroom has a log style king bed, TV with cable and private bathroom with tub, shower and double sinks.  The second master has a queen bed, TV with cable and DVD player and private 3/4 bath with large shower.  The last bedroom has a queen and twin bed, and TV with cable and DVD player.

This cabin is great for your next family getaway to Big Bear Lake!

Features: 3 Miles to Bear Mountain, Quiet Neighborhood, Hot Tub, Deck, Natural Gas Barbecue, Cable, Internet, DVD, Wood Burning Fireplace, Carpet, Ceiling Fans, Central Heat, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Microwave, Coffee Pot, 2 Master Bedrooms, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and desired appliances.

name: Dancing Bear Lodge - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Full, Twin over Full Bunk, Rollaway (Not Pictured)

description:
This gorgeous log home is just minutes from Bear Mountain for a comfortable stay with traditional mountain decor. Perfect for couples, families or small groups.

The open living area with its soaring ceiling, spectacular log interior and beautiful gas rock fireplace is warm and welcoming after a day on the slopes or at the lake. Extensive log style accents and mountain style decor throughout this home capture the true mountain feeling. The living room opens up to the dining and kitchen areas for a great room feel. The spacious kitchen features wood cabinetry, expansive counter tops keeping the warm and welcoming atmosphere of the rest of this home while offering every amenity. Step out to the back deck and grill on the propane barbeque or sit back and enjoy the fresh air in the over sized back yard with mature pine trees.

This home is a perfect welcome to Big Bear at its best.  After a day on the slopes or at the lake, relax and enjoy the peace and quiet from the back deck while soaking in the outdoor hot tub. There is endless stargazing here at night in the mountains. The fully fenced back yard has lots of room for the little ones to run around.

The master suite is warm and inviting with separate deck access, king size bed, bathroom with tub/shower combo, and flat screen TV. The second bedroom has a twin over full bunk bed and a small sofa to read a book. The third bedroom has a queen bed, ceiling fan and TV no cable..  A shared bathroom is just off the hall with tub/shower combo.

This home is ideally located for seasonal fun and relaxation, you'll truly appreciate having everything nearby while feeling tucked away in your mountain log home.

Features: Hot Tub, Deck, Large Fenced Yard,  Propane BBQ, Gas Fireplace, Log Home Accents, Flat Screen TV, Convenient Location, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided.


This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Two of the bedrooms only have DVD players. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Crystal Lake Inn - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master bedroom: King and Full with a Bathroom Suite, Sunken Bathtub and Separate Shower (Main Level)

description:
Beautiful cabin in the desirable Fox Farm area located on a corner lot with plenty of trees and very lush landscaping.  Enjoy this peaceful setting on your vacation.

This comfortable home has a family room and a living room.  The family room opens up to the dining area which features french doors with access to an expansive deck.   The living room has cathedral ceilings making the space feel nice and open.  Cozy up next to one of the two wood fireplaces either in the living room or the family room.

Overlooking the living area is a loft which has the game room featuring an air hockey table, pool table, Arcade game called Silk Worm, a basketball hoop, Foosball table and a unique bar for entertaining including a bar sink.

Ceiling fans throughout the home will help keep you cool in the summer time. 

Master bedroom has French doors leading out to an expansive size deck with patio seating as well as it's own bathroom with tub and shower. The spacious bedrooms have ample sleeping space for everyone after a full day of fun.

Features:  Ceiling Fan, Washer/Dryer, Game Room, Wood Burning Fireplaces, Natural Gas BBQ, Local Phone, Gas Stove, Dishwasher, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Linens Provided, Cable TV,  Flat Yard, Fenced Yard, Basketball Hoop Outdoors

Note: Air hockey table is functional but scoreboard does not work. The arcade game "Silk Worm" is currently out of order until further notice. We apologize for any inconveniences this may cause.

DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few  dated features or appliances that will meet most of your needs for an enjoyable vacation..
address: 124 Crystal Lake Road Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: Cloud 9 - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 1: Queen, Twin over Full Bunk, Full Bath (Entry Level)

description:
Enjoy a mountain getaway at Cloud 9!  This comfortable cabin has it all: hot tub, game table, fireplaces, cable, internet and less than a mile from Bear Mountain!

The entry level features a family room for evenings of entertainment with wood burning fireplace, air hockey table, and large flat screen TV with cable and Blu-Ray player.  The first bedroom is also on this level and has a queen and twin over full bunk, private bathroom with shower/jet tub combo.

Head upstairs to the open floor plan main living space with living room, kitchen and dining area.  The living room has a large sofa that focuses one the wood burning fireplace and TV with cable and DVD player.  Stay connected with complimentary internet.  Two dining tables and bar seating ensure everyone can sit down to enjoy a meal.  The cheerful kitchen has granite counters, gas range, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot.  Relax in the back yard which features a large patio with hot tub and charcoal grills.

Down hallway is a full bathroom and two bedrooms.  One bedroom has a king bed and TV with cable.  The last bedroom has a full bed.

You will surely appreciate the amenities and location of this cabin!

Features: Less Than 1 Mile to Bear Mountain, Hot Tub, Air Hockey Table, Blu-Ray, Cable, Internet, Wood Burning Fireplaces, Charcoal Grill, Granite Counters, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.

name: Cozy Lakefront - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
As of September 26, 2018, the water depth for dock use about 2 feet to 2.5 feet deep. 

Experience a bit of Big Bear Lake history in this beautifully maintained 1940's lakefront cabin on your next vacation.  This cabin has cozy features including a natural stone gas fireplace, knotty pine walls, and thoughtfully chosen mountain decor and furniture.  Watch your favorite show or movie on the TV with cable and DVD player while you lounge on the sofa. Sip on your morning coffee from the table overlooking the water and mountains beyond. The kitchen maintains it's rustic feel with modern upgrades including a gas range, dishwasher, coffee pot and microwave.  Down the hall is a 3/4 bathroom with double sinks and first bedroom.  Enjoy lake views from the comfort of the king bed or watch TV with cable and DVD player.  A second bedroom with full bed as well as a full bathroom and washer and dryer are off the living room.  The third bedroom is downstairs and features lake views, two queen beds and TV with cable.

The elevated back deck is where you will love to spend the most time.  Sit back in the hot tub while you enjoy the fresh air and lake views, or grill on the propane barbecue.  Take a stroll down to the water's edge and watch the ducks or do a bit of fishing off the dock.

Note: This cabin has a parking pad at street level with stairs leading down to the front door.

Lake levels vary throughout the year and boat docks availability is not guaranteed at the time of your arrival. Destination Big Bear is not responsible for the level of water in the lake during the course of guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most up-to-date lake levels for lakefront properties.

Features: Lakefront, Dock, Lake Views, Hot Tub, Gas Fireplace, Deck, Propane Barbecue, TVs, Cable, DVD Players, Internet, Gas Range, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Dishwasher, Wall Heaters, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.
address: 755 Cove Drive Big Bear Lake, CA

name: Dylans Secret Hideaway - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Queen over Queen Bunk, Shared Bathroom

description:
Dylan's Secret Hideaway is sure to become your secret getaway, too!  Just minutes from the lake, ski resorts and conveniences.  This single story cabin is sure to make your Big Bear Lake vacation memorable.

The open floor plan includes a large living room with corner gas fireplace, large flat screen TV with cable and two couches.  There is plenty of room to play a game of pool or step into the family room with a Foosball table, wood pellet stove, large TV with cable, and tables for playing a game of cards.  Set the dining room table that has seating for 10 and enjoy a home cooked meal prepared in the spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances.  A Keurig coffee pot makes mornings a breeze.  The kitchen includes a gas stove, dishwasher, microwave and large fridge.

The backyard is designed for relaxation with a partially covered deck, propane barbeque and flat yard with easy access off the family room and two of the bedrooms. A laundry room is also available just off the kitchen and a half bathroom is conveniently located in the hall. A new hot tub (photo coming soon) is ready for a relaxing evening under the stars!

There are two master suites for your group to enjoy, both with two queen beds, a large flat screen TV with cable, deck access and private 3/4 bathrooms with double sinks and separate rooms with toilet and shower.  The third bedroom has a queen bed and shared access to the jack-and-jill full bathroom.  The fourth bedroom has queen over queen log bunk bed, shared bathroom access and TV with cable.

Features: Large Flat Screen TVs, Cable, Internet, Propane Barbeque, Hot Tub, Stainless Steel Appliances, Keurig Coffee Maker, Dishwasher, Microwave, Gas Stove, Ceiling Fans Throughout, Gas Fireplace, Wood Pellet Stove, Pool Table, Foosball Table, Deck, 2 Master Suites, Washer/Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided
This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.
address: 160 Starvation Flats Road Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: Eagle Mountain Lodge - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Welcome home to Eagle Mountain Lodge, located within the quiet walkable neighborhood of Eagle Mountain Estates in Fox Farm. This single-story 4 bedroom, 2 ½ bath cabin is within minutes of the slopes, lake, recreation areas, shopping, and dining. This log-style cabin is luxury at it's finest with new high-end furnishings, a custom-made local juniper pool table, distressed wood flooring, granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances with a cozy cabin-in-the-mountains feel.

The open floor plan features beautiful knotty pine walls and cathedral ceiling that brings the space together.  The living room is highlighted by the river rock wood burning fireplace that will surely keep you warm after a day on the slopes or stay cool during the summer with central air conditioning.  The spacious sofa has room for everyone in front of the large flat screen TV with cable and Blu-Ray (bring your own DVDs).  The kitchen has enviable counter space of solid granite and bar seating as well as stainless steel appliances including a gas range with double oven, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot.  The dining area is perfect for a meal or catching up with friends on your laptop and Wi-Fi.  When night falls you can enjoy playing pool on the custom pool table while watching cable TV.  Step out to the back yard for relaxing in the fresh mountain air while grilling on the propane barbecue.  Kids will love exploring the fenced back yard with mature trees.  The covered front porch is the perfect place for sharing memories and a bottle of wine with family and friends.

Down the hallway is a full and half bathroom, laundry room and four bedrooms.  The master suite is the perfect space for relaxing with a California king bed, back deck access, TV with cable and a 3/4 bathroom with extra spacious shower. Bedroom two has two queen beds, TV with cable and Xbox One S console (bring your own games).  Bedroom three has a queen bed and TV with cable, and bedroom four has a California king bed and TV with cable.

This hidden gem will make you want to come back to Big Bear Lake before you even leave!

Features: Quiet Neighborhood, Minutes From Slopes and Conveniences, Single Story, High-End Furnishings, Pool Table, Cable, Blu-Ray, X-Box 1, Internet, Central A/C, Wood Burning Fireplace, Propane Barbecue, Wood Floors in Great Room, Carpet in Bedrooms, Stainless Steel Appliances, Granite Counters, Gas Range w/ Double Oven, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Deck, Master Suite, Central Heat, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This is a luxury property which includes the finest furnishings, luxury building materials, and a highly consistent design theme. Luxury properties range from elegant and formal to relaxed and chic, but all appeal to guests who appreciate first-class accommodations with a designer flair.
address: 115 Stony Creek Rd Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: Deer Creek Cottage - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Situated high in the hills of the beautiful Moonridge neighborhood of Big Bear Lake, just minutes from Bear Mountain with mountain views, wood burning fireplace and knotty pine wood throughout.  Deer Creek Cottage is the perfect woodsy cabin for a mountain getaway!

This reverse floor plan features an open living space with cathedral ceilings, mountain views, river rock floor to ceiling wood burning fireplace and large flat screen TV with Blu-Ray player for movies and streaming programing as well as internet. The dining room and kitchen are just steps away with spacious dining table for everyone.  The kitchen has ample counter space and gas range, microwave, traditional coffee pot, Keurig machine and dishwasher.  Keep the chef in the family company while you play a game of darts.  The upper back deck has table and chairs and a propane barbecue for outdoor cooking and entertaining.  A half bath as well as the washer and dryer are also on the main level.

Downstairs are three bedrooms and a full bathroom.  The master suite has a king bed, private full bathroom and Smart TV for streaming.  Step out to the lower back deck for relaxing in the shade with your morning coffee.  The second bedroom shares access to the lower back deck and has a queen bed and Smart TV.  The last bedroom is perfect for the kids or kid at heart with two twin over twin bunk beds, small air hockey table and Smart TV.

Features: Mountain Views, 2 Decks, Wood Burning Fireplace, Internet, Smart TVs, Blu-Ray, Propane Barbecue, Gas Range, Coffee Pot, Keurig, Dishwasher, Microwave, Air Hockey Table, Central Heat, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.

name: Day Family Cabin - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Queen, 2 Twins with Twin Trundle (Upper Level)

description:
Day Family Cabin is the perfect location, day or night, for your next vacation to Big Bear!  The bear "Oso" welcomes you to this comfortable retreat as you reach the upper front deck level.  Located within easy access to the resorts, shuttles, zoo and conveniences, this cabin is ideal for a family getaway.

The entry level great room features a wood burning fireplace, comfortable sofa and love seat, TV with cable, Blu-Ray and streaming.  The dining table separates the living room and kitchen with room for 8 with three additional seats at the counter.  The kitchen has a gas range, microwave, dishwasher, Keurig machine and ample counter space for entertaining and cooking.  Just off the kitchen is a full bathroom and laundry room.  For outdoor relaxation and enjoyment step out to the back deck with a propane barbecue, table and fenced yard for the kids to explore.

Upstairs you will find a Foosball table, full bathroom and three bedrooms.  The first bedroom has a queen bed, 3 twin beds, and a deck overlooking the front.  Bedroom two has a queen bed and TV with DVD player.  The last bedroom has a queen bed and two twins with trundle beds for flexible sleeping arrangements, and a Smart TV with Blu-Ray.

This is a great family cabin for your next Big Bear adventure!

Features: Close To Bear Mountain, Zoo and Golf Course, Wood Fireplace, Propane Barbecue, Foosball Table, Blu-Ray, Yard, Deck, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Keurig, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Eagle Ridge - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 4: 2 Twin over Twin Bunk Beds (Upper Level)

description:
Overlooking Big Bear Lake and Bakers Pond, the views from this luxury home are amazing. Sitting high above on an Eagle Ridge, this home is a perfect choice for your family gathering or holiday. From amazing outdoor space to indoor entertainment, there is great fun to be had.

Elegantly decorated, Eagle Ridge is spacious with a cozy feeling. Lodge pole pine, granite counter tops, and stone floors compliment the mountain setting. This home has an open floor plan. The kitchen and dining area are adjoined by a large center island giving way to plenty of space for large family meals. It comes fully equipped and has a dishwasher. There is a sitting area by the rock fireplace to warm up or watch movies on the flat screen TV. This level has access to the deck for grilling on the propane barbeque while taking in the views or soak in the hot tub.

The master bedroom is located on this level and has its own full bath with whirlpool tub, shower, fireplace and private deck. A bedroom with a Queen bed is also on the main level.

On the upper level there are three guest rooms, each with queen beds. The children’s room has two bunk beds shaped like pirate ships, adventure waits!  Bedrooms do not have cable.  There is a bonus loft with two queen sofa beds for extra sleeping or just a quiet place to nap or read and relax. The game room has a pool table, shuffleboard and a wet bar for good times and laughter. Gather outside for a game of horse shoes and take in the seasonal colors of the beautifully landscaped yard. Eagle Ridge, is a vacation above the rest.

description:
You are certain to enjoy this spacious 7 bedroom, 6.5 baths, near Bear Mountain with it's large yard and views of the slopes, open floor plan that offers plenty of room for you and your guests to spread out and relax in the peace and quiet.

This open floor plan features an extra large kitchen with dishwasher, double oven, electric stove top with additional electric built in griddle, microwave and the basic comforts of home.  The living room includes multiple seating options, a wood burning stove, dining areas and a flat screen TV with cable and DVD player. Play billiards or a game of poker with family and friends. Get cozy in the sunken lounge area with wood burning fireplace. A powder room is just off the front entrance and a 3/4 bathroom with washer and dryer is off the kitchen.

Your guests will appreciate the serene tree and mountain views from the spacious, furnished deck that features seating, charcoal grill, spa and large yard.

All the bedrooms have a TV with cable and DVD player.  The main level has four bedrooms, the first bedroom has a queen bed, private 3/4 bathroom with large shower and access to the back deck.  The second bedroom has a king and twin bed, and access to the hall bathroom with large tub and separate shower, as well as access to the back deck.  Bedroom three has a queen bed. Bedroom four has a queen bed and 3/4 bathroom. 
Upstairs you can play a game of Foosball in the landing with sitting area.  Upstairs are two more bedrooms, one with 2 queen beds, private bathroom with claw foot tub (no shower), and the sixth bedroom has king bed and access to the large bathroom with separate shower and toilet room, and two separate rooms each with double sinks. The seventh bedroom features a full bed. Additional sleeping space is available in the upper hallway landing with a twin bed, and on a sleeper sofas on the main level.

name: Dew Drop Inn - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: Twin over Twin Bunk with Twin Trundle  (Upper Level)
arrangements.Additional: Queen Aero Bed in Bedroom Closet

description:
Now is the time to escape to Dew Drop Inn! Brand new remodel nestled in Big Bear’s best lakeside neighborhood, highly desirable Eagle Point! Walking distance to the lake and close to the slopes, the Village, activities, restaurants and more!

Enter Dew Drop Inn through a large front deck and you'll immediately feel dazzled by the modern, open-plan living space. The centerpiece is a floor to ceiling gas fireplace with a white-stone facade. The fireplace has glass on both sides and making it a feature that can be enjoyed from both the living room and dining room. Flat-screen televisions with cable are mounted above the fireplace on both the living room and dining room sides, so that you'll never have to miss your favorite sporting event or television show. Soaring beamed ceilings, wood floors, and lighting fixtures with Edison bulbs are found throughout the home.
Done in shades of white, the kitchen is a clean, inviting space that features stainless steel appliances and granite counter tops. Dew Drop Inn is the ideal home to entertain or host a big holiday meal, and you'll find that the kitchen is stocked with all the tools that you'll need to whip up a home cooked dinner. Kitchen features include, a dishwasher, microwave, Keurig, and coffee pot. 

Serve your fabulous meal at the dining table that seats eight and don't forget to use the fireplace for both warmth and ambiance. Additional seating for two can be found at the breakfast bar. 

Access to the back deck can be found adjacent to the dining room. The backyard area is flat and fully fenced, providing a safe place for children to play.

Walk down a small set of stairs near the kitchen to find an enormous bathroom with a walk-in glass shower. This bathroom is so big, that it also houses a closet where you'll find a side-by-side washer and dryer. No one wants to have to do laundry while on vacation, but this is a great option if the need should arise.

An entertainment room is located next to the bathroom. This room has reclining couches and a flat-screen television with cable and a Roku box. This is an excellent spot to have a family movie night. A small gas fireplace adds additional coziness. An access door to the backyard is also found in this room.

Getting sleepy? Head upstairs to find all the bedrooms. The master bedroom includes a king bed and has sloped ceilings. Curl up in bed and watch a movie on the flat-screen television with cable and Roku box. Step out on the private deck and take in the fresh mountain air. The en suite bathroom is an oasis with a soaking tub and walk-in glass shower.

The second bedroom with its animal and explorer theme is perfect for the little ones in your group. It includes a set of twin bunk beds and a window.

The third bedroom has two queen beds and a flat-screen television with cable. A window provides views of the backyard. You'll love the modern deer head fixtures above each bed.

A full bathroom to be shared between the second and third bedrooms is located off the hallway. 

Dew Drop Inn and let your worries fade away!

Features:  Linens and Towels Provided, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Cable TV, DVD Player, Roku, Internet, Multiple Decks, Barbeque, Central Forced Heat, Dishwasher, Gas Fireplaces, Washer/Dryer, Jet tub, Mountain/Ski Slope Views, Walking Distance to Lake and Close to Everything

name: Feels Like Home - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
This adorable, well appointed cabin will Feel Like Home in the mountains of Big Bear!

The living room centers around the cozy, wood burning fireplace.  Enjoy TV viewing with cable, DVD player and a large selection of DVD movies.  Stay connected with internet.  A dining table is perfect for your holiday meal or just a night spent playing a game.  A full bathroom is within easy access.

Step through to the kitchen with breakfast table and ample counter space.  Appliances include a gas range, microwave, dishwasher, and coffee pot.  Through the hallway you will find a stacked washer and dryer, a full bathroom, deck access with propane barbecue, and two bedrooms.  The first bedroom has a king bed, deck access and TV with cable and DVD player.  The second bedroom has a full bed and TV with cable and DVD player.  An assortment of games are in the closet.

Flat parking is convenient for any time of year.  Take in the fresh mountain air on the front deck under the mature pine trees or enjoy a leisurely stroll through the neighborhood.  This quaint cabin will have you wanting to come back to Big Bear again!

Note: The home you have booked has a strict not pets policy due to home owner  allergies. Bringing a pet inside this home will result in loss of full  deposit.

name: Eagles Nest North - Fawnskin, CA
description:
Perched on a hill top on the North Shore, you will love the extraordinary views of Big Bear Lake and Snow Summit Resort. This is the perfect escape for those who want plenty of outdoor space, parking and great views!

This historic rustic cabin, built in 1929, still has a lot of the original cabin charm throughout.  This is an eclectic home that both Will Rogers and Wilt Chamberlain have visited because of the historical importance of the home known as the Eagle Nest North. You will love it or hate it.

Kids will have fun playing on the ping pong table, pool table, Foosball table, or the whole family can sit back and watch cable TV's throughout, a movie on the DVD player, or surf the internet! Sit back and relax in the outdoor eight person hot tub overlooking the lake. The expansive deck is perfect for watching the car show in the summer from the front of the cabin while barbecuing on the propane grill!  

Retreat indoors and cozy up to the fireplace or gather around the dining table for game night or a nice meal.  The kitchen has all the basics and plenty of counter space.  When the weather gets chilly, retreat to the sun room with expansive windows and enjoy the lake view.  Downstairs you will find a family room with a small kitchenette and bar with seating and more fabulous views.

There are plenty of sleeping options for the whole family.  Upstairs are two spacious bedrooms with bathrooms. Downstairs is one more bedroom, a full bathroom and sleeping nook for the kids.

Features: Spectacular Lake Views from Most Rooms, Two Wood Burning Fireplaces, Piano, Sled in the Backyard,  Flat Backyard, Hiking in National Forest, Dishwasher, Washer & Dryer, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Linens and Towels Provided.

DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

This cabin is one of the best deals for guests on a budget. The property may be showing a bit of wear and tear on the inside, but all of the basic furnishings are present. The property is ideal for those who value location instead of décor, are on a tight budget, or are simply less concerned with the appearance of the property or amenities.

description:
Live the enchanted mountain life in this beautiful cabin for your stay in Big Bear!  Located high in the hills overlooking Bear Mountain, the forest and Big Bear Lake.  This wonderful log style cabin has been lovingly decorated with mountain cabin decor, natural wood and stone accents, and takes advantage of the incredible views from the multi-level deck.

The living room features vaulted ceilings, large windows, slope views, a wood burning natural stone fireplace and plenty of comfortable seating (note: no TV). Step out to the deck and soak in the hot tub while enjoying the views.  The gourmet kitchen features professional grade stainless steel appliances including gas stove, microwave, dishwasher, wine fridge, coffee pot, prep sink and expansive granite counters. The dining area has table and chairs and window seating for watching the chef in the family prepare a delicious meal.  A propane barbecue is just outside on the covered section of the deck for year round grilling enjoyment.

The main level has a washer and dryer, access to garage parking, a full bathroom and first bedroom with twin over twin bunk, twin over queen bunk bed and TV with DVD player.

Head upstairs for a good night's sleep.  The beautiful master suite has a log style king bed, private deck with slope and lake views, gas fireplace, TV with cable and Blu-Ray player and full bathroom with large shower, double sink and corner jet tub.  The other two bedrooms each have queen beds. A full bathroom is located in the hall.

The lower level of the cabin is all about fun and entertainment.  The whole family can gather around on the wrap around sofa in front of the electric fireplace and watch a movie or favorite show on the large TV with DVD player and cable access.  Spend a few hours challenging each other at a game of Foosball or shuffleboard. A wet bar is just around the corner complete with mini fridge, microwave and sink.  The last bedroom is located on this level and has a queen bed, TV with DVD player, covered deck with porch swing and slope views.  A full bathroom is in the hall.

description:
Experience mountain luxury in the comfort of Evening Breeze.  Located just a few minutes from The Village for shopping and dining and Snow Summit for year round adventure.  This cabin has it all for a family retreat to Big Bear Lake!

The warm and welcoming great room features beautiful knotty pine vaulted ceilings, wall to ceiling windows and mountain cabin decor. Gather around the gas fireplace with natural stone hearth and surround.  The flat screen TV has DVD player and SPECTRUM CABLE that includes HBO, CINEMAX AND SHOWTIME PREMIUM CHANNELS for your viewing pleasure.  Take a seat at the dining table or pull up a chair at the breakfast bar in the kitchen featuring granite counters, stainless steel appliances including a gas stove, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot.  Spend an hour or two fine tuning your skills playing pool.  The back deck overlooks the large treed lot.  Soak in the hot tub after a day on the slopes or grill on the propane barbecue.  A half bathroom is conveniently located on the main level.

When night falls, head downstairs to one of the three bedrooms.  The master suite has it all with private small deck, log style king bed, TV with Spectrum Cable access and 3/4 bathroom with large shower and double sinks.  Bedroom two has a twin over full bunk bed, twin size pull-out sofa, and TV.  Bedroom three has a queen bed, TV with Spectrum cable and desktop computer for surfing the web or catching up on an email.  A full bathroom and washer and dryer are located in the hall.

A weekend at Evening Breeze will make you and the people you love happy...is there anything more lovely than that?

name: Fox Colony - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Fox Colony is a single-story home located in the desirable Fox Farm neighborhood. It is centrally located to Big Bear's shops, restaurants, and attractions. Just a short drive to Big Bear Village and the ski slopes.

A flat, circular driveway provides easy access to Fox Colony, even during the winter months. It's just two steps up to the wrap-around porch and cheerful red entry door.

Enter Fox Colony to find yourself in the living room. A main feature is an enormous wood-burning fireplace with a stone hearth. It will provide warmth and ambiance during chilly winter nights. Mounted above the fireplace is a flat-screen television with HDTV cable and a Blu-ray player. Play a game of checkers at the checkers table. Super fast wifi will keep you connected. The living room also includes the dining room table with six chairs and two benches. Open the living room curtains to have a pretty view of the front of the house while you are dining. 

A glass sliding door in the living room provides access to a deck with a hot tub. The hot tub is a great place to relax after a day of skiing or spent exploring Big Bear. After dark, turn on the outdoor lights to create a beautiful illumination and magical atmosphere. This deck also has a charcoal grill and a patio dining set with seating for four. Enjoy the fresh mountain air as you dine al fresco.

The kitchen is located adjacent to the living room. In the kitchen, you'll find all the basic tools to whip up a home cooked meal. Take special note of the adorable fox head cabinet pulls. A small rolling island provides additional kitchen space. Features of the kitchen include a microwave, gas oven, coffee pot, and dishwasher.

If the need to do laundry should arise, you'll find a stacked washer and dryer next to the kitchen.

Access to the back yard can be found through a door in the laundry room. The back yard is fully-fenced, providing a safe space for children to play.

A 3/4 bathroom is located between the laundry room and master bedroom, with access from both rooms. The master bedroom includes a king bed, television with HDTV Cable, and a ceiling fan. 

The second bedroom is located next to the master. It includes a queen bed with a festive string of lights hung over the headboard. This room includes a television with dvd player. The window has views of the back yard.

The third bedroom as a queen bed, television with dvd player, and views of the backyard.

A full bathroom is located in the hall, near all bedrooms and the living room.

Additional sleeping space can be found in the living room, on the sleeper sofa.

Fox Colony is a cozy home in a fabulous neighborhood. It's perfect for a small family or group, and features many amenities. 

Features: Hot Tub, Charcoal BBQ, HDTV Cable, Blu-Ray Player, Fast  Wifi, Fully-Fenced Back Yard, Wrap-Around Porch, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Dishwasher, Gas Oven, Easy Driveway, Washer and Dryer.

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Queen and Twin over Twin Bunk (Lower Level)
arrangements.Master Bedroom: King and Twin over Twin Trundle (Upper Level)

description:
Wonderful family home located in Fox Farm, one of Big Bear's most coveted areas. This home is situated in a fully landscaped park like setting with lawn, slate rock patio, and custom spa with waterfall feature. You are sure to enjoy the  over 10,000 square foot yard and welcoming curb appeal. Located in a quiet neighborhood, it's perfect for evening family walks.

The interior has been completely renovated and nicely decorated with a modern nature feel to create an inviting and enjoyable place to spend time with friends and family. As you enter the home, you are welcomed by a very large open living room with a gas/wood burning fireplace, 51" flat screen HDTV with expanded cable access, Netflix streaming capabilities and Blue-Ray player. The living room has wood beamed vaulted ceilings and opens up to the dining area and kitchen so it's perfect for holding fun dinner gatherings all in one large space.

The home features a fully equipped gourmet kitchen with brand new granite counter tops, SS Thermadore gas stove with indoor grill, professional cookware and dishwasher. Fully stocked kitchen with many amenities including serving platters, pizza set, baking pans and specialty utensils. The dining room, which looks over the treed backyard, seats eight with five additional seats at the eat-in bar.

The large game room is bound to entertain with a pool table, a foosball table, 46 inch TV, wet bar and large L-shaped couch  for lounging. There is also a cabinet stacked with board games, poker set and bingo game for hours of family fun.

The large master bedroom is located upstairs with full master bath including a tub with jets, king bed as well as daybed with trundle, a flat screen HDTV with expanded cable and Blue Ray player. In addition, the master has a work station which offers a copier, printer and fax machine.

The second bedroom, also upstairs, has a single queen bed. The third bedroom has a queen as well as twin bed with matching linens. These bedrooms share a large full bathroom with double sinks.

The fourth bedroom, located on the lower level hosts both a queen bed as well as twin bunks and a 25 inch television.

Fox Lodge is located close to the Convention Center  where there are many activities for adults and kids alike. A short drive will take you to the lake, Village, Starbucks, grocery stores, ski slopes and everything else Big Bear has to offer.

name: FranksFort - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Current outdoor construction through December 2018. Rent now for our discounted pricing before the ongoing construction is finished and the rental price will become higher. Early bird gets the worm!

ABSOLUTELY NO PARTIES !! THIS IS A FAMILY HOME IN A PRIVATE NEIGHBORHOOD

Indulge in the beauty of Frank's Fort where the expansive lot is spectacular for all types of families to enjoy.

This incredibly appointed property is situated on 1.38 acres of flat, completely fenced in grounds featuring a full size beach volleyball court, basketball court, plenty of grass space for catch, horseshoes,  and many more summer activities!

Log style at its best with modern amenities and a recently remodeled interior, Franks Fort feels luxurious and spacious. Just under 3,600 square feet of living space with five bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms located on a cul-de-sac in Big Bear City just minutes from the slopes and Village.

The home features an open floor plan that is beautifully furnished with you in mind. Relax with seating for eight around the dining table and an additional six at the island. The high ceilings add charm to the main living area.

Enjoy the comfort of the kitchen which opens up to the great room featuring stainless steel appliances, tile flooring, a dishwasher and granite counter tops.  Just off the kitchen is a bathroom for your convenience. Wood flooring is found throughout the cabin, with rugs to add warmth.

Relax next to the cozy gas fireplace with a beautiful rock feature. Watch your favorite movie on the large, flat-screen TV that  can be viewed from all areas of the great room.

Upstairs you'll delight in the master suite, which includes a spacious room with a king-size bed. Three additional bedrooms and two full-size bathrooms are also included on the upper level. Bedrooms two and three, feature three sets of full over full bunks, and the fourth bedroom has two sets of full over full bunks. 

Enjoy the views of the forest and mountain peaks from one of the ample sized decks.

The lower level consists of a fifth bedroom with two queen beds, as well as a game room with a pool table and Foosball table. The game room includes a flat screen TV and mini fridge.

When you're tired from playing in the game room, step outside and relax in the large hot tub. Use the 10 ft propane barbecue and 700 degree pizza oven to create fabulous meals.  The 320 sqft covered gazebo allows you to dine al fresco  during any season!

Note: DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your  full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional  repairs.

Please use caution with children around the pond and waterfall. Bring your own basketball for the basketball hoop. The  property does have outdoor security cameras. There is a $100 fee to use  the outdoor fire pit and gas heaters.

name: Foothill Lodge - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Great location! 

This large cabin is perfect to spend your weekend getaway with your family and friends! The cabin has three levels and it is very roomy and comfy, you will feel just right home! Game tables include a Foosball table, pool table and ping-pong table!

This cabin is located right in the Village and it is walking distance to the lake. Let the kids enjoy the ping-pong table while the rest of the family are playing pool in the spacious living room in the middle level. 

This beautiful home has 6 nicely decorated bedrooms. The first bedroom is located on main level and it has a king and a queen bed; the second bedroom is located on main level and it has a queen bedroom; the third room is located on middle level and it has a king bed; the fourth bedroom is located on upper level and it has two queen bedrooms with a full bathroom included; the fifth bedroom is located on upper level too and it has two queens with full bathroom included; the sixth bedroom is located on upper level and it has two queen bedrooms. There are 3 standard couches throughout if needed but they are not pullouts or sleeper sofas. 

There are a couple of living rooms in the house, just perfect to accommodate all the members of the family and friends, besides there is a sitting area for chill-out while you are watching TV. 

Living room 1 on main level has a sofa, wood burning fireplace, flat screen TV, cable, small dining area, Foosball table. 

Living room 2 on middle level has a sofa, wood burning fireplace, flat screen TV, cable, pool/ping-pong table.

The sitting area on upper level has a sofa, flat screen TV and cable.

The kitchen on middle level features stainless steel appliances, gas stove, oven, microwave, coffee pot, granite counters, dining area, access to backyard and multiple amenities. 

There are 4 bathrooms in this property, a full bathroom on main level, a full bathroom on middle level and two master suites on upper level.

Outdoor features: You can have a great time in the hot tub, make a delicious meal with the propane barbecue, enjoy the privacy fence and park a maximum of 5 cars in the flat parking area.

Foothill Lodge comes with WiFi, DVD players, central heating, towels, linens, washer and dryer. 

Note: This property is located off a street that is not maintained. Street is not plowed or maintained by city. No ice maker. Not a luxury home. This cabin is always a good idea for vacationers seeking a lot of space. Generally features furnishing, desirable amenities, with a few dated features or appliances.

name: Four Bear Lair - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Suite: King, Full Bath, Wood Fireplace, TV w/ Blu-Ray ( Upper Level/Loft )

description:
Four Bear Lair is the perfect cabin for family and friends who want to be together but need some space of their own.  With over 2,800 square feet of living space, this three story cabin has two living rooms, a family room, a master suite with private sitting room, and a hot tub. Plenty of mature trees and peek-a-boo lake views lend to the beautiful atmosphere of the cabin.  Entertainment options are endless with a private movie theater room, pool table, air hockey and Foosball!

The entry level has a living room with wood burning fireplace. Spend time at the pool table or head into the family room that is perfect for the kids or young at heart and includes an air hockey table, Foosball table, flat screen TV with cable, Blu-Ray player, X-Box 360, and collection of DVD's.  A pellet stove will keep you warm and toasty on chilly nights.  Two log style full over full bunk beds offer plenty of sleeping options.  Through a small hall you will find the first bedroom with king bed, TV and 3/4 bathroom.  Bedroom two has a queen bed and full bathroom.

Upstairs is the main living space with living room, two dining areas and large kitchen.  The living area has a wood burning fireplace, flat screen TV with cable and Blu-Ray player. Step outside to the wrap around deck and soak in the hot tub or grill on the gas barbecue.  The kitchen features granite counters, professional grade gas stove, wine fridge, stainless steel appliances, separate prep sink and large pantry.  A half bath is located off the kitchen for your convenience.

You might have to toss a coin to determine who gets the master suite located in the loft.  The suite includes a private sitting area and bathroom with double sinks, jet tub, shower and separate toilet and bide.  The bedroom area has views of the mountains and living room below, wood burning fireplace, king bed and TV with Blu-Ray player.

Note: Driveway has steep transition from the road. High clearance vehicles recommended.  Always carry chains during winter months.

Features: Peek-A-Boo Lake and Mountain Views, Close to Bear Mountain, Hot Tub, Wood Burning Fireplaces, Movie Theater, Flat Screen TVs, Cable, Blu-Ray Players, Internet, Gas Barbecue, Game Tables, 3 Living/Family Rooms, Deck, Gourmet Kitchen, Professional Grade Gas Stove, Stainless Steel Appliances, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Microwave, Wine Fridge, Master Suite, Garage Parking, Central Heat, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided
