name: Gentle Grizzly Getaway - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Looking for incredible views of Bear Mountain Ski Resort? Look no further than Gentle Grizzly Getaway, located on a quiet street in the neighborhood of Upper Moonridge.

Park your vehicle on a flat-driveway and walk through a garden gate to be greeted by a welcome bear statue sitting on a rock. If you arrive at night, you'll appreciate that he is holding a lantern! The double-door entry is located just a few steps up and features pretty glass windows.

Gentle Grizzly Getaway has a front entrance with wood flooring. The flooring throughout the home includes both wood and carpet.

Turn left and you're in the living room. The beautiful stone fireplace provides both warmth and ambiance. A large elk head is mounted over the gas only fireplace, giving the home a touch of rustic decor. Entertainment is close at hand, with the Pac Man classic video game table and flat-screen television that is equipped with HDTV cable and a DVD player. Wifi will keep you connected with the outside world, but plenty of board games are available for an unplugged pastime. Pour a glass of wine or mix your favorite cocktail at the wet bar, located just behind the living room couch. High above the city smog, we have amazing views of the stars. Use the telescope to get a closer look.

A door between the living and dining room gives you access to the outdoor deck with incredible views of Bear Mountain Ski Resort. Sore muscles from a day on the slopes or nearby hiking trails? Melt them away in the relaxing hot tub. When the weather is warm, sit back in the wicker deck furniture and enjoy the view. Grill up a steak on the propane bbq.

Head back inside to discover the dining room table, which seats six, but also includes two additional chairs for more hungry guests. Look up to notice the chandelier, with a carved wolf motif.

The kitchen comes with all the basics that you'll need to create a home-cooked meal. If you're visiting us during the holidays and cooking up a feast, you'll find the counter top space and storage to be plentiful. Features of the kitchen include: tiled counters, a double oven, microwave, dishwasher, trash compactor, and coffee pot. The cook won't feel left out of the vacation, as those amazing slope views are visible from large windows in both the kitchen and dining areas.

When it's time for bed, Gentle Grizzly Getaway offers you a choice of three bedrooms. The master and second bedroom are both located upstairs.

The master bedroom has a queen bed located under a skylight, a great spot to look at the night sky as you drift off to sleep. Before falling asleep, watch a movie on the flat screen television with HDTV cable and a dvd player. Walk outside to enjoy your private deck with views of the slopes. During a sunny day, relax on the two outdoor lounge beds. The master includes an en suite 3/4 bathroom.

The second bedroom has a queen bed, television with HDTV cable, and DVD player. This room also has a private deck, with views of the gated front garden. A full bathroom is located in the hall, between the master and second bedroom.

The third bedroom is located on the first level, to the right of the main entry door. This room is perfect for kids, with a twin over twin bunk bed and an additional twin bed. This room has moose and bear themed bedding. Need to do laundry? A full-size, side-by-side washer and dryer is located in the closet of this bedroom.

A half-bath for the first level is located near the third bedroom. 

Come visit Gentle Grizzly Getaway, with its stellar views and many amenities. You'll experience the serenity of nature, but be located just a ten minute drive from all the restaurants, shops, and Big Bear activities.

Features: Bear Mountain Resort Views, Pac Man VIdeo Game Table, Gas Only Fireplace, Flat-screen Television, HDTV Cable, Wifi, DVD Player, Propane BBQ, Hot Tub, Wet Bar, Telescope, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Trash Compactor, Dishwasher, Washer and Dryer.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.

name: Goldmine Getaway - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Walk to Bear Mountain Resort!

This two bedroom, two story town home is located in Bear Meadows right on the golf course and just a short walk to Bear Mountain and the Zoo. A great option for year round getaways! Tastefully decorated with cozy cabin decor for that mountain feel.

The two bedrooms are located on the entry level and both have private full bathrooms and access to a small deck. The first bedroom has a queen bed and TV with cable. The second has two twin beds a TV and DVD player.  A laundry room is available and is perfect for longer stays.

Upstairs is the main living area with plenty of comfortable seating for the group in front of the gas fireplace.  A large wrap around sofa as well as a sofa sleeper offers flexible lounging and sleeping arrangements. Watch your favorite movie on the flat screen TV with cable and Blu-Ray player. Wi-fi will keep you connected to friends and family back home. Take some time to reconnect around the dining table by playing one of the provided board games or share a meal.  The kitchen has all the basics with gas stove, microwave, coffee pot and dishwasher.  Step out to the covered deck to relax in the shade or grill on the propane barbecue.  A half bathroom is conveniently located on the upper level.

name: Grand Mountain Retreat - Big Bear City, CA

arrangements.Master 1: King and Pullout Full Couch with Flat Screen TV and Bathroom (Upper Level)
arrangements.Master \u00a02: King and Pullout Full Couch with Flat Screen TV and Bathroom (Upper Level)
arrangements.Master 3: King and Pullout Full Couch with TV and Bathroom (Upper Level)
arrangements.Downstairs Living Room: 2 Couches. 1 is a Pullout Full Couch (Upper Level)

description:
This Upper Moonridge estate is the perfect getaway in the mountains.  This cabin is situated on over an acre of land, with hiking, biking and sledding right here on the spacious property! A peaceful, private getaway on a quiet cul-de-sac in the woods with the ski slopes just a mile away.  Enjoy the large backyard deck with wood burning fireplace, barbeque, hot tub and basketball hoop on the side of the house.

Grand Mountain Retreat is a 3,800 square foot cabin with a mix of rustic and high-end finishes throughout including natural wood floors, stone tile and log accents.  The living room has an extra large sectional sofa, flat screen TV and fireplace.  For the cook in you, the gourmet kitchen is large and opens up to both the living room and dining area so all can enjoy each others company. A gigantic island highlights the oversized kitchen. Features include stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, a huge refrigerator and freezer, two dishwashers, and a walk-in pantry. The downstairs laundry room has two washers and two dryers.

Upstairs is a family room with fireplace, large flat screen TV, roomy circular sofa and an air hockey table.

The downstairs has a master suite with attached bathroom and access to the back deck.  Upstairs are two more master suites and a large bedroom. This accommodating house easily sleeps up to 16. All master bedrooms have dual sinks. Two of the masters have sunken whirlpool tubs and separate showers. Five full bathrooms in total for everyone's convenience and comfort. The flooring in the three master bathrooms is heated, a perfect welcome in the morning, especially during the winter months!

This home is located on a flat lot that is extremely kid and pet friendly. Kids will enjoy playing in the "tree house" playground set. Please remember to respect the neighbors. This home is located in a nice quiet neighborhood with full- time residents. Sounds travels very easily in this area.  

Outdoor Features: Oversized Outdoor Hot Tub, Basketball Hoop and Blacktop (seasonal), Two Spacious Decks (Front and Rear), Wood Burning Fireplace on Rear Deck, Propane Gas Barbeque, Large Lot, Roomy On-Site Parking

Indoor Features: 4 Flat Screen TVs with DVD Players, Stereo, Family Room, Two Indoor Wood Burning Fireplaces, Air Hockey Table, Two Washer and Dryers, Tile and Rustic Wood Flooring Throughout, High Ceilings, Cable Television, WiFi.

Note: DO NOT MOVE THE GAME TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE GAME TABLE,  your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

DO NOT USE THE HOT TUB AFTER 8:00PM OR YOU FACE FINES AND EVICTIONS.   SOUND TRAVELS, DO NOT TRY TO SNEAK IN OR OUT of HOT TUBS, THE CITY WILL EVICT  YOU.  THE FINE CAN BE VERY LARGE FROM THE CITY, IF YOU THINK YOUR GROUP  CAN NOT ABIDE BY THESE CITY ORDINANCES THEN CALL US AND WE WILL CANCEL  THIS RESERVATION WITHOUT A PENALTY.  BEING ON THE DECK USING THE BBQ AFTER 10:00PM CAN RESULT IN A FINE.
No use of basketball court after 8:00 PM.

name: Grand Colusa Lodge - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Suite: King, Futon, Full Bath, Fireplace, Deck (Entry Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 3: 2 Twin over Queen Bunks, 3/4 Bath, Deck (Lower Level)

description:
Spend your vacation enjoying mountain luxury in this custom home featuring slope and lake views, log furnishings, a game room and hot tub!  Grand Colusa Lodge is just minutes from Bear Mountain Ski Resort and a short drive to town, where you'll find plenty of shopping and dining options.

Parking is conveniently located directly in front of the home or in the two car garage, including dual 220v car EV chargers so you can charge 2 cars at one time!  Walk just a few steps up to the front door. In the entry hall, you'll be greeted by a delightful carving of baby bears and a raccoon climbing a tree. You'll also find a charming wood bench with bears carved on either side. A skylight provides natural light.

The grand entrance welcomes you to this three level home with local bear carvings and knotty pine.  The entry level has the enviable master suite that features custom-designed furniture, including the bed frame, bookshelf, and a desk. Use the gas fireplace to fill the master suite with warmth and ambiance. Keep entertained with a flat-screen television and Blu-ray  player. Step out on the private deck to take in the fresh, mountain  air. The high ceilings and ceiling fan will keep you cool during the  warm months. The master bedroom includes an en suite bathroom with a large Jacuzzi tub, double sinks, and a glass shower. The toilet is located in a separate room to provide privacy.

Head up to the top level where you will find the main living space with plenty of room and options for everyone to enjoy.  The living room has a large sofa that offers viewing of the TV with cable, streaming and DVD and the gas fireplace.  A wet bar is the perfect place to mix up your favorite cocktail before heading out the deck to grill on the propane barbecue or just to admire the sweeping views of the slopes and lake.  When hunger strikes, head over to the fully stocked kitchen and prepare a meal with ease.  The kitchen has ample granite counter space, stainless steel appliances including a gas range, dishwasher, microwave, blender and coffee pot.

For fun and entertainment you will want to spend a few hours in the game room.  Take you pick of shuffle board or pool while you watch TV with Blu-Ray and soundbar and serve snacks at the dry bar.  Relax in front of the wood fireplace on one of two pull out sofas.  If outdoor recreation is more your style then you will love the hot tub and outdoor games.

The lower level is all about getting a good night's rest.  You will find three bedrooms, a full bathroom, garage access and laundry room on this level.  The first bedroom has a king bed and TV with streaming and Blu-Ray.  The next bedroom has two twin over queen bunks, deck access with views, TV with DVD player and private 3/4 bath with double vanity and large shower.  The last bedroom has a king bed, deck access with views and a TV with Blu-Ray player.

This cabin has it all!  Make your Big Bear vacation memorable with your family and friends when you stay at Grand Colusa Lodge!

Features: Slope and Lake Views, Hot Tub, Game Room, Propane Barbecue, Wood and Gas Fireplaces, Internet, Blu-Ray, Cable and Streaming TV, Decks, Master Suite, Garage Parking, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This is a luxury property which includes the finest furnishings, luxury building materials, and a highly consistent design theme. Luxury properties range from elegant and formal to relaxed and chic, but all appeal to guests who appreciate first-class accommodations with a designer flair.

DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE or SHUFFLEBOARD! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE or SHUFFLEBOARD TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

GUIDELINES FOR USE OF HOT TUB
Do not use the hot tub or deck after the 10:00 PM curfew.  Sound travels far in the mountains. If the City of Big Bear Lake receives a complaint call from a neighbor you could be subject to fines and eviction.

name: Grand Views - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: 2 Full over Full Bunks, Shared Full Bath (Lower Level)

description:
If you are looking for property that has it all, then Grand Views is where you will want to stay!  This luxury home has a private movie theater, hot tub, game tables, seven bedrooms, is located close to The Village and of course, the views!  

This breathtaking, three story home has been crafted with the finest materials for a luxury experience in the mountains.  The main floor great room features knotty pine cathedral ceiling, wood burning fireplace, hardwood floors, log accents and large sliding glass doors leading out to the deck overlooking the lake, town and valley below.  The living room area has an oversized sofa for the family to gather in front of the fireplace and large flat screen TV with cable access.  Two dining areas offer flexibility with meals as well as additional seating at the natural log breakfast bar.  The gourmet kitchen has granite counters, stainless steel appliances, gas stove top, double oven, microwave, built in espresso/coffee machine and dishwasher.  Down the hall you will find the laundry room, half bathroom and garage with parking, great for winter months.  The large back deck stretches the full width of the cabin with a hot tub and natural gas barbecue to enjoy while admiring the views and taking in the fresh mountain air.  Warm up by the outdoor propane fire pit (propane not supplied - guests welcome to bring their own).

The first master suite is on the main level and has ample room for relaxing and enjoying private time.  The suite offers a king bed, TV with cable, bar sink and back deck access.  The bathroom features a jet tub to soak in while you enjoy the lake views, shower, double sinks and private toilet.

Head downstairs for hours of entertainment possibilities.  The family room is sure to be a favorite location with a beautiful wet bar, pool table and seating area in front of the gas fireplace and large flat screen TV with cable and DVD player. If that doesn't suit the group then head into your own private 12 seat movie theater with surround sound and comfortable reclining seats with cup holders. The fun doesn't stop there!  The kids will love staying in the bedroom with the two full over full bunk beds, TV with cable, X-box and attached game room with Foosball table and Ms. Pac-Man video game console and shared Jack-and-Jill full bathroom. The other lower level bedroom sharing the bathroom has a queen bed, TV and deck access.  The lower covered deck offers more opportunity to enjoy the grand views. A 3/4 bathroom is located off the game room for your convenience.

The upper level has four more bedrooms including a second master suite.  The suite features a king bed, flat screen TV with cable, gas fireplace, private deck with lake views and duplicate master bath with jet tub, shower, double sinks and private toilet.  Bedroom five has a king bed, private 3/4 bath, TV with cable and DVD player and front deck access.  Bedroom six has a king bed, TV with cable and DVD player, front deck access and shares a full Jack-and-Jill bathroom with private toilet and tub/shower room and double sinks.  Bedroom seven has a king bed, TV with cable and DVD player and shared bathroom.

Once you get to this cabin you might not ever want to leave! For the ultimate Big Bear Lake experience, Grand Views has it all! If this home is booked for your dates, check out Grand Lakefront Escape!

Note: This cabin is located high in the hills to take advantage of the views.  Always carry chains in the winter months as roads may be icy.  Propane not supplied for outdoor fire pit.

name: Grizzly Bear Lodge - Big Bear City, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Queen over Queen Bunk, Twin (Main Level)

description:
Enjoy your family vacation in the mountains at this warm and cozy cabin featuring a wood burning fireplace, hot tub, game room and plenty of space for everyone..

The great room features knotty pine cathedral ceilings and wood floors that brings the space together.  The living room area has a roomy leather sofa, perfect for warming up by the fire, reading a good book or watching your favorite shows on the flat screen TV with cable and DVD player.  The dining area has seating for 6 with additional places at the kitchen island.  The kitchen is stocked and ready for preparing a meal and includes gas range, microwave, dishwasher, and coffee pot.  Step outside to the peaceful fenced backyard oasis with sunken hot tub, propane barbecue and seating.  Kids will love all the room to run around and their very own tetherball!

Down the hallway are the bedrooms, a full bathroom and laundry.  The master suite has a queen and twin bed, back deck access, a private full bath, and TV with cable.  The second bedroom has a king bed and TV with cable and DVD player.  Bedroom three has a queen over queen bunk and twin bed.  The last bedroom suite has two queen beds, TV with cable and a private full bathroom.

For fun and games head down to the game room (separate outside entrance) where you will find a Foosball table, air hockey, TV with cable, 1/2 bath and sofa for lounging.
 
Hiking trails just a block away! 

This cabin has it all!  Plan your next Big Bear getaway and stay at Grizzly Bear Lodge!

NOTE: This cabin has stairs leading up to the main living area. No ground floor entrance to living room/bedrooms.  Game room has lower outside separate entrance.  Always carry chains in the winter months as driveway and roads can get icy.

name: Happy Trails - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
You will love the location and all this cabin has to offer for your family vacation in Big Bear!  Just a 5 minute drive to The Village and only a 3 minute drive to Snow Summit for winter skiing or hop on your mountain bike and hit the trails when the weather is warm!

The main level of this cabin features knotty pine ceilings, wood floors, a wood burning fireplace and upgraded kitchen and bath.  The living room has a large flat screen Smart TV with cable and DVD player.  Stay connected with complementary Wi-Fi.  The dining area is just steps from the kitchen for family meals.  The kitchen has ample granite counter space with bar seating, stainless steel appliances including gas range, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot.  The back deck and fenced yard are sure to be a favorite hangout for the kids with plenty of room to run around under the mature pine trees.  Adults will love the deck with table and chairs, propane barbecue and large hot tub for soaking away the day under the stars.  The main level has two bedrooms and a full bathroom.  The first bedroom has a queen bed, and the second bedroom has two twin over twin bunks.  

The upstairs loft area is the perfect place to cozy up in front of the wood burning fireplace, try your hand at a card game, or watch your favorite team on the flat screen with cable.  A full bathroom and private bedroom with a king bed is also on this level.

Come to Big Bear for fun and adventure at Happy Trails!

name: Hawks View - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: King, Queen, and Twin, sleeper sofa (Middle Level)

description:
If you are looking for a place to getaway that is close to the Village yet off the beaten path and surrounded by beautiful forest, look no farther than Hawk's View. This four bedroom, two and a half bath home is spacious, great for gatherings and is located in a quiet canyon just high enough to see above the tree tops with peek-a-boo lake views.

Hang out together in the upstairs great room where you can enjoy a game of pool by the wet bar with family and friends. Watch movies on the large flat screen TV while getting cozy by the ceiling to floor rock fireplace on the comfortable sofas and chairs. The dining area is also located on the great room level, surrounded by vast windows creating an outdoor eating experience without leaving the comforts of the indoors. Watch the sunset over the lake, birds in the springtime, and snow fall from the dinner table. Take in the same views while grilling on one of two barbeques out on the wrap around deck. Read a book relaxing with the sounds of nature. For those who love to cook, the large kitchen is equipped with a center island, basic amenities, and a walk-in pantry for extended stays.

Located on the lower entry level, the master bedroom has a king bed, a private bathroom and attached deck. Bedroom two and three are both furnished with queen beds and canyon views. The cabin features an inset, indoor spa. This is perfect for some R&R after a long day of mountain adventure. Bedroom four is on a separate, second upper level, great for the kids as it sleeps five comfortably.Has a sleeper sofa for additional sleeping. 

Hawk's View is just a 15 minute walk to the Village, a short drive to Snow Summit or Bear Mountain Resort and minutes from Big bear Lake. This home has it all, internet, space, privacy, views and location.

Features: Close To The Village, Wood Burning Fireplace, Barbeques, Deck, Internet, Pool Table, Hot Tub, Towels and Linens Provided

Note: The home is on a dirt road and can be very difficult to get to especially in the winter with melting snow. This property is perfect for the guest who is looking for a cabin rental that won't break the bank. Generally simple decor and filled with basic furnishings and amenities that will meet most of your needs for an enjoyable vacation.

name: Heavenly Heights - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Head to the mountains and climb to Heavenly Heights, with a heavenly view!  Just a short drive to Bear Mountain with views of the slopes, lake and town below.

The open living room features wood floors throughout, floor to ceiling windows to take advantage of the view, a natural stone wood burning fireplace, large flat screen TV with cable and Blu-Ray player, as well as complementary internet.  The dining area has table and chairs for a meal or family game night.  The kitchen has beautiful upgrades with granite counters, stainless steel appliances, gas range, microwave, coffee pot and dishwasher.  The covered back deck has a propane grill.  The large front deck is the perfect place for sitting back and enjoying the sunset over the mountains.

Down the main floor hall is a full bathroom, stacked washer and dryer, and two bedrooms, each with a queen bed.  Upstairs in the loft is a Foosball table, TV with DVD player, and a full bathroom.  The spacious, private master bedroom has a king bed, pull-out sofa for flexible sleeping arrangements, and a TV with cable and DVD player.

NOTE: Stairs to front door.  Always bring chains during winter months as roads in Moonridge can be slick with ice and snow. The blinds in living room do not open.

name: Hibernation Station - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Gather your family and friends and head up to Big Bear for a relaxing weekend in the mountains!  This spacious cabin has it all with a hot tub, game room, internet, DirecTV and more!  Located in the quiet upper Moonridge neighborhood where you are just a few minutes from Bear Mountain, the golf course, zoo, and restaurants.

This reverse floor plan cabin features a large living room with knotty pine cathedral ceiling, large flat screen TV with DirecTV and Blu-Ray player.  The comfortable, reclining leather sofas are the perfect place to get cozy in front of the natural stone wood burning fireplace.  For a few hours of fun you can take advantage of the retro bar area, perfect for mixing up a cocktail and entertaining family and friends.  The kitchen is open to the main living space and includes plenty of counter space, stainless steel appliances, gas range, microwave, dishwasher, coffee pot and counter seating.  A dining table with bench seating is a great place to enjoy a cup of coffee or meal.  For added convenience during your stay, a washer and dryer are available for your use, as well as a half bath on the entry level.

Out on the back deck you can enjoy the peaceful surroundings while soaking in the hot tub or grilling on the natural gas barbecue.  Outdoor seating is available on both the front and back decks.  The kids and your dog will love the completely fenced backyard. 

Spend your evenings with plenty of entertainment options in the game room!  This hub for all things fun includes a large flat screen TV with DirecTV and DVD player, a wet bar, air hockey table, Foosball table, and ping pong!

The master bedroom is on the entry level and includes access to the back deck, a queen bed and private full bathroom.  Downstairs you'll find three more bedrooms.  One bedroom has two twin beds, the next bedroom has a queen bed, and the last bedroom has two twin over full bunk beds.  This level also has a full bathroom off the hallway.

Enjoy everything Big Bear has to offer from the comfort of this great family-friendly cabin!

Note: No ground level entrance to the cabin.  Stairs required to enjoy the indoor space.  Loft space is NOT for tenant use. The home is near full time residents,  please be respectful since sound does carry in the mountains. 

Features: Family and Pet Friendly, Fenced Back Yard, Easy Access Level Parking, Hot Tub, Deck, Natural Gas Barbecue, Wood Burning Fireplace, Ping Pong, Foosball, Air Hockey, Carpet, DirecTV, Blu-Ray, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Bar Seating, Central Heat, Ceiling Fans, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishings, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.

name: Hidden Pines - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 4: Twin over Full Bunk, Twin Trundle

description:
Just a few minutes drive will take you from your mountain retreat at Hidden Pines to Bear Mountain Resort, the Zoo, golfing and anything else you'd like to do on your vacation to Big Bear Lake. This elevated cabin has a spacious deck with beautiful tree views and a large yard the kids will surely love.

The open living room and kitchen has all the essentials for a relaxing getaway with family and friends. Cozy up in front of the wood burning fireplace, watch a movie on the large flat screen TV, surf the internet or play a fun board game. The kitchen is stocked with the basics and includes a dishwasher, microwave, coffee pot, gas stove, full refrigerator and upgraded solid surface counter tops.

The kids will enjoy their own space in the back bedroom with twin over full bunk, trundle bed, Foosball table and TV. Down a hallway is the master bedroom which has it's own private half bath and king bed. Two more bedrooms have queen beds, and a full bathroom with tub/shower combo is also in the hall.

The front deck has a propane barbecue and table with chairs for outdoor relaxation. The back has a small deck with a hot tub that leads onto the backyard with lots of room to run around. This is a great family cabin option for your next vacation!

Note: Always carry chains in the winter months. This cabin has a fairly steep driveway.

Features: Wood Burning Fireplace, Hot Tub, Propane Barbecue, (No Cable),  Internet, WiFi, Gas Stove, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Foosball Table, Deck, Yard, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and  well-appointed accommodations. Generally features comfortable  furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few dated features or  appliances.

name: Hillside Haven - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: Queen, Twin over Twin Bunk (Lower Level)

description:
Enjoy the breathtaking mountain and ski slope views of Bear Mountain at our newly updated Hillside Haven. Perfect for a barbeque on the deck among the tree tops. Take in the mountain air and sun in the outdoor yard and patio area.

The upper/entry level, open floor plan gives way to perfect space for families and groups to come together. Relax on the spacious sofa facing a flat screen TV and cozy wood burning fireplace. Internet and cable are provided for your entertainment. The dining room table offers plenty of seating for your meals, gatherings, board games, or a game of cards. The beautifully remodeled kitchen comes equipped with stainless steel appliances, gas range, microwave, coffee pot, dishwasher and is stocked with your basic cooking needs. Sit back with the colors of the mountain sunset from the bay window while you read a book.  A full bathroom is also on this level. The deck features slope views and a charcoal barbecue.

Sleep comfortably in the bedrooms located on the lower level. The master has a queen bed and a private deck for morning coffee/cocoa, a flat screen TV with DVD player and access to the hallway full bathroom.  The next bedroom has a queen bed, built in twin over twin bunk and flat screen TV with DVD and X-Box. The last bedroom has a queen bed and beautiful slope views. 

Get the group together and enjoy a game of Foosball or air hockey in the down stairs game room with deck access (outside entrance).

Features: Great Ski Slope/Mountain Views, Cable, Internet, Flat screen TV's,  Wood Burning Fireplace, Charcoal Barbeque, Decks, Yard, Updated Kitchen and Baths, Laminate Wood Floors, Carpet, Granite Counters, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Towels and Linens Provided

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Highland House - Big Bear CIty, CA
description:
Highland House is a cozy cabin, centrally located, in a quiet neighborhood. It's just minutes to all the restaurants, shops, and Big Bear activities. 

The front porch includes two wood rocking chairs, a great spot to relax and enjoy the serene neighborhood.

Enter Highland House to find an entry way with wood floors, coat hooks, and a vintage wood-burning stove. A welcome pillow is sitting on a nearby chair to greet you to the home. 

This is a two story, reverse floor plan home. On the entry level, you'll find three bedrooms. The master bedroom has a king bed and wood ceilings. Entertainment is at hand with a flat-screen television and HDTV cable. The en suite master bathroom includes a soaking tub, stone walk-in shower, and double sinks.

The second bedroom has both a queen and twin bed. The storage is plentiful, with an alcove to keep your belongings tidy. A window provides views of the side yard.

The third bedroom includes two full beds and a window with views of the side yard.

The entry level has a bathroom in the hall to share between the second and third bedrooms. This is a full-size bathroom with double sinks.

Next to the bathroom, you'll find a door that leads you to the back yard. The back yard is fully-fenced and has a pretty garden with a windmill. A flat-area provides a safe place for children to play. The yard has a wood deck with an outdoor table and four chairs. The hot tub is the perfect spot to soothe sore muscles, after a day spent on the slopes or hiking trails. 

Head upstairs to find a balcony with views of the back yard. This balcony includes a large outdoor dining area with seating for seven. A canopy over the dining table will provide shade from the sun. Grill a chicken or a juicy steak on the propane BBQ, and enjoy dining al fresco in the fresh mountain air.

Just inside of the balcony, you'll find a half-bathroom for the upstairs level.

The kitchen includes all the tools that you'll need to whip up a home cooked meal.The kitchen has granite counters, stainless steel appliances, and a ceiling fan. As you cook, you'll be able to admire the views of the backyard through the window and glass slider, both of which fill the room with natural light. Other features of the kitchen include a gas oven, microwave, coffee pot, trash compactor, kitchen island, and dishwasher.

Serve your meal at the dining table that is located adjacent to the kitchen. The table seats eight and includes a ceiling fan to keep you cool during the warm summer months. Open up the curtains to enjoy a view of the front of the house as you dine.

In the living room you'll find multiple sitting areas, some close to the television and others in a quieter spot, for guests who might want to read a book or play board games. The flat-screen television includes HDTV cable. Although you're up in the mountains, it's easy to stay connected with wifi access. On a chilly night, you'll love the wood-burning fireplace. The antler chandelier above the living room gives the cabin a touch of nature.

The futon in the living area provides an additional sleeping option.

Highland House is close to the action, yet located in a quiet area that will provide peace and relaxation. This cabin has cozy touches and amenities that will make you feel at home. Make Highland House the destination for your Big Bear vacation!

Note: For bookings of 5 nights or more, laundry services at the home will be available.

Features: WiFi, HDTV Cable, Deck, Hot Tub, Fenced Yard, Game Table, Propane BBQ, Balcony, Stainless Steel Appliances, Granite Counters, Ceiling Fans, Microwave, Dishwasher, Trash Compactor, Coffee Pot, Wood Burning Fireplace, and Soaking Tub

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.  This home is in a quiet neighborhood, please abide to all rental laws.

name: Honeymoon Hideaway - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Get your sweetheart and head up to Big Bear Lake for a cozy weekend alone at Honeymoon Hideaway.  No sweetheart?  Then enjoy the peace and quiet in this ideal writer's retreat.

The adorable cabin has been lovingly cared for and combines the history of the area with the upgraded amenities of today. The living room features wood floors, original wood ceiling and natural stone gas fireplace.  Get comfortable on the sofa in front of the flat screen TV with cable and DVD player.  Stay connected with complementary Wi-Fi.  The kitchen is just steps away and has granite counters, gas range, dishwasher, microwave and coffee pot.  Seating is available at the counter or at the dining table. Through the small hallway is a stacked washer and dryer, uniquely updated full bathroom, and bedroom with king bed.

The large flat fenced back yard is perfect for spending an afternoon in the fresh mountain air grilling on the charcoal barbecue.  For a touch of romance, soak in the hot tub under the stars.  This cabin is the perfect little getaway!

Features: Hot Tub, Quiet Neighborhood, Wood Floors, Central Heat, Gas Fireplace, Ceiling Fan, Cable, DVD, Internet, Charcoal Barbecue, Flat Fenced Yard, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Stacked Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Haus Matterhorn - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Twin over Full Bunk and Twin

description:
Haus Matterhorn is a beautifully decorated single story cabin with a style of its own. Located across the street from Bear Mountain Golf Course driving range with wonderful views of the summer green or winter  snow, this home has much to offer. From Haus Matterhorn you can watch the sunset over the slopes of Bear Mountain Resort just a short drive away. Visit the rescued animals at Moonridge Zoo right up the street or soak under the night stars in the outdoor hot tub in the private, fenced yard.

This three bedroom, two baths cabin comes with a colorful and inviting fully equipped kitchen with a center island for extra counter space and a dishwasher. Sharing an open floor plan with the dining area, the living room has beautiful wood features and large windows to enjoy the mountain scenery. Relax by the wood-burning fireplace or catch a movie on TV. Haus Matterhorn has cable TV and wireless internet.

The first bedroom has a queen bed with TV/DVD, the second bedroom has a full bed and TV/DVD with a bathroom conveniently located in the hall. The third bedroom has a twin over full bunk beds plus a twin bed and another TV/DVD. The house also comes with a folding crib for a baby.  Between the kitchen and back entrance you'll find a central area that consists of the second bathroom, a desk/office area, a space for coats and shoes behind the door, as well as the air hockey table kids will enjoy.  The cabin is pet friendly and a zebra striped blanket and doggie dishes are available for your use so they will feel right at home. Laundry use is available.

Features: Close to Bear Mountain and Golf Course, Hot Tub, Fenced Yard, Laminate Floors, Wood Burning Fireplace, DirectTV, Internet, Air Hockey, Dishwasher, Washer and Dryer, Blow Dryer in Each Bathroom, Propane BBQ, Pet Friendly, Towels and Linens Provided
This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with a few original features or appliances.

name: Hunkered Down - Big Bear City, CA
description:
When the snow is falling or the sun is shining, this is a great cabin for hunkering down for the night!  Set down from the road for added privacy, this cabin is sure to keep you comfortable and cozy during your Big Bear vacation.

The living room is centered around the wood burning stove and large flat screen TV with DirecTV and DVD player.  The dining area is perfect for a meal or try your luck with one of the provided board games.  The kitchen is stocked with all the basics and includes a gas range, microwave, dishwasher, coffee pot and Keurig coffee maker.  For a breath of fresh air step out to the back deck for grilling on the propane barbecue or just relaxing with a glass of wine.  Your furry family members will appreciate the dog beds.

Down the hallway is a full bathroom and two bedrooms.  The first bedroom has two queen beds, a TV with DVD player and doors leading out to the front patio.  The second bedroom has a loveseat for lounging, twin daybed with twin trundle and TV with DVD player.  Downstairs is the master suite with king bed, futon, TV with DirecTV and private full bathroom with claw foot tub/shower.  The laundry room is also on this level, as well as access to the back yard.

Note: This cabin has an elevated parking pad with multiple stairs leading down to the front door.

Features: Close to Bear Mountain, Open Floor Plan, Pet Friendly, Deck, Propane Barbecue, Wood Burning Fireplace, DirecTV, DVD, Internet, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Keurig Coffee Maker, Board Games, Central Heat, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Indian Summer - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
This brand new (Spring 2016) custom log home has been lovingly decorated with cabin decor, log accents and high end finishes. Located within walking distance to restaurants, Meadow Park, the lake and only a few minutes drive to the resorts and shuttles, this cabin is quickly becoming a favorite vacation spot with guests.

Enjoy the spacious single story open floor plan with wood grain tile floor, vaulted ceilings, wood burning fireplace and plenty of natural light.  The cabin offers a warm and cozy but spacious feeling that your friends and family are sure to appreciate. The living room features a comfortable reclining sofa and chair in front of the fireplace and flat screen TV with cable access and DVD player with DVDs.  The dining area has a tall table with extra seating at the beautiful log breakfast bar for a snack, family meal or game night.  The beautiful kitchen has all the basics and features spacious granite counters, stainless steel appliances, gas stove, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot.  For some fresh mountain air and a little outdoor R&R head out the fenced backyard.  The back deck has a charcoal barbecue for grilling and mature trees. The garage has been coverted to a game room with a pool table and TV with cable (not pictured) for evenings of fun!

Down the hall you will find a washer and dryer, full bathroom and the three bedrooms.  The master suite has a king bed, back deck access and private full bathroom with double copper sinks.  Bedroom two has a king bed and back deck access.  Bedroom three has a queen and twin bed.

This is a luxury property which includes the finest furnishings, luxury building materials, and a highly consistent design theme. Luxury properties range from elegant and formal to relaxed and chic, but all appeal to guests who appreciate first-class accommodations with a designer flair.

Features: Walk to Restaurants and the Lake, Close to Snow Summit and Shuttles, High End Finishes, Pool Table (photo coming soon) Wood Burning Fireplace, Flat Screen TV, Cable, DVD, Internet, Stainless Steel Appliances, Granite Counters, Gas Stove, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Charcoal Barbecue, Master Suite, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided.

name: Journey's End - Big Bear City, CA

arrangements.Master Suite: King, TV w/ Cable, Deck Access

description:
Located within a few minutes drive to Bear Mountain, Snow Summit, and the Village in the established neighborhood of Fox Farm.  There is plenty of room to roam or just sit back and relax.  This cabin is full of retro accents and new paint, carpets, and  furnishings!

The great room features a floor to ceiling rock-faced wood burning fireplace, oversized sofa, flat screen TV with cable and Blu-Ray player. Read a book in the sitting area or pull up to the bar complete with mini fridge, built in blender and pass-through window to the back deck.  Spend some time challenging each other at a game of Foosball, pool, or ping pong.  The central kitchen has expansive counter space, breakfast bar seating, 6-burner gas stove top, double oven, dishwasher, microwave and coffee pot.  The dining room has seating for everyone to share a family or holiday meal with a serving counter that can also be used as a desk.

Plan on spending some quality time on the back deck grilling on the charcoal barbecue or just lounging in the shade with a glass of wine.  Kids can run and explore in the flat, fenced yard (no pets).

The bathroom and bedrooms are located down a hallway for peace and quiet.  A laundry room is available and convenient for longer stays.  The full bathroom has a tub/shower combo.  The first bedroom has two, twin over full bunk beds.  The second bedroom has a queen bed and TV with cable.  The master suite has king bed, TV with cable, back deck access and 3/4 bathroom with separate sink and large shower with tile bench.

Features: Minutes From Bear Mountain, Single Story Living Space, Wood Burning Fireplace, Cable, Internet, Pool Table / Ping Pong Table, Foosball Table, Charcoal Barbeque, Partially Covered Deck, Central Heat, 6-Burner Gas Stove Top, Double Oven, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Dishwasher, Washer and Dryer, Master Suite, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing and desirable amenities.

name: Iris Getaway - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Looking for a private mountain getaway?  Feel miles away from everything, while just moments away from it all!  This cozy cabin is situated on an extra large lot with mature trees and rustic cabin decor.  Just a short trip to nearby hiking trails or Alpine Slide.

Light a fire in the wood burning fireplace while you recline in a comfortable leather chair or on the sofa.  Watch satellite TV on the large flat screen or play a game of poker or a board game on the rustic log game table.  The updated kitchen features a gas stove, microwave, dishwasher and easy access to the porch for charcoal barbeque grilling.  A private bonus room is perfect for a nap or reading a good book with a pull-out sofa and attached bathroom with a shower.

The bedroom is off a small hallway with a queen bed and TV with attached DVD player.  A spacious full bathroom is conveniently located right outside the bedroom door.

The extra large lot is perfect for the kids to build a snowman or play a game of Frisbee.  A small basketball court is right behind the property for additional outdoor fun.

Features: Flat Screen TV, Satellite, Pet Friendly, Deck, Charcoal Barbeque, Wood Burning Fireplace, Large Lot, Poker Table, Gas Stove, Microwave, Dishwasher, Granite Tile Counter tops, Tree Views, Private Setting, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Inn the Pines - Big Bear City, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Twin over Full Bunk with Twin Trundle

description:
Centrally located in the desirable Fox Farm neighborhood, Inn the Pines is a beautiful log-cabin style home. You'll love this quiet neighborhood that is filled with mature pine trees. 

Walk down a few steps to the front door and enter the home to find a wood alcove with a bench to store your outdoor gear, such as skiing equipment and boots. You'll soon notice that the walls of the home are decorated with sporting equipment and retro signs that celebrate the outdoors. 

Next, you'll encounter the open plan living area. Wood paneling covers the ceiling and several of the walls, giving the space a cozy vibe. Tile floors are featured throughout the main living area and kitchen. On chilly nights, create a fire in the wood-burning fireplace. Curl up on the couch and watch your favorite movie on the flat-screen television with DirecTV and Blu-Ray player. A ceiling fan will keep you cool during the warm summer months.

The kitchen features granite counter tops and stainless steel appliances. It's spacious, with plenty of countertop space, a great bonus if you're hosting a holiday feast or wanting to spend an afternoon baking. Features of the kitchen include a gas oven, microwave, dishwasher, and coffee pot.

Serve your meal at the dining table, located near the living room. The wood dining table has four chairs and a wood bench. Open the curtains and enjoy views of the backyard while dining. An additional seating option can be found at the wood breakfast bar with four stools.

Speaking of bars, pour a glass of wine or craft your favorite cocktail at the wet bar, located next to the dining table. Play bartender as you stand behind a custom-made wood bar with a antler chandelier. The wet bar includes a mini-fridge.

Access to a wood deck and the backyard is through a sliding glass door near the dining table. Grill a juicy steak on the propane grill. Enjoy the fresh mountain air, while sitting around a four person table with built-in fire pit. Beautiful trees with bird feeders will attract feathered locals to the backyard. The yard is fully-fenced, making it a safe place for children to play.

Back inside the home, walk up a few steps near the kitchen to find yourself on the mid-level of the house. Open the door immediately in front of you to discover that the garage has been converted into a game room. A portable heater will keep you warm during the summer months. Challenge your friends to a friendly game of pool or darts.  A half-bath is also located on this level.


Walk upstairs to find three bedrooms. No one wants to do laundry while on vacation, but should the need arise, you'll find a side-by-side washer and dryer in the upstairs closet.

The master bedroom is a true oasis. It has a king bed, ceiling fan, and wood-burning fireplace. Enjoy the stars at night from your private deck, which faces the front of the house. Use the telescope for a closer look. Stay entertained with the flat-screen television with DirecTV and DVD player. The en suite bathroom has recently been updated and includes a stone shower, Jacuzzi tub, bidet, and toilet.

The second bedroom has a full bed, ceiling fan, flat-screen television with DirecTV. The window provides views of the front of the home.

The third bedroom is perfect for kids and it includes a twin over full bunk, flat-screen television and DirecTV. The window provides views of the front of the home.

The third and fourth bedrooms share a full-sized bathroom, with access in each bedroom.

Additional sleeping space can be found in the living room on the sleeper sofa.

Inn the Pines is a beautiful home, stocked with many amenities. It is just a short drive to the ski slopes, hiking trails, and Big Bear Village. Grocery stores and restaurants are minutes away. Make Inn the Pines your home for your Big Bear Vacation!

Features: Centrally Located, Fully-Fenced Yard, Deck, Hot Tub, Propane BBQ, DirecTV, DVD Player, Ceiling Fan, Wet Bar, Game Room, Pool, Darts, Gas Oven, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Jacuzzi Tub, Telescope, Washer and Dryer.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.

name: Knotty Bear Villa - Big Bear City, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: Twin over Twin Bunk, Twin over Queen Bunk

description:
Located in Upper Moonridge, Knotty Bear Villa is a two-story, reverse floor-plan cabin. This home is nestled in a quiet neighborhood that is filled with beautiful trees. It's located close to Bear Mountain Ski Resort, and just a short drive to Big Bear's restaurants, shops, and activities.

Pull up to the long driveway and park in front of Knotty Bear Villa. The entry door is on the front deck, fourteen steps up from the driveway. You'll be greeted by a welcome bear statue. Take note of the slider chair, a great place to relax and enjoy the neighborhood. 

When you enter the home, you'll find the master bedroom on your right. The master bedroom features a king bed and a television with HDTV cable. A window provides views of the front porch and the side of the house.

To the left of the entrance, you'll find the second bedroom. The second bedroom has two sets of bunk beds. The first bunk is a twin over twin, and the second bunk is a twin over queen. This room has a television with HDTV cable. It's a spacious room that also includes a reclining chair.

Both the master and second bedroom share a downstairs full bathroom. This bathroom is located in a hall behind both of the bedrooms. This hall also contains a place to store your outdoor gear. 

Walk upstairs to the open plan living area. At the top of the stairs, turn left and you'll find another full bathroom. This bathroom includes a walk-in glass shower. If the need to do laundry should arise, you'll find a side-by-side washer and dryer in this bathroom.

A major feature of the living room is the wood-burning fireplace with over-sized brick hearth. The brick work extends to create a nearby window seat. This beautiful fireplace will keep you warm and cozy. Relax on the sofa or reclining chair to watch a movie on the flat-screen television with Blu Ray player and HDTV cable. Knotty Bear Villa has a large collection of DVD's and you're sure to find a movie to enjoy. Even though you're vacationing in the mountains, you'll find it easy to stay in touch with Wifi.

The ability to create a home cooked meal is one of the joys of staying in a rental home. The kitchen is stocked with all the tools you'll need to whip up a homemade meal. The kitchen is spacious with a tile counter top and a window that provides peek-a-boo views of Bear Mountain Ski Resort. Features of the kitchen include: microwave, dishwasher, gas range, and coffee pot. Serve your meal at the six person wood dining table.

Next to the living room, you'll find the sliding door that leads to the upper deck. Enjoy the fresh mountain air while relaxing on comfortable deck chairs. Grill your dinner on the propane BBQ and dine al fresco on the picnic table.

Knotty Bear Villa is charming cabin that is centrally located. It's perfect for a small family or group. Make Knotty Bear Villa the destination for your Big Bear vacation!

Features: Wood-Burning Fireplace, HDTV Cable, Wifi, Blu Ray Player, Microwave, Dishwasher, Gas Range, Coffee Pot, Washer and Dryer.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.

name: Hulley's Hideaway - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 1: Queen and Twin over Twin Bunk

description:
This cozy mountain retreat is walking distance to Bear Mountain and Alpine Zoo! Dog friendly!

Nestled in the trees and walking distance to Bear Mountain Ski Resort and hiking trails, this home is in the perfect mountain location. The wraparound deck is a great place to escape and unwind. Complete with an 4 person hot tub, porch swing and great forested  views. Opposite you will find a picnic area for the family and a gas barbecue grill.

Step inside this well cared for cabin where you'll see a dining area with seating for 7. The well-appointed kitchen has newer modern appliances, ready to prepare any meal. There is a standard coffee maker and plenty of kitchenware for your group.

The living room area features a free standing wood burning fireplace, flat screen smart TV and WIFI. Relax on the oversized sectional sofa or the futon. In the living room you will find deck access to step out and enjoy the hot tub.

Down the hall is a vanity area and a stackable washer and dryer for your use.

The first bedroom has a Queen size bed and a Twin over Twin bunk bed, complete with a flat screen TV and Amazon Fire TV Stick. The second bedroom provides added sleeping space with a Queen size bed.

The home has incredible vaulted open wood beam ceilings throughout, emphasizing the true cabin feel. You are certain to stay warm as this home provides central heat and a wood burning fireplace.

Note: Although one story, this home has over 12 steps to descend to the front entrance.

name: Kodiak Lodge - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
This 4 bedroom, 4.5 bathroom, three story log cabin backs up to the National Forest in the beautiful neighborhood of upper Moonridge. Close to Bear Mountain and hiking trails for those seeking adventure! This cabin has desired amenities including hot tub, pool table, sauna, wood burning fireplaces and more!

The great room features floor to ceiling windows overlooking the forest beyond, giving a sense of bringing the outdoors in.  The family will enjoy spending time in front of the wood burning fireplace after a chilly day on the slopes.  Watch all your favorite programs and movies on the large flat screen TV with DirecTV and Blu-Ray player. The kitchen has a rustic cabin feel with wood counters and solid log breakfast bar, but has all the perks including stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, coffee pot, microwave, and professional grade gas range.  The dining room has a log style table and chairs and access to the back yard with both propane and charcoal barbecues.  Soak away the day in the sunken hot tub overlooking the trees while the kids explore the forest beyond.

Through the den you will find the main level master suite with log style king bed, back deck access, flat screen TV with DirecTV and private bathroom with soaking tub, large shower and double sink solid log vanity.

Up the log spiral stairs is the loft with three bedrooms and sitting room featuring large sofa with room for everyone, TV with DVD player and DirecTV. The second master suite  has a king bed, forest views, TV with DirecTV and private 3/4 bathroom with double sinks, shower and private toilet.  Bedroom three has ta queen bed, bedroom four has a queen bed, and both share the Jack-and-Jill 3/4 bathroom.

Downstairs in the lower level is where all the fun is!  At the base of the landing you will find the laundry room, a unique bathroom with wine barrel sink and a sauna for easing tired muscles.  The game room features a pool table, convertible poker/bumper pool table, Foosball table and wood burning fireplace.  A full with twin trundle provides flexible sleeping arrangements.
NOTE: This home has beds for 10 people.

Features: Radiant Floor Heating, Close to Bear Mountain, Backs to National Forest, Hot Tub, Pool Table, Foosball Table, Propane and Charcoal Barbecues, Sauna, Wood Burning Fireplace, DirecTV, DVD, Blu-Ray, 2 Master Suites, Stainless Steel Appliances, Dishwasher, Professional Grade Gas Range, Coffee Pot, Microwave, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor,  and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Lake Escape - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Suite: King, Full Bath, Lake Views (Main Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 2: King, Queen Murphy Bed, Full Bath, Lake Views (Lower Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 4: Queen, Twin over Twin Bunk (Lower Level)

description:
As of September 26, 2018, the water depth for dock use about 2.5 feet to 5.5 feet deep.

This lakefront retreat was designed for entertaining on your vacation!  Includes a large wet bar, spacious kitchen with ample counter space and large center island, and gorgeous lake views from the living room and deck.  Head down to the water and enjoy your own small beach and boat dock!

The living room features a flat screen TV with cable, Blu-Ray and surround sound for movie watching in front of the wood burning fireplace.  Catch up on the latest news with friends or read a book in the sitting area.  Gather around the dining table for a game or holiday meal, or pull a seat up to the kitchen counter and keep the chef in the family company while they cook on the professional grade Viking stovetop with grill, flat top and large burners.  The kitchen also includes a dishwasher, two ovens, a microwave and coffee pot.  Down the hallway is a half bath and laundry room.

The deck will be calling your name during the warmer months when you can enjoy outdoor seating and grilling on the propane barbecue overlooking the lake.

The main level has a beautiful master suite with lake views, a gas fireplace, king bed and bathroom fit for royalty.  Enjoy an evening soak in the large tub, or rinse off the day in the large shower.  There are also two vanities and a bidet.

Downstairs is the entertainment hub with a pool table, Foosball table, wet bar, gas fireplace, lake views and deck.  Tune into the latest in sports or watch a movie on the flat screen TV with cable.  Three bedrooms complete the lower level.  The first bedroom has a king bed, queen Murphy bed, gas fireplace, lake views and a full bathroom with dual sinks.  The next bedroom has a king bed and full bathroom with dual sinks.  The last bedroom has a queen bed, twin over twin bunk bed, TV with DVD player and access to the full bathroom that is also available from the game room.

Escape to the lake and book your next stay at this luxury lakefront retreat!

Note: Lake levels vary throughout the year and boat docks availability is not guaranteed at the time of your arrival. Destination Big Bear is not responsible for the level of water in the lake during the course of guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most up-to-date lake levels for lakefront properties.

Features: Lakefront, Dock, Beach, Luxury, 2 Wet Bars, Wood Burning and Gas Fireplaces, Large Kitchen, Gas Stovetop, 2 Ovens, Dishwasher, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Cable, Blu-Ray, Pool Table, Foosball Table, Bathrooms with Every Bedroom, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: La Casa Bella - Big Bear City, CA
description:
You will love staying at this "beautiful house".  La Casa Bella is tucked away in a quiet neighborhood on the north side of Big Bear Lake with desirable upgrades and log furnishings.  Pull up a chair on the covered front porch, or soak under the stars in the hot tub.  There are plenty of ways to have fun indoors with a pool table and pinball table. New family memories are sure to be made.

Step inside to the grand entry and try your luck at the mini slot machine (entertainment only).  The living room is the perfect place to gather around the wood burning fireplace and sip a cup of hot cocoa with the family.  The dining room features a custom, handmade log table with chairs and bench seating. The kitchen has plenty of counter space for preparing a meal.  Have a cup of coffee or make yourself an espresso on the dual feature coffee machine.  The kitchen has a gas stove, microwave dishwasher and granite counters. Just off the kitchen is the TV room with cable access, convenient for watching your favorite show while you cook.

Step out to the back deck and grill on the propane barbeque.  The hot tub is sure to be popular, especially after a day on the slopes. A washer and dryer is available for use in the garage (no garage parking).
The first bedroom is on the main floor and features a log style queen bed.  A half bath is conveniently located right outside in the hall.

When night falls, head upstairs to bed.  The master suite has a queen bed and private 3/4 bathroom with double sink and shower.  The attached game room is sure to be a favorite place for the kids with a small pool table, pinball machine, corner wood stove and TV with cable. Two more bedrooms are on the other side of the hall, one with a twin over twin bunk and the other with a queen bed.  A full bathroom is also on the upper level.

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and appliances.

Note: No Garage Parking

Features: Pool Table, Pinball Table, Flat Screen TV, Cable, Internet, Wood Burning Fireplace, Propane Barbeque, Deck, Covered Porch, Hot Tub, Granite Counters, Log Furnishings, Gas Stove, Microwave, Dual Coffee/Espresso Machine, Dishwasher, Master Suite, Central Heat, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided.
address: 820 Antelope Mountain Dr. Big Bear City, 92314

name: Lake Point Crossing - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: King, Twin and Twin Trundle (Main Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 3: Queen, Twin and Twin Trundle (Main Level)

description:
Located between Gilner Point, Lagonita Point, Gibralter Point, Metcalf Bay and just a few minutes drive to the marina, The Village and hiking trails, Lake Point Crossing is a great cabin for your next family getaway!

This single story, three bedroom cabin is warm and inviting and has everything your friends and family are looking for in a cabin in Big Bear.  The living room features a wood burning fireplace for those chilly nights while you watch TV on the flat screen with cable and DVD player.  Centrally located is the family room with pool table, TV and beverage station with seating, wine fridge and Keurig coffee maker.  The kitchen has plenty of space for making a meal with two sinks, professional gas range, dishwasher, microwave, and large refrigerator.  The dining area has a nice size table and chairs with extra seating at the breakfast bar.  Step outside to back yard and relax in the shade with a table and 6 chairs (not pictured), grill on the propane barbecue or soak in the hot tub under the stars.

The bedrooms are located down a hall, away from all the action so you can get a good night's sleep.  The master suite has a California king and private 3/4 bathroom with large shower with both a rain and standard shower head.  Bedroom two a California king plus a twin daybed with twin trundle and 3/4 bathroom.  Bedroom three has a queen bed plus twin with a twin trundle.  A full bathroom with tub/shower combination is in the hallway.  A laundry room is available for you use and is perfect for longer stays.

Features: Close to the Lake and Village, Hot Tub, Pool Table, Flat Screen TVs, Cable, DVD Player, Internet, Wood Burning Fireplace, Stainless Steel Appliances, Professional Gas Range, Dishwasher, Keurig Machine, Microwave, Propane Barbecue, Master Suite, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

description:
***DUE TO DROUGHT CONDITIONS AND EXTREMELY LOW WATER LEVELS, THE BOAT DOCK IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.***

Dock is available at local marina. Non-motorized watercraft launching only from shoreline.

Lake levels vary throughout the year and boat docks availability is not guaranteed at the time of your arrival. Destination Big Bear is not responsible for the level of water in the lake during the course of guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most up-to-date lake levels for lakefront properties.

Relax and enjoy the spectacular views and amazing sunsets from the deck of this spacious Big Bear lakefront retreat. With four bedrooms, two and a half bathrooms as well as over 3,000 square feet of living space, there is plenty of room to lose yourself.

Lakefront Manor is located in the highly desirable area of Eagle Point, which is just a short drive to the Village and to the slopes! Anything you'll want to do in Big Bear is less than five minutes by car.   Enjoy lakeside living at it's finest. The flat yard is manicured with a fenced area for small kids and pets and boasts spectacular views and almost 15,000 square feet of outdoor play space.

This multi-level home boasts views from almost every uniquely decorated room plus three spacious decks overlooking the lake.

The vaulted ceilings and open floor plan with a great room allows for you and your family/friends to enjoy being together in one room.  Have some fun playing a game of poker, roulette or craps at the interchangeable bar and table. Chess and board games are available or just sit back and relax while you watch TV Flat Screen TV with cable and DVD player. A wood burning fireplace will keep you toasty after a day of mountain fun.

The kitchen features granite counter tops, pantry, slate flooring, stainless steel JennAir appliances and upgraded finishes. There is plenty of counter space with a gas burning stove facing the views and living area.

The large game room features a pool and Foosball table, flat screen TV and DVD player. Or sit back and relax in the hot tub located just outside with breathtaking views. 

The master bedroom has it's own gas fireplace, private bathroom and flat screen TV with DVD player.  Three more bedrooms ensure plenty of sleeping room plus additional accommodations on the living or game room sofas.

Note: Children's play equipment belongs to the neighbor.  Not for tenant use.  No dock available.

DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your  full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional  repairs.  As of 9/30/2017 yard is temporarily only partially-fenced due  to tree removal.
