name: La Vie Boheme - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 1: Queen, Smart TV, Access to Full Bathroom (Main Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 2: Twin over Twin Bunk, TV w/ Cable & Roku (Main Level)

description:
Discover your wanderlust at La Vie Boheme, located within walking distance to Snow Summit resort or the shuttle lot for a quick ride to Bear Mountain.

Entering upon the mudroom, you will enjoy the perk of heated floors from a long day out on the slopes! The open main floor features wood floors throughout, vaulted ceilings, floor to ceiling windows, a wood burning fireplace and all the comforts of home.  The living room is the perfect gathering place after a day full of adventure with an oversized sectional and a couple leather swivel club chairs, as well as a couple rustic stools. Very comfortable spacious seating for 6+ people.  There is also a flat screen TV with HBOGo, Showtime, Netflix, and Spectrum ready-to-use accounts. and DVD player.  The dining area has plenty of space for everyone at the table for a meal or game night even featuring a quality record player with 50+ cut a rug vinyls. The kitchen features a large island and stainless steel appliances including gas range, microwave, dishwasher, coffee pot and Keurig machine.  For your convenience there is a washer and dryer in the main floor laundry room, as well as garage parking for one to two cars, The oversized garage also doubles as a game room with Foosball and darts.

For a bit of relaxation head out to the back deck and soak in the sunken hot tub, or just sit back and enjoy the fresh air while you grill on the propane barbecue. Have some competitive fun with a game of cornhole. There is additional outdoor living space on the front deck.

When night falls, take your choice between three bedrooms. Stay entertained in all rooms with a TV equipped with HBOGo, Showtime, Netflix, and Spectrum ready-to-use accounts. The main floor first bedroom has a queen bed, Smart TV, and shared access with the hallway full bathroom with large tub/shower combo.  The second bedroom has a twin over twin bunk and TV with cable and Roku.  Upstairs you can play a game of shuffleboard in the loft.  The enclosed master bedroom is also on the upper level and has a queen bed and private full bathroom with large tub/shower combo and double sinks.

If you are looking for a great location, cozy, unique design and a little something for everyone, then La Vie Boheme is for you!

Features: Walking Distance to Snow Summit and Shuttle Lot, Close to Restaurants and Conveniences, Updated Mountain Design and Decor, Garage Parking, Hot Tub, Propane Barbecue, Wood Burning Fireplace, Wood Floors, Cable, DVD, Smart TV, Internet, Foosball Table, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Keurig Machine, Dining Table, Central Heat, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided.

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Lakefront Sunsets - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
As of September 26, 2018, the water depth for dock use about 1 foot to 2 feet deep. 

The lakefront dream is yours to have at Lakefront Sunsets on the shore of Big Bear Lake. This single story cabin has wall to wall windows so you can enjoy amazing views from the open living room, kitchen, dining area and master bedroom. A beautiful place for your year-round getaway.

The spacious living room has rustic features with wood floors, a wood burning fireplace, comfortable sofas, and is the perfect place to relax after you enjoy the beautiful sunset over the lake on the back deck or down at water's edge.  When night falls you can watch your favorite shows on cable TV or play a movie on the DVD player. You can prepare a meal without missing out on the view or family. The well-stocked open kitchen has all the upgrades you desire with granite counters, stainless steel appliances, small appliances, dishwasher, microwave, gas stove and large refrigerator with pull-out freezer. Gather around the dining table for a game of cards, board games or a family meal.

Rest peacefully in one of the three bedrooms located down a hallway. The master suite has wall to wall windows with lake and mountain views, deck access and private full bathroom. Stretch out in the king bed with memory foam topper and enjoy a fire in the gas fireplace while watching the TV with cable access. The second bedroom has two memory foam extra long twin beds plus a twin trundle and a TV with cable and a Wii game console with games. The third bedroom has a queen bed. Two upgraded bathrooms are close by, one is a half bathroom and one is a 3/4 bathroom. A stacked washer and dryer is available for your convenience.

Don't forget to bring your golf putter so you can practice on the 3 hole putting green in the fenced yard while you wait for your meal to cook on the propane barbecue. Also, try your luck at a game of horseshoes. If you are looking for alone time, the gazebo is the perfect spot.

In the summer season, bring your boat and enjoy the convenience of the  24 ft long 12 ft wide brand new dock that is sure to accommodate whatever you have!  Or just relax and enjoy the beautiful sunset while you sit on the edge with your feet in the water. In the winter, you’re ten minutes from the ski slopes.

Note: Lake levels vary throughout the year and boat docks availability is not guaranteed at the time of your arrival. Destination Big Bear is not responsible for the level of water in the lake during the course of guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most up-to-date lake levels for lakefront properties.

Features: Lakefront, Wood and Gas Fireplaces, Wood Floors, Cable, Internet, Propane Barbecue, Putting Green, Stainless Steel Appliances, Granite Counters, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Master Suite, Deck, Lake and Mountain Views, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Lakewood Haven - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Suite: King, Pull-Out Sofa, TV w/ Cable, Private Bath (Main Level)

description:
If you are looking for a cabin with plenty of room, close to the lake and indoor fun then Lakewood Haven is perfect for you!  This three level, eight bedroom cabin has two kitchens, two living rooms, pool table, Foosball table and deck with peek-a-boo lake views.

The expansive main floor living room is highlighted by the floor to ceiling windows, wood burning fireplace and vaulted ceiling.  Sit back and relax on the wraparound sofa in front of the flat screen TV with cable and Blu-Ray player.  A table and chairs is perfect for a game of cards or extra seating during family meal time.  Through the dining room you will find the kitchen with center prep island.  The large, stainless steel refrigerator, stacked double oven, microwave, warming drawer, extra large gas stove top and dishwasher will make cooking a breeze. A laundry room with front loading washer and dryer is perfect for longer stays. Step out onto the deck for grilling on the propane barbeque or have lunch on the back deck while you enjoy the fresh air, mature trees and peek-a-boo lake views.

Two bedrooms are located on the main level.  The huge master suite features a sitting area with pull-out sofa and lots of windows for plenty of natural light and access to the back deck. Get coxy in the king bed while watching TV with cable or light a fire in the gas fireplace and read your favorite book. The master bathroom has a jet tub, large shower, double sink and separate room with toilet and bidet.  The second bedroom with full size bed is off a separate hall, along with a 3/4 bathroom.

The upstairs loft has a nice sitting area with a pull-out sofa, along with a full bathroom and four more bedrooms.  The third bedroom has a king bed, TV with cable access and private small deck.  Bedroom four has a queen bed and private deck.  Bedroom five has a queen and twin bed.  Bedroom six has a log style twin over full bunk, perfect for the kids or kid at heart.

Head all the way downstairs for even more living space!  The living room has a pull-out sofa and loveseat with TV, cable and DVD player. Light a fire in the wood burning fireplace while spending some time playing pool, Foosball or have a shootout on the double hoop basketball net.  A second kitchen ensures all your favorite foods are just steps away and includes a fridge, dishwasher, gas stove and microwave.  A small log style bar has a mini-fridge and seating. A 3/4 bathroom is also on this level.

Make sure you spend some time outdoors. Take a leisurely walk down to the water or bring your bikes and ride around the quiet neighborhood. It's the perfect haven for your Big Bear vacation.

A security camera is integrated into the front doorbell.

Note: Two car garage parking and two additional parking spots are available at street level.  Additional parking is located on the fairly steep driveway which could get icy and difficult during winter months.  Always carry chains when snow and ice are present.

Features: Walk to Lake, Pool Table, Foosball Table, 2 Wood Burning Fireplaces, 1 Gas Fireplace, Propane Barbeque, 2 Living Rooms, 2 Kitchens: 2 Dishwashers, 3 Ovens, 2 Microwaves, 2 Gas Ranges, Warming Drawer, 3 Sinks, 2 Full Size Refrigerators, Coffee Pot, Washer and Dryer, Master Suite, Cable, Blu-Ray, DVD, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Lakeside Living - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Suite: King and Twin Sleeper Sofa with Full Bathroom (Upper Level)

description:
As of September 26, 2018, the water depth for dock use about 7 inches to 1.25 feet deep. 

You may not want to leave this custom built lakefront log cabin situated on a beautifully landscaped lot on the shore of Big Bear Lake.                                                                         Bring your boat and enjoy the convenience of the boat dock that is sure to accommodate whatever you have! Enjoy the privacy of the sylvan setting with gorgeous lake and mountain views.

The cabin features a large deck looking out to the water with seating and propane barbeque for the ultimate in outdoor living. The cabin is tucked away behind mature trees and lush landscaping, creating a private retreat.  Head inside to the comfortable, cozy living room which opens to the dining area, kitchen and loft above.  Floor to ceiling windows, knotty pine and log accents, gas fireplace and cabin decor accompany the views from the sofa in the living room. Take some time with the family while you relax and share vacation memories around the dining room table. The kitchen is just steps away and is complete with gas stove, microwave, coffee pot and dishwasher. A stacked washer and dryer is located in the hallway, as well as a full bathroom.  Two bedrooms are on the main level, each with a log style twin over queen bunk bed, one with a Smart TV.

Head upstairs to the loft for movie night in the family room with wraparound sofa, large flat screen TV with cable and DVD player.  The master bedroom is also upstairs and features a mirrored window for privacy while taking advantage of the lakefront view.  The master suite has a private full bathroom, king bed and twin pull out sofa.

Feel miles away while being just minutes from The Village, resorts and conveniences.

Note: No garage.

Lake levels vary throughout the year and boat docks availability is not guaranteed at the time of your arrival. Destination Big Bear is not responsible for the level of water in the lake during the course of guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most up-to-date lake levels for lakefront properties.

name: Lakeview Haven - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Boasting lake views and great location, this 4 bedroom cabin will have your friends and family wanting to stay a few more days in Big Bear!

The reverse floor plan takes advantage of the serene views of Big Bear Lake from the top floor deck, dining room, kitchen and living room.  The open living space features wood floors, leather sofas, a wood burning fireplace and TV with cable and surround sound system.  The pool table doubles as a dining table and can seat 6.  The kitchen has plenty of rustic charm with all the modern conveniences you expect including gas range, dishwasher, microwave, Keurig machine and wine fridge.

Down the hallway you will find a 3/4 bath with corner shower, as well as two bedrooms.  The master bedroom has a queen bed, TV with cable, skylight and private full bathroom.  The second bedroom has a twin over full bunk and desk for writing postcards or writing about all your fun adventures in your journal.

Down stairs on the entry level is a stacked washer and dryer, access to the back yard with hot tub, and two more bedrooms.  Each bedroom has a queen bed and is decorated in their own fun mountain theme.  A 3/4 bathroom is shared between the two bedrooms.

Kids will enjoy playing in the flat, grassy yard while the adults lounge in the shade of the covered front deck while enjoying the view of the lake beyond.

Plan your stay in Big Bear today!

Note: Driveway is long with fairly narrow entrance from street.  Always carry chains in the winter months.  Stairs required for entry.

Features:  Lake Views, Close To Village, Reverse Floor Plan, Decks, Propane Barbecue, Wood Burning Fireplace, Hot Tub, Yard, Cable, Ceiling Fans, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Wine Fridge, Keurig, Master Bedroom, Stacked Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Lassen Bear Lodge - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Twin over Twin Bunk and Full (Main Level)

description:
Lassen Bear Lodge is a lovely four season Big Bear escape. Grab your pass and enjoy walking distance to Bear Mountain's slopes! Just steps from the bunny hill along Lassen Drive, this home comes fully equipped to provide an amazing  mountain experience. A custom lodge featuring an outdoor spa, horseshoe pit, and room to sled.

With just a 10 minute walk you can reach all the outdoor fun you are looking for.  Heading to the mountain for some winter fun? Hit the slopes at Bear Mountain Resort! Visiting us in spring? Walk to the Moonridge Zoo and see the animals emerging from their winter dens. Want to escape the summer heat of the desert?  Grab your golf clubs and play a round at  the beautiful 9-hole golf course. Feeling the need to get away in fall? Enjoy the autumn colors as you hike or mountain bike through the adjacent forest. Lassen Bear Lodge has it all.

This four bedroom, four bathroom, 2,500 square foot home is nestled among the oaks and pines and features a garage and plenty of room for snow play and sledding in the spacious yard. The entrance hall features stained glass windows and a large bench to keep all that ski equipment handy.

The woodsy, main living area has laminate wood floors, a central wood burning stove, wrap-around windows, skylights, a large flat screen TV, Wi-Fi, and comfortable sofas with recliners. It is the perfect place to relax with family and friends after a long day on the slopes, lake or golf course. The large dining table seats eight with seating for four more at the granite bar. Cook for the entire crew in the fully stocked kitchen and enjoy the stainless stove top, double door fridge with ice maker and a dishwasher. This kitchen also has plenty of storage in the rustic, knotty pine cabinets.

Off of the living room you will find a bedroom with twin bunk beds and a full size bed. There is an updated 3/4 bath on this level and a full size washer and dryer.

Lassen Bear Lodge features two master bedroom suites. The master "family suite" is on the main floor and has a comfy king bed, TV and CD player, electric fireplace and a private deck. The large, private master bath has a jetted tub/shower combo and dual sinks.

Venture upstairs and find yourself in the family room. Here you will find a queen sleeper sofa and flat screen TV. Do you need to check emails or surf the net? A little further on you will find a comfortable desk area that will make it easy to do just that.

The huge, main master is upstairs and features vaulted ceilings, a king bed, a comfortable sofa with chaise, TV, walk-in closet and an amazing lake view. Enjoy that view with your morning coffee on your own private top level deck. A 3/4 bath is located in this master suite. Also located upstairs is a comfortable guest bedroom with a queen bed and an additional 3/4 bath for your convenience.

When you are ready to enjoy the outdoors, step outside through the slider and enjoy a huge, private, two-level deck that boasts a charcoal barbeque, plenty of seating and spa, all with fantastic ski slope and mountain views surrounded by lovely oaks and pines. Challenge your friends to a game of horseshoes or take the kids sledding in the large backyard. Set off on a hike or mountain bike ride in the adjacent forest.

Lassen Bear Lodge is the ideal cabin for your next Big Bear getaway, any time of the year! This home is also perfect for a group retreat. There is plenty of space for everyone to spread out and large gathering areas as well. It is located on a huge lot that is very private and adjacent to the National Forest.

Note: Sorry, no pets!

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few  dated features or appliances.

name: Log Inn - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Log Inn is the perfect cabin for enjoying Snow Summit for mountain biking in summer or skiing, snowboarding, and sleeding in winter and is ideal for couples, families or small groups.

This wonderful log home is about as close as you can get to Snow Summit Ski Resort. It is complete with rustic mountain style and panoramic views from every direction, inside and out. The cozy living area with its soaring ceiling and beautiful rock wood burning fireplace is warm and welcoming after a day on the slopes or at the lake. Extensive log style accents throughout this home capture the true mountain feeling. The fully equipped kitchen offers all the modern conveniences while keeping the warm and welcoming atmosphere of the rest of this home. The large butcher block island provides casual seating for morning coffee. The dining area, with floor to ceiling windows, captures expansive views bringing nature right indoors. Two levels of outdoor decks make way to magnificent views of the mountains and valley. Relax and breathe in the clean, mountain air from the large, private hot tub. 

Every bedroom in this home is comfortable, has its own TV and takes full advantage of the wonderful mountain views. The heater unit in the bedroom is for decoration only. The light-filled master suite has it all including a king bed, beautiful rock fireplace, sitting area, private bath, awesome views and access to the upper deck. The second spacious bedroom has two queen beds while the third bedroom has two twin beds. A bunk bed is featured in the fourth bedroom.

This home is ideally located only 100 yards from Snow Summit Resort, and you are only five minutes drive from Bear Mountain Ski Resort or take the shuttle. With less than two miles from Big Bear Lake and the Village, you will really appreciate the excellent location and peaceful private mountain setting of this home. Two driveways are available for this home and outdoor parking for up to four vehicles. There is also a washer and dryer for your convenience.

Features: Hot Tub,  Close to Snow Summit, Centrally Located, Mountain Views, Parking, Internet, Decks, Wood Burning Fireplace, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few  dated features or appliances.  Note:  There is no BBQ at this property.

name: Little Bear - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Little Bear is a sweet cabin with a modern flair!  Located in Big Bear  City, just minutes from restaurants and conveniences.  This cabin has  plenty of room for everyone with three bedrooms, two bathrooms, full  kitchen and two table options for dining or a game night.

The  living room centers around the large Samsung smart HDTV with streaming  and a Blu-Ray player.  The dining area has a fireplace and seating for  four.  Step through to the kitchen with granite counters, gas range,  microwave and coffee pot.  Off the kitchen are a 3/4 bathroom and the  first bedroom, which has a queen bed and TV with an Amazon fire stick.

Upstairs  is a full bathroom and two bedrooms.  The first bedroom has a queen bed  and the second bedroom has two twins.  All bedrooms have wall heaters.

Time  outdoors can be enjoyed on the front deck, and the fenced backyard is  great for the little ones and pets. The backyard also includes a propane  BBQ.  

Features:  Close to Conveniences, Modern Decor, Fireplace, TV, Blu-Ray,  Streaming Capabilities, Internet, Updated Kitchen, Gas Range, Microwave,  Wall Heat, Deck, Propane BBQ, Towels and Linens Provided.
address: 204 W. Mojave Blvd Big Bear City, 92314

name: Marina Landing - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 4: King, Twin Convertible Futon Chair (Main  Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 5: King, Queen, Twin Convertible Futon Chair, TV with Cable (Lower Level)

description:
***DUE TO DROUGHT CONDITIONS AND EXTREMELY LOW WATER LEVELS, THE BOAT DOCK IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.***

Daily slip rentals are available at Holloway's Marina, right on the shore where this cabin is located.  Shoreline is usable for launching non-motorized watercraft and fishing.

The name says it all! Relax and enjoy the spectacular views from your own private lakefront retreat just steps away from Holloway's Marina for boat rentals and summer fun.  With two expansive decks, large windows, 5 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms and open living spaces, and over 3,500 sqft, this cabin is perfect for family and friends.

This amazing cabin is located on a quiet street set back from the road.  Sit back and relax on one of two decks and take in the lake and mountain views.  Grill on the 4 burner Weber Summit natural gas grill with dedicated 5th smoker burner and tray for wood chips. The grill, conveniently located on the upper deck. Eat outside on the large table and rail-side bar height food and drink counters.  There is plenty of cooking space in the kitchen with center island, dining area, lots of counter space, a double oven, dishwasher, gas stove, microwave and coffee pot. For breakfast, make incredible high altitude waffles on the double sided waffle iron.  On chilly days you can warm up with the wood pellet stove while sipping a cup of cocoa. Guests are responsible for providing their own pellets which can be purchased at our local DIY and Butchers Block stores. 

The living room features cathedral ceilings with wood beams, floor to ceiling natural stone gas fireplace, wall to wall windows to enjoy the view and large sofa for lounging and watching your favorite movie on the flat screen TV with DirectTV and DVD.  A second dining area is great for a family game night or additional eating space. Have some fun playing Pacman, Centipede or one of the other over 100 arcade video games from the 80's on the multi-game console.

The main level has four bedrooms and two bathrooms, located down a hall for a peaceful night's sleep.  The first bedroom features cedar lined walls, a king bed and TV with cable or DVD, and connects to a large bathroom with double sink and spacious shower with gorgeous stone reminiscent of a forest canopy.  The second bedroom also connects to the bathroom and has two queen beds.  The third bedroom has a queen bed and full futon for flexible lounging and sleeping arrangements.  The fourth bedroom has a king bed and a convertible chair that can fold out to a small bed, and moved to a different bedroom if necessary.  A large bathroom is off the hall with double sink and door separating the tub/shower for privacy and multi-person use.

Downstairs you will be amazed at the high ceilings and beautiful wood grain tile floor.  An extra large bedroom has a queen and king bed as well as an additional convertible chair that can fold out into a small bed, TV with cable and access to the covered deck with hot tub overlooking the water.  A bathroom with double sink and door separating the tub/shower is right down the hall.

The family will have a great time in the game room complete with dual flat screen TVs, pool table, foosball table, wood fireplace, wet bar and access to the covered deck with water views. The backyard is fairly flat for kids to run and play or set up a game of horseshoes and challenge each other to outdoor fun.

You'll be booking your next stay before you even leave this fabulous lakefront mountain retreat.

Note: DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

***DUE TO DROUGHT CONDITIONS AND EXTREMELY LOW WATER LEVELS, THE BOAT DOCK IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.***

Lake levels vary throughout the year and boat docks availability is not guaranteed at the time of your arrival. Destination Big Bear is not responsible for the level of water in the lake during the course of guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most up-to-date lake levels for lakefront properties.

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Lazy Lazy Bear Lodge - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 1: 2 Queens, Full Bath, Wood Burning Fireplace (Upper Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 2: 2 Queen over Queen Bunks, Full Bath (Upper Level)

description:
As of September 26, 2018, the water depth for dock use over 10 feet deep.

Stay in this luxury lakefront cabin in Big Bear Lake for your next vacation. Located on a quiet cul-de-sac with private sandy beach, rustic log cabin features, meticulously decorated with mountain decor and an enviable outdoor space with lake views! 

Designed in a bed and breakfast style, this entire cabin is yours to enjoy and is perfect for your family and friends.  The living room is warm and cozy with a wood burning fireplace, wood floors, and several nooks to curl up and read a book or enjoy a mug of hot cocoa or glass of wine whether it's bright and sunny or you are watching the snow fall.

The kitchen and dining room is sure to be a place where family and friends will gather.  The kitchen features granite counters, stainless steel appliances including a professional grade Viking stove with 6 burners, flat top grill and dual ovens with convection cooking options. Dual microwaves, a coffee pot, dishwasher and two sinks complete the space.  The dining room has seating for everyone with lake views and a TV with cable access.  From here you can step out to the back deck for grilling on the propane barbecue or just hang out on the expansive deck and enjoy the beautiful mountain weather.  Take the stairs down to the lower level outdoor sitting area, or down to the covered patio overlooking the water.

The main floor also has the fantastic game room where there are sure to be hours spent on all the entertainment options.  Pull down the big screen for Blu-Ray movie or TV viewing while you play a game of pool, cards, or make yourself a cocktail at the custom built bar.  Two arcade games will keep the kids busy (requires quarters).  A full bathroom and stacked washer and dryer are also on the main floor.

Up the custom spiral staircase are five bedrooms and a full bathroom.  The first bedroom has two queen beds that overlook the lake, a sitting area with wood burning fireplace and a private full bathroom with separate tub and shower.  Bedroom two has two queen over queen bunks and a full bathroom.  Bedrooms three, four and five all have queen beds.  Plenty of sleeping options for everyone!

This cabin will make your vacation dreams come true!

Note: The homeowner's boat is parked at the dock. Side-ties are still available for guest use.

Lake levels vary throughout the year and boat docks availability is not guaranteed at the time of your arrival. Destination Big Bear is not responsible for the level of water in the lake during the course of guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most up-to-date lake levels for lakefront properties.

This is a luxury property which includes the finest furnishings, luxury building materials, and a highly consistent design theme. Luxury properties range from elegant and formal to relaxed and chic, but all appeal to guests who appreciate first-class accommodations with a designer flair.

description:
Beautiful updated home with a pool table, comfortable furniture, warm carpet, stainless steel appliances and pleasing cabin decor throughout.

This luxury home has a modern flare with rustic accents and an open floorplan.  Walking distance to Big Bear Lake, Meadow Park and centrally located close to the slopes and shopping in the Village! Sit back and relax on the large covered backyard deck. This completely fenced in yard is perfect for kids to play and the cabin is pet friendly.

The living room has leather sofas, a large screen TV and wood burning fireplace. The kitchen has wood floors, lots of granite counter space and breakfast bar seating. The grill is just outside on the deck with outdoor seating for a summer meal.  Washer and dryer are available for your convenience.

At night, retire to one of three bedrooms and sleep soundly in one of the log beds.  This is a great cabin for kids!

Enjoy grilling on either the propane barbeque or the table top charcaol grill.

name: Makin' Memories - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Enjoy the fresh mountain air, wildlife and beautiful trees while you're "Makin' Memories" at this comfortable cabin nestled back on a large lot in a neighborhood perfect for morning or evening walks.  Located just a short drive to Bear Mountain, the grocery stores, the lake and hiking trails.

The open and airy floor plan features warm colors, leather sofas and chair and natural stone wood burning fireplace. Curl up and watch your favorite movie on cable TV or DVD player.  The kitchen has been nicely upgraded with granite counters, gas stove, microwave, dishwasher, coffee pot and seating at the breakfast bar or dining table. Head out to the huge back yard and kick back in the shade of the pine trees and listen to the squirrels and birds chatter.  Soak in the hot tub after a day full of adventure or grill on the propane barbecue.

Two bedrooms are located on the main level with a full bathroom conveniently located in the hall.  Bedroom one has a king bed, and bedroom two has a queen bed and TV with cable and DVD player.  Upstairs in the loft it's all about fun with a pool table, poker table, board games, TV with cable and DVD player and two twin over twin bunk beds for the kids or kid at heart. A 3/4 bathroom is located on this level.  This cabin is a great family option any time of years for Makin' Memories!

Features: Close to Bear Mountain and Conveniences, Hot Tub, Pool Table, Wood Burning Fireplace, Upgraded Kitchen, Flat Screen TV, DVD player, Cable, Internet, Propane Barbecue, Large Yard, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features.

name: Lone Wolf Lodge - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
If you are looking for a gorgeous home away from home, perfectly located for all Big Bear activities, Lone Wolf Lodge is the ideal getaway for you!  This beautifully furnished and decorated home has all the amenities you and your group would ever need to have an ideal vacation! It is located near Snow Summit, the Village, hiking, biking and all that Big Bear has to offer. The back yard faces the lush forest and offers beautiful views off the deck. A truly unique Big Bear experience you do not want to miss out on!
 
The living, dining and kitchen areas feature an open floor plan with luxurious wood and tile throughout. The living area has a beautiful brown leather sectional with a pull out bed. Great for extra guests or movie nights for the little ones! There is a large flat screen TV featuring Apple TV and YouTube TV. Anything you want for entertainment is right at your fingertips! The living area also features a wood-burning fireplace surrounded by gorgeous stonework. Just off the living area is the dining and kitchen area with large stone tile flooring throughout, granite countertops and stainless steel appliances. The open floor plan is ideal for entertaining and quality family time! The dining room table features an absolutely beautiful rustic modern wooden table with bench seating for 6 or more! The kitchen features granite countertops and is equipped with everything your family chef needs to whip up a delicious meal. There is a large pantry for storage, a Keurig coffee maker, gas range, microwave, and an island with an extra sink for your convenience. Just off the kitchen is a large deck with a propane grill facing the fenced back yard and hot tub. Perfect for those summer barbeques and sunset toasts!

The master bedroom features gorgeous wood furnishings, a king size bed, a twin pull-out bed, and has private access to the deck and back yard. Wake up to beautiful forest views just outside your window! There is a large flat screen TV with Apple TV and YouTube TV. Relax and enjoy and cozy night in! The master bath features beautiful tile work, a jetted tub with forest views, and a large tiled shower. Great for relaxing and having a spa-like experience after a long day of Big Bear fun!
The second bedroom has beautiful décor and features a queen size bed. Private, comfy and perfect for guests or kids! The third bedroom features a full size bed, a love seat with a pull out twin bed,  and a dresser for storage. Across the hall is a full bath with a tub and shower. Just down the hall is a separate laundry room with a full size washer and dryer, and cabinets with granite countertops for your convenience. 

Head downstairs to the renovated garage where all the fun happens! The floors are a beautifully stained concrete that compliment the space perfectly. There is an entertainment are with a sectional and a large flat screen TV with Apple TV and YouTube TV. Never miss the big game in this space! There is also a pool table, board games, and plenty of fun for the whole family to be had!

Enjoy a cup of coffee or lemonade on the front porch rockers, or head to the fenced back yard and enjoy and soak in the hot tub. The back yard faces our beautiful Big Bear forest, giving you privacy and nature views. The large deck features a propane grill and a picnic table with bench seating. There is also a hammock for those midday naps while enjoying our beautiful weather!
If you are looking for a gorgeous home away from home, in an ideal location close to everything, Lone Wolf Lodge is the perfect space for you!

Features:  Close to Snow Summit, Close to the Vilage, Open Floor Plan, Gas Range, Wood Floors, Wood Burning Fireplace, Flat Screen TVs, Apple TV, YouTube TV, WiFi, Game Room With Pool Table, Laundry Room With Washer and Dryer, Granite Countertops, Stainless Steel Appliances, Keurig Coffee Maker, Propane Grill, Decks, Fenced Back Yard, Jetted Tub, Hot Tub.

name: Monterey Manor - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: Twin over Queen, Bathroom Access (Main Level)

description:
This home is located in a quiet neighborhood,  please be respectful and aware that any loud noise could result in eviction.

If you are looking for a cabin that is close to Bear Mountain with views of the slopes, beautiful finishes, a hot tub and game table, then Monterey Manor is the perfect cabin for your Big Bear vacation! 

The entry level features the warm and inviting living room with corner gas fireplace, large flat screen TV with cable, and Lazy Boy sofa and recliner for the ultimate in comfort.  Up a small flight of stairs is the dining area, kitchen and family room.  The kitchen has luxury finishes with granite counters, stainless steel appliances including gas range, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot.  Gather in the family room on the Lazy Boy sofa in front of the gas fireplace and TV with cable and DVD player.  A selection of board games and a piano will keep the group entertained.  The deck is just steps away and features peek-a-boo views of the slopes, propane barbecue and seating so you can enjoy the fresh mountain air.  The main living level also has the first bedroom with twin over queen bunk and shared access to the full hallway bathroom.

Upstairs you will find the master suite, two more bedrooms, laundry, full bathroom and access to the back yard with hot tub.  The master suite features a king bed, private full bathroom with separate large shower, double sinks and tub.  Enjoy expansive slope views from the private deck!  The third bedroom has a queen bed, slope views and a crib for the little one.  The fourth bedroom has a queen bed, access to the back yard, and access to the shared full hallway bathroom.

On the ground level you will appreciate access to the two car garage with ping pong table.

This cabin allows SMALL DOGS only.

Note:  2 car parking in garage and 1 car parking parallel to street on driveway.  This cabin has stairs leading up to the main living area either through the garage or front door entrance. Garage Door must be open by button in the garage, manually. Garage opener available upon request for elderly and handy capped guests.  

Features: Close to Bear Mountain, Slope Views, Hot Tub, Ping Pong Table, Deck, Garage Parking, Propane Barbecue, Gas Fireplaces, Cable, Internet, Luxury Finishes, Piano, Board Games, Granite Counters, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Carpet, Central Heat, Ceiling Fans, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Majestic Lodge - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 1: King with Fireplace, Flatscreen TV, & Private Bath with Jetted Tub

description:
This custom mountain, log styled cabin is the perfect Big Bear getaway. Walk in to the smell of vanilla and cinnamon and take in the decorations in the theme of Big Bear with different ornaments and pictures throughout the house. Located in the desired area of Castle Glen, this is the perfect quiet spot in Big Bear to spend your vacation. 

When entering Majestic Lodge the open floor plan is spacious to enjoy each other’s company. The living area has a cozy feel to enjoy by the wood fire while enjoying the striking view of the trees and mountains beyond. Access the deck from the first floor and be prepared to get your breath taken away with seating to relax or cook your favorite foods in the sunshine on the large propane barbeque. Feel right at home in the kitchen with gas range, oven, microwave, coffee pot, Keurig and dishwasher. Dining for six gives you the opportunity to dine in and enjoy some home cooked meals.

The main floor master suite carries on the log home tradition with cabin decor, king bed, fireplace, TV, back deck access and private bathroom with separate soaking tub, shower and double sinks.

Down a set of spiral stairs to the lower level you will find an extra living area to relax and watch TV as well as a Foosball table and wet bar. The lower level bedroom is spacious with queen bed,  flat screen TV and access to the 3/4 bathroom.  The laundry room is available for your convenience.

The upper level has lounging areas to sit back and enjoy the view from the large glass windows. Three bedrooms are also on this level as well as a full bathroom with tub and shower.  The first upper level bedroom has a log style queen bed and TV. The next bedroom has a full bed and TV, and the last bedroom has a queen bed, TV and views of the mountains.

For additional outdoor time, head down to the backyard and take a break on the patio furnishings while the kids run around the yard. This is a great family cabin for your next trip to Big Bear!

Features: Mountain Style Decor, Modern Kitchen, Wood Burning Fireplace, Flat Screen TV's, Satellite TV, Game Room with Entertainment Bar, Game Table, Foosball Table, WiFi, Decks, Fenced Back Yard (No Pets), Propane Barbecue, Washer/Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided.

name: Moose Creek Manor - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Moose Creek Manor is a charming red cabin with green trim that's immediately welcoming. The interior is just as delightful as the outside, with cute woodsy touches like moose themed lamps and a dining table with bears etched in the metal chairs. This quaint cabin is the perfect Big Bear getaway featuring original woodwork from 1928. It has all the character you would expect from a cabin in the mountains.

The original cabin has been turned into a cozy den. Sit and relax while you experience the historic charm of the wood burning fireplace. The living room has plenty of seating or additional sleeping space with two futons. Entertainment is at hand with a stocked library and a television with cable/ DVD player. The living room is sunny with plenty of access to natural light. 

 Moose Creek Manor has been expanded and includes an open kitchen and dining area with all the basics for an enjoyable stay. In addition to a dining table, a breakfast bar adds an additional seating option. 

The cabin has two bedrooms, the master with a queen and the guest with a full and twin. The master has an en suite bathroom with a shower. 

Walk outside more amenities; like a relaxing hot tub and a propane BBQ. Sit on the front porch and enjoy nature with the mature trees that surround the property. Moose Creek Manor is located in a quiet neighborhood and is the perfect mountain escape.
Moose Creek Manor is pet-friendly. Bring your four-legged friend on vacation and take walk to Big Bear Village.

Moose Creek Manor is pet-friendly. Bring your four-legged friend on vacation and take walk to Big Bear Village.
Features: Cable TV, DVD Player, One TV, Propane BBQ, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Stainless Steel Appliances, Vaulted Ceilings, Linens and Towels Provided, Flat Screen TV, Wood Burning Fireplace, Hot Tub, Boat Parking, Washer, Dryer, Walk to the Village, Flat Yard, Tree Views

Note: The carpets are lighter and do have some smudge marks. This property is perfect for the guest who is looking for a cabin rental that won't break the bank. Generally simple decor and filled with basic furnishings and amenities that will meet most of your needs for an enjoyable vacation.

name: Moose Manor - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: Twin over Twin, Twin over Full (Main Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 3: Twin over Twin, Twin over Full (Upper Level)

description:
If views is what you are looking for, Moose Manor has some of the best in Big Bear Lake!  This stunning cabin sits high above the lake and Village and boasts views of the valley below.  

The living room has a cozy mountain feeling with beamed ceiling, wood burning fireplace, lake views and comfortable sofa.  A large smart TV with cable and DVD player, Foosball table and dry bar will keep you entertained.  The hot tub is just outside on the deck!  For more fun and games head into the game room with pool table, darts and access to one of the many back decks.

The dining area has a beautiful log table with additional seating at the dry bar.  The kitchen has lake views at the sink and cooking will be a breeze on the gas range, double wall ovens, microwave and coffee pot.  A dishwasher makes clean up after a meal a snap!  A natural gas barbecue is great for all your grilling.

Down a small hallway you will find a full bathroom and a bedroom with a twin over twin bunk, twin over full bunk, and back deck.

Upstairs are more bedroom options, a full bathroom and a laundry room.  The spacious master suite is a retreat all by it's self with a king bed, futon, gas fireplace, TV with cable and DVD player, private deck, and bathroom with jacuzzi tub, separate shower, and double vanity.

Two more bedrooms are on this level.  One has a twin over twin bunk, twin over full bunk and deck.  The last bedroom has a king bed and back deck.

Your family will love this spacious cabin on the hill!

Note:  Driveway is very steep.  High clearance vehicles recommended.  No street parking.  Driveway is heated in the winter but not guaranteed.

Features: Lake Views, Close to Village, Hot Tub, Pool Table, Foosball Table, Gas Barbecue, Wood and Gas Fireplaces, Multiple Decks, Cable, Internet, DVD, Gas Stovetop, Double Oven, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Moonridge Mountain Ski Cabin - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Be one of the first to experience our fully remodeled Gambrel style cabin. A crisp clean retreat nestled in a peaceful natural setting of Moonridge within 1.3 miles of Bear Mountain Resort.

After skiing, snowboarding or sledding, relax by the fire and the 50'' flat screen smart TV. Or warm up in the hot tub underneath the evening stars, while the kids play Foosball up in the game room. A DVD player and board games are also available.

Preparing meals is a delight, in the well stocked kitchen appointed with new stainless steel appliances. Or take a short drive to an array of restaurants. There is fun for all ages anytime of the year.

Enjoy the sunset and the peek-a-boo view of the slopes through the forest trees. Enjoy multiple outdoor games such as horse shoes, corn hole, and more! You will want to make this your home-away-from-home.

Mountain bike available for tenants. Small dogs (under 25 lbs) only available at property.

Features: Close to Bear Mountain, Hot Tub, Fireplace, Propane Barbecue, Foosball Table, 3 Wi-fi Smart TVs with Netflix Access, DVD Player, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Linens and Towels Provided

name: Mountain Masterpiece - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bonus 2nd Master Suite: Queen, Private Bath, Kitchenette (Upper Level/Over Garage)

description:
This 6 bedroom, 4.5 bath, 5500 sq. ft. three story home is a Mountain Masterpiece!  Custom finishes, gourmet kitchen, multiple decks, and stunning lake views, as well as ideal location for walking to the Village, lake or Alpine Slide.

MAIN / UPPER LEVEL
Enter through the top level and into the main living space with vaulted wood ceilings and double-sided wood burning fireplace.  The cozy living room features a main sitting area in front of the fireplace for gathering to share stories and laughs with family and friends.  The corner nook is set up for TV viewing with a flat screen, DirecTV and Blu-Ray player.  Just on the other side of the fireplace is a dining table fit for a king!  Step into the gourmet kitchen with expansive stone counters, lake views, stainless steel appliances including gas stovetop, double wall oven, microwave, dishwasher, coffee pot, and toaster oven.  Turn on your favorite cooking show or music channel on the TV with DirecTV and get inspired for your next meal.  The upper level covered deck boasts breath-taking lake views, table and chairs, and propane barbecue.

MIDDLE LEVEL
Head down to the middle level that also has outside entry where you will find the bedrooms.  You might not want to leave the master suite, with its king bed, gas fireplace, TV with DirecTV and access to two separate decks with breath-taking views.  The bathroom is a sight to behold with double sinks, large corner hot tub, separate toilet and oversized, circular shower that occupies the stone turret.  Three more bedrooms are on this level.  The first has a king bed, lake views, and TV with DirecTV and Blu-Ray.  The third bedroom has a king bed, lake views, smart TV with Blu-Ray, and access to the middle level deck.  In the hall you will find the laundry and full bathroom with double sinks, and separate room with a sink, toilet and tub/shower.

LOWER LEVEL / ENTERTAINMENT ROOM
For fun and entertainment you can spend time in the lower level.  Mix up a cocktail at the dry bar, and play a friendly game at the pool table, Foosball and air hockey table. The full-grain leather couches and sitting area focuses around the over-sized 65” TV with DirecTV.  A 3/4 bathroom and bedroom with two twin over full beds and Smart TV with DVD player is also on this level.  For relaxation at the end of an adventurous day head out to the patio and soak in the Jacuzzi/hot tub.  In the winter the kids will love playing in the snow!

BONUS 2ND MASTER SUITE 
When you want to be close but need a bit of privacy you can stay in the 2nd Master Suite over the garage (separate entrance).  This bonus suite features a queen bed, table and chairs, leather sectional sofa, smart TV with Blu-Ray, full bathroom with double sinks, and a fully-stocked kitchenette with microwave, coffee-maker, and full-size refrigerator/freezer.

Once you get to this cabin you might not ever want to leave! For the ultimate Big Bear Lake experience, Mountain Masterpiece has it all!

Note: During the winter months we recommend 4WD/AWD on the immediate road leading to and the driveway of Mountain Masterpiece.

Features: Walking Distance to Village, Lake and Alpine Slide, Hot Tub, Game Tables, Propane Barbecue, DirecTV, Smart TVs, Blu-Ray, Multiple Decks, Lake Views, Master Suite, Bonus Suite, Gourmet Kitchen, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Mountain Time - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Den: Pullout Twin Trundle and Roll-Away (Lower Level)

description:
Are you looking for some quality Mountain-Time? This home is just the place for you. From the knotty pine wood work, high ceilings and rustic décor, you will love the “cabin” feel with updated features. This house is centrally located in a quiet neighborhood of the Fox Farm area and is nestled amongst the pine trees. You can have fun in the sun, barbeque on one of two large decks, or unwind in the private outdoor spa. This property has a huge backyard for winter snow play and sledding!

The open floor plan of the living and dining rooms provide a large space to gather and spend time together. The kitchen is upgraded with custom cabinetry, granite counter tops, and stainless appliances. You can warm up by either of the two gas fireplaces while sharing stories with family or just enjoy the peace and quiet of Big Bear.  The living room has a large flat screen TV with cable and internet included. Show the kids where video games started with a sit down, arcade style game of Pac-Man. Retreat to the lower level den that is great for bigger families offering shuffleboard, a flat screen TV, a pull out trundle and a roll away bed.

The main level has one private bedroom with a queen bed and full bathroom. The upper level bedrooms offer sleeping arrangements with a queen bed or three twins.

In just a five minute drive you can experience all Big Bear has to offer with Bear Mountain and Snow Summit Ski Resorts, water sports on Big Bear Lake, the Village's shops and entertainment, even the Moonridge Zoo that shelters and cares for various rescued wildlife. Plan a trip for R&R, family fun and good quality Mountain-Time.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities.

Features: Flat Screen TV, Cable, Internet, Games, Fireplaces, Hot Tub, Decks, Granite Counters, Stainless Steel Appliances, Close to Bear Mountain, Charcoal Barbeque, Towels and Linens Provided.

name: Mountain Pines Lodge - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Mountain Pines Lodge is a beautiful Big Bear cabin rental that your friends and family will so appreciate during your vacation. Includes fully equipped kitchen, hot tub and all the amenities.
NOTE: No Garage Access

Features: Secluded Location, Incredible views of Pine and Oak Trees from Every Room, Backs to the National Forest, Close to Village, Slopes and Lake, Covered Outdoor Hot Tub, Game Room with Pool Table & 52" HD Flat Screen TV, Bose Surround Sound, Slate, Wood-burning Fireplace in Game Room, New fully Upgraded Kitchen and Bathrooms, HD TV/DVD/VCR/Cable, , Wireless Internet Access, 3 Huge Decks with Beautiful Views, Back 2 Decks Fully Enclosed, Wet Bar & Refrigerator in Game Room, Patio Furniture, Propane BBQ, Dog Friendly, Washer & Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Mountain View - Big Bear City, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: Queen, Twin over Twin Bunk (Lower Level)

description:
If you like houses with mountain décor, big open bright rooms and log style architecture, Mountain View is right for you. Located high in the hills of the Moonridge neighborhood offering fantastic views. This reverse floor plan cabin has a great room where the living room, dining room, kitchen, and pool table area come together under the knotty pine cathedral ceiling.  The sliding glass doors to the back deck highlight the slope and tree views while letting in natural light.

The family will enjoy gathering around the wood burning fireplace while watching a movie on the flat screen TV with DVD player.  The kitchen is just on the other side of the stairs leading down to the bedrooms on the lower level.  The spacious kitchen features a dining area, expansive granite counters, gas stove top, double oven, microwave, coffee pot and dishwasher.  Step out to the deck for grilling on the propane barbecue. Everyone will love soaking in the hot tub after a day full of adventure. A half bath is  conveniently located on the main level.

Downstairs you will find the three bedrooms, a full bathroom and laundry.  The master suite is designed to please with a gas fireplace, flat screen TV, deck access and private bathroom complete with jet tub, shower and double sinks. Bedroom 2 has a queen bed and twin over twin bunk and TV.  Bedroom 3 has a queen bed and TV.

This is a great cabin with all the amenities you are looking for!  Your vacation to Big Bear will surely be memorable.

name: Mountain Chic  - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: Twin over Twin over Twin,  Twin over Full

description:
If you’re looking for elegance in the heart of Big Bear, Mountain Chic Retreat is the vacation home for you. This gorgeously designed home has all the amenities you need to have the perfect getaway! Located in the center of Big Bear, this beautiful home away from home will keep you close to all the Big Bear action!

With gorgeous wood floors throughout, as well as indoor/outdoor living, Mountain Chic Retreat is perfect for relaxing in beauty and well thought out design. The living area features plenty of seating for all to gather around, a flat screen TV, and a gas fireplace. 

The dining area has seating for six and faces the outdoor living area as well as the kitchen. Great for a family dinner night in! The kitchen has top of the line stainless steel appliances, including a gas top range, a coffee maker with a Keurig machine, and a separate ice cube maker. The kitchen is equipped with all one would need to whip up a nice meal next to the gas fireplace. There’s even a popcorn maker for movie nights, an ice cream maker and a crock pot! There is plenty of beautiful countertop space as well as bar seating for four.

Head outside to the covered dining and living area for some outdoor fun! The dining area features seating for six and a propane grill. Perfect for dining al fresco and enjoying our beautiful Big Bear weather! Gather around the propane fire pit on chilly nights, or relax and take a nap in the hammock. The fenced back yard also features a horse shoe pit for a little friendly competition! Just around the corner is a private deck area with a hot tub and lounge chairs.  Great for resting and soaking after a long day of Big Bear activities. Just off the deck is a great play space. It features a table with seating for four, corn hole and a Giant Tumble Tower!

Bedroom one is the Master Bedroom and features a king size bed and gorgeous décor. Great for privacy and a relaxing night of rest. The master bath features dual sinks and a tiled shower. Perfect for a steam after a long day on the slopes or the lake! 

Bedroom two is the Bunk Room, and features a triple twin bunk and a twin over full bunk. What a great space for the little ones! In the hall there is a gorgeously updated full bath with beautiful tile throughout, dual sinks, a tub, and a shower. Bedroom three is the Spa Room and features and king size bed, wood floors, a writing area, and a private access to the hot tub. There is also a full size washer and dryer in the hall as well as a powder room for your convenience.

The garage is converted to a game room for hours of entertainment playing Foosball or sitting on the couch and enjoying the 50" smart TV. The landscaping of this home is absolutely beautiful with flowers and apple trees throughout the yard.  If you want elegance and beautiful design set in an ideal location, Mountain Chic Retreat is the place for you! 

Features: Central Location, Foosball, Wood Floors, Gas Range, Hot Tub, Gas Fireplaces, Stainless Steel Appliances, Full Size Washer and Dryer, Propane Fire Pit, Horse Shoe Pit, Corn Hole, Giant Tumble Tower, Popcorn Maker, Ice Cream Maker, Crock Pot

name: Moose Mountain - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Bedroom: Queen with Bathroom, Flat Screen TV and DVD Player
arrangements.Bedroom 2: 2 Queens and Pull Out Full Sofa Bed

description:
Beautiful mountain cabin tucked away in Moonridge with views from the wrap around deck. The large fully fenced flat backyard is a joy for children and pets. The deck is fully fenced and gated for safety. Beautifully landscaped with remarkable curb appeal, you will feel at home in this extraordinary cabin.

A woodsy setting with lots of trees surrounding the cabin provide the perfect mountain getaway. In the distance, enjoy peek-a-boo views of Big Bear Lake from the top floor rooms and top floor deck. Catch a glimpse of the ski slopes from the back of the house in the winter time!

The open floor plan is perfect for those times you all want spend time together. With wood floors and wood beamed ceilings, you get the feeling you escaped to the mountains. The wood burning rock fireplace is sure to keep you warm in the winter time.

The kitchen overlooks the back yard with wonderful views. There is plenty of counter space for a buffet, cooking or a work station. Dining room table has seating for 7.  Featuring stainless steel appliances, slate tile flooring, dishwasher, gas stove, wine fridge and pantry.

As you exit the kitchen onto the spacious deck, you will find the six person hot tub. Enjoy relaxing while you gaze at the stars above. There is an outdoor bar as well for entertaining your family and guests. Both the main level master bedroom and kitchen have access to the deck and hot tub.

Upstairs features two bedrooms and a full size bathroom with tub. One of the bedrooms feautres a HD flatscreen! Total of three bedrooms and two and a half baths.

Enjoy playing on the miniature Foosball/pool table combo located in the living room or watch a movie on the new HD flat screen TV and DVD player. Plenty of board games to play as well for a fun night to remember.

Very short five minute drive to town/ lake or Snow Summit. Very close to Bear Mountain, the golf course and zoo, about one mile. Hiking is just a couple blocks away with some of the most beautiful settings!

Featuring a one car garage with direct access into the cabin with additional flat parking.

Features: Wi-Fi, Updated Furnishings with Pillow Top Mattresses, Fully Equipped Kitchen, Propane BBQ, Linens and Towels Provided, Hot Tub, Garage Parking, Flat Screen TVs, Wood Burning Fireplace, Cable TV, DVD Players, Board Games, Foosball Table

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.
address: 43655 Bow Canyon Road Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: Mountain Haven - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
This warm and inviting cabin is sure to be your Mountain Haven for your next trip to Big Bear!  Located on a quiet dead-end street, this cabin is just minutes from Snow Summit, hiking trails and The Village. Enjoy all the comforts of home plus more!

The living room features cathedral ceilings that give the space an open and airy feeling.  Stay cozy on a winter day in front of the dual sided gas fireplace while you watch TV on the flat screen with cable and DVD player.  There are plenty of seating options on one of the three sofas.  A room with table and chairs is just off the living room where you can close the French doors and play a few rounds of cards, or relax on the futon and read a book in the quiet space.  Step on back to the kitchen and dining room.  Have a glass of wine or cup of coffee in front of the fireplace while you watch the chef in the family prepare a delicious meal.  The kitchen has ample counter space as well as stainless steel appliances including a gas range, microwave, coffee pot, dishwasher, as well as granite counters and a butcher block center island. Pull up a chair at the dining table for a nice family meal. The laundry room and a half bathroom is close by.

For fresh air and grilling on the propane barbecue, step out to the back patio where you can relax under the mature trees.  Try your luck at horseshoes or take a leisurely walk around the neighborhood.

The main floor has the spacious master suite with king bed, TV with cable, a futon, and private bathroom with a jet tub. The master includes a virtual fireplace, a 18x30 screen that recreates the look of a fireplace and emits heat. Upstairs you will find two more bedrooms, a full bath and the game room.  The whole family can gather around the large entertainment space that features plenty of couch seating, a pool table, TV with cable and DVD player, games, a futon and 2 full beds.  Down the hall is a bedroom with a king bed and TV with DVD player.  The last bedroom has a queen bed and attached access to the hallway bathroom.

This cabin is perfect for your next getaway with family and friends!

Features: Close to Snow Summit and The Village, Propane Barbecue, Gas Fireplace, Virtual Fireplace, Cable, DVD, Pool Table, Internet, Horseshoe Pit, Granite Counters, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Master Suite, Central Heat, Ceiling Fans, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Ortega Sun - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Family Room: Queen Pull Out Couch (Main Level, Kitchen)

description:
***DUE TO DROUGHT CONDITIONS AND EXTREMELY LOW WATER LEVELS, THE BOAT DOCK IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.***

Slip rentals are available at Pleasure Point Marina, right on the shore where this cabin is located.

What a spectacular lakefront home! Perfect for a large family or group that wants to enjoy each others company, while having enough space to find peace and quiet. You will feel like a millionaire when you vacation in this luxury estate on the water set back from the road. Soak in the large hot tub overlooking the water and mountains, or relax in front of the 60" flat screen TV and prepare a drink at the bar featuring beautiful logs and granite counters.

As you enter into this beautiful home, you immediately appreciate the vast floor plan and living room with a unique rock wood burning fireplace, large windows, high ceilings and comfortable furnishings. The dining area overlooks the lake and has plenty of seating for a nice meal.  The kitchen boasts expansive granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances, a wine fridge and seating at the large island. A cozy seating area with corner gas fireplace makes it perfect for cooking and visiting with family and friends. The propane grill is just steps away on the back deck with outdoor seating and hot tub. Just off the kitchen is a bathroom with a large shower and bonus room with a pool table, flat screen TV, fireplace inspired heater and comfortable leather sectional sofa.  Front loading washer and dryer is provided and great for longer stays.

Upstairs you will feel like the home goes on forever.  A fabulous master suite has a private deck overlooking the lake, gas fireplace, king bed and private bathroom with double copper bowl sinks.  Down the short hall is a bright full bathroom and pleasant bedroom with a queen bed.  Next you will enter a nice office space convenient for a laptop, or have fun playing some tunes on the keyboard piano. A cozy lounge with 60" flat screen TV with cable and DVD player, stove style wood burning fireplace and gorgeous bar with full logs, granite counters and small fridge is ready for a day of watching sports or a movie.

Get a good night's sleep in one of the four bedrooms off this wing of the house.  Choose from queen and twin beds.  A spacious bathroom with double sinks is just off the hallway.

This home offers the luxury of a new construction with the feel of a mountain cabin.  You will find log wood trim throughout the house, vaulted ceilings, wood floors, central heat and a fenced back yard.  Sit back relax and enjoy the mountains and lake in style!

Features: Lakefront, Pool Table, Wood Floors, Central Heat, Wood Burning Fireplaces, Granite Counter Tops, Stainless Steel Appliances, Wine Fridge, Lake Views, Mountain Views, Hot Tub, Internet, Cable, Flat Screen TVs, Washer/Dryer, Master Suite, Multiple Living Rooms, Propane Barbeque, Towels and Linens Provided

Note: DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

***DUE TO DROUGHT CONDITIONS AND EXTREMELY LOW WATER LEVELS, THE BOAT DOCK IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.***

Destination Big Bear is not responsible for the level of water in the lake during the course of guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most up-to-date lake levels for lakefront properties.

This is a luxury property which includes the finest furnishings, luxury building materials, and a highly consistent design theme. Luxury properties range from elegant and formal to relaxed and chic, but all appeal to guests who appreciate first-class accommodations with a designer flair. Slot machines do not work.

name: Owl's Perch - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Owl’s Perch is a cozy two bedroom home with a charming cabin feel. This cabin is close to Bear Mountain and the zoo and is within walking distance to the Bear Mountain shuttle for winter fun.

The living room in this two story home features a gas fireplace and a flat screen TV with Direct TV or if you prefer the outdoors, there is balcony access for sitting in the sunshine and enjoying the forest views in the neighborhood.

The festive kitchen has a dining table and a large private deck is just steps away, equipped with a propane barbecue, a dining table for four and a chaise lounge for relaxing. New outdoor propane heater to keep you warm while you grill (propane not provided). The main level also has a full bath.

Relax in the tranquil upstairs bedrooms, one with a queen bed and flat screen TV and a second bedroom has a daybed with trundle and a flat screen TV.  This cabin comfortably accommodates and sleeps 4 adults with the couch recommended for children.

Features: Flat Screen TVs, Gas Fireplace, Direct TV, Balcony, Deck, Propane Barbecue, Convenient Location  

This property is perfect for the guest who is looking for a cabin rental that won't break the bank. Generally simple decor and filled with basic furnishings and amenities that will meet most of your needs for an enjoyable vacation.

name: Oak Tree Retreat - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
This house gets its name from the beautiful 100 year old huge Oak Tree that is the feature for the back yard! Speaking of trees, they surround the property, providing both privacy and a sense of being in nature. Escaping the hustle and bustle of city-life is one of the primary reasons that guests visit Big Bear and you'll get that feeling of relaxation when you spend your vacation at Oak Tree.

When you enter Oak Tree, you'll find yourself in the cozy living room. When the temperatures drop in Big Bear, you'll love the warmth and ambiance created by the fireplace. Entertainment is abound with Wi-Fi, Satellite TV, 42' LCD TV, DVD/VHS player, CD player, and media center (ROKU, NETFLIX). The living room sleeper sofa provides an additional sleeping space. 

Located adjacent to the living room, you'll find the kitchen. It includes all of the basics to whip up homemade meals to enjoy in your cabin. The kitchen features upgraded counter tops, gas stove, microwave and a four person dining table. 

The back deck includes a relaxing spa, where you can enjoy the fresh mountain air as you admire the beautiful tree views. You can grill a tasty steak on the charcoal and propane barbeque (not pictured). The back deck is sure to be a favorite spot to create special vacation memories.  

When its time to say goodnight, you can have your choice of two bedrooms. The master bedroom features a king bed and the second bedroom includes two twin beds. A bathroom with shower is located in the hall. Oak Tree has a maximum capacity of five and it's a pet-friendly property.  Bring Fido along on your fun trip to the mountains!

Oak Tree is ideally located within walking distance to both the village and the lake. This quaint cabin is perfect for a small family or couple looking for a mountain getaway. 

Features: Spa, Cable with Premium Movie Options, Wi-Fi Internet, Deck, Charcioal and Propane Barbecue (not pictured), Fenced Yard, Upgraded Kitchen, Close to the Village, Towels and Linens Provided

This property is perfect for the guest who is looking for a cabin rental that won't break the bank. Generally simple decor and filled with basic furnishings and amenities that will meet most of your needs for an enjoyable vacation.

name: My Happy Place - Big bear lake, CA
description:
Welcome to “My Happy Place”.  Walking distance to the lake, park, tennis, volleyball, playground and approximately a mile to the Village and less than one mile to Snow Summit Resort, shuttles, grocery stores, shopping and restaurants.  Eagle Point is the perfect location close to everything in Big Bear Lake!

Situated on a large 11,000 sf lot with plenty of space in this fenced in yard.  Perfect for Bocce Ball or horseshoes (please bring your own).  Plenty of deck space in the front and back and a hot tub for the ultimate in relaxation!

Enjoy the open floor plan with solid surface flooring throughout the main level.  The cabin has been thoughtfully decorated with modern cabin décor and newly remodeled inside and out in Dec 2016. Sit back and relax next to the cozy wood burning rock featured fireplace while you watch a movie on the Smart TV with DVD player.  The dining area connects the living room, kitchen and family room.  The kitchen has beautiful slab granite counters with breakfast bar seating, stainless steel appliances including gas range, dishwasher, microwave, coffee pot and toaster oven.  There is no shortage of entertainment in the family room featuring windows overlooking a preserve as well as shuffleboard and TV with DVD player. Step out to the back deck for grilling on the propane barbecue or sit back and relax or soak in the hot tub.  

Down the hall on the main level you will find a full bathroom with washer and dryer, as well as the first bedroom with king and full beds, and bathroom access.

Upstairs you will find three more bedrooms, a full bathroom and space to relax and read a good book.  The master suite has a king bed, private deck and 3/4 bathroom.  Bedrooms three and four each have a queen bed.

This cabin is sure to become your happy place in Big Bear Lake for your family and friends.

Features:  Shuffleboard, Open Floor Plan, Flat Fenced Yard, Hot Tub, Kid Friendly, Central Heat, Flat Screen, DVD Player, Wood Burning Fireplace, Internet, Propane Barbecue, Smart TV, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Toaster Oven, Beautifully Decorated, Parking, Close to Everything, Perfect for Bocce Ball or Horseshoes (Please Bring Your Own), Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Out of Bounds  - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
The owner has a strict not pets policy due to home owner  allergies.  Bringing a pet inside this home will result in loss of full  deposit.

Stay in Big Bear just steps from the lake for summer fun at Holloway's Marina and only a short drive from the slopes and the Village.  This quaint cabin is perfect for a relaxing getaway just "Out-of-Bounds" in the mountains.

Enjoy a blend of vintage charm and beautiful updates with granite counters, updated appliances and lots of windows to capture the sunlight and cool breezes off the lake.  Sit out on the deck and relax under the trees with peek-a-boo lake views or grill on the propane grill.  Gather around the cheerful living room for an evening in front of the wood burning fireplace or watch TV with DirecTV or DVD and surround sound. A stacked washer and dryer is available for your use.

The main level has two bedrooms off a small hall, one with a king bed, TV with DirecTV, and the second bedroom has a queen bed.  A full bathroom is also on the main level.  Upstairs are three more bedrooms for family and friends to choose from.  One bedroom has a king bed, the next bedroom has a queen bed and the fifth bedroom is great for the kids with 5 twin beds, air hockey table,  large flat screen TV with DirecTV and DVD.  Upstairs is also a bathroom with double sink and shower.

The group will enjoy the large yard for a game of Frisbee or catch. Remember to bring your horseshoes and enjoy the recently added horseshoe pit!  This is the perfect cabin for your next mountain and lake getaway!

Note: The owner has a strict not pets policy due to home owner  allergies. Bringing a pet inside this home will result in loss of full  deposit.

Features: Lake View, Walk to Holloway's Marina, Quiet Street, Large Yard, Granite Counters, Dishwasher, Gas Stove, Microwave, Air Hockey Table, Propane Grill, Large Deck, Wood Burning Fireplace, DirecTV, Surround Sound, DVD, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided
This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, updated kitchen and bathroom features with possibly a few dated items.

name: No Bad Days - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
There are No Bad Days when you come to Big Bear and stay in this comfortable cabin located between Snow Summit and Bear Mountain making this the ideal location for winter fun!  Just a few minutes from the lake and Village.

The warm and welcoming cabin features an open floor plan with plenty of windows for natural light, comfortable sofas, a gas fireplace, and TV with cable.  Stay connected with complementary internet.  The kitchen is just steps away and has breakfast bar seating, granite counters, plenty of counter space, a gas range, microwave, dishwasher, and coffee pot.  Step out to the front deck for grilling on the propane barbecue.  Around the corner is a 3/4 bath and laundry room with access to the large, flat FENCED back yard for the kids to run around.  Two bedrooms are also on the main level.  One bedroom has a queen bed, and the other bedroom has a queen and TV with built in DVD player.

Head upstairs for fun and entertainment in the large game room that has a ping pong table, Foosball table air hockey and pool table!  Watch TV with cable and DVD player while you play a game or lounge on one of the two futons.  The last bedroom is also on this level and has a king bed, TV with built in DVD player and small deck overlooking the back yard.  A full bathroom with shower and large soaking tub combo is in the hall.

This cabin is sure to become a favorite with your family and friends on your next trip to Big Bear!
NOTE: Cable viewing is available in the Living Room and Game Room.  HDMI and USB hook-ups are available in the bedrooms (no cable).  Do NOT use charcoal in the BBQ- Propane only. Please Do NOT bring your owne charcoal grill. There is absoluetly no smoking allowed on this property. Absolutely NO CAMPFIRES and NO OUTDOOR FIRE PITS ALLOWED.  

Features:  Between Snow Summit and Bear Mountain, Pool Table, Air Hockey, Ping Pong Table, Foosball Table, Deck, Yard, Gas Fireplace, Cable, DVD, Internet, Granite Counters, Gas Range, Propane Barbecue, Dishwasher, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Papa Doug's Dream - Big Bear City, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Full with Full Trundle, 2 Twin (Upper Level)

description:
Papa Doug's Dream can be your dream as well!  Located in the upper Moonridge neighborhood, this cabin lets you feel like you are getting away while being close to everything Big Bear has to offer.  This comfortable cabin is pet friendly so you can bring the whole family for your next getaway!

The cozy living room has space for everyone on the large sofa in front of the wood burning fireplace and flat screen TV with cable and a Roku for streaming your favorite shows and movies.  Curl up with a good book in one of the nooks.  The kitchen and dining is just steps away with a table for six and everything you need to prepare a simple meal including granite counters, gas range, microwave and coffee pot.  There is easy access to the propane barbecue, deck and fenced backyard.  The main level has a full bathroom with washer and dryer, perfect for longer stays.

The master bedroom is on the main floor and features a king bed, TV with Roku, private 3/4 bathroom and access to a patio.  Upstairs are two more bedrooms.  One bedroom has a queen bed, TV with Roku and small deck for a little fresh mountain air.  The last bedroom is ideal for the kids or kid at heart with a full bed, two twins, and TV with Roku.  A Pack-N-Play is also available for the little ones.

When it's time to get away, this cabin is your place to stay!

Notes:  No Dishwasher.  This home requires the use of stairs to access the cabin. The outdoor fireplace is off limits to guests. Do not attempt to build a fire in the outdoor fireplace.
