name: Redwood Manor - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Great family cabin located in a quiet neighborhood but just minutes from everything!

Enjoy the expansive deck with propane barbeque, hot tub and seating.  The living room has plenty of seating to watch the large flat screen TV with cable or DVD.  Internet is available for staying in contact with your family and friends back home.  A game room is just off the living room with futon, flat screen TV, air hockey table, wet bar, wood burning stove and more windows that you can count!  The kitchen has plenty of counter space to prepare a meal with a log style dining table and access to the back deck.  A 1/2 bathroom is also on the main level for your convenience, as well as a washer and dryer.

Upstairs you will find the master suite with king bed, pull-out sofa, private deck, full bathroom with large tub and TV with DVD and cable.  Two more bedrooms feature 2 queen beds each as well as TV with DVD. A full bathroom is off the hall.

name: Relaxation Flats - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Hot tub will no longer be available beginning April 2019

Head to the mountains for a little R & R at Relaxation Flats.  Sit on the covered porch, soak in the hot tub under the stars, or just hang out by the wood burning fireplace.  Come rejuvenate your spirit and leave your stress behind.

The open floor plan brings the space together with the living room, dining and kitchen.  The living room focuses around the fireplace and flat screen TV with Blu-Ray and Roku streaming. All TVs stream CBS live, Netflix, Hulu, and MoviesAnywhere (over 600+) free using Rokus.  The dining room has seating for six and is the perfect place to have a meal or fun game night.  The kitchen has all the basics and includes a gas range, microwave, Keurig coffee maker, dishwasher and solid surface counters.  Just around the corner is a half bathroom with a stacked washer and dryer.

Head out to the back deck and spacious back yard that the kids will love exploring while the adults enjoy the hot tub and grilling on the propane barbecue.

For a good night's rest, head upstairs and take your pick of one of two bedrooms.  The first bedroom has a queen and smart TV.  The second bedroom has a queen, full and smart TV. There is also a loft off the second bedroom with a full size bed.  A full bathroom is off the hallway.

For the eco-friendly, enjoy the . 220 plug for electric vehicles! This cabin is sure to be a favorite escape for your next trip to Big Bear!

name: Retreat at Bear Mountain - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 1: California King, TV w/Cable, Private Full Bath
arrangements.Bedroom 2: Twin over Queen Bunk, TV w/Cable

description:
Retreat at Bear Mountain is a beautiful, luxury log cabin, perfect for all four seasons!  Located right on the golf course, you can spend your summer afternoons on the back deck enjoying the view or take a stroll down to the coffee shop and deli for lunch.  When the snow falls, grab your gear and walk up to Bear Mountain for a day on the slopes!  You can't beat this location!

Inside you are welcomed by the natural warmth of the knotty pine and log accents and wood floors.  The floor to ceiling stone gas fireplace will keep you warm in the cooler months while you watch the snow fall through the expansive windows overlooking the fairway.  Relax on the leather sofas in front of the large flat screen TV with cable and DVD player.  The gourmet kitchen is just steps away and includes bar seating at the natural log breakfast bar.  There is plenty of space to prepare a meal on the granite counters, stainless steel appliances including gas range, microwave, dishwasher, coffee pot and center island with prep sink.  A formal dining room is just around the corner.

Step outside to the partially covered back deck for grilling on the propane barbecue or just relaxing in the shade with a glass of wine or cup of tea.  Kids will enjoy playing in the fenced backyard while watching the golfers go by.

The master bedroom is located on the first floor and features access to the back deck, a king bed, TV with cable and DVD player, electric fireplace and private bathroom with tub and separate shower. The laundry room and a half bathroom is also on the main level for your convenience.

Head upstairs to the loft for an evening spent playing pool with your family and friends.  Two bedrooms and a full bathroom with separate toilet room are on this level.  One bedroom has a twin over queen bunk bed and TV with cable.  The last bedroom has a queen bed.

Your friends and family will love vacationing in Big Bear Lake and staying at the Retreat at Bear Mountain!

Note: DO NOT MOVE THE GAME TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE GAME TABLE, your full  deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional  repairs.

Features: Walk to Bear Mountain, Walk to Coffee Shop and Deli, Garage Parking, Luxury, Deck, Golf Course Views, Wood Floors, Propane Barbecue, Gas Fireplace, Cable, Internet, DVD, Pool Table, Gourmet Kitchen, Granite Counters, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Formal Dining Room, Central Heat, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This is a luxury property which includes the finest furnishings, luxury building materials, and a highly consistent design theme. Luxury properties range from elegant and formal to relaxed and chic, but all appeal to guests who appreciate first-class accommodations with a designer flair.
address: 947 Club View Drive Big Bear Lake, CA

name: Ponderosa - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Ponderosa is a beautiful, single-level home located just off Big Bear Blvd, in a quiet neighborhood. When you drive up to the property, you'll find ample parking and a flat, circular drive for easy access. Walk just a few steps to the front porch and admire the exterior stone work on the front of the home.

Immediately upon entering Ponderosa, you'll notice the high ceilings and many windows, including sky lights, that fill the home with plenty of natural light.

The kitchen is located to the left of the entrance. It features stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, and is equip with all the basics that you'll need to whip up a home cooked meal. Imagine filling the home with the rich aroma of freshly brewed coffee and blueberry pancakes. After a long day on the ski slopes, your group would love to return home and feast on a hearty lasagna. Kitchen features include a gas oven, microwave, coffee pot, blender, and dishwasher. 

A ten-seat wood dining table is adjacent to the kitchen. This area includes a ceiling fan to keep cool in the warmer months. If you prefer dining al fresco, a slider to an outdoor deck is located in the dining area. The deck and backyard are an oasis, with mature trees and bird feeders. The deck includes a four person outdoor dining set and additional plastic Adirondack chairs. Grill up a juicy steak on the propane BBQ and enjoy a meal outside, in the fresh mountain air.

The living room is located next to the dining room. An enormous picture window fills the room with light and provides views of the backyard. Warm up by the old-fashioned wood-burning fireplace. The living room includes multiple couches and chairs, plenty of room for your entire group to relax and enjoy a movie on the flat-screen television with cable. Wifi will ensure that you're kept updated on all that is happening in the world.

To the right of the front entrance, you'll find a hallway that leads to the bedrooms. Take a moment to check-out the vintage pictures of Big Bear that adorn the hall. Need to do laundry? A side-by-side washer and dryer can be found in the hall closet on the left. A 3/4 bath is also located near this hall, off of the main entry.

The first bedroom is a great pick for kids. It done in a bear theme and contains a pair of twin over twin bunk beds. This room also includes a television with HDTV cable and a window with views of the front yard.

The second bedroom is accessible through the first bedroom, but it has a pocket door to provide privacy. A full bathroom is located between the first and second bedrooms. The second bedroom includes a queen bed and television with HDTV cable. An unique feature of this bedroom is a small, in-wall fireplace located near the bed. This fireplace will provide both warmth and ambiance.

The third bedroom is located in the far back of the house. It includes a queen bed, a sink (no bathroom) and views of the side of the house. This room includes a private entrance accessible from the outside of the home. Through this room, you can also enter the garage, where you'll find a Foosball table, a dining table that can be used for playing games, and a futon.

The master bedroom can be found on the opposite side of the hall. This enormous room has a king bed with a rustic wood frame. Walk out on your private deck to enjoy the amazing nighttime star display that you won't find in the city. Entertain yourself with the flat-screen television and HDTV Cable. An en suite bathroom includes a shower with high ceilings and a skylight. The separate sink area will make getting ready in the morning a breeze.

Extra sleeping space can be found in the living room with a pull-out sofa.

Ponderosa is less than a five minute drive to Bear Mountain Ski Resort, Snow Summit, and all of the shops and restaurants in town. It is a spacious home with many amenities, that is sure to be a favorite vacation spot!

Features: Great Location, Circular Driveway, Propane BBQ, Wifi, HDTV Cable, Wood-Burning Fireplace, Deck, Stainless Steel Appliances, Coffee Pot, Microwave, Dishwasher, Blender, Gas Oven, Foosball, Washer and Dryer.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.

name: Sandoval Slopes - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Sandoval Slopes is a four bedroom, three bath large family home. It is located close to Bear Mountain Resort, has adequate parking and the most amazing slope views.

An open floor plan gives way to plenty of room for family gatherings and holidays. Meals are easily prepared in the spacious, fully equipped kitchen with lots of counter space, a dishwasher and bar. There is a den and family room both with flat screen TV’s,  internet and lots of seating. Cozy up by the wood burning fireplace in the cold winter months. The sleeping arrangements vary with rooms on both levels. The upper rooms each have their own private baths.

There is a pool table and a dartboard for a little indoor fun. Don't forget to bring your favorite games. The outdoor patio offers time for summer relaxation, enjoying the views or cook your favorite meals on the propane barbeque with friends and family. This is a great place to star gaze or watch the moon rest over Bear Mountain Resort.

Note: DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few  dated features or appliances.

name: Scout's Honor - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Twin over Full Bunk, Twin (Upper Level)

description:
If you are looking for a great cabin just two minutes from Bear Mountain, then Scout's Honor is for you!  Enjoy the warm and cozy living room with corner wood burning fireplace, TV with cable and Blu-Ray player and comfortable leather sofa.  The kitchen has a table for eight and is stocked with all the basics including gas range, dishwasher, microwave and coffee pot.  A laundry room and 3/4 bathroom is just off the kitchen for your convenience.

Head out back to the deck and you'll find your choice of a propane or charcoal bbq. You can grill up your dinner and enjoy the mountain air, while dining on the outdoor table set. After a day of hitting the ski slopes or hiking the trails, you can enjoy the stars while unwinding in the sunken hot tub. The back deck is sure to be a favorite spot for socializing with your group.

When night falls, head upstairs where you will find the three bedrooms and a full bathroom.  The first bedroom has a queen bed and a TV with cable. This room also has access to a small upper deck oufitted with an Adirondak chair set and table. This deck is surrounded by beautiful trees, providing a perfect place to relax and enjoy nature. The second bedroom has a queen bed and also has deck access.  The third bedroom has a twin over full bunk and additional twin mattress for flexible sleeping arrangements, as well as a TV with cable.

Scout's Honor has the perfect blend of comfort, amenities, and a cabin feel all situated on a beautiful large lot with mature trees and peek-a-boo mountain views.

NOTE: The driveway has a fairly steep transition from the road.  Use caution and always carry chains during winter months.

Features: Close to Bear Mountain, Hot Tub, Laminate Wood Flooring, Cable, Internet, Wood Burning Fireplace, Propane and Charcoal Barbecues, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Washer and Dryer, Wall Heat, Towels and Linens Provided
This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.

name: Primrose Pines - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Primrose Pines combines location and amenities for the perfect Big Bear getaway!  Located just 2 minutes from Bear Mountain, the golf course and zoo.  Enjoy soaking in the hot tub or just relaxing in the fresh mountain air.

The living room has an open and airy feeling with knotty pine walls and ceiling, solid surface wood look flooring, a wood burning fireplace, flat screen TV with cable, and expansive windows overlooking the back yard.  The kitchen is just steps away and is stocked with all the basics including electric stove top, wall oven, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot. A tall table and stools is in the living room for a quick meal or game of cards. A full bathroom with stacked washer and dryer is also on this level.

Step outside to the back yard for soaking in the hot tub, grilling on the propane barbecue or sitting back in the shade and enjoying a glass of wine or morning cup of coffee.

Upstairs is the loft with views of the back yard, a desk for your laptop use or writing, and a queen bed.  The private bedroom has a queen bed.

This cabin is ideal for a simple weekend away with family and friends.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.

Features:  Close to Bear Mountain, Hot Tub, Deck, Propane Barbecue, Wood Accents, Wood Burning Fireplace, Flat Screen TV, Cable, Internet, Solid Surface Flooring, Electric Stove Top, Wall Oven, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Dishwasher, Washer and Dryer, Wall Heat, Ceiling Fans, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Silver Tip Inn - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
If you are looking for a great mountain getaway with family or friends, then Silver Tip Inn is the perfect cabin. Walking distance to Bear Mountain, the golf course, Alpine Zoo and the shuttles for year-round activities.

The spacious living room with cozy cabin decor has comfortable seating on the couch or oversize chair next to the wood burning fireplace.  Watch your favorite show or movie on the large flat screen TV with cable, DVD player, and collection of DVD's.  A Foosball table is sure to provide hours of fun. A full-size washer and dryer is just down the hall leading to a full bathroom.

The kitchen is complete with plenty of seating for everyone at the  table.  Enjoy the convenience of a microwave, gas range, dishwasher,  coffee pot and access to the deck for grilling on the propane barbeque and outdoor seating.  The two-person hot tub will be a welcome treat after a day on the slopes or bike trails.

Upstairs you will have your choice of three bedrooms and a full size  bathroom.  Two bedrooms feature queen beds, one with a large TV, while  the kids or young at heart can have the twin over full bunk bed and   Flat screen TV with DVD player.

Features: Hot Tub (2 person), Close to Bear Mountain, Cable TV, Internet, DVD Collection, Wood Burning Fireplace, Propane Barbeque, Microwave, Dishwasher, Large Deck, Tree Views, Laundry, Foosball Table, Towels and Linens Provided
This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and  well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable  furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few dated features or  appliances.
address: 883 Silver Tip Dr Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: Pattersons Lakefront Retreat - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Twin over Full Bunk, Twin Trundle (Upper Level)

description:
***DUE TO DROUGHT CONDITIONS AND EXTREMELY LOW WATER LEVELS, THE BOAT DOCK IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.***

Patterson's Place is a place to drop in, take it easy - eat, relax and  enjoy your friends and family. This cabin is a lakefront slice of heaven  where everyone can have a good time.  Take a stroll down by the water or soak in the hot tub.

The main house entry provides access to the main living space, laundry room and bonus suite located over the garage.  Down a short flight of stairs and hallway you will find the living room with it's fabulous windows overlooking the lake and marina.  Curl up on the sofa in front of the oversize natural stone wood burning fireplace and read a book, or watch programing on the TV with cable and DVD player.  The formal dining room is just off the living room and has a fireplace of it's own as well as large table for 10 and lake views. You can step out to the back covered deck for some fresh air, or step up into the beautifully finished kitchen with custom cabinets, granite counters, stainless steel appliances and the conveniences of a gas stove top, wall oven, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot.  The breakfast room provides additional dining space and is the perfect place for a cup of coffee while reading the newspaper.  Just off the kitchen is a deck with propane barbecue, seating and access to the beautiful backyard where kids will love running around, or take a stroll down to the water's edge.  The hot tub is the perfect way to end a day full of adventure.

Up a small flight of stairs from the kitchen is a bathroom and office space with bench seating and large corner desk for catching up on work for those who can't fully get away.  This level also has the master bedroom with a queen bed, TV with cable and private 3/4 bathroom.  Up another flight of stairs to the top floor are two more bedrooms, each with access to a small upper deck overlooking the lake.  One bedroom has a queen bed, and the other bedroom has a twin over full bunk with additional twin trundle bed and TV.

For those looking for a private space away from the family while still being close, there is a private suite over the garage that has outdoor and indoor access.  The living space has a living room with futon, wood burning fireplace, TV with cable and large windows looking toward the lake.  The kitchenette features a sink, microwave, refrigerator, coffee pot and seating.  The separate bedroom has a queen bed, full bathroom and access to a large upper deck in the back of the house.

The owners want to share their home with you and sincerely hope you have such a memorable stay that you will want to come back and visit again.
Patterson's Place is a historic cabin located on the shore of Metcalf  Bay in Big Bear Lake.  The cabin was lovingly and meticulously built by  Pat and Casey Patterson in 1957 with salvaged lumber and supplies  lending to it's wonderful history.  Over time the cabin has grown from a  simple two-room summer retreat to the beautiful multi-level lakefront property it is today.

Note: During Winter 4-wheel Drive and Chains REQUIRED. During summer, boat trailers cannot be parked on the property.

***DUE TO DROUGHT CONDITIONS AND EXTREMELY LOW WATER LEVELS, THE BOAT DOCK IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.***

Lake levels vary throughout the year and boat docks availability is not  guaranteed at the time of your arrival. Destination Big Bear is not  responsible for the level of water in the lake during the course of  guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most up-to-date  lake levels for lakefront properties.

Features: Mountain Decor, Lakefront, Hot Tub, Wood Burning Fireplaces, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Stove Top, Wall Oven, Microwave, Coffee Pot, TV, Cable, DVD Player, Surround System, Wireless Internet, Decks, Boat Dock [Side Tie Only], Propane Barbecue, Yard, Central Heat, Private Suite, Washer & Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Rocky's Hideaway - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Located conveniently near the Village and the lake, Rocky’s Hideaway is the perfect Big Bear getaway for you and your family! This multi-level home has something for everyone, whether you want to relax, or venture out and have some fun! You’ll feel right at home at Rocky’s Hideaway.

The first level features a cozy living area with a wood burning stove and a flat screen TV with cable, perfect for catching the big game or kicking back for movie night! Head into the kitchen to whip up a delicious meal with all the tools you'll need already provided for you. The kitchen features granite countertops, wood flooring and a dining area that seats up to six, great for when you want to have a family meal in! Head out to the deck and have a soak in the hot tub after a long day or enjoy lunch at the pation table with an umbrella and seating for four.  Just off the kitchen is a bedroom that is perfect for the kiddos, with a twin over full size bunk bed! Conveniently located on the first level is a full bath with a tub and shower. Across the hall is an additional bedroom with a queen size bed and super cute décor! Just up the hall a few steps away is a laundry room with a full size washer and dryer for your convenience.

The second level features a kitchenette area with bar seating, a second living space, and an additional bedroom with a queen size bed. This is the perfect home for entertaining with room for everyone! The kitchen has a regular coffee maker, a microwave, and a refrigerator. The living area features a gas fireplace and a flat screen TV, with access to a small deck where you can relax outside with a cup of coffee in the morning or watch the sunset at night! Just down the hall is a bathroom with a shower, as well as a separate room with a jetted tub! Let all your stress melt away and enjoy some relaxation time. Just past the bedroom, head out to a second large deck with plenty of seating and a table with an umbrella and seating for four. Enjoy dining al fresco or have family game night outside!

Just through the laundry room and downstairs is a game room for a little friendly competition! It features a pool table, a Pac Man arcade machine, a dart board and a large flat screen TV! Fun for the whole family!

Rocky’s Hideaway has something for the whole crew. It is the perfect place to relax and unwind, as well have a ton of fun! This home away from home will keep you close to all the Big Bear action with its convenient location!

Features: Game Room, Wood Burning Stove, Two Living Areas. Hot Tub, Jetted Indoor Tub, Gas Range, Wood Floors, Cable TV, WiFi, Two Decks, Close to the Village & the Lake

name: Sinatras Villa - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Centrally located and walking distance to Snow Summit, Sinatras Villa will keep you close to all the Big Bear action! This two-story cabin has all the amenities you and your group need to have an amazing stay. Close to Snow Summit, dining, and just a short drive to the Village, this getaway is the ideal vacation spot!

The large living area is the perfect place to lounge after a long day of skiing, Gather around the wood burning fireplace and nestle into the large and comfy couches and chairs. There is a large flat screen TV to watch the big game on or have movie night! Just off the living area is the dining expansive dining table with eight chairs and two bar stools.. The kitchen has all the amenities you need for making delicious meals in. It features a stainless steel gas top range, a coffee maker, and a dishwasher.

Head out to the front porch to dine al fresco while enjoying our beautiful forest! Play a game of chess, tic tac toe or hop scotch! There is also a small patio table with seating for three as well as a charcoal grill.

The first level features a full bath, laundry with a full size washer and dryer, and two bedrooms. The first bedroom features a twin over queen size bunk bed, a flat screen TV with a gaming system, and plenty of games! What a great space for the little ones!  Bedroom two has a queen size bed and a flat screen TV.

Head upstairs for a friendly game of pool! There is also a queen size sleeper sofa for your convenience. The second level features the master bedroom with a king size bed, a Foosball table, and a flat screen TV. There is also a full size bath complete with a tub and shower.

If you want a ideally located cabin with all the amenities you need for a wonderful vacation, Sinatras Villa is the place for you!

Features: Close to Snow Summit, Full Size Washer and Dryer, Flat Screen TVs, Stainless Steel Gas Range, Wood Burning Fireplace, Charcoal Grill, Linens & Towels Provided, Enterway monitoring.
address: 656 St Moritz Dr Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: Skyfall - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Take in the mountain scenery from this hillside home located near Bear Mountain Resort. Enjoy the beauty of the surrounding Big Bear Mountains from the wrap around deck as you watch the sun rise or the night Skyfall.

Newly remodeled, this home is a breath of fresh air, inside and out decorated with a modern mountain flare. Knotty pine beams, old world style wooden floors and handpicked tiles give a rustic cabin feeling while bringing this home to life.

The kitchen has marble counter tops, dark wood cabinets with glass accents and stainless steel appliances. It comes fully equipped and has a dishwasher. The corner bar adds extra seating for entertaining guests. Sharing an open floor plan with the dining area and family room allows everyone to enjoy quality time on their mountain retreat. The dining table seats 9 for holiday dinners. The family room has a flat screen TV, internet, fireplace and amazing views. We also feature a 412 cocktail style, arcade game table featuring (Pac Man, Donkey Kong, Gallaga, etc).

The entry level bedroom has a queen bed with adjoining bathroom and is the only bedroom on this level for added privacy. The upper level master has a king bed, views of the mountain skyline and two twin beds for added sleeping arrangements. The second guest room has a queen bed and two twin beds. These rooms share an adjoining full bathroom.

Watch the stars while relaxing in the spa on the wrap around deck. Watch the snowflakes fall with hot cup of cocoa by the fire. Skyfall is the perfect hideaway for all seasons.

This cabin is just minutes from Bear Mountain Resort, the Moonridge Zoo, and Bear Mountain Golf Course. Take a short drive to enjoy Big Bear Lake, Snow Summit Ski Resort, hiking, biking or boating. There are many adventures waiting.

Features: Spa, Flat Screen TV, Internet, Dishwasher, Close to Slopes, Mountain Views, Natural Gas Barbeque

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Ski Haus - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Twin over Twin Bunk (Middle Lower Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 4/Suite: Queen, Sleeper Sofa with Full Bath, TV (Lowest Level)

description:
Feel like you are at the top of the mountain with sweeping views of Bear Mountain ski resort and the valley below!

This well appointed, reverse floor plan mountain retreat boasts wood features throughout and cozy cabin decor.  The entry level features wood floors in the living room, an electric fireplace, WiFi, TV with DirecTV Now streaming subscription featuring 100 channels plus HBO, ESPN and local channels plus a Blu-Ray and Roku, along with gorgeous views of the slopes.  From here you can step out to the upper level deck for grilling on the propane barbecue or sit and relax at the table with your morning coffee or evening glass of wine.

The dining and kitchen will make enjoying a family meal a breeze!  Don't let the views distract you during a fun game night at the table!  The kitchen has a gas range, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot.  The attached garage has a washer and dryer along with plenty of room for storing your adventure gear (no garage parking). Enjoy a Tesla charging power outlet located near the outside parking!

When it's time to say goodnight, head down to the lower levels where you will find the bedrooms and bathrooms.  The middle level has a full bathroom and three bedrooms.  The master bedroom has a king bed, slope views and a TV with DVD and Roku (fireplace not for tenant use).  The second bedroom has a queen bed and slope views.  Down a short hallway is the third bedroom with a twin over twin bunk.

Down a second flight of stairs to the lowest level you will find a private suite complete with queen bed, twin pull-out sofa, electric fireplace, Roku TV, Foosball, kitchenette with sink and mini fridge, and a full bathroom.  Access to the lower back deck and yard is also on this level.

This cabin is sure to leave you wanting to come back to Big Bear again and again!

Note: Always bring chains in the winter months.

Features:  Views of Bear Mountain Resort, Flat Parking, Electric Fireplaces, Roku, DVD, Internet (WiFi), Propane Barbecue, 2 Decks, Stocked Kitchen, Washer and Dryer, Garage for Equipment Storage, Tesla Charging Power Outlet, DirecTV Now

name: Star Gazer - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Located in the quiet neighborhood of Fox Farm, Star Gazer is a great cabin for sitting back on the deck and gazing at the stars. This cabin sits on a large corner lot and features plenty of mature trees for a wooded atmosphere.  

Step inside to the warm and inviting living room with knotty pine ceilings. Relax on a comfortable sofa and recliners (fireplace is not for tenant use).  Watch your favorite shows or a movie on the new 49" smart flat screen TV with Roku and DVD player. Log into your accounts like Spectrum, Dish, Sling, Hulu, Netflix, Amazon Prime (over 50 apps), etc. A full bathroom is conveniently located on the main level.

The kitchen is just steps away and features ample counter space, a gas range, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot. The kitchen is spacious enough to include a dining table for four. 

For a breath of fresh mountain air, relax under the covered deck or grill on the new propane barbecue. The deck includes a dining set, the perfect spot to enjoy a meal outside on a warm evening. You can also unwind in a wooden Adirondack chair with a book or cocktail. Parents will feel secure with permanent gates to both the front and back entry areas.  The trees do not only surround Star Gazer, but the deck was built around existing trees!

Head upstairs for a good night's sleep. The first bedroom has a queen bed and a TV with a DVD player for DVD use only. It also includes an electric fireplace that provides both warmth and ambiance. The second bedroom has a queen bed and a full-sized futon.  A half bathroom is located in the hall for your convenience.

Star Gazer is sure to be a great home base for making family memories and going on adventures in Big Bear!

Note: Living room fireplace is NOT for tenant use.

Features: Close to Bear Mountain, Foosball, Yard, Deck, Propane Barbecue, Internet, Carpet, Central Heat, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Snow Summit Ridge - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 1: Queen, Twin Over Twin Bunk, Trundle

description:
Snow Summit Ridge is the perfect Big Bear getaway located in the heart of Snow Summit Resort! Whether you’re skiing in winter or headed to the bike park in the summer, this wonderful condo will keep you close to all the action! Walk to the community heated pool next door for summer fun or sit out on the deck and enjoy a cup of coffee. Snow Summit Ridge has all the amenities you and your group need to have serious Big Bear fun at one the most convenient locations possible!

The reverse floor plan features two bedrooms and one full bath on the first level. There is also a full sized washer and dryer for your convenience. The first bedroom has a queen size bed as well as a twin over twin bunk bed with a trundle. There is also a flat screen TV with cable and a DVD player. Perfect for movie nights! The second bedroom features a queen size bed, beautiful hard wood floors, a separate sink area and a flat screen TV with cable! There is also a closet for storage and private patio access! Great for dining al fresco with your sweetie!

Head upstairs to the kitchen and dining area with seating for 6 and enjoy some relaxation time. The kitchen is equipped with all the amenities you need to whip up a delicious meal! There is also bar seating with an open window into the kitchen for some kitchen cuisine conversation. The living area has a flat screen TV, cable, a DVD player, and hardwood floors throughout! Gather around the gas fireplace on those chilly California nights! There is a powder room just off the kitchen area. The upper level also has a deck with seating for a sunset toast or some hot cocoa with a view!

Snow Summit Ridge has it all! The resort is centrally located, so it’s just a short drive to all the Big Bear action!

Features: Walk to Snow Summit, Cable TV, Hardwood Floors, Gas Fireplace, Patio, Deck, Flat Screen TVs, DVD Players, Full Size Washer and Dryer

name: Snowmass - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Loft: Queen, Twin over Twin Bunk (Upper Level)

description:
Even if you can't make it to Aspen, you can still tell your friends you stayed at Snowmass!

A spacious cabin that offers a great location! Close to the village for shopping, dining and activities (about 1.1 miles) and walking distance to Snow Summit Resort, a little over half a mile! This cabin is located near the end of a quiet street and offers a fully fenced flat backyard. Enjoy relaxing next to the wood fireplace in the large and open living room with vaulted wood ceilings.  This cabin offers a large open loft area plus 2 bedrooms!​
 
Sit back and relax in this wonderful cabin and enjoy true mountain charm.  Other features include a gas grill on the back deck and flat screen TV in the living room.

Features:  Fully Stocked Kitchen, Fenced Yard, Linens and Towels Provided, Wood Burning Fireplace, Washer, Dryer, Internet, Propane BBQ.

This property is perfect for the guest who is looking for a cabin rental that won't break the bank. Generally simple decor and filled with basic furnishings and amenities that will meet most of your needs for an enjoyable vacation.

name: Sublime For-Rest - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Bedroom: King, Twin w/ Twin Trundle, Private Bath (Upper Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 2: King and Twin over Twin Bunk (Upper Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 4: Twin over Twin Bunk and Queen(Upper Level)
arrangements.Upstairs Hall Closet: Twin and Roll Away Cot (Upper Level)

description:
This large home is perfect for large families and groups wanting to spend time together yet have plenty of space throughout the house inside and out. Located on a cul-de-sac in the highly desirable neighborhood of Fox Farm on over 11,000 square feet of beautiful land. The lot is flat and fenced in for the little ones. Multiple decks throughout with patio furnishings.

The split level house features an open and airy living room with lots of natural light, a comfortable sofas and wood burning fireplace. Watch your favorite shows or a movie on the flat screen TV with cable. Vaulted ceilings throughout the living room, dining room, and kitchen provide a dramatically striking, wide open ambiance. Cedar plank walls complete the rustic wood cabin feeling with hardwood floors in the living and dining room.  Up a small flight of stairs is the beautifully updated kitchen with granite counters and stainless steel appliances including gas stove, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot. Sit down at the dining table or keep the cook company at the bar seating. Step out back to the deck for relaxing and grilling on the charcoal barbeque.

Another separate living space with a multiple sitting arrangements, a wood burning fireplace and a large flat screen TV is on the lower level with laundry room and 3/4 bathroom. Enjoy playing a game of pool!

All the bedrooms are located on the upper level. The master bedroom has a king bed, twin with twin trundle, and TV with cable.  Enjoy the private master bathroom with large tub and separate shower.  There is another full size bath in the hallway for all the bedrooms. Bedroom two has a king and twin over twin bunk, bedroom three has 2 full beds, bedroom four has a twin over twin bunk and queen bed.  

You can access the decks from the master bedroom, kitchen, family rooms and two other bedrooms. A hot tub is located on the deck overlooking the wooded back yard. 

Features: Cable, Internet, Two Large and a Smaller Flat Screen TVs, DVD Player, Ceiling Fans Throughout, Linens and Towels Provided, Pool Table, Two Wood Burning Fireplaces, Multiple Decks, Boat Parking, Tree Views, Charcoal Barbeque,  Central Heat, Updated Kitchen, Stainless Steel Appliances, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Hot Tub, Washer and Dryer

Note: DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs. PARKING FOR THIS RENTAL IS ONLY IN THE DRIVEWAY. PARKING ON THE FRONT LAWN WILL RESULT IN FORFEITURE OF FULL DEPOSIT.

This property is perfect for guests who value remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing decor, newer furniture and updated kitchen and appliances.

name: Sonoma Retreat - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Sonoma Retreat is a luxurious, gorgeous, newly built smart home located near Bear Mountain and many Big Bear activities! There is surround sound throughout the entire home! It’s the perfect home away from home with gorgeous furnishings and a reverse floor plan. This two story home is great for families and friends alike to enjoy all of what Big Bear has to offer. A short drive way from the Village and close to the popular Moonridge area, Sonoma Retreat is the place to get away from it all and still stay close to all the action!

Pass through the gorgeous entry way and up a few stairs and enter the game room and entertainment area complete with two flat screen TVs and a bar area! There is a pool table for some friendly competition and plenty of seating for the spectators. Beautiful wood floors run throughout this luxurious vacation spot. The bar area features a wine fridge, a microwave, bar seating for four and a sink with plenty of counter space. Enjoy the game or a movie on your choice of flat screen TVs while playing a round of pool or having a cocktail! Just off the game room is a beautifully decorated full bath with corrugated copper walls in the shower and a gorgeous stone sink. On the same level are two super cute bedrooms! Bedroom one features very fun décor and two full beds including a flat screen TV. Perfect for your guests to relax and have some privacy! Bedroom two is also has very cute décor and features double bunks with four twin beds. It also includes a flat screen TV and a Foosball table! Perfect for the kiddos!

Head upstairs to the open concept living area including a dining table with seating for eight, a desk/writing area, and a gorgeously outfitted kitchen! For an amazing indoor/outdoor living experience, just open the bifolding sliding glass doors! The living area features a beautiful brown leather sectional, a flat screen TV and a gas fireplace! Perfect for movie night in and family relaxation time! Just off the living area is a deck with views of the slopes and our beautiful forest. Great for a morning cup of coffee or a sunset toast!  Just off the living area is the amazing kitchen with bar seating for four, stainless steel appliances and everything you would ever want for a lovely dinner night in. Hop on over to the poker table for more fun for everyone! Just down the hall is a half bath and a full size washer and dryer for your convenience. Head into the beautiful master bedroom featuring a king size bed. The master bath has gorgeous stonework throughout, a jetted tub and a large shower with glass doors. Relax and soak after a long day of Big Bear fun! 

If you are looking for an ideal family vacation home in an optimal location, Sonoma Retreat is the perfect place for you!

name: Starlight Lodge - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Bedroom: King  with Couch and Views of Lake and Mountain (Upper Level)

description:
Welcome to the Starlight Lodge, located in beautiful Castle Glen Estates, one of Big Bear’s newest Developments! With over 3000 square feet of living space and gorgeous views of Big Bear Lake and the surrounding mountain range, this cabin is perfect for entertaining and family gatherings!

The expansive great room is enclosed with large view windows and view decks. Enjoy cooking in the gourmet kitchen while you watch your family play Foosball in the living room. The kitchen features granite counter tops, a breakfast nook, stainless steel appliances, microwave, dishwasher, gas stove and is fully stocked with all the necessities. The great room features a ceiling fan, wood burning fireplace, Foosball table and plenty of board games.

Spend time outdoors on any of the three expansive decks and enjoy a barbecue or take in the lake views. Or, enjoy time indoors playing Foosball or hanging out in the entertainment room which features a 60” screen TV, surround sound, Stereo, movie channels, cable, a wood burning fireplace and a large wrap around couch/twin sleeper bed.

Only minutes from skiing, hiking, biking, the Village shopping, golf, festivals and of course, Big Bear Lake. Whether you are enjoying Big Bear for the snow or summer fun, you can't go wrong with this wonderful location.

Features: 3 Fireplaces, Ceiling Fans in Every Room, Panoramic Views from Most Rooms, 3 Lake and Mountain View Decks, Charcoal Barbeque, 4 Spacious Bedrooms, 2 Master Bedrooms, Phone, High Speed Internet, DVD Players/VHS, TV’s Throughout, Luxurious Mountain Decor, Patio Chairs, Porch Swing, Linens and Towels, Laundry Room with Washer and Dryer, Parking for 6 Cars

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, updated kitchen, desirable amenities, with possibly a few dated features.

name: Snow Creek  - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Full and Twin Over Full Bunk Bed (Upper Level)
arrangements.Master Bedroom: King with Flat Screen TV, Gas Fireplace, and Private Bathroom (Upper Level)
arrangements.Bonus Room: Full Futon with Flat Screen TV with DVD Only (Upper Level)

description:
Situated in one of the most desirable areas of Big Bear Lake, this Eagle Point cabin is centrally located close to all there is to do in Big Bear.

Your kids will enjoy playing in the expansive fenced in back yard. The adults will enjoy playing horseshoes or soaking in the hot tub.. The deck is large enough for your entire party to sit back and enjoy star gazing above. Charcoal barbeque grill is provided for your convenience.

There are wood floors throughout the main level of the cabin and carpet on the upper level. There are four bedrooms plus a bonus bedroom. The bonus bedroom is on the main level making it convenient for those who have trouble with stairs. Keep in mind, there are approximately three steps up at the main entrance. There are two quarter baths. The quarter bath is on the main level while the full bathrooms are upstairs

The kitchen opens up into the dining room and the dining room opens up to the living room. The kitchen and dining room have views of back deck to the large yard. There is a beautiful rock gas fireplace in the dining room.

The living room has a flat screen TV, DVD player and pool table! This great room is sure to be fun for the entire group!

One stall parking in garage for tenants. At the present time there is no deck furniture.

Features: Hot Tub, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Stainless Steel Appliances, Bar Seating, Large Dining Table, Linens and Towels Provided, Washer, Dryer, Mud Room, 2 Gas Fireplaces, Boat Parking, Central Heating, Cable, Internet, Pack and Play (portable baby crib) located in closet next to washer dryer.

Note: DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few  dated features or appliances.

name: Summit Creek Pines - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Location, location, location! This thoroughly modern and recently renovated home is ideally located in a quiet neighborhood, walking distance to the lake and to a local park. If you visit during the 4th of July, you couldn't be in a better spot to view the annual fireworks on the lake. You are also just minutes away from Big Bear Village, Snow Summit, and Bear Mountain. 

Enter the home to find an open-plan living space with wood floors and high wood-beam ceilings. Skylights allow for plenty of natural light and a ceiling fan will keep you cool during the warm summer months. Curl up on the sofa and watch your favorite movie on the flat-screen television with cable. Although you've come to the mountains to escape the city, with wifi and plenty of phone chargers, you'll never feel out of touch. On a chilly night, warm up beside the electric fireplace.

The kitchen is a chef's paradise with a large center island and plenty of counter space. This is the perfect place to entertain or host a holiday meal. Kitchen features include quartz counter tops, stainless steel appliances, blender, microwave, and dishwasher. If you love coffee, you'll adore the separate coffee station with a traditional coffee maker, coffee bean grinder, and Kuerig. 

Enjoy your meals at the wood farmhouse-style dining table with benches that seat eight. For a casual seating option or fun spot for kids, there are four bar seats at the kitchen island.

A half bathroom is located right next to the dining room.

Access to the fully-fenced backyard is through the dining room. Relax sore muscles from a day on the slopes or a day spent hiking in the hot tub. Enjoy the fresh air while grilling dinner on the natural gas BBQ. 

On the right side of the house, main level, you'll find three bedrooms. The master bedroom features a king bed, high ceilings, ceiling fan, and has a television with cable. A window provides views of the backyard. The 3/4 en suite bathroom has a walk-in glass shower.

The second and third bedrooms both feature queen beds and televisions with cable. These bedrooms share a 3/4 bathroom with a glass walk-in shower that is located in the hall. 

Enjoy extra large paved flat driveway for plenty of parking. For friendly competition, the garage has been converted to a game room featuring a regulation pool table, regulation ping pong table, and flat screen TV.

This is a excellent rental for vacationers looking for a modern home in a great location. 

Features: Recently Remodeled, Near Lake, 2 Water Heaters, Digital Door Lock, Bose WiFi, HDTV in Every Room, Hot Tub,Natural Gas Grill, Fenced Yard, Wifi, Cable, Wood Floors, Ceiling Fans, Microwave, Dishwasher, Granite Counters, Stainless Steel Appliances, Kuerig, Washer and Dryer.

Note: The upper level of the home is currently not available to renters. 

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Summit Escape - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Located within walking distance of Snow Summit, this beautifully furnished two-story condo is the perfect getaway for you and your family! Centrally located, Summit Escape is close to all the Big Bear action, including shopping, dining, hiking and biking!

On the first level, beautiful wood floors run throughout the kitchen, dining, and living area. Leather bar level chairs seat six for a great dining experience or game night! Just off the dining area is a porch with a hot tub, a table with chairs, and a grill for those summer barbeques. The kitchen features retro-modern green counters and includes a gas range, coffee maker, microwave, toaster and dishwasher. A stacked washer/dryer is located near the entrance for your convenience. Enjoy relaxing near the wood-burning fireplace on the comfy leather couches in the living room. Have movie night on the large flat screen TV, with cable and DVD player! There is also a stereo when you feel like putting on some tunes.

On the second level are 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. A perfect set-up for a family with little ones! The master bedroom features a king size bed, a flat screen TV, and a private bath with a shower and tub. The second bedroom has two twin beds with a twin and full bed each, as well as an additional twin bed. Located just across the hall is a full bath with a tub and shower. This is such a great condo for a family Big Bear trip!

Features: Gas Stove, DVD Player, WiFi, Cable, Flat Screen TVs, Wood Burning Fireplace, Stacked Washer and Dryer, Hot Tub, Gas Range, Grill, Wood Floors, Towel and Linens Provided

name: Temple Retreat - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
A fabulous Big Bear Lake home offering great value, nice interior, lake views from two decks and three of the bedrooms. The nice game room featuring a pool table, opens to dining area and deck with spa.

Soaring ceilings in the large living room and a beautiful fireplace makes this a perfect spot to gather with friends and family. Room for lots with five bedrooms and three and three quarter baths. Internet.

Enjoy watching a fire in the wood burning fireplace or a movie on the flat screen TV with DVD player.

The inviting hot tub overlooks the peak lake views right across the street.

Note: DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

Features: Propane BBQ, Dishwasher, Wood Burning Fireplace, Pool Table, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Washer & Dryer, Linens and Towels Provided, Hot Tub, Sorry - No Garage Access.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few dated features or appliances.

name: Summit Secret - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
This single level cabin is located in a quiet, old-growth forest neighborhood within walking distance to Snow Summit and shuttles to Bear Mountain. Several restaurants, bicycle shops, and ski shops are also within walking distance. Groceries are an easy three minute drive away as is shopping in the Village. This cabin is on the Moonridge loop paved bicycle trail and is also a few minutes to forest hiking and biking trails. The driveway is flat and long enough for RV or boat parking with easy in and out access.

Small children and dogs will love the flat fenced backyard. Play a game of Foosball. Relax on the expansive front deck enjoying a the mountain air or the antics of the birds, squirrels, and other wildlife. Enjoy all of the romance of a true mountain home centrally located and close to everything Big Bear has to offer.

Features: Fully Stocked Kitchen, Fully Furnished, Close to Snow Summit, Charcoal Barbecue, Dishwasher, Pet Friendly, Flat Fenced Yard, Cable, Wood Burning Stove Insert, Fireplace, Linens and Towels Provided

Note: No internet or WiFi

This property is perfect for the guest who is looking for a cabin rental that won't break the bank. Generally simple decor and filled with basic furnishings and amenities that will meet most of your needs for an enjoyable vacation.

name: Sunset Chalet - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Bedroom: King, TV w/ cable & DVD (Main Level)

description:
This delightful cabin is perfect for your family getaway to Big Bear!  Located in the desirable Moonridge area of Big Bear Lake, this three bedroom, two bathroom cabin has been beautifully updated with desired finishes.  Just a few minutes drive to Bear Mountain, the golf course and zoo and within walking distance to the shuttles.

Step inside and enjoy the warm, homey feeling of the open floor plan, tastefully decorated with cabin accents.  The living room has a comfortable sofa for getting cozy in front of the gas fireplace, or watching TV with cable and DVD player. The dining area has seating for 6 with additional seating at the breakfast bar.  The kitchen has beautiful granite counters, stainless steel appliances including gas stove, microwave, dishwasher and large refrigerator. Head to the back of the house and relax on the deck or grill on the propane barbeque.  You will find the washer and dryer convenient for longer stays.

The master bedroom is also on the main floor and features a king bed and TV with cable and DVD player. A full bathroom is located in the hallway.

Upstairs you will find bedrooms two and three.  The kids will love bedroom two with a queen and twin bed, and a Foosball table.  Bedroom 3 has a king bed, TV with built in DVD player and small private deck.  The second full bathroom is also on the upper level.

Enjoy the convenience of flat parking and an additional deck in the front for those lazy afternoons in the fresh mountain air.

Note: This house does NOT have a yard, but does have nice decks for outdoor enjoyment.

Features: Close to Bear Mountain, Golf Course & Zoo, Updated, Flat Screen TVs, Cable, Internet, DVD Players, Fooseball Table, Central Heat, Gas Stove, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Dishwasher, Granite Counters, Gas Fireplace, Propane Barbeque, Decks, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Sweet Caroline - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Sweet Caroline is a charming cabin located in the quiet neighborhood of lower Moonridge. It's centrally located, just minutes from shops, restaurants, and local activities- very close to the Bear Mountain Ski resort, Golf Course, and Moonridge Alpine Zoo!

Parking for Sweet Caroline is located directly in front of the house on a flat, concrete drive. Walk ten steps up and you're at the front door. Before heading inside, take a moment to enjoy the front deck that is surrounded by mature pine trees and offers peek-a-boo views of the local mountains. Relax on the deck furniture and take in the fresh mountain air.

Enter the home to find an open-plan living space. The main level of the home has wood flooring and is filled with cute decorative touches like antique ice skates, ski poles, and canoe paddles. Bear signs and statues add to the cozy cabin vibe.

On a chilly night, you'll love cuddling on the couch and warming up in front of the wood-burning fireplace. There are several seating options in the living room, including a couch, love seat, two recliners, and a rocking chair. Watch your favorite movie on the flat-screen television with HDTV Cable and DVD player. Peek inside the side-table cabinet to discover board games and puzzles. 

Imagine waking up in the morning to the aroma of freshly brewed coffee and blueberry pancakes. Creating a homemade meal in your cabin is one of the best aspects of renting a home. Sweet Caroline's kitchen comes equiped with all the basic tools that you'll need to whip up a home cooked meal. Located next to the living room, kitchen features include a gas oven, microwave, dishwasher, coffee pot, and Keurig. Serve your meal at the wood dining table that seats six and is located in the kitchen.

Access to the side deck can be found through the kitchen. This deck wraps around from the side to the back of the house and an additional access door can be found at the back of the main level. How about having bbq for dinner? You'll find a propane bbq on the side deck.

Walk down the hallway next to the living room to find a full-size bathroom.

All of the bedrooms are located upstairs. The stairs and upper level of the home feature carpeted floors.

Immediately, at the top of the stairs, you'll find a twin bed and night stand. This bed is located on the upper-level landing and is not in a bedroom.

The bedroom one has a queen bed and a dresser. Keep yourself entertained with a flat-screen television with HDTV cable.

The second bedroom has two queen beds, plus a flat-screen television with HDTV cable and DVD player. Store your clothing in the large closet or dresser. This bedroom has windows with views of the front of the house. 

A 1/2 bathroom is located on the upper level, to be shared between all the bedrooms.

Sweet Caroline is cozy cabin in a desirable location. It's perfect for a small family or group. Make Sweet Caroline your destination for your Big Bear vacation!

Features:  Close to Bear Mountain, Resort Parking, Golf Course, Zoo, Shops, Wood Burning Fireplace, Decks, Cable, DVD, Internet, Propane Barbecue, Laminate Floors, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Keurig, Coffee Pot, Wall Heat, Towels and Linens Provided

This property is perfect for the guest who is looking for a cabin rental that won't break the bank. Generally simple decor and filled with basic furnishings and amenities that will meet most of your needs for an enjoyable vacation

name: Tall Timbers - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Bedroom: King and Twin over Twin Trundle (Upper Level)

description:
Nestled on a quiet cul-de-sac in Moonridge, Tall Timbers sits tall among the trees offering an amazing view of Bear Mountain Resort.

This spacious three bedroom, three bath home is modern in textile with granite counter tops, tile floors, knotty pine ceilings and relaxing earth tone paints. The kitchen comes fully equipped with stainless steel appliances, a center island for plenty of space, a pantry and all needed amenities. Open to the dining area and living room to enjoy family time as you prep and enjoy meals or watch movies on the flat screen TV From the dining area, access the private outdoor patio, great for grilling on the charcoal barbeque.

Relax, read a book, soak in the sun or catch the winter activities on the slopes while sitting on the, upper level deck. Extra room for fun & games is found in the lower level game room with Foosball table, bar and queen futon.

The master bedroom with king bed, has a private bathroom with a whirlpool tub and large, double headed shower. Morning coffee on a private deck or breakfast in bed with cable TV and internet. Both guests bedrooms are across the upper level for privacy and space. One room has two queen beds while the other has a twin and a queen for your choice of sleeping arrangements.

Enjoy the comforts of home while staying in this modern day log cabin with tree top views of the slopes and all that Big Bear has to offer. Just minutes from Bear Mountain Resort, Moonridge Zoo, Snow Summit Resort and the Village.

Features: Flat Screen TV, Internet, Cable, Laundry, Dishwasher, Wood Burning Fireplace, Fooseball Table, Mountain Views, Deck, Towels and Linens Provided

Note: Pinball machine out of order.  Careful in the winter the driveway is semi steep. This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Summit Mtn Getaway - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: Twin over Full Bunk and Twin Trundle, TV, DVD (Upper Level)

description:
Location, location, location! This upscale townhouse sits just steps away from the base of Snow Summit Resort! You can walk to the chair lift in under four minutes! This is a perfect location for winter skiing and snowboarding, or summer fun on the hiking and biking trails. It is centrally located for easy access to the lake and Village!

This is the perfect place to make and share cherished Big Bear memories, while you gather around the wood burning fireplace in the living room, or while watching your favorite movie or show on the flat screen TV with cable and DVD player.  The dining room ties in the kitchen and living room area and has a enough seating for 6.  The kitchen has ample granite counter space for buffet style meals, or for making a simple cup of coffee before you head out for a day full of adventure!  Enjoy the convenience of a gas range, dishwasher, microwave, and coffee pot.  From the kitchen you can easily access the 2 car garage, laundry room, and half bathroom.  Spend a little time on the front deck with chairs and a charcoal barbecue.

Head upstairs where you will find the bedrooms and a full bathroom.  The master suite is complete with vaulted ceilings, a small private deck, a king sized bed, a TV with cable, a private bathroom with separate toilet, double sinks, shower and large tub for a relaxing soak.  The second bedroom has a twin over full bunk and twin trundle, and a TV with DVD player. Perfect for the kiddos! The last bedroom features a queen size bed.

You can't beat these accommodations in one of the best locations in Big Bear!

Features: Walk to Snow Summit, Centrally Located for Lake, Grocery and Village, 2 Car Garage Parking (plus 1 off street parking spot), Laminate Floors, Wood Burning Fireplace, Cable, Internet, DVD, Stocked Kitchen, Granite Counters, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Central Heat, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Summits Trident - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Bedroom: King with Flat Screen and Blu-Ray/DVD player (Lower Level)

description:
Welcome to Big Bear at its best.  This ideal mountain retreat has the perfect location: centrally located a few blocks to Snow Summit, Big Bear Lake, and a short drive to The Village.  You'll truly appreciate having everything nearby, while feeling tucked away in your mountain cabin home.

The first floor features an open layout and warm knotty pine ceilings throughout the entire house.  Cozy up next to the wood burning fireplace and watch your favorite movie on the large flat screen TV with Apple TV.


The Brand-New Kitchen Remodel is complete with seating for 7 plus 5 around the expansive center island, gas stove, dishwasher, microwave and washer & dryer in the utility room.  Step out to the covered backyard patio area and enjoy a soak in the hot tub under the stars after a day of outdoor activity.

The first floor Master with attached bathroom offers a king-size bed, flat screen TV with Apple TV, and Blu-Ray/DVD player.

The upstairs features a game room with a pool table, a large flat screen TV with Apple TV, and a Blu-Ray/DVD player.  Sliding glass doors allow the game room festivities to flow out onto the second-floor balcony.  A full-size futon in the game room provides for additional accommodation.

The second and third bedrooms are upstairs just adjacent to the game room with a full bathroom conveniently located off the hall. The second bedroom features a queen-size bed, while the third bedroom features two twin beds.

After a day on the slopes or at the lake, relax in this cozy cabin retreat.  The large fenced backyard is great for the kids. Enjoy grilling on the outdoor charcoal BBQ.  Also, keep in touch with the secure wireless internet access. 

Come up and enjoy!

Note: DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities and all updated appliances and electronics.

name: The Point - Fawnskin, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 1: King, Pull-Out Sofa (not pictured), Full Bathroom (Main Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 5: Queen, Non-Pull Out Sofa, Full Bathroom, Spa Tub (Upper Level)

description:
As of September 26, 2018, the water depth for dock use about 5 feet to 6 feet deep.

One of the best locations on all of Big Bear Lake with views of the San Gorgonio Mountain, ski slopes, and all of Big Bear Lake. This home has the feeling of privacy and features multiple levels with 5 bedroom suites, all with their own private bathrooms and most with fireplaces. Enjoy public beach access and lake views from almost all rooms or one of the multiple decks.

The great room is all about the view and windows and features a sunken living room with "L" shaped built in sofa.  Sit down for a family meal at the dining table or play a game of cards on the additional round table.  There is plenty of seating for everyone with unobstructed views of the lake and mountains.  Enjoy two sliding patio doors for fresh air and deck access featuring multiple levels or head down to the beach.

You won't mind spending time in the kitchen with lake views, beautiful granite counters, gas stove, microwave, coffee pot and dishwasher.  A small office area is great for catching up on emails.

The main level has a den (not pictured) off the great room with deck access, 3/4 bathroom and full bed.  An additional half bathroom is down a short hall off the entryway.

Off the kitchen is a cozy family room with pull-out sofa and TV with DirecTV.  Have fun in the game room just off the kitchen which includes a pool table, wood burning fireplace, pull-out sofa (not pictured), and a full bathroom.  Bedroom one has a raised King bed, pull-out sofa (not pictured), wet bar, private deck, lake views, wood burning fireplace, TV with DVD and 3/4 bathroom with large shower and double sinks.  

Downstairs on the lower level you will find the second bedroom which is the same as bedroom two, as well as the exercise area with lake views.

The upstairs has three more bedrooms. The 3rd bedroom has a full bed, full bathroom, wood burning fireplace and window seat which is perfect for relaxing. The 4th bedroom has queen, full bathroom, private deck, wet bar, TV with DVD player and fireplace. The 5th bedroom is a fantastic suite with queen, wood burning fireplace with sitting area, private deck, TV with DirecTV, sunken spa tub, large separate shower and double sinks.  A front loading washer and dryer are in the hall and perfect for longer stays.

Note: Wood Stove in living room is NOT for use.

Lake levels vary throughout the year and boat docks availability is not guaranteed at the time of your arrival. Destination Big Bear is not responsible for the level of water in the lake during the course of guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most up-to-date lake levels for lakefront properties.

Features: Lakefront, Beach Access, Mountain Views, Propane BBQ, Bedroom Suites, Separate Heating In Each Bedroom, Wood Burning Fireplaces, DirecTV, Internet, Decks, Lake Views, Coffee Pot, Gas Stove, Microwave, Dishwasher, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This property is all about the location and is perfect for guests who  value newer construction or remodeled homes with tasteful interior  design. Enjoy a pleasing decor, a few dated furniture items and updated  kitchen appliances.

name: The Foxes Den - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
This  beautifully remodeled boutique cottage is luxe & charming! Perfect  for a couple seeking a romantic mountain retreat in style! Located in  lower Moonridge neighborhood that is 6-8 mins drive to downtown This cottage is tucked in the mountains  conveniently close to both ski resorts and walking distance to the  shuttles to either resort from the Moonridge Parking Lot. Including,  only a three minute drive to Bear Mountain Golf Course and steps away  from a coffee shop & restaurant.
 
Built  in 1948, this mountain chic cottage is meticulously styled & in  excellent condition. Nestled between neighboring cabins & hidden  behind two pine trees towers over this little gem. With a curb appeal  straight out of a "Hallmark" romance movie like setting that is  undeniably charming! Although small in size at only 540 sq. ft  it's  intimate setting makes for the perfect idyllic "cottage in the woods."  Ideally suited for a couple or a couple with a child.  It is not  recommended for groups or guests who are seeking a more rundown party  cabin.

In  the master bedroom, the bed has been arranged to accommodate the  limited space. It features a show stopping birch wallpaper w/ a queen  size bed draped in a duvet goose down comforter or coverlet & king  size plush pillows for your ultimate comfort.

The  second room includes a daybed/couch trundle that converts to a 2 twin  bed. Accommodating 2 additional small guests w/ plenty of plush pillows  & blankets.

In  the galley kitchen, complimentary coffees, teas, ciders & hot cocoa  are offered in the coffee station. With open-shelving for easy access  to baking & cooking essentials. Including a beautiful farmhouse  sink, dishwasher, gas range, under-counter fridge, microwave, blender,  crockpot, toaster, tea pot, French press, T-Fal titanium non-stick  cookware, Cuisinart K-Cup coffee maker & a small propane BBQ in the  yard. Everything you need to make a home cooked-gourmet meal!

Then cozy up in the living room to enjoy the gas burning fireplace & make lasting memories!

Other  amenities include two LCD-HD flat screen TV's, Blu-ray disk player,  iHome docking station, high speed wireless internet, cable, plenty of  board games & more!

Note: No washer/dryer or spa.

name: The Tambay Chateau - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Bedroom: King and Queen Pull Out in Attached Room(Private Bathroom)
arrangements.Bedroom 3: Twin Over Full Bunk and Twin

description:
Welcome to The Tambay Chateau, a beautiful private setting backing up to the national forest near Bear Mountain Ski Resort, Golf Course, the Bow Canyon hiking trails, biking trails and the Zoo!
 
Take in the views from the ample decks of this split-level cabin style home which includes 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and more than 2100 square feet of living space. Sit back and relax in the warm and comforting indoor hot tub located in the master bedroom bathroom.

Enjoy the updated kitchen featuring island seating, brand new stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, and light and bright knotty wood cabinets throughout. The adjoining dining area opens up to a welcoming deck overlooking the serene alpine forest.
 
Now cozy up next to a gas burning fire in the family room or wood burning fire in the living room.  The living room boasts high ceilings, making the space feel very inviting and open. 
 
You're also going to want to be sure to check out the newly-added game room featuring a big screen TV, full size billiard table, ping pong table, air hockey and more. This area is bound to keep some members of your group so entertained they may never want to leave!
 
The Tambay Chateau is sure to create memories for you and your family and friends to relish for many years to come!

Features: Internet, Cable TV, HDTV, DVD Players, Washer, Dryer, charcoal BBQ, Forest views, Linens and Towels Provided, Plenty of Parking, Indoor Hot Tub, 2 Fireplace, Gas Oven, Fully Equipped Kitchen, and a Newly Added Man Cave (Game Room)

name: The Crazy Bear - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Crazy Bear Lodge is a well appointed cabin with everything you need to call the mountains home for your next trip to Big Bear!  Located within minutes of Bear Mountain and conveniences, this cabin combines location with amenities for a pleasant stay with your family and friends.

The open floor plan provides an airy feeling while still being cozy, thanks to the mountain decor, knotty pine cathedral ceiling and corner wood burning fireplace.  There is plenty of comfortable seating in front of the large flat screen TV with streaming.  The kitchen boasts ample counter space for meal preparation and buffet style serving for your next holiday feast.  Included is a gas range, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot.  The dining table has seating for seven.  If cooking outdoors is more your style, the side deck has a propane barbecue as well as the hot tub!  The fenced backyard is great for the kids with plenty of room to roam.

Down the hallway you will find a full bathroom, the washer and dryer, and three bedrooms.  The master suite is complete with king bed, Smart TV for streaming, and a private full bathroom.  The second bedroom has a queen bed, Smart TV, and access to the deck and yard.  The third bedroom has a twin over queen bunk, Smart TV, and a Play Station 3.

You will cherish the memories you are bound to make at Crazy Bear Lodge during your next trip to Big Bear Lake!

NOTE: No Cable.  PS3 games not provided.

Features:  Close to Bear Mountain and Conveniences, Mountain Decor, Wood Burning Fireplace, Fenced Backyard, Hot Tub, Propane Barbecue, Smart TVs, DVD, Internet, Play Station 3, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Tile Floors, Carpeted Bedrooms, Central Heat, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, updated appliances with possibly a few original features.

name: The Grand On the Shore - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Queen with Jack and Jill Bath
arrangements.Bedroom 4: Queen with Jack and Jill Bath
arrangements.Game Room: Two pull out sofas and two cots with air mattresses

description:
***DUE TO DROUGHT CONDITIONS AND EXTREMELY LOW WATER LEVELS, THE BOAT DOCK IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.***

This grand property is the perfect retreat located on the shore of Big Bear Lake. Relax in style in the spacious rooms with desired amenities providing a luxury feel. The customization within the property is on point adding that extra detail to your stay, making it a memorable visit to Big Bear.

From the moment you walk in you will instantly feel at home with the open plan layout consisting of the spacious living area with comfortable seating to enjoy watching Direct TV in front of the fire or just gazing out at the water. The large modern kitchen with rustic accents gives all guests room to prepare meals on the natural granite work top with additional amenities including a coffee maker, microwave, dishwasher and a pantry. Seating is provided on the slab wood breakfast bar overlooking the kitchen. The dining area is located next to the window to enjoy a lake view while eating. 
The first master bedroom is welcoming with dark furnishings, king bed, gas fireplace, TV and also the perfect view of the lake. Connected is a full bathroom including a Jacuzzi bath and separate shower. The kid’s bedroom includes a twin over full bunk bed with a cozy feel to the room.

Upstairs in the loft you can sit down and relax enjoying the view through the large windows. The second master bedroom has a private deck to admire the view from the top floor, king bed, wood burning fireplace, TV and private 3/4 bathroom. Two more bedrooms each have a queen bed and are connected with a Jack-and-Jill bathroom. Each bedroom is decorated with detail and care to make your stay comfortable and memorable.

The lower level game room provides you with space for entertainment and relaxation to enjoy with all the family. The pool table will be enjoyable to play as well as admiring the lake view. The bar area is the perfect place to create your favorite drinks with all the equipment you will need. Access the covered deck for a breath-taking view of the lake with a propane barbeque and seating. Go down to the small fenced yard to access the hot tub and unwind with the cool lake breeze in the shade.

***DUE TO DROUGHT CONDITIONS AND EXTREMELY LOW WATER LEVELS, THE BOAT DOCK IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.***

Note: Lake levels vary throughout the year and boat docks availability is not guaranteed at the time of your arrival. Destination Big Bear is not responsible for the level of water in the lake during the course of guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most up-to-date lake levels for lakefront properties.

Features: Dog Friendly, 2 Master Suites, Mountain Decor, Lakefront, 2 Car Garage, Jetted Tub in Masters, 3 Fireplaces, Gourmet Kitchen, Flat Screen TV's, DVD, DirecTV, Surround System, Wireless Internet, Beautiful Decks, Pool Table, Card Table, Outdoor Hot Tub, Propane Barbecue, Walk to Village, Washer & Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided.

name: Timber View - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Located just a short drive from Bear Mountain, you will surely enjoy sitting out on the back deck and enjoying the Timber View!  Situated down from the road for added privacy, this two bedroom two bath home is great for a simple getaway to Big Bear Lake.

The living room features natural wood accents, wood inspired tile floors, a corner wood burning fireplace, large flat screen TV with and a futon for flexible lounging and sleeping arrangements.  The dining area transitions the space into the kitchen that is stocked with all the basics including gas range, microwave and coffee pot.  Just around the corner is a 3/4 bathroom and laundry room for your convenience.  Step out to the back deck and grill on the propane barbecue.

Upstairs are two bedrooms and a full bathroom.  Both bedrooms have a queen bed and TV.

Features: Short Drive to Bear Mountain, Wood Burning Fireplace, Propane Barbecue, Tile and Carpet Floors,  Flat Screen TV, Gas Range, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Dining Area, Wall Heat, Deck, Laundry, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Timberline Trail - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Located in a quiet neighborhood, Timberline Trail has all the amenities you need to have the perfect Big Bear getaway! This three bedroom, two bath home has an open floor plan and beautiful furnishings throughout. If you are looking for a home away from home, this is your ideal vacation spot!

The living area features a wood-burning fireplace, a flat screen TV with Google TV, and gorgeous leather couches including a pull-out bed. Enjoy lounging in the living area, playing a game of pool, or whipping up dinner in this beautiful open area. Perfect for entertaining and quality family time!  The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, wood floors, granite countertops and everything you need for the chef in your group to whip up something for a nice night in. Just off the kitchen is a deck surrounded by beautiful greenery and a propane grill. Perfect for summer barbeques!
