Leading to the bedrooms is a full bath, including a tub and shower for your convenience. The first bedroom has a queen size bed and carpeted floors with plenty of closet space. The master bedroom is just down the hall and includes a king size bed, a flat screen TV, a wood burning stove and a private deck! The master bath is fully equipped with a large tiled shower, a jetted tub and granite countertops. Perfect for relaxing after a long day of Big Bear fun! The third bedroom has a queen size bed and is super cozy for your guests or little ones. Located in the garage just off the third bedroom, are a full sized washer and dryer.

Timberline Trail is near the lake, hiking trails and many Big Bear activities. It also has a private driveway and a two-car garage. This is the perfect place for you and your family and friends to enjoy your stay!

Features:  Hot Tub, Decks, Flat Screen TVs, Jetted Tub, Open Floor Plan, Pool Table, Propane Grill, Gas Range, Full Size Washer and Dryer, Wood Burning Fireplace, Wood Burning Stove, Two Car Garage, Private Driveway

name: Tippie Canoe - Fawnskin, CA

arrangements.Master Bedroom: King with Gas Fireplace and Flat Screen TV, Lake View  (Lower Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 3: Twin over Full Bunk, Lake View (Main Level)
arrangements.Living Room: Twin Pullout Couch, Lake View (Main Level)

description:
***DUE TO DROUGHT CONDITIONS AND EXTREMELY LOW WATER LEVELS, THE BOAT DOCK IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.***

Tippie Canoe is located just steps from Big Bear Lake, providing spectacular views of both the lake and Snow Summit from nearly every room in the house. The property includes two large decks, perfect for watching boating on the lake or enjoying a barbequed dinner during sunset. At Tippie Canoe, you'll have a front row seat to the Fourth of July Fireworks: one of Big Bear Lake's biggest annual events. In the winter, you'll enjoy the serenity of watching snow fall on the water. Stunning lake views are the star of Tippie Canoe!

This property is built on the side of a mountain and includes a steep set of stairs the first deck, with the front door located on the side of the house. This would not be the best property for guests with mobility issues.

When you enter the home, you will discover the stairs to the upper level on your right, and the door to the master suite directly in front of you. The spacious master suite features a king size bed facing a window to maximize those lake views. The master suite also includes a flat-screen television with DirecTV and an ensuite 3/4 bathroom.

Relaxation is key to a perfect vacation. To help you achieve that goal, Tippie Canoe has an indoor spa and sauna. Located in a separate room adjacent to the master suite, the spa and sauna are excellent places to unwind. Since they are located within the house, you can enjoy these features year-round, however for a magical experience, this room opens on to the lower balcony, providing you with stellar views of the lake as you soak in the spa.

Walk upstairs to the second level of the home and you'll find yourself in the cozy living room. Warm up with a wood burning fireplace as you curl up on the couch and enjoy those lake views or watch a movie on the flat-screen television with DirecTV. Show off your competitive side, with a friendly game of air hockey.

The kitchen has tile countertops and includes essential appliances; such as a coffee pot, dishwasher, and microwave. A breakfast bar divides the dining area from the kitchen. The dining area has a six person wood dining table with stunning lake views. If you enjoy grilling, the upper level deck includes a propane barbeque and it is convienantly located with access from the dining room.

No one wants to do laundry on vacation, but if you're planning an extended stay or have a clothing emergency, it's a huge bonus to have a washer and dryer handy. Tippie Canoe has you covered with a full-size washer and dryer located in a separate space behind the kitchen and near the back bedroom.

Two bedrooms and a full-bathroom are located on the upper level. The first bedroom is off the living room and features lake views. This bedroom has a bunk-bed (full bottom/twin top) that is perfect for the kids in your group. The second bedroom is in the back of the house and has a window with forest views. This bedroom features a queen bed, and although the bathroom is not attached, this is the closest room to the full bathroom.

This property has lake access, but NO DOCK availability. The access point provides a good shoreline for launching non-motorized watercraft. There is additional off street boat parking available directly across the street from the home. 

Note: Tippie Canoe is kid friendly but please note that although the property  does have a small backyard, it is not fenced or an appropriate area for  children to play. Please accompany small children when crossing the road  to the lake. Speakers next to spa are not for tenants use. This is a very old cabin with old stairs.  

***DUE TO DROUGHT CONDITIONS AND EXTREMELY LOW WATER LEVELS, THE BOAT DOCK IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.***

Lake levels vary throughout the year and boat docks availability is not guaranteed at the time of your arrival. Destination Big Bear is not responsible for the level of water in the lake during the course of guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most up-to-date lake levels for lakefront properties.

Features: Lake Access, Two Flat-Screen Televisions, Air Hockey Table, Direct TV, DVD/VHS Player, Spectacular Lake Views from Most Rooms, Gas Fireplace, Wood Burning Fireplace, Parking for up to Five Cars, Fully-Stocked Kitchen, Washer & Dryer, Linens & Towels Provided, Propane Barbeque

This property is perfect for the guest who is looking for a cabin rental that won't break the bank: simple decor, filled with basic furnishings, and amenities that will meet most of your needs for an enjoyable vacation.

name: The Barn - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
This nicely updated cabin in Big Bear will have you dreaming of the country, or at least the mountains!  Appropriately named "The Barn" this cabin is located just minutes from the slopes, restaurants and conveniences.

The cabin boasts wood features throughout including flooring, beams and ceiling.  The natural rock wood burning fireplace will keep you cozy in the winter as well as add that desired mountain ambiance you crave.  The living room has comfortable seating for everyone with a sofa, loveseat and recliner.  Enjoy watching your favorite programing on the TV with cable and streaming.  The updated kitchen is just steps away with granite counters, stainless steel appliances including gas stovetop, wall oven, microwave, dishwasher, and both Keurig and standard coffee maker.  The dining room is the ideal location for a meal or family game night.  Enjoy the conveniences of the half bathroom with stacked front loading washer and dryer.  From the dining room you can step out to the fenced backyard for a game of corn hole, grilling on the propane barbecue, and relaxing at the table and chairs.

Upstairs you will find accommodations for a good night's sleep and a full bathroom.  The landing has entertainment and sleeping options with a Foosball table, TV with DVD and cable, small deck and two twin beds. The master bedroom is a retreat of it's own with king bed, deck, sitting area, wood stove and private 3/4 bathroom with double sinks and separate toilet and shower room.  A large DVD collection is available for your viewing pleasure.  The second bedroom is also on this level and has a king and twin bed.

This cabin is a great choice for your next vacation in Big Bear! Please don't forget to ask about The Barn's discount for military, first responders, and educators!

Note: Small dogs only allowed at this home.

Features: Wood Features, Propane Barbecue, Wood Fireplace, Cable, Internet, Updated Kitchen, Master Suite, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: The Bunk House - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Looking for a great cabin for you and your sweetheart?  Or maybe a mother-daughter getaway?  The Bunk House has it all for a great vacation in Big Bear Lake with sweeping views of the slopes, a hot tub for the ultimate in relaxation and beautiful finishes with a cozy mountain flair. Enjoy all the updated features inside and out!

The great room has wood floors throughout, a gas fireplace for those chilly mountain nights and views of Bear Mountain that is the highlight of the space.  Cozy up on the sofa and watch TV with a built in DirecTV Now and Roku featuring HBO, Showtime, and Netflix or relax with a good book.  The kitchen has granite counters, stainless steel appliances, a gas range with double oven, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot.  The dining table features bench seating and is perfect for a meal or game night.  Step out to the upper deck and grill on the propane barbecue or sip a glass of wine in the fresh air while you admire the view.  Soak all your stress away in the hot tub located on the lower deck.

The main floor has a full bathroom and bedroom with queen bed.  Upstairs in the loft is a queen and twin bed for flexible sleeping arrangements.

Features: Slope Views, Hot Tub, Central Heat, Updated Kitchen and Bath, Wood Floors, Deck, Propane Barbecue, Gas Fireplace, Granite Counters, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Range with Double Oven, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, DirecTV, Internet, Towels and Linens Provided

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Villa Grove Lodge - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Driving up to this wooded cabin, you notice that it is the mountain cabin that you have always dreamed of when envisioning your vacation in the San Bernardino National Forest. With the timbered cabin exterior and the log cabin style interior, you won’t find a more suitable cabin for your mountain getaway needs.

This cabin has a fully equipped kitchen that will enable you to cook up some tasty meals for the whole family that will help make you feel right at home here. Not only that, but you can also take advantage of the pool table and take part is some friendly competition amongst family.

And after all of that family fun, why not lounge around in front of the stone fireplace and catch up on all of the peace that you have been missing for quite some time now. To enjoy that peace even more, venture out onto the back deck and bask in the warmth of the hot tub overlooking the San Bernardino National Forest surrounding you.

It sounds pretty amazing doesn’t it? Come and see for yourself!

Features: 2 Car Garage, TV, VCR/DVD Players, CD Player, Cable Channels, Pool Table, Fully Equipped Kitchen, Outdoor 3 Person Hot Tub, Wood Burning Rock Fireplace, Deck with Outdoor Furniture, Wireless Internet, Air Conditioning Upstairs, Propane BBQ, Towels and Linens Provided
address: 749 Villa Grove Ave Big Bear City, 92314

name: Waters Edge - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Suite: King, Twin with Twin Trundle (Upper Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 3: King, Twin over Full Bunk (Lower Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 4: King, Twin over Twin Bunk (Lower Level)

description:
As of September 26, 2018, the water depth for dock use about 2 feet to 3.5 feet deep. 

Plan your next Big Bear vacation and stay at Waters Edge, located right on the shore of Big Bear Lake with sweeping views of the mountains, observatory and water.  Warmer months are perfect for relaxing on one of the decks with a glass of wine while you watch the boats go by, or enjoy access to your own boat at the private boat dock (seasonal).

This 5 bedroom, 4 1/2 bathroom cabin features 4 split levels, beautiful welcoming spaces and all the amenities you are looking for.  Step inside to the entryway with room for your boots and outdoor gear.  Step down a few stairs into the sunken living room with large sofa that is situated to take advantage of the lake views, air conditioning, gas fireplace and large flat screen TV with Tivo, Apple TV and Blu-Ray player.  The pool table can be converted into a ping-pong table for hours of fun.  Head up to the middle level for dining and entertaining.  Family meals are sure to be enjoyed at the table with additional seating at the breakfast bar.  A sitting area focuses on the amazing lake view so bring your favorite book and relax with a cup of tea while overlooking the water.  The kitchen is fully stocked and features granite counters, stainless steel appliances, two sinks, a gas stove top, double ovens, microwave, dishwasher, wine fridge and coffee pot.  A laundry room is available for your convenience.  A late night might be spent playing poker in the den.  For grilling, step out to the deck and enjoy the use of the propane barbecue.  Soak in the hot tub under the stars!

Up a short flight of stairs is the landing with a half bathroom as well as the stairs to the master suite, and separate stairs to another bedroom. All the bedrooms have been named and thoughtfully decorated.  The master suite "Eagle's Nest" is a dream come true with lounge area that includes a twin daybed with twin trundle and wet bar. The bedroom has a small private deck overlooking the lake, a king bed and TV with Tivo.  The bathroom has a sunken jet tub, double sinks, shower and private toilet room.  Head back down the stairs to the landing and then up a separate flight of stairs to the "Wolf's Den" that has a full over full bunk bed and private 3/4 bathroom with private toilet room.

Two more bedrooms are located on the lowest level of the cabin.  "Elk's Habitat" has a king and twin over full bunk, full bathroom, TV and patio with lake views.  The last bedroom "Bear's Cave" has a king and twin over twin bunk bed, full bathroom, TV with Tivo and patio with lake views.

This cabin is sure to be a family favorite with plenty of space for everyone and the amenities you desire. If this home is booked for you dates, check out Pattersons Lakefront Retreat!

Note: Fireplace in master is NOT for guest use. Dock is NOT available for tenant use during the winter season.

 Lake levels vary throughout the year and boat docks availability is not guaranteed at the time of your arrival. Destination Big Bear is not responsible for the level of water in the lake during the course of guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most up-to-date lake levels for lakefront properties.

Features: Lakefront, Lake Views, Boat Dock (Seasonal), Hot Tub, Air Conditioning, Propane Barbecue, Pool/Ping-Pong Table, Gas Fireplace,  Poker Table, Tivo, Apple TV, Blu-Ray, Internet, Granite Counters, Stainless Steel Appliances, Wine Fridge, 2 Sinks, Double Oven, Gas Stove Top, Coffee Pot, Dishwasher, Microwave, Bathrooms in all Bedrooms, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided.

name: What A View - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Suite: King, Full Bath, Gas Fireplace, Deck (Entry Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 4: Twin over Full Bunk, Twin over Twin Bunk, Twin Trundle (Lower Level)

description:
As soon as you step into this fabulous mountain retreat you'll be saying "Wow!  What a view!"  This log style cabin is located in the coveted Castle Glen Estates neighborhood and boasts one of the best views of the lake, mountains and town below.  Spend your evenings watching the sun set over the water while you soak in the hot tub, grill on the propane barbecue or just sit back and enjoy a glass of wine.

This cabin has a split level floor plan with the main living area on the upper level.  The living room, kitchen and dining room complete the space with wall to wall windows overlooking the lake.  There is plenty of comfortable seating on the large wraparound sofa in front of the wood burning fireplace and big screen TV with cable, Blu-Ray and streaming.  The kitchen has bar seating, plenty of granite counter space, separate prep sink, coffee pot, stainless steel appliances including gas stove top, single wall oven, microwave and dishwasher.  Two dining tables ensure everyone has a place for a family meal or holiday gathering.  The upper deck has the barbecue, seating and of course, the view!  There is also a large work space for your laptop and a half bathroom.

One level down is the entry level with the beautiful master suite.  Enjoy your own private seating area with gas fireplace, TV with cable, and deck with lake views.  Snuggle in for the night in the log style king bed.  The private bathroom has a corner tub, separate shower, double sinks and separate toilet room.

Down another level are three more bedrooms, a full bathroom, and laundry room.  The second bedroom suite has a king bed, love seat with twin pull-out bed, private full bath with double sinks, lake views, a TV with cable and access to the hot tub.  The third bedroom has a king bed, TV with cable, lake views and access to the hot tub.  The fourth bedroom has a twin over full bunk with additional twin trundle, a twin over twin bunk and TV with cable.

The lowest level is where all the evening fun is sure to be found!  Turn on a game on the large flat screen TV with cable and DVD player with plenty of seating on the wraparound sofa.  There is also a gas fireplace for those winter days.  Challenge each other to a game of pool or ping pong on the convertible table.  Mix up a cocktail at the wet bar with sink and small fridge.

This mountain retreat has it all!

Note:  This cabin is a split level home with 4 levels. 

Features:  Lake Views, Luxury Finishes, Close to Lake and Conveniences, Hot Tub, Pool Table, Ping Pong, Propane Barbecue, Wood and Gas Fireplaces, Cable, Internet, Blu-Ray, DVD, Stainless Steel Appliances, Granite Counters, Dishwasher, Gas Stovetop, Single Wall Oven, Microwave, Coffee Pot, 2 Master Suites, Laundry Room, Towels and Linens Provided

This is a luxury property which includes the finest furnishings, luxury building materials, and a highly consistent design theme. Luxury properties range from elegant and formal to relaxed and chic, but all appeal to guests who appreciate first-class accommodations with a designer flair.

name: Vista Ridge Lodge - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Suite: King, Twin Pull-Out, 3/4 Bath, Gas Fireplace, TV, Views (Entry Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 2: Queen, Twin over Twin Bunk (Upper Level)

description:
Your friends and family will love staying at this breathtaking, multi-level cabin with sweeping views of the slopes and lake.  Lovingly decorated with upscale mountain decor for a cozy feeling. This four bedroom, 4 1/2 bath home will be a favorite destination for all of your Big Bear weekends!

The entry level has a fabulous mudroom for storing your adventure gear. Just to the right is the fabulous game room complete with a pool table, sleeper sofa, large screen TV with cable, slope views, and the perfect wet bar with mini fridge for trying out your bartending skills. Behind a set of barn style doors is the washer and dryer and 3/4 bathroom.

This level also has the master bedroom that is fit for a queen with front deck access, remote control blinds, and slope views!  Rest peacefully on the king bed or lounge on the sofa that also converts into a twin bed. When the weather gets cold you can snuggle up by the gas fireplace while watching TV with cable. Enjoy the convenience of the private bathroom with large walk in shower and double sinks.

The main living area is located on the upper level with access via two sets of spiral stairs.  The whole family has space to gather in the large living room with vaulted ceilings, slope and lake views, wet bar with mini fridge, corner gas fireplace, large TV with cable, remote control blinds, and a half bathroom. This great room also has a pull out sofa for added sleeping space. Make your way to the kitchen with an over-sized island and beautiful stone counters.  Meal prep will be a breeze with the stainless steel appliances including gas range, dishwasher, microwave, and coffee pot.  Step out to the deck for grilling on the propane barbecue while you admire the panoramic views. Just around the corner is the large hot tub!

When it's time to eat, take a seat at the dining table with plush seating. The family room helps keep everyone connected while enjoying the gas fireplace.

Through the unique circular hallway you will find a full bathroom, a 3/4 bathroom, and three bedrooms.  The first bedroom has a queen bed and twin over twin bunk. The second bedroom has a queen over queen bunk, and the last bedroom has a queen bed.

The spacious driveway has ample parking space. For a fun and memorable Big Bear vacation, look no further than Vista Ridge Lodge!

Note:  No garage parking.  No ground level entrance- stairs are required to enter property.  Interior stairs are metal spiral stairs and guests should use caution when carrying groceries and bags to the upper level, or use the exterior stairs.

Features: Slope and Lake Views, Hot Tub, Pool Table, Propane Barbecue, Upscale Mountain Decor, Cable, Internet, 2 Wet Bars, 3 Gas Fireplaces, Upgraded Kitchen, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Microwave, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Whispering Pines Retreat - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Escape to the pines for fresh air and a relaxing getaway.  Located in the coveted area of Fox Farm, Whispering Pines Retreat has all the comforts of home with traditional mountain cabin flair. The main living room features a gas only fiireplace, vaulted wood ceilings and comfortable seating. Watch a movie or cable on the flat screen TV. A small dining area is great for a meal and the spacious kitchen has plenty of counter space, gas stove, dishwasher, oven and microwave.

Challenge each other at a game on the pool table or step out onto the back deck with charcoal grill, seating and hot tub. The lush yard features wildflowers and a play house that is perfect for the kids. A laundry room and half bathroom is located on the main level for your convenience.  Have fun with your friends playing air hockey and Foosball!

Upstairs is a master suite with king bed and attached bathroom.  The two other bedrooms each have two queen beds and share the large hallway bathroom. A pull-out couch provides additional sleeping space.

Features: Hot Tub, Gas Barbeque, Pool Table, Cable, Internet, Laundry, Yard, Deck, Gas Fireplace, Large Kitchen, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Woods View - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Entering into this quaint cottage cabin, with its cozy comforts will allow you and your guests the chance to bond and relax after a day of mountain exploring. This two story charmer has everything you and your guests will need to create lasting memories.

The main living area includes comfortable couch seating for six, a flat screen TV and a wood burning fire place. Its open floor plan includes kitchen, dining area, living room and access to the furnished deck.

The kitchen comes fully stocked and has a dishwasher. At the top of the stairs is a game room which includes a mini hockey table, a selection of owner supplied games, a flat screen TV and the internet is provided for your pleasure. 

Sleep comes easy in the master bedroom which includes a queen bed, gas fireplace and a full bath assessed from the master bedroom and game room.

You will find each bedroom has a queen to accommodate all your guests, one with deck access. Relax, surrounded by forest views on the deck which is equipped with a charcoal BBQ. The spacious deck is furnished with a table and chairs and a chaise lounge ideal for curling up with a good book or napping in the forest air.

Features: Forest Views, Open Floor Plan, Laundry, Dishwasher, Internet, Flat Screen TVs, Carpeted Floors, Gas Fireplace, Charcoal Barbeque, Deck, Air Hockey Table

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few  dated features or appliances.
address: 870 Villa Grove Avenue Big Bear City, 92315

name: Willow Wonderland - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Located centrally in beautiful Big Bear, Willow Wonderland is truly the perfect home away from home!  With beautiful hardwood floors throughout, this two-story home is as functional as it is gorgeous! You will be close to all Big Bear has to offer, including Snow Summit, shopping and dining.

The first level features a large living room with a wood burning fireplace, a large flat screen Roku TV, and a Blu-Ray player. Lounge on the large sectional sofa a have movie night by the fire! The dining area has seating for four and is open to  the living area. The kitchen has all you need to enjoy a dinner night in. It features top of the line appliances including a gas range, microwave, dishwasher and coffee maker. In addition, there is bar seating for two. Down the hall from the kitchen is a stacked washer and dryer, and a bathroom with a shower for your convenience.

Bedroom one has beautiful wood furniture, a king size bed, and a full bath with shower and tub. Bedroom two is great for guests and the little ones! It features a king size bed, as well as a twin over twin bunk bed. Heading off the living area is the game room where all the fun happens! Enjoy a friendly game of pool, Foosball, or enjoy Pac-Man on the arcade machine! In between level one and two, is a large deck with a picnic table and views of our lush forest. Great for dining al fresco, or family game time outside! On level two, bedroom three features a king size bed and a full bath with tub and shower. Bedroom four features a twin size bed with a trundle.

Head out back to the fenced back yard and enjoy the charcoal grill or have a soak in the hot tub after a long day of Big Bear fun! The back yard faces an unobstructed view of the beautiful forest. The hot tub is located in the gazebo for shade. Hop in, relax, and enjoy the view!

Whether you want to stay in, or get out and enjoy all the Big Bear activities, Willow Wonderland is the place for you! 

Features:  Wood Floors, Blu-Ray, Roku TV, Gas Range, Laundry, Game Room, Hot Tub, Fenced Yard, Deck, Forest Views, Near Snow Summit and Bear Mountain

name: Winterpark - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bonus Room: Twin over Full Bunk, Twin (Upper Level)

description:
Located between Snow Summit and Bear Mountain and just 2 blocks from the shuttles, this cabin is the perfect location for year round adventure in Big Bear!  This spacious 4000 sqft cabin sits on a 1/2 acre lot and has plenty of sleeping options, a game room and luxury finishes that will make your vacation memorable.

The open floor plan features cathedral ceilings with log accents, a river rock wood burning fireplace and plenty of windows to let in the natural light.  The living room has a wraparound sofa for comfortable seating in front of the large flat screen TV with cable.  Stay connected with complementary internet.  Mix up a drink at the wet bar, perfect for entertaining.  The kitchen has ample granite counter space for preparing a meal, gas stove top, double wall oven, dishwasher, microwave and small TV with cable access.  Down the hallway you will find a half bath, laundry room and the game room with pool table, Foosball table, pull-out sofa and TV with cable.  For grilling on the propane barbecue and a breath of fresh mountain air, head out to the back yard and patio.  Kids will love running around the fenced back yard or playing in the snow.

Three bedrooms are located down the main floor hallway.  The master suite has a king bed, wood burning fireplace, TV with cable, backyard access, and beautiful bathroom with jet tub, large shower with dual shower heads, double sinks and separate toilet room.  The second and third bedrooms each have king beds and share a Jack-and-Jill full bathroom.  Upstairs you will find more sleeping arrangements.  The landing has a futon for flexible lounging and sleeping.  A bonus room has multiple sleeping options including a twin over full bunk and twin bed. Bedroom 4 has a queen bed, bedroom 5 has a king and twin bed, and bedroom 6 has a queen bed. There is also a full bathroom for your convenience.

This cabin will surely provide the perfect place to make fond memories of time spent with family and friends in Big Bear!

Features: Close to Snow Summit/Bear Mountain, Wood Burning Fireplace, Propane Barbecue, Cable, Internet, Yard, Patio, Pool Table, Foosball Table, Granite Counters, Dishwasher, Microwave, Double Wall Oven, Gas Stove Top, Master Suite, Washer and Dryer, Central Heat, Towels and Linens Provided

name: 1 Sweet Retreat - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Come relax at this beautiful getaway on the North Shore of Big Bear Lake!  Conveniently located near hiking trails and grocery stores, 1 Sweet Retreat is the perfect  vacation spot for you and your loved ones! Hardwood floors run throughout this gorgeous home.  The kitchen, living and dining areas on the first floor feature an open floor plan. Perfect for entertaining or having those special family meals together. An indoor/outdoor dining area is conveniently located off  the living area and deck. Amazing sunset dining with easy access to the jacuzzi and grill! Beautiful views of our mountains are available throughout the home. Multi-level decks offer a choice of spectating spots for the best  of Big Bear's beautiful nature.

The main living area features cable TV, a gas fireplace, and is centrally located for easy access to the kitchen, dining and deck areas. The master bedroom is just off the living area and has a king sized bed as well as a darling day bed with a trundle. There is a Roku TV for all your entertainment needs and a lovely soaking tub for those relaxing nights.

Head upstairs for a game of Foosball! The game room features a sofa with a pull-out bed, a Roku TV and a deck perfect for having your morning cup of coffee. Off to each side of the game room are two bedrooms. Both beautifully decorated and each featuring queen beds and Roku TVs.

The fenced backyard offers a patio area and horseshoes, as well as beautiful plant life and views of the Stanfield Marsh Wildlife and Waterfowl Preserve. Enjoy taking a walk with friends and family to this beautiful and scenic boardwalk. Also nearby is the Alpine Pedal Path, a paved 3 mile stroller and bike friendly path along the lake. Great for jogging, cycling or walking and soaking up the gorgeous views of our lake!

Book your stay today at 1 Sweet Retreat!

Features: One Car Garage, Jacuzzi, Foosball Table, Multi-level Decks, Horseshoe Pit, Grill, Gas Range, Open Floor Plan, Hardwood Floors Throughout, Gas Fireplace, Washer and Dryer, Fenced Back Yard, Internet, Flat Screens Throughout, Towels and Linens Provided

name: 29 Pines - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Located on Metcalf Bay, 29 Pines is a charming multilevel home surrounded by mature pine trees and featuring fabulous lake views. This home is just a short walk to the lake with private access and close to Pleasure Point Marina.  Great restaurants and shops can be found on the main road and it's a quick, ten-minute drive to Big Bear Village. The lake views and excellent location are key reasons that 29 Pines is a wonderful place to spend your Big Bear vacation.

As you approach 29 Pines, you'll notice the inviting exterior design, which includes a brick chimney, green trim, and both the shutters and door painted in a cheerful cherry red.

Park your vehicle at the front door and walk up two steps to enter 29 Pines. As you enter the home, you'll see the open-floor-plan living space.

Wood is featured prominently in the living room, with its wood floors, wood paneled walls, and vaulted wood ceilings. The honey color of the wood and a large area rug make the living room an extra-cozy space. The wood-burning fireplace adds additional warmth and ambiance. Enjoy a large 64" smart tv in living room with streaming and bluray player. (Wi-Fi only. No cable.)

Whipping up a home-cooked meal and enjoying it with your friends and family is one of the best parts of a cabin rental vacation. The kitchen is located adjacent to the living room and in it you'll find all the basics needed to make a meal. Imagine starting the morning with the rich aroma of brewing coffee and a batch of blueberry pancakes? Or warming up after a day on the slopes with a hearty homemade lasagna? With its wood floors and white cabinets, the kitchen also includes a gas stove, coffee pot, microwave and dishwasher.

Between the kitchen and living room, you'll find the dining room, located just a few steps up from the main floor. The wood dining table seats eight. Additional seating for two can be found at a long bar-style table, which faces the dining area. The dining room has glass doors leading to a deck with patio furniture and a propane BBQ. Grill a steak and enjoy dinner in the fresh mountain air!  A full-size bathroom is also located on this level.

Getting sleepy? Walk downstairs to find 29 Pine's two bedrooms located on the lower level. The master bedroom has a king bed with lake views. The second bedroom features two full beds with forest views. The two bedrooms share a full bathroom that is located off the downstairs hallway. Both bedrooms have carpeting to keep your feet warm..

No one likes to do laundry while on vacation, but should the need arise, a stacked washer and dryer is located in the downstairs bathroom.

A mountain escape means putting down our electronic devices and enjoying time with family and friends. Board games and cards are a favorite group activity for all-ages. If you're looking for games, head up to the loft, which is accessible by the spiral staircase located in the main living area. Don't worry if you want to stay in the loop with the outside world while in Big Bear, 29 Pines has Wi-Fi. 

29 Pines is a delightful home with close proximity to the lake, making it an inviting accommodation for your Big Bear vacation.

Features: Wood-Burning Fireplace, Deck, Propane Grill, Wifi, Washer and Dryer, Board Game Room, Electric Stove, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Close to Lake with Private Access

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.

name: Above It All - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Located in beautiful Upper Moonridge, Above It All is your perfect home away from home! This two story beauty has a reverse floor plan and gorgeous views from the downstairs and upstairs balconies. The property also backs to the national forest providing easy access to hiking trails and offers plenty of room for snow play in the backyard. Equipped with all the amenities you and your group need for a great Big Bear getaway, Above It All is your ideal vacation spot!

Walk through the beautiful entry with stone tile flooring and a rustic wood staircase to the game room! It is equipped with bar seating for 4, table seating for 2, a love seat, and a pool table for some friendly competition! The game room also features a 65 inch flat screen TV with cable. Perfect for gathering around and watching the big game!  Just off the game room is the lower deck featuring a table with seating for 4, extra chairs and a ping pong table for even more outdoor fun!

Adjacent to the game room is a full bath complete with a tub and shower, dual sinks and granite countertops. Bedroom one features a queen size bed and a day bed with a trundle. Great for all your guests and kiddos! Bedroom two has a queen size bed and super cute fishing décor!  A full size washer and dryer is located in the hall near the entry for your convenience!

Head upstairs to an open floor plan featuring a living, dining, and kitchen area. The kitchen includes all the amenities you need for your family chef to whip up a nice dinner in! There are granite countertops throughout, an island with a gas range, a coffee maker, a microwave, a dishwasher, double ovens and a trash compactor. The kitchen opens up to the dining area which has seating for eight! Dine indoors or head out to the deck which includes two tables with a total of seating for 10! There is a propane grill for family barbecues and gorgeous views of the mountains! Perfect for spending quality family time in the great outdoors!

The living area has plenty of comfy seating for all to sit around and enjoy the fireplace for game night! Watch a movie or the game on the 65 inch smart TV  with a DVD player! Just down the hall, there is a powder room and a storage area with plenty of games for the whole family. Bedroom 3 features a queen size bed, and dresser for even more friends or family! Bedroom four is a large master with a king size bed, a smart TV with cable and private deck access with gorgeous views! The master bath has a jetted tub perfect for soaking after a long day of Big Bear activities! There is tile throughout, a large shower and granite countertops with dual sinks.

There is plenty of parking in the private driveway as well as access to the garage in this quiet Moonridge neighborhood. Come relax and feel at home at Above It All!

Features:  Private Drive, Mountain Views, WiFi, Full Size Washer and Dryer, Cable, Pool Table, Ping Pong Table, Multi-Level Decks, Propane Barbecue, Gas Range, Dual Ovens, Dishwasher, Coffee Maker, Microwave, Jetted Tub, Granite Countertops, Stone Tile Flooring, Carpeted Bedrooms, Linens & Towels Provided

name: Acorn Acres - Big Bear City, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: 3 Twin with TV w/ X-Box (Lower Level)

description:
Escape to your own oasis in the mountains, nestled among the trees  with all the comforts of home.  Just minutes from Bear Mountain,  conveniences and all that Big Bear has to offer.

Step into the welcoming great room with living room, kitchen and dining  area.  The living room is the perfect place to gather in front of the wood burning fireplace and TV with DirecTV.  Stay connected with complementary internet. A sofa and sleeper sofa provide comfortable seating and sleeping options for the whole family.

The dining area has table and chairs for six for a meal or fun game  night.  Outside on the upper back deck you can enjoy the fresh mountain  air, natural gas barbecue, tree views and seating.  The  smell of bacon cooking in the morning will have everyone gathering in  the kitchen.  Take advantage of the ample counter space for serving and  cooking.  Updated appliances include a gas range, microwave, dishwasher,  and coffee pot.

Just off the main living area is a 3/4 bathroom and two bedrooms, each  with a queen bed.  Downstairs on the lower level is a full bathroom and  two more bedrooms.  One bedroom has three twin beds and TV with X-Box, perfect for the kids or kid at heart.  The last bedroom has a king bed, gas fireplace, and access to the backyard.  A washer and dryer is available in this room for easy laundering.

Be sure to bring your friendly competitive spirit for a game of horseshoes in the backyard.  A variety of DVD's are available for your viewing pleasure.

Your family and friends will have plenty of new, fond memories to take home after your visit to Big Bear.

Features:  Wood & Gas Fireplace, Two Decks, Horseshoes, DirecTV,  Internet, Gas Barbecue, Tree Views, Updated Appliances, X-Box, Washer/Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided
address: 1362 La Cresenta Dr Big Bear City, 92314

name: A Cabin With A View - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Live the mountain cabin dream for your next Big Bear Lake vacation! A Cabin With a View is perfect for your next family getaway.  Spend your days on the back deck overlooking the slopes. After all, it's called A Cabin With a View for a good reason!  Fresh mountain air and sunshine await!

The updated cabin features a wood burning fireplace, comfortable sofas, large flat screen TV with cable and Blu-Ray player, a Foosball table, and plenty of board games, movies and books. Step out to the back deck for grilling on the charcoal barbecue or hanging out under the mature pine trees.  The updated kitchen has stainless steel appliances including a gas stove, dishwasher, microwave, coffee pot and table for sharing a meal.  A full bathroom and stacked washer and dryer are also on the main level.

Upstairs you will find the two bedrooms, both with queen beds, great windows and TVs. A 3/4 bath is also upstairs for your convenience with an additional bath tub provided.

Features: Mountain and Slope Views, Updated Kitchen, Stainless Steel Appliances, Internet, Foosball Table, Wood Burning Fireplace, Charcoal Barbecue, Flat Screen TV, Cable, Play Station, Deck, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, updated kitchen appliances.

name: 4 Seasons Cabin - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Winter, spring, summer or fall...any time of year is the perfect time to spend your vacation in Big Bear Lake at 4 Seasons Cabin!  This charming cabin boasts original rustic elements with comfortable upgrades for a fabulous stay.

As you enter 4 Seasons Cabin, you can hang your snow skis and all your gear on the custom ski racks built to hang five sets of skis.

The fully fenced private back yard is sure to be the highlight of your stay with a beautifully landscaped yard with elevated terrace that houses the pine gazebo-covered hot tub that can be enjoyed rain, snow, and shine. Enjoy home-cooked grilled meals  with the and charcoal barbecue.  The large covered patio with seating right outside the back entrance can be enjoyed watching the snow fall and the rain and is perfect for mornings and evenings spent reminiscing with family and friends.

Inside you will love the warm and cozy atmosphere of the living room with wood burning fireplace, sofa and large flat screen TV with Netflix, YouTube and other apps, cable and Blue Ray DVD player.  The fully equipped kitchen is just steps away with sightlines to the living room.  Appliances include gas range, toaster oven, coffee pot, microwave, and ample counter space.  The dining area has plenty of seating for everyone.  Down a short hallway is a full bath and bedroom with a queen bed. Upstairs is the master bedroom with a queen bed and private 3/4 bathroom.

This cabin will have you coming back to Big Bear again and again!

Important: Dear Traveler, you will be charged with USD 200 in case you include a Pet in your reservation as a Refundable Damage Deposit for Pets.

Features:  Ski Racks, Gazebo Covered Hot Tub, Charcoal Barbecue, Private Fenced Yard, Close to Walk to Marina, Village and Boulder Bay, Cable, Two Flat Gravel Driveways, Covered Patio, Fully Equipped Kitchen, Gas Range, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Adventure Point - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: 3 Twin over Twin Bunks with TV (Upper Level)

description:
This sits just steps away from the base of Snow Summit Resort! You can walk to the chair lift in under four minutes! This is a perfect location.

This newer town home has flat screen TVs throughout the cabin, with cable. Wood burning fireplace in the living area and Foosball table. The kitchen and dining room open up to the living room so everyone can enjoy each others company. The inviting kitchen has new appliances, dishwasher and gas stove. There is a laundry room off the kitchen next to the two car garage.

In the master bedroom located upstairs, you can relax in the Jetted tub, or read a book in the comfortable lounge chairs in front of the Wood Burning Fireplace. There is a deck located off the Master bedroom.

Features: Fully Stocked Kitchen, Linens and Towels Provided, Off Street Parking, Electric BBQ, Foosball Table, Flat Screens TV's, Walk to Snow Summit Resort, Jacuzzi Jet Tub in the Master, Internet, Washer, Dryer, Gated for Security

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes.

name: All Seasons - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: Queen and Twin over Twin Bunk with Bathroom (Lower Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 5: King, Queen with Bathroom, Fireplace (Upper Level)

description:
This five bedroom, five bathroom two story cabin is the perfect gathering space for friends and family! The home features a fourteen seat movie theater with stadium seating and 3D capabilities for entertainment delight. Challenge each other to a game of pool while you marvel at the lake vistas or watch a sports game on TV. Other guests can socialize by the fireplace or play a game of Foosball and air hockey.

You won't be far from the group while you prepare meals in the open kitchen that has a gas stove, dishwasher, refrigerator, microwave, coffee pot and plenty of counter space. The dining area has lots of seating with easy deck access for grilling on the propane barbecue and features multiple levels with lake views and private tree surroundings. The sunken living room area has comfortable couches and extra dining space. The large windows overlooking the trees, cathedral ceiling and wood stove really makes the cabin experience complete. A flat screen TV swivels between the dining and living areas so you can watch all your favorite shows on DirecTV. The house also features internet with Wi-Fi access.

The main level has three bedrooms and two bathrooms. The bedroom off the living area has a queen bed and gorgeous, private tree views. Another bedroom has a queen bed and twin bunk beds with attached bathroom.  One more private room offers sleeping or lounging on day bed with optional trundle bed so all guests can sleep comfortably on vacation.

The upstairs level has two large bedrooms with on-suite bathrooms and amazing views of the trees. Feel like you are in your own private tree-top villa in the expansive master bedroom with on-suite bathroom with double sinks. Rest comfortably in one of the queen beds and watch the flat screen TV. The second upstairs bedroom has one king and one queen bed, a private deck with mountain ski slope views, a gas/wood burning fireplace and on-suite bathroom.

Soak in the large hot tub while gazing out at the mountains and ski slope any time of year.

Features: Direct TV, Flat Screen TV, Movie Theater with 3D, Internet, Fireplaces, Spa, Mountain Views, Lake Views, Pool Table, Foosball Table, Air Hockey Table, Barbeque, Washer & Dryer, Decks, Dishwasher, Gas Stove

Note: No hot tub use after 8:00pm. Due to city ordinance, use will be strictly enforced and tenants in violation will be subject to eviction and fines. DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations. Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few dated features or appliances. It is not a luxury cabin.

name: 7th Heaven - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Suite 1: King, Gas Fireplace, TV w/Cable, Private 3/4 Bath (Entry Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 2: Queen, TV w/Cable, Bathroom Access (Entry Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 3: Twin over Full Bunk, Full over Full Bunk, Private Full Bath (Entry Level)
arrangements.Master Suite 2: King, Gas Fireplace, TV w/Cable, Private Full Bath (Upper Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 6: Full Over Queen Bunk, TV w/Cable, Bathroom Access (Upper Level)

description:
You'll be in 7th Heaven at this custom built, log style home across the street from Big Bear Lake and just a 3 minute walk to Big Bear Marina and 10 minute walk to the Village!  Vacation in luxury right where you want to be!

The lovely covered porch greets you with a cool breeze off the water and lake views.  Step inside to the entry level sitting room with gas fireplace and pool table for evening entertainment.  The entry level also has three bedrooms and the laundry room.  The first master suite has a king bed, gas fireplace, large TV with cable, peek-a-boo lake views and a private 3/4 bathroom.  The second bedroom has a queen bed, access to the full hallway bathroom, and a TV with cable.  The third bedroom has a twin over full bunk and full over full bunk, a beautiful private full bathroom and lake views.

Upstairs is the great room that welcomes you with mountain cabin decor, knotty pine ceiling and log accents, and views of the lake.  The living area has rich leather sofas in front of the wood burning fireplace and large flat screen TV with cable.  The kitchen opens up to the space with breakfast bar seating and a dining area.  Enjoy the convenience of the expansive granite counters, gas stove top, double wall oven, microwave, dishwasher, traditional coffee pot and Keurig machine, and wine fridge.  The deck is sure to become a favorite hangout spot with the gas grill and lake views.

There are three more bedrooms on the upper level.  The second master suite boasts lake views, a king bed, TV with cable, and a private full bathroom.  Soak away all your stress in the tub while enjoying the gas fireplace.  Bedroom 5 has a queen bed, and bedroom 6 has a full over queen bunk bed, TV with cable and access to the full hallway bathroom.

This fabulous cabin will have your family asking to stay more days!  Heaven awaits you in Big Bear!

Note: This cabin has stairs leading up to the front door.  No ground level access.  No Garage parking.

Features: Walking Distance to Lake and Village, Lake Views, Flat Parking, Pool Table, Gas Fireplaces, Wood Burning Fireplace, Cable, Internet, Granite Counters, Gas Stove Top, Double Oven, Coffee Pot, Keurig, Dishwasher, Microwave, Wine Fridge, Gas Barbecue, Ceiling Fans, Carpet, Wood Floors, Central Heat, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: 3 Sisters Lodge - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Full over Full Bunk and Queen (Upper Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 5: Two Sets of bunks Twin over Queen, Full (Upper Level)

description:
3 Sisters Lodge is nestled at the end of a cul-de-sac in the quiet neighborhood of Fox Farm. As you walk up to the home, you'll be greeted by a friendly bear statue and you'll discover cute bird feeders hanging from the trees. There is a short set of stairs to the front door, but adjacent to the stairs, you'll also find a mobility ramp.

Immediately upon entering the home, you'll notice the wildlife and mountain theme that is carried throughout the entire cabin. Turn left from the entry hall to enter the living room. Cozy is the key-word to describe this living room. It features comfortable leather sofas, a wood-burning fireplace, and a thoughtful basket of plush blankets to keep you warm. Lack of entertainment options will never be an issue at 3 Sisters Lodge. The living room comes stocked with board games for all ages. Watch your favorite movies on the flat-screen television that includes HDTV and DVD player.

To the left of the living room, you'll find a game room with a Foosball table and shuffleboard. Sit at the high-top bar table and enjoy a drink, while waiting for your turn to play.

Next to the living room, on the opposite side of the game room, you'll find the dining room. Enjoying a meal together in your cabin is one of the highlights of a family vacation and at 3 Sisters Lodge, you'll find a beautiful wood dining table, with two long benches and chairs at the heads. The dining table can seat eight. For another fun seating option, one that kids always love, you'll find three stools at the kitchen breakfast bar, located adjacent to the dining room.

In the kitchen, you'll find all the basics to whip up a home-cooked meal. Imagine making a batch of warm chocolate chip cookies on a snowy afternoon or perhaps a hearty spaghetti dinner to fuel your family after a day on the slopes. Kitchen features include: Microwave, coffee pot, dishwasher, and toaster oven.

No one wants to do laundry while on vacation, but should the need arise, a side-by-side washer and dryer set is located in the hall next to the kitchen.

Access to the backyard is available through a slider in the dining room and the hallway next to washer and dryer. The fenced backyard has a wood deck and a concrete surface around the side of the house. Grill up a meal on the charcoal BBQ. Enjoy fresh mountain air while relaxing in the hot tub and at night, look up to see the spectacular star display that you can't see in the city!

3 Sisters Lodge has five bedrooms and four bathrooms!

The first bedroom is located in the corner between the living and dining rooms. This room has a queen  bed and en suite bathroom. The bathroom has a shower with a flat entry, making it easy for older guests or guests with mobility issues. This bedroom has a ceiling fan and views of the backyard.

When you walk through the front entry hall of the house, you'll see two short sets of stairs to the right. The stairs leading down, will take you to the second bedroom and full bathroom. The bathroom and bedroom are not connected, but they are the only rooms located on this staircase, providing a sense of privacy. This bedroom includes a king bed, flat-screen television with HDTV, a ceiling fan, and views of the backyard.

The upstairs level has three bedrooms and two full bathrooms. The third and forth bedrooms share the full bathroom in the hall.

The third bedroom is the kid's zone. It features a full over full bunk bed (note: this bunk is for small children only) and separate queen size bed. This room features backyard views and has cute, ski themed decor. This room also includes a ceiling fan.

Fishing, a favorite lake activity, is the theme for the fourth bedroom, that includes a queen bed, backyard views, and a ceiling fan.

The fifth bedroom includes two large set of bunk beds with twin over queen mattresses. Access a small balcony with views of the front yard from a slider in this bedroom. Stay entertained with a flat-screen television, DVD player, and HDTV. This room includes an en suite full bathroom with double sinks.

Additional sleeping space can be found on the pull-out sleeper sofa in the living room.

With all of this space, don't forget Rover! 3 Sisters Lodge is a pet-friendly cabin and has a fenced backyard. 3 Sisters Lodge is the perfect home for the entire family and a great place to make wonderful Big Bear memories!

Features: Charcoal BBQ, Wood-Burning Fireplace, Hot Tub, Foosball, Shuffle Board, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Toaster Oven, Deck, HDTV, DVD Player, Pet-Friendly, Fenced Yard, Accessibility Ramp

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.
address: 429 Crater Lake Road Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: Alpine Get-A-Way - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Twin over Full Bunk and Twin (Lower Level)

description:
Spend your Alpine-Get-Away at this three bedroom, two bath home that is walking distance to Meadow Park and Big Bear Lake (approximately ten minutes). Centrally located in town, this cabin is easy drive to Snow Summit Resort and the Village.  Swim Beach is also located at Meadow Park and is great for playing in the lake during summer months.

The kitchen, dining, and living room share an open floor plan, giving plenty of space for your family gathering. The fully equipped kitchen has a dishwasher and bar, providing a great cooking area with all the needed amenities. In the family room, you can warm up by the wood burning fireplace while taking in the mountain skies through the large windows throughout. Watch a movie on the flat screen TV or enjoy cable and internet.

Offering privacy, the bedrooms are located on separate levels. The master is on the upper level with a king bed, private half bath and a flat screen TV. The guest rooms are on the lower level. Extra sleeping arrangements are offered with a pull out couch in the family room. The lower level bedrooms share a full bath with a whirlpool bathtub and laundry use.

Alpine-Get-Away has fun to offer the whole family. Play a game of shuffleboard or bumper pool with a mini bowling option. Enjoy a game of horse shoes in the front yard or parents will love the fenced backyard for the kids to run around. Both yards are beautifully treed with fruits and pines. Have a barbeque on the propane grill on the spacious back deck. There is garage use with parking for two as well as additional parking for two out front or for a boat.

Features: Close to Everything, Cable, Internet, Flat Screen TVs, Bumper Pool, Shuffleboard, Horse Shoes, Fenced, Parking, Dishwasher, Laundry

This property is perfect for the guest who is looking for a cabin rental that won't break the bank. Generally simple decor and filled with basic furnishings and amenities that will meet most of your needs for an enjoyable vacation.

name: Alpenglow Chateau - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
If you’re looking for the perfect family Big Bear getaway, Alpenglow Chateau is ideal for you and your group! It has all the amenities you would ever hope for and even more! This two-story, centrally located home is equipped with all you’d ever want for fun, entertainment, relaxation, and comfort. It truly is a home away from home and waiting for you to have your best Big Bear experience!

Enter into the home and immediately feel welcomed by the comfy living area with large leather couches, fireplace, and large flat screen TV with surround sound. This room is perfect for catching the big game or having quality family time! It is equipped with everything you could want for entertainment including a Blu-ray player, stereo, controls to the game room stereo system and more! Head into the next room to an open floor plan featuring the kitchen, dining area, and a lounging area equipped with a large flat screen TV, a large leather couch and a pool table for a little friendly competition! There is also a closet full of board games. The kitchen is equipped with all you need for those perfect nights cooking in. It has tile floors and bar seating for four, as well as an island. Gather round and help the family chef whip up breakfast for the whole gang! The dining area has seating for up to eight people and is perfect for sit down dinners with friends and family.  There is also room to add on the dining table for additional seating.

Head outside for a soak in the hot tub or dine al fresco at the patio table with an umbrella with seating for six! There is a large fenced yard for privacy as well as a propane grill for barbecues!

Enjoy the convenience of having a TV in every bedroom equipped with cable and a Roku for easy streaming of your Netflix or Hulu accounts, 7 in total throughout the home. The first level also features two bedrooms, a full bath, and a laundry room complete with a full size washer and dryer and storage for your convenience! The first bedroom has a queen size bed with a beautiful wooden frame as well as a flat screen TV and carpeted floors. Great for privacy for your guests or family members!  The second bedroom features a queen size bed as well as a twin size day bed with a trundle bed. There’s also a flat screen TV to enjoy a movie night in!

Head upstairs for a fun game of Foosball in the game area overlooking the living area! The second level also features the enormous master bedroom including a king size bed, a private living area with a gas fireplace, private deck access and a large master bath. There is a large flat screen TV with cable and a Roku for your perfect, private, movie night!  Enjoy a soak in the large, luxurious tub or have a steam in the shower after a long day of Big Bear fun! This home really has it all!

The second level also features two more bedrooms and a full bath. The first bedroom has a king size bed in a gorgeous wood frame and a flat screen TV. The second bedroom has two queen size beds and a twin day bed with a trundle as well as a flat screen TV! Great for all of your family members, friends, including all the little ones!

With its central location in the beautiful Fox Farm area, Alpenglow Chateau is the ideal location for you and your entire group to enjoy all that Big Bear has to offer! From entertainment to relaxation, this the ideal vacation home for you!

DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

Features: Centrally Located, TV's with Cable and Roku in Every Bedroom, Blu-Ray Player, Surround Sound, Private Deck, Hot Tub, Board Games, Foosball Table, Pool Table, Gas Range, Wood Floors, Carpeted Floors, Full Size Washer & Dryer, Large Yard, Cable, WiFi

name: Allendale - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Discover paradise in the mountains at this tranquil hideaway surrounded by mature pine trees on the over sized lot.  Multiple outdoor lounge areas let you choose your place of peace. The cabin boasts a feeling of seclusion while being only a short drive to everything Big Bear has to offer, including Bear Mountain and Snow Summit.

Enjoy the mountain and tree views from the open living room with wood burning fireplace or watch a show on the flat screen TV with cable. Feel like you are sharing a meal outdoors in the adjoining dining room with large windows overlooking the backyard. The open kitchen has plenty of counter space and all the basic conveniences for cooking a meal including gas stove, microwave, dishwasher and bar seating. Step out to the back patio where you will find the gas barbeque, table and chairs and hot tub that is perfect after a day on the slopes.

Off the main living area you will find a full bathroom with tub/shower combo and two bedrooms.  The first bedroom has a queen bed with beautiful log headboard. The second bedroom has two full beds.

Be sure to admire the beautiful log craftsmanship of the staircase on your way to the upper level.  Upstairs is the huge family room with floor to ceiling windows, wood burning fireplace, spacious sofa with seating for everyone to watch the large flat screen TV with cable and Blue Ray, perfect for movie night. Through a small hallway you will find a full bathroom with tub/shower combo.  The third bedroom has a king bed and ceiling fan.  The fourth bedroom has a queen bed.

This is a great family cabin for any time of year.  Memories are sure to be made at Allendale!

address: 469 Santa Clara Boulevard Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: Altitude Adjustment - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Twin over Twin Bunk,  Queen and Twin.

description:
Located in the desirable neighborhood of Upper Moonridge, Altitude Adjustment is the perfect cabin rental for a family vacation. The entrance to this reverse floor plan home is up a short set of stairs that lead to a large deck.

Before you walk through the doors, turn around to admire the clear views of Big Bear Lake and a peek-a-boo view of the Bear Mountain Ski Resort! The ski slopes are just a short drive from Altitude Adjustment and beautiful pine trees scatter the neighborhood. A wood bench on the front porch is the perfect place to enjoy these beautiful views, including a view of the Lake.

Enter the home to find yourself in the open-floor-plan living area with wood-paneled walls and cathedral ceilings. Curl up on the plush sofa and get warm in front of the wood-burning fireplace. The living room includes a small flat-screen smart television but it is not the primary entertainment center of the home. This space is best used for relaxing with a book or playing board games with your family.

Cute decorative touches included wooden ducks and an ornamental vintage, cast-iron stove.

One of the best parts of staying in a rental cabin is the ability to whip up a home-cooked meal. Imagine starting the morning with a gooey batch of chocolate chip pancakes and filling the cabin with the aroma of freshly brewed coffee? Or perhaps a hearty lasagna to enjoy after a day on the slopes? The kitchen is stocked with all the basics that you'll need to create a fabulous meal. Kitchen features include: microwave, gas stove, kitchen island, toaster oven, and coffee pot. Serve your meal at the four-person dining table, located right next to the kitchen.

Need to do a load of laundry? A side-by-side washer and dryer is located in a room adjacent to the dining area.

Walk through the laundry room and outside to the back yard. The concrete deck hosts a charcoal BBQ, a patio table with four chairs, and four additional chairs. Grill up a steak and enjoy your dinner while taking in the fresh mountain air. The backyard features views of the forest with many mature trees.

Altitude Adjustment offers the choice of three bedrooms, with the first two located on the main living level, just off of the living room. The master bedroom features a king bed and large dresser. It has two windows that allow plenty of natural light and views of the backyard. The second bedroom has a queen bed with two large windows that provide peek-a-boo views of the mountains.

The two upper level bedrooms and main living space share a 3/4 bathroom located near the bedrooms.

For fun and entertainment, head downstairs to the game room. Have a friendly game of pool, Foosball, or ping-pong! The flat-screen television is perfect for a movie night. Search through the collection of family-friendly DVDs and find your favorite movie. Smart tv and wifi will give you additional internet access. In the game room, you'll discover many other games, sleds, and sports equipment. Sliding doors allow access to the lower level of the front of the house.

The third bedroom, located adjacent to the game room, is one that the kids will love. Decorated with animal-themed bedding, it includes a bunk bed with twin mattresses, a queen bed, and a twin bed. This bedroom also includes a full en suite bathroom.

Altitude Adjustment is the perfect cabin for a large family or two families vacationing together. It's filled with kid-friendly amenities and its located close to both the Bear Mountain Ski Resort and the Moonridge Zoo. It is just a short, ten minute drive from shops, restaurants, and the lake. Looking for a cozy, mountain-style cabin with beautiful views? Look no further than Altitude Adjustment!

Features: Lake view, Mountain views, Foosball, Pool, Ping-Pong, DVD Player, Smart TV, WiFi, Game Room, Charcoal BBQ, Microwave, Gas Stove, Coffee Pot, Toaster Oven, Sleds, Washer and Dryer.

This property is perfect for the guest who is looking for a cabin rental that won't break the bank. Generally simple decor and filled with basic furnishings and amenities that will meet most of your needs for an enjoyable vacation.

name: Angels Camp - Big Bear City, CA
description:
If you are looking to get away to a quiet neighborhood then consider Angels Camp, a beautiful, log-style cabin with luxury finishes and custom woodwork throughout.  This 5 bedroom 3 bath home has plenty of room for family and friends with a warm and cozy feel.

The living room, dining area and kitchen share the great room which features cathedral ceilings, a floor to ceiling wall of windows overlooking the mature trees, hardwood floors and a gas fireplace with custom bear carvings on the mantle.  The oversize sofa centers around the flat screen TV with cable and DVD player.  The dining area shares the same great view and has access to the large front deck.  The kitchen has all the desired amenities with granite counters, custom cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, gas range, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot.

Down the main floor hallway is a full bath and two bedrooms.  One bedroom has a queen bed, and the other bedroom has a twin with twin trundle and TV with cable and DVD player.

The upper level features a large master suite with a king and queen log style bed, TV with cable and a DVD player, and beautiful bathroom with double sinks and separate room with jet tub, shower and toilet.  Across the hallway is a 3/4 bathroom with large shower, laundry room, and two more bedrooms.  One bedroom has a queen and a full bed, and the last bedroom has two queen beds.

This cabin has the space you are looking for with the cabin-in-the-mountains feel that will make your Big Bear Lake vacation a dream come true!
Note: No Barbecue

Features: Quiet Neighborhood, Custom Wood Work, Wood Floors, Gas Fireplace, Yard, Flat Parking, Luxury Finishes, Cable, Internet, DVD, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Range,  Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Granite Counters, Ceiling Fans, Central Heat, Carpet in Bedrooms, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This is a luxury property which includes the finest furnishings, luxury building materials, and a highly consistent design theme. Luxury properties range from elegant and formal to relaxed and chic, but all appeal to guests who appreciate first-class accommodations with a designer flair.
address: 1725 Angels Camp Road Big Bear City, 92314

name: Aspen Forest - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Perfect for a year round getaway!  Located across from the National Forest and just 7 minute walk from Skyline and 2N10 trailheads for hiking and mountain biking, and is at the base of Bear Mountain Ski Resort, the Zoo and golf course.  This three bedroom, one bathroom house is perfect for families and friends looking for a mountain getaway.

The cabin features two beautiful decks with a smaller deck off the master bedroom and a main deck with table seating to relax and view the stars after a fun day at the lake or on the slopes. On the main deck you are able to grill out using the propane barbeque while enjoying the forest and peek-a-boo lake views. Also, take advantage of the brand new two to three person sauna! The traditional steam  sauna features rocks and water that is also very eco-freindly, only  using electricity when occupied!

The open floor plan allows for the living room, dining area and kitchen to all open up to one another with high vaulted ceilings. The main level has comfortable seating in the living room with wood burning fireplace and large flat screen TV with Amazon TV featuring free On Demand movies, TV shows and live TV apps. The kitchen has all the basic necessities with gas stove, dishwasher, microwave and a coffee pot. A full bathroom is conveniently located on the main level.  Separate from the main living area are two bedrooms with queen beds, one with separate access to the deck overlooking the forest.

Upstairs, you can play a game of Foosball, enjoy watching TV on the large flat screen with a DVD player while relaxing comfortably in the queen size bed or on lounge chairs.

Features: Close To Bear Mountain, Sauna, Amazon TV, Internet, DVD Players, Wood Burning Fireplace, Propane Barbeque, Foosball Table, Deck, Forest Views, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Dishwasher, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided.

Note: ALWAYS carry chains in the winter months.  Cabin is located in a fairly steep area, that lends to its mountain charm.
This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few dated features or appliances.

name: Bear Hug Hideaway - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: Twin over Full Bunk and Queen (Upper Level)

description:
"Warm and cozy" describes this log cabin located close to Bear Mountain and Snow Summit Resort. Just a 10 minute walk to the ski shuttle and restaurants in Moonridge.  Enjoy warming up in the hot tub after a day on the mountain!

This cabin is ideally located with no hills and flat parking for four cars. It is perfect for smaller boat parking during the summer and convenient during the winter snowy months. A main level bedroom with nearby bathroom are great for guests looking for minimal stairs.

The open living and dining room boasts views of Bear Mountain Resort with a small chess game table in front of the huge picture window across from the large native rock wood burning fireplace that completes the nostalgic cabin decor.  A large dining table features a cabin inspired antler chandelier with easy access to the spacious kitchen with dishwasher.  A washer and dryer are available for your convenience.  Step out onto the back deck with barbeque grill and lots of seating under the mature trees.

This cabin is perfect for couples, families and singles, as well as the elderly with just a few steps to enter the main level, bedroom and bathroom.  The upstairs has a bathroom and two bedrooms with plenty of sleeping for everyone.

Downstairs the family will surely enjoy playing bumper pool or Foosball in the large game room/family room while you cozy up next to another warm wood burning fireplace.

name: Autumn Bliss - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Find your bliss in the mountains at this beautiful log style cabin located in the upper Moonridge area of Big Bear Lake.  Enjoy tree, mountain and slope views from the two large decks, soak in the oversize hot tub or spend some quality time with family and friends in the open and airy great room.  Just minutes from Bear Mountain and everything Big Bear has to offer.

This reverse floor plan features three bedrooms, a full bathroom and laundry on the entry level.  The master bedroom has a log style king bed, full bathroom with double sinks and private deck off the back of the house. Bedroom 2 has two twin over twin bunk beds, and bedroom 3 has a queen bed.

The family is sure to love the upstairs living area.  The living room has a gas corner fireplace, perfect for getting cozy on a chilly winter night.  Enjoy Wi-Fi internet and AppleTV on the flat screen, or put on your favorite DVD.  The expansive kitchen features granite counters, gas stove, microwave, coffee pot and dishwasher.  The dining table is perfect for a family meal or game night with extra seating at the breakfast bar.  Hours are sure to be spent playing a game of pool. A half bathroom is available on the upper level for your convenience.

Spending time on the two large decks is sure to be a highlight of your stay.  The front deck has views of the mountain, slopes and trees.  Spend the afternoon grilling on the gas barbeque and having lunch at the table and chairs.  The back deck has more beautiful tree views and an oversize hot tub, perfect for soaking in under the stars.

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Bear Meadows Retreat - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Walk to Bear Mountain Resort!

A golfer's dream! This two bedroom, two story town home is located in Bear Meadows right on the golf course overlooking the ninth hole. Easy walking distance to Bear Mountain Golf and Ski Resort and the Moonridge Zoo.

The entry level has both bedrooms, one with a queen be and one with two twins.  Both bedrooms have full bathroom, and access to the lower patio overlooking the t-box.  A washer and dryer are also on this level.

Upstairs is the main living area and a half bathroom.  The living room focuses around the gas fireplace and TV with cable and DVD player.  The dining area has plenty of seating with additional seating at the counter.  The kitchen is stocked with all the basics and includes a gas range, microwave, dishwasher, and coffee pot.  Step out to the covered deck for grilling on the propane barbecue while you watch the golfers down below or winter sports in the distance.

Get out and enjoy the town with a short drive to the lake and the Village.

Book this one and "Bear House" for larger parties, up to 12 people, located just next door to this condo.

arrangements.Master Suite: King, Full Bath, Lake Views (Lower Level)
arrangements.Family Room: Twin over Full Bunk, Twin over Twin Bunk (Lower Level)

description:
Enjoy time spent near the lake at Bayview Lane Splendor!  You will love the view of Boulder Bay while you relax on the multi-level deck, grill on the propane barbecue, or sit inside by the cozy fireplace.

The reverse floor plan features a living room with a comfortable sofa and plenty of space for everyone in front of the flat screen TV with cable, blu-ray player, and wood burning fireplace.  There is a large selection of movies and games to keep the family entertained!  The dining room features a log table with room for everyone.  The kitchen is stocked with all the basics and includes a gas range, microwave, coffee pot and dishwasher.  Step out to the back deck where you can relax or dine overlooking the bay.

Off the hallway is a full bathroom and the first bedroom with a queen bed.  Downstairs you will find the family room with card table, darts, access to the lower deck, and half bathroom with stacked washer and dryer.  Flexible sleeping arrangements can be made on the twin over full bunk or twin over twin bunk.  The master suite is your own private oasis overlooking the lake and mountains beyond with king bed, TV with cable and Blu-Ray, full bathroom and access to the lower deck.

Your weekend getaway in Big Bear is sure to be memorable in this classic cabin by the lake!

name: Azure Woods Escape - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Queen, TV w Cable, DVD (Upper Level)

description:
Enjoy the mountains in this beautifully updated cabin with a modern twist!  Just a short drive from Bear Mountain, grocery stores, restaurants and conveniences.  It features wood-look tile floors throughout, fenced yard for the kids, air hockey table and more!

This two story updated cabin is located in the coveted and peaceful neighborhood of Fox Farm in Big Bear Lake.  It's set back from the street and surrounded by mature trees.  The entry level has the main living room and features a wood burning fireplace, flat screen TV with cable , comfortable sofa and love seat.  Kids and adults alike will have fun playing air hockey on the table just around the corner.  A washer and dryer is available for your convenience.  Two bedrooms and a full bathroom are also on this level.  Bedroom one has a queen bed and TV with cable.  Bedroom two has a twin over queen log bunk bed.

Upstairs you will find the kitchen, dining area and family room.  The kitchen has ample counter space and is stocked with all the basics for preparing a meal.  Enjoy the conveniences of a gas range, microwave, dishwasher, and coffee pot.  A small table is perfect for sharing a cup of coffee over a good conversation.  Step out to the deck for grilling on the propane barbecue (not pictured) and a breath of fresh mountain air.  Back inside you can all sit down to a family meal or game night at the large table in front of the wood burning fireplace.  The family room has sofa seating in front of the large flat screen TV with cable, DVD/Blu-Ray player and Atari game console.  You can step out to the front deck from here as well.

The upper level has a full bathroom and two more bedrooms.  Bedroom three has a queen bed and TV with cable and DVD player.  Bedroom four has a queen over twin log bunk bed.

This cabin is sure to be a family favorite for your next trip to Big Bear Lake!
