name: Bear Mountain Horizon - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Enjoy the mountains during your stay at Bear Mountain Horizon!  This 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom cabin is located in the upper Moonridge neighborhood of Big Bear on a nice treed lot, close to Bear Mountain with peek-a-boo views of the slopes.

The cabin has beautiful knotty pine wood accents throughout.  The living room is comfortable with plenty of seating in front of the stove style wood burning fireplace with river rock surround.  Enjoy watching a movie on the flat screen TV with cable and Blu-Ray player.  The kitchen and dining room are right around the corner.  The kitchen is stocked with all the basics and includes a gas stove, microwave, dishwasher, coffee pot and breakfast bar seating.  The dining room is sure to be an enjoyable space for a family meal or game night.  Step out to the backyard to enjoy the fresh air on the back deck. Grill up your favorites on the gas barbecue or relax in the hot tub located in a covered gazebo for year round enjoyment!

Two bedrooms are located on the main level.  Bedroom one has a queen bed and TV with cable and DVD player. Bedroom two has a queen bed and private full bathroom.  A full bathroom is also on this level just off the kitchen.

Head upstairs for a fun and entertaining evening in the game room with pool table and wet bar.  A gas fireplace is sure to add the perfect ambiance after a day full of adventure.  Two pull-out sofas offer lounging and sleeping options.  The third bedroom is on the upper level and includes a queen bed. A full bathroom and a washer and dryer are available for your use.

name: Bear Escapes - Big Bear City, CA

arrangements.Master Bedroom: Queen and Twin with Private Bathroom and Fireplace (Entry Level)

description:
Looking for that perfect escape?  Come relax and have fun at Bear Escapes!  This 4 bedroom, 3 bath home has been tastefully remodeled and decorated and is located in the Peter Pan neighborhood of Big Bear City on the northern shore of Big Bear Lake, just minutes from everything.

Enjoy the ski slope views of Snow Summit Ski Resort while relaxing on the front deck smelling the pine trees and quiet surroundings and peacefulness that our local mountain resort has to offer.  Share those priceless memories with the family while playing games like pool or ping pong in the fun game room and cook a great dinner in the fully remodeled kitchen with granite countertops, gas stove, and gas barbeque right off the rear deck.  Light a fire, tell stories and spend real quality time in a very special place that feels so good to just be there.  For the ultimate in relaxation, soak in the hot tub  in the yard, fully enclosed by a 6' fence.

Come to Bear Escapes and experience everything that Big Bear has to offer. If you are looking for an area of town with tree lined streets, a few peek-a-boo mountain views and a lovely, small neighborhood feel, then Bear Escapes might just be the place. Located on the north side of town the area has easy access to the north shore and Big Bear City. It is just a short drive to both Bear Mountain and Snow Summit ski resorts, as well as the Village, Big Bear Lake, the many trails in the National Forest, restaurants, shopping, and all the fun outdoor activities available.

This is truly a place where memories are made.

description:
Welcome to Bear Necessities, located close to everything you would want to do in Big Bear. In less than six minutes, you will be at Big Bear Lake, the Village, Big Bear City for antique shopping or Snow Summit Resort for skiing in Winter or the sky chair in Summer. This comfortable reverse floor plan home is located in a quiet neighborhood and features four bedrooms with a game room and hot tub. The backyard is very large and fenced in, perfect for kids and pets (some restrictions).

arrangements.Bedroom 7: Twin and Twin over Full Bunk (Lower Level)

description:
Absolutely no pets at this home!

Welcome to this stately, Victorian-styled home located in Evergreen Estates,  just a short minute walk to the shuttles for Snow Summit and Bear Mountain Resort! This beautiful home offers so much for all ages. Enjoy cooking in the gourmet kitchen while laughing with friends in the large formal dining room.

This open floor plan allows you to enjoy each others' company from several rooms in the house.  Just off the entry way is the sitting room with wood burning fireplace, seating and TV with cable. French doors open to an outdoor entertaining area that is cozy and relaxing with an outdoor gas fireplace and outdoor hot tub, perfect for sitting under the stars.  Just beyond the sitting room you will find the great room with living room and kitchen.  The living room area has plenty of seating with French doors leading out to the back deck.  The gourmet kitchen features ample granite counter space, bar seating, dishwasher, microwave, coffee pot and large professional gas range. The nearby formal dining room will make holiday meals memorable.

The upper level of the home is where five of the seven bedrooms are located, giving you and your guests privacy.  The spacious master suite has it's own fireplace, king bed, and private full bathroom with large tub. A second master suite has a king bed and bathroom.  Three more bedrooms each have a queen bed, and one has a queen and twin.  The lower level offers an exquisite game room including a pool table, television and bar area. Two more bedrooms offer additional sleeping space.  One bedroom has a queen and twin, while the other bedroom has a twin and twin over full bunk.

Note: There is no bathroom located on the lower level. Ice maker does not work. Do not use any wood in the outdoor gas fireplace. The garage and its bathroom are not available to guests. There is standing water in the creek on the property- Be careful of little ones.

name: Bears Eye View - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Gorgeous custom built home is the highly desired Timber Ranch Estates! Ten minute drive to ski slopes, and a five minute walk to great hiking trails.

Bears Eye View , with its beautiful rich wood siding exterior and custom carved-door entrance is an elegant home in the desirable neighborhood of Upper Moonridge. Ease and luxury are apparent as you pull into the flat drive-way and park just steps from the front door.

Enter Bears Eye View to find yourself in the living room. Large  floor to ceiling windows provide plenty of both natural light and scenic mountain views. The high vaulted ceilings  make the living room feel spacious. Immediately you'll notice a unique wood burning fireplace, which is located to the left  of the room and is made from floor to ceiling stone, making it a feature that can be enjoyed from both the living room and dining room.

You will find the master suite just to the left of the living area. The same floor to ceiling fireplace is featured and is also wood burning.  Enjoy forested views or step onto the deck. The master suite has a King size bed and flat screen TV with cable. In the master bath area you will find dual master sinks, a soaking tub, stall shower and private restroom area.  Complete with Travertine tile and Alderwood cabinetry.

The dining area features a large flat screen TV, multi disc DVD player, cable and the dining area can seat up to six guests. Keep the cook company in the expansive kitchen complete with upgraded stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher, trash compactor, microwave, dual ovens, gas range, side by side fridge/freezer and a flex brew coffee station for both standard coffee and k-cup coffee. No expense was spared with the Traevertine and granite tile work and Alderwood cabinetry in this gourmet kitchen. 

The downstairs area is completed with a half bath and laundry room, complete with a full size washer and dryer. Both located near the front entrance. 

Enjoying nature and soaking in the mountain air are a huge part of any Big Bear vacation. Through the dining room, you'll find access to the large deck. Grill a juicy steak on the propane barbecue. The expansive deck is the perfect place to unwind after a day on the slopes or spent hiking through the San Bernardino mountains.  Make sure to walk outside at night for a spectacular star show that you won't find in the city, or catch the sunset as you enjoy the outdoor gas fireplace.

In search of a quiet spot to read your favorite book or play a board game? Located on the upstairs landing you will find a settee perfect to curl up with your favorite book.  Or play a board game while overlooking the living area. Head down the hall where you will find the second master bedroom with a king size bed, deck access and a half bath.

Across the hall you will find a second bedroom on the upper floor with a queen bed and deck access. Lastly you will find the large game room that is situated above the garage. It has a queen size sofa bed for extra sleeping arrangements,  a Foosball table for hours of fun and a large flatscreen TV with cable. Bring your devices to stream on the homes WIFI. 

Note: Please be sure sleeping arrangements work for your group. This home does have a city set occupancy of 9 guests but does not sleep 9 guest in beds.

Features: Foosball Table, Wood Burning Fireplaces, Outdoor Gas Fireplace, Carpeted Floors, Wood Floors, Smart TV, Cable, Game Room, Deck, Propane BBQ, Oversized Refrigerator, Six-Burner Stove, Double Oven, Flex Brew Station, Microwave, Dishwasher,  Trash Compactor, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

arrangements.Bedroom 1: Queen with TV with Private Bath (Entry Level)

description:
As of September 26, 2018, the water depth for dock use about 3 feet to 4.5 feet deep. Side-tie only. This is a shared dock.  Good shoreline access for non-motorized boat launching. When facing the lake, use right side of dock. Bumpers and bungee ties required.<!--td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;}-->

This luxury lakefront cabin in Big Bear has all the modern amenities you’ve come to love in your daily life without all of the hustle and bustle of being in the city. You’ve found your second home here at Big Bear Lakefront, right in the middle of the San Bernardino National Forest and fun things to do in Big Bear.

With the spacious living area, you can enjoy this cabin rental with the whole family without being cramped on the spacious built-in leather sofas. Warm up in front of the gas fireplace while watching a movie on the TV that hides away when not in use (not pictured). The dining area overlooks the lake and is perfect for a family meal.  The kitchen is just steps away has has ample counter space with bar seating, lake views, gas stove top, oven, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot.  The back wrap-around deck is sure to be a favorite hangout for the family during warm summer months with lake views, propane barbecue and seating.  Kids will enjoy playing in the yard below or take a stroll down to the water's edge.

The main floor has a master suite with lake views, a queen bed, TV with cable, and private bathroom with large tub/shower combo, double sinks and separate toilet room.

Downstairs is a large bunk room with lake views and patio access, gas fireplace, Foosball table, sofa, TV with cable and DVD player, and four twin over twin bunks. Two private bedrooms each have a queen bed.  Two full bathrooms and a 3/4 bathroom are located on this level.

Live out the lakefront dream in this spacious cabin over looking the beautiful Big Bear Lake!

Note: 4x4 required during winter season.

Lake levels vary throughout the year and boat docks availability is not guaranteed at the time of your arrival. Destination Big Bear is not responsible for the level of water in the lake during the course of guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most up-to-date lake levels for lakefront properties.

Features: Lakefront,  Views of 4th of July Fireworks, Propane Barbecue, Boat Dock (confirm lake levels for dock use) 2 Gas Fireplaces, Wireless Internet, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Dining for 12, TV/DVD, Cable, Large Decks, Foosball Table, Washer/Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided.

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Bearwood Hideaway - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Enjoy easy access to the marina, evening strolls around the neighborhood, and being just minutes from Boulder Bay, Alpine Slide and the Village.

This cabin is perfect for family and friends looking for a comfortable stay.  The living room has seating for the group to gather around in front of the TV with DirecTV, or cozy up next to the wood burning fireplace.  A log table and benches will seat everyone for a meal or game night.  This cabin was designed with adventure in mind where you can store your gear in the nook or one of the many cupboards.  The kitchen has a gas range, coffee pot, toaster oven, microwave and fridge.  Step outside to the extra-spacious fenced back yard for grilling on the propane or charcoal barbecue.

When night falls you have your choice of three bedrooms.  The first bedroom has a King bed, TV with DirecTV and twin roll-away.  Just down the hall is the second bedroom with twin bunks, Foosball table and TV with X-Box and Chrome Stick.  The third bedroom is off the living room and has a full futon.  The 3/4 bathroom is also just off the living room.

Features:  5 Minutes to the Village, 10 Minutes to the Ski Resorts, Close to Marinas and Boulder Bay, Wood Burning Fireplace, DirecTV, Internet, Foosball Table, Yard, Propane and Charcoal BBQs, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Big Bear Family Hangout - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Family Room: Queen, Full Futon with Bathroom (Upper Level)

description:
Planning a family vacation just got easier! Big Bear Family Hangout has everything you need for a getaway to the mountains with four bedrooms, four beautiful bathrooms, DirecTV, internet, a game room and is only a short walk to the ski resort shuttles or a quick drive to Bear Mountain Resort!

This recently remodeled cabin features an extended entryway with room for coats and winter gear. The spacious living room is perfect for getting cozy in front of the wood burning fireplace while watching a movie on the DVD player or tuning into your favorite show with DirecTV. In the warmer months you can step out to the large front deck to relax under the mature trees.

The kitchen is ready for a hot meal and includes a table with bench seating, stainless steel appliances, gas stove, microwave, Keurig coffee maker, dishwasher and granite counters. The back yard has a charcoal barbecue on the patio and tall table and chairs for those times you just want to sit outside with a hot cup of coffee or glass of wine. Soak in the hot tub under the stars!

The main floor has two bedrooms, one with a queen bed and separate access to the hallway full bathroom with double sink. The second bedroom has a full and twin bed with a full bathroom just out in the hall. You are sure to appreciate the washer and dryer.

Upstairs you will find two bedrooms, one with a queen bed and small private deck, the other with queen bed. A 3/4 bath is in the hall. The large family game room is also upstairs and is perfect for the kids with flat screen TV with DirecTV, Foosball table, queen bed, full size futon, and bathroom with double sink and extra large shower.

Tell your family to pack their bags for a fun and fabulous getaway!

Features: Close to Bear Mountain and Shuttles, DirecTV, Internet, Wood Burning Fireplace, Charcoal Barbecue, Hot Tub, Stainless Steel Appliances, Keurig Coffee Maker, Updated Bathrooms, Foosball Table, Deck, Patio, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided
This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, updated kitchen appliances, with possibly a few dated features.

name: Black Bear Lodge - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Bedroom 1: Queen, 3/4 Bath and TV with Cable (Main Level)
arrangements.Master Bedroom 2: King, Full Bath, TV w/Cable (Lower Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 4: Twin over Twin, Twin over Queen, Twin Trundle, TV w/Cable (Lower Level)

description:
***DUE TO DROUGHT CONDITIONS AND EXTREMELY LOW WATER LEVELS, THE BOAT DOCK IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.***

Black Bear Lodge is the perfect mountain retreat for your trip to Big Bear!  This reverse layout, mountain cabin features a grand great room with cathedral ceiling, wood burning fireplace, hot tub, lake views and a pool table.  Located on the lake next to Meadow Park for an ideal home away from home for families with kids or those looking to be just a few minutes from the Village, marinas and winter resorts.

The living room area focuses around the cozy fireplace and flat screen TV with cable and a Blu-Ray with streaming.  The pool table is sure to provide hours of fun!  The kitchen and dining area are the perfect place for your holiday gathering with a table for seven and additional seating at the kitchen breakfast bar.  The beautiful natural granite counters have ample room for meal prep and serving.  Stainless steel appliances complete the space and include a gas range, microwave, dishwasher, and coffee pot.  Enjoy sunsets over the lake on the deck while you grill on the propane barbecue or just relax with a glass of wine while enjoying the view and fresh mountain air.

The main level has a half bathroom and a master bedroom with queen bed and private 3/4 bathroom and TV with cable.  Downstairs you will find the laundry room, 3/4 bathroom and three more bedrooms.  The spacious master suite has a king bed, TV with cable, beautiful full bathroom with soaking tub, lake views and access to the lower deck where you will find the hot tub.  The third bedroom has a queen bed, deck access, lake views and a TV with cable.  Bedroom four has a TV with cable, lake views, twin over twin bunk, and twin over queen bunk with twin trundle.  Plenty of space for everyone!

Plan your mountain escape to Black Bear Lodge in Big Bear now!

Please contact us to inquire about the most up-to-date lake levels for lakefront properties.

***DUE TO DROUGHT CONDITIONS AND EXTREMELY LOW WATER LEVELS, THE BOAT DOCK IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.***

address: 212 S. Eagle Drive Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: Bear Vista Retreat - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 1: Queen, TV w/ Cable and DVD (Entry Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 3: Twin over Twin Bunk, TV w/ Cable and DVD (Entry Level)

description:
Whether you want to sit back and enjoy the view, watch the ski and snowboarders or experience the thrill of the downhill yourself, Bear Vista Retreat will get you close to all the fun!  In just a moment's drive you can be at Bear Mountain Resort, the Golf Course or set out on foot to the hiking and biking trails.

This reverse floor plan cabin features beautiful log accents and cozy cabin decor.  The entry level has three bedrooms, a full bathroom and stacked washer and dryer.  Bedroom one has a queen bed and TV with cable and DVD player.  Bedroom two has a queen bed, and bedroom three has twin over twin bunk, peek-a-boo views of the slopes and TV with cable and DVD player.

Head upstairs to the living room with open floor plan, views of the slopes, vaulted knotty pine ceiling, natural stone wood burning fireplace, leather sofa and TV with cable and Blu-Ray player.  The kitchen is just steps away and includes granite counters, a gas stove, microwave, dishwasher, traditional coffee pot as well as a Keurig machine. Step out the deck and enjoy soaking in the hot tub, grilling on the propane barbecue or just relaxing in the shade. A 3/4 bathroom is also on the upper level with corner shower and separated sink, convenient for shared use.

Features: Slope Views, Close to Bear Mountain, Walk to Hiking/Biking Trails, Wood Burning Fireplace, Hot Tub, Deck, Propane Barbecue, Cable, Internet, Central Heat, Gas Stove, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Keurig, Stacked Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Bird's Nest - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: Queen and Twin over Twin Bunk (Main Level)

description:
This comfortable home is the perfect place to get away from it all and enjoy all that nature has to offer in Big Bear!  Bird's Nest has two stories with an open floor plan, located close to the lake and centrally located to the Village and the ski resorts.

The entry level features a family room with pool table, a selection of games for the whole family, a flat screen TV, a wood burning fireplace and comfy couches for curling up with a good book, watching cable TV or surfing the internet. Just off the game room is the fully stocked kitchen with gas range, dishwasher, microwave, coffee pot and bar seating for three.  The dining area with table seating to accommodate eight. The living room features a large couch with plenty of seating and room to spread out while watching TV or Blu-ray and warming up by the Franklin stove.

The main level has a full bath and 3 bedrooms, including the master with a flat screen TV, private bath and deck access.  Bedroom two has a twin over full bunk.  Bedroom three has a queen and twin over twin bunk.  Upstairs is an additional loft bedroom with small upper deck access, a full and a twin with twin trundle.

The spaciousness doesn’t end here. Through the laundry room, you can head out to the back deck with a spa, propane barbecue and table seating for ten. Also, the deck overlooks a natural eagle preserve with public access for you to enjoy.

Features: Close to Lake, Great Central Location, Walk to Meadow Park, Cable, Internet, Blu-Ray, DVD, Flat Screen TV, Deck, Hot Tub, Propane Barbecue, Dishwasher, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Central Heat, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

Note: DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Blue Jay Cottage - Fawnskin, CA
description:
Enjoy the serenity of the mountains in this beautifully maintained cabin located on the North Shore side of Big Bear Lake! Looking at a picture of "Blue Jay Cottage" one would inevitably say it resembles a gingerbread house....indeed magical memories can't help but be made. Perfect for a small family and guests, this three bedroom, two bath cabin is on a street to street lot nestled in the pines in a quaint neighborhood evidenced by the lovingly maintained park across the street behind the cabin with swing set, playground, basketball court, tennis and more. Just a short drive to the lake or the main street in Fawnskin, this cabin is perfect for guests who appreciate the history of the area and is ideal for activities such as fishing, hiking, bike riding, visiting the Discovery Center, dining, and antiquing.

You will enjoy relaxing by the wood fireplace as you stretch out on the roomy leather sectional in the living room. Watch TV and choose from cable or the DVD player on the flat screen that swivels from living room to master bedroom. The new wooden window shutters offer multiple options for the beautiful view, natural light and privacy. The charming retro kitchen is complete with gas stove, microwave, coffee pot and seating for 4 at the dining table. The enclosed back porch is perfect for winter coats and boots after a day of fun in the snow and has a convenient stacked washer and dryer.  Sit amongst the mature trees and enjoy some peace and quiet watching the wildlife including the beautiful Blue Jays while relaxing on the spacious back deck that offers a covered area and charcoal grill.

Sleep comfortably in one of the two spacious bedrooms on the main level with full bathroom located conveniently off the hallway.

The cabin features a separate living area 3rd bedroom loft with outside entrance, sitting area with love seat, cable TV, full sized bed and bathroom with a shower. This would make a nice retreat for a second couple or relatives preferring a private space of their own while staying close to all the fun.

Feel home away from home in the mountains in this Big Bear Lake cabin!
Note: This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and  well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable  furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few  dated features or  appliances. We do not provide jugs for water dispenser.

Features: Flat Screen TV, Cable, DVD Player, Internet, Gas Stove, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Separate Guest Quarters, Close To Playground, Charcoal Grill, Wood Fireplace, Washer & Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided.

name: Big Bear Ski In Ski Out - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 1: King, Full Bath, Slope Views (Upper Level)

description:
Location! Location! Location!  When it comes to winter fun you can't beat Big Bear Ski In Ski Out, just steps away from Bear Mountain, and warm weather fun at the golf course, zoo and biking/hiking trails!  This condo backs up to Bear Mountain where you can watch the skiers and snowboarders head down the slopes, or why not join in the fun!

The open floor plan includes the living room, kitchen and dining area.  The living room has comfortable seating in front of the wood burning fireplace, flat screen TV with cable and DVD player.  The dining area has room for everyone.  The kitchen is stocked with all the basics and includes a gas range, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot.  The private front patio has a propane barbecue for grilling, while the back patio overlooks the slopes. There is also a free inter-mountain shuttle from Bear Mountain to Snow Summit for easy access to either resort!   A half bathroom and stacked washer and dryer are on this level for your convenience.

Upstairs are two bedrooms.  The first bedroom has a king bed, sofa for lounging, flat screen TV with cable, deck overlooking the slopes and a full bathroom.  The second bedroom has a queen bed and two twin beds, flat screen TV with cable and a full bathroom.

Note: Additional guest parking available in the gated community. No Garage Parking.  Spa is a community hot tub and is not guaranteed to be available.

Features: Walk to Bear Mountain/Golf/Zoo, Backs Up to Slopes, Close to Biking/Hiking Trails, Cable, DVD, Propane Barbecue, Wood Burning Fireplace, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided
address: 1377 Club View Drive #9 Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: Boulder Bay Hillside - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
If you are looking for a cabin with lake views, walking distance to the water, that backs up to the National Forest, then Boulder Bay Hillside is the perfect cabin for you!  The inside is beautifully finished with wood floors, a gourmet kitchen, granite counters, travertine tile bathroom features, log accents and more.  But, coming up to the mountains is all about spending time in nature and this cabin is surrounded by it's beauty, tucked between the boulders and mature pine trees.

This split level cabin is warm and welcoming with the main level great room.  Everyone can gather around the living room with it's sofa and chair in front of the wood burning fireplace, large flat screen TV with DirecTV and Blu-Ray. A Foosball table is sure to provide fun entertainment. You might just find yourself gazing out the windows enjoying the lake views.  The dining area has a circular table with extra seating at the expansive granite kitchen counter. The kitchen features stainless steel Viking appliances including a gas stove, microwave, dishwasher and large refrigerator.  A coffee pot and wine fridge complete the space.

The back deck is the highlight of the cabin.  Relax at the table and chairs or enjoy preparing a meal on the propane barbeque.  You will feel lost in the woods among the trees and boulders.  Out front you will find the hot tub with lake views, accessible through the living room sliding doors.

The bedrooms are divided on the upper and lower level.  The upper level has the master suite with king bed, private deck, TV with DirecTV and lake views.  The master bath has a corner jet tub, separate shower and double sink.  The second bedroom is just down the hall with queen bed, tree views and TV with DirecTV.  A 3/4 bathroom is in the hall.

The lower level has three more bedrooms.  Bedroom three has a full over full bunk, front patio access and TV with DirecTV.  Bedroom four has a full over full bunk, tree views and TV with DirecTV (in closet).  The fifth bedroom has a queen bed, front patio access, lake views and TV with DirecTV.  A 3/4 bathroom has a shower and stacked front loading washer and dryer.

Features: Lake/Forest Views, Across the Street From Boulder Bay, Backs to Forest, Hot Tub, Foosball Table, 2 Car Garage Parking, Wood Burning Fireplace, DirecTV, Internet, Gourmet Kitchen, Dishwasher, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Gas Stove, Propane Barbeque, Master Suite, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This is a luxury property which includes the finest furnishings, luxury building materials, and a highly consistent design theme. Luxury properties range from elegant and formal to relaxed and chic, but all appeal to guests who appreciate first-class accommodations with a designer flair.

Note: This cabin uses a septic tank.  DO NOT flush feminine products or excessive amounts of toilet paper.  (This is due to it's rocky location and when used properly will not affect your stay in any way)

This cabin has a steep driveway and many stairs to reach the front door in order to enjoy the beautiful vista and serene setting.  Garage parking is available on the lower level of the driveway. Do not park on the top driveway during winter months.
address: 38925 Big Bear Blvd Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: Brave Bull - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Brave Bull is the perfect Big Bear getaway located in an ideal location! This beautiful gated property has everything you could ever want for your home away from home! This gorgeous one-story home has an immaculate driveway with plenty of parking and immaculate landscaping.

This beautifully decorated home will welcome you with open arms and an open floor plan. Lounge in front of the fireplace on the large comfy couches or sit at the bar with seating for four and chat with your family chef! There is something for everyone at Brave Bull!

The kitchen features a gas range, stainless steel appliances, and all the amenities you would ever need for family meals in! The beautiful wood cabinetry and flooring will have you cooking up your meals in style. The dining area features a gorgeous wood table with chair and bench seating for six. Open to the living area, it offers a great atmosphere for quality family and friend time! Just off the kitchen is a full size washer and dryer for your convenience as well as a small powder room in the same hallway.  Head into the second living area with a large entertainment center with a flat screen TV and cable! There is a large sectional couch as well as a gas fireplace.  Perfect for catching the game or movie night! Head out to the deck and grill up some burgers! There is a large fenced back yard with an herb garden and a propane grill. Great for summer cookouts! Don’t forget to take a pic with the Brave Bull in the back yard and tag us at Destination Big Bear!

The master bedroom with private deck access features a king size bed and a flat screen TV with cable! Snuggle in and enjoy your privacy in this gorgeous bedroom with a detailed woodwork ceiling. The master bath includes a jetted tub, a remote controlled toilet and a large tile shower. Exactly what you need after a long day of Big Bear fun!  Just down the hall is a room perfect for the kiddos! It features a full bed over a queen bunk bed as well as a flat screen TV with cable! There is also a desk area and plenty of storage. Tuck the little ones in and have a wonderful night! Head to bedroom three with two beautiful queen size beds and a fun chalk board wall! Leave your mark and have a great night’s sleep! There is also a full sized bath with a tub and shower in between the two rooms for your convenience.

Enter the garage where the whole family will get to have fun playing in the game room where you'll find ping pong, air hockey, pinball and arcade console.

This home is perfect for you and your family to enjoy Big Bear in your secluded and private getaway with the convenience of being near all the action!

*** Please note playhouse is not functional. It is just for decoration.

Features:  Gated Property, Propane Grill, Cable TV, Ping Pong, Air Hockey, Pinball Machine, Arcade Console, Basketball, Gas Fireplaces, Jetted Tub, Gas Range, Stainless Steel Appliances, Two Living Areas, Deck, Large Fenced Back Yard, Full Size Washer and Dryer, Parking

name: Buffalo Lodge - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
The perfect location for a family getaway to Big Bear for skiing and snowboarding.  Just steps to Bear Mountain!

This traditional Big Bear cabin features a reverse floor plan to take advantage of the slope views from the upper level main living area.  The open great room has vaulted knotty pine ceiling, a spacious living area with new, comfortable sofa and recliners centered around the wood burning fireplace and large TV with a streaming smart BluRay player and cable.  Stay connected with complementary internet.  The kitchen is stocked with all the basics and includes a gas range, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot.  The dining table converts into a bumper pool table for evenings of entertainment.  The front deck has views of the slopes and zoo where you can watch the deer graze.  Just off the main room is a full bathroom.

Head down to the entry level where you will find two bedrooms and a full bathroom.  The first bedroom has a king bed, and the second bedroom has a queen bed. The media room is a great hangout space with a futon and oversize flat screen TV with cable!

This cabin is all about the location for a fun filled getaway to Big Bear!

Note: This cabin uses additional space heaters in the bedrooms.  Wall heat is located on the upper level and front entryway.

Features:  Next to Bear Mountain, Zoo and Golf Course,  Wood Burning Fireplace, Internet, DVD, Bumper Pool Table, Deck, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Wall Heat, Towels and Linens Provided, Outdoor Propane BBQ

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and basic accommodations and value location instead of décor. Features comfortable furnishings and basic amenities that will meet most of your needs for an enjoyable vacation.

name: Brown Bear Heaven - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Brown Bear Heaven is your slice of mountain paradise in Big Bear!  Located in the upper Moonridge neighborhood, this cabin features natural log accents throughout, a wood burning fireplace, game table and more!

The great room is open and airy yet boasts a cozy atmosphere with the fireplace, and flat screen TV with cable and DVD player.  Family meals can be enjoyed at the dining table and breakfast bar.  The kitchen has ample counter space and has a gas range, dishwasher, microwave and coffee pot.

Step out to the beautiful back yard and relax on the porch, grill on the charcoal barbecue, and watch the kids play under the mature pine trees, play horseshoes or shoot some hoops.

Back inside and down the main floor hallway you will find a full bathroom and laundry room with back deck access.  Two bedrooms complete this level.  The first bedroom has a queen bed and TV with Roku.  The second bedroom has two twin over full bunks, a desk and TV with streaming and DVD player.

Upstairs in the loft you can relax on the futon, play a game of air hockey or watch TV with streaming and Blu-Ray.  The master bedroom has a log style queen bed and private bathroom with tub, shower, double sinks and separate toilet.

No matter the time of year, Brown Bear Heaven will be a favorite place to call home for your family and friends.

Note: No garage access.

Features: Wood Fireplace, Air Hockey, Charcoal BBQ, Cable, Streaming, DVD/Blu-Ray, Internet, Fenced Back Yard, Basketball Hoop, Gas Range, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Dishwasher, Master Suite, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Bodet Chalet - Big Bear City, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Twin over Queen Bunk, Twin over Twin Bunk, Twin Trundle

description:
For an amazing mountain retreat experience, this cabin high on the mountain top will surely make this a dream vacation! As soon as you drive up the mountain to this wonderful cabin and enter the front deck, you will know you are in for a real treat!

As you sit on the front deck porch swing surrounded by the tree tops of the tall pines and expansive sky and mountain top views, you'll know you're in heaven, or close to it! The peaceful breezes bring you to total relaxation and you'll want to sit on this front porch swing for hours. There's also a wonderful bistro table and chairs to enjoy you're morning coffee or an evening glass of wine.

As you enter the front door you'll feel the openness and warmth of the great room, with wood beam vaulted ceilings and a wonderful wood burning stone fireplace in the corner. There's wood flooring, a comfy couch and love seat with a large 50" flat screen SmartTV with cable. By the entry there's a beautiful indoor cherry wood shuffle board table for many hours of fun with family and friends.

The great room opens to the dining area that seats 6 and is open to the large kitchen that has a breakfast bar that seats 4 more. The kitchen is fully stocked with everything you need to make great meals and includes a gas range, microwave, coffee pot, and dishwasher.

Step outside to the back deck for entertaining and grilling on the charcoal barbecue.  There are two tables for an outdoor meal or just relaxing in the fresh mountain air.  Take some time to soak your cares away in the hot tub in the fully fenced back yard with mature oak and pine trees.

Down the hallway you'll find a full bathroom with tub/shower combo and the washer and dryer. Take your pick from one of the three bedrooms.  The master suite has a king bed, TV with cable and private full bathroom.  Bedroom two has a queen bed and SmartTV, while bedroom three has a twin over queen bunk with trundle, twin over twin bunk, and a SmartTV.

Every room in this cabin retreat is decorated with wonderful mountain decor that is sure to delight everyone!

Note: This cabin requires the use of stairs.  No ground level entrance.  The driveway has a steep transition from the road - high clearance vehicles recommended.  Always carry chains in the winter months.

Features: Mountain Decor, Wood Accents Throughout, Hot Tub, Wood Burning Fireplace, Charcoal Barbecue, Tree Views, Fenced Back Yard, Deck, Outdoor Seating, SmartTVs, Cable, Internet, Shuffle Board Table, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Microwave, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.

name: Blue Lagoon - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Bedroom: Queen, Sitting Area, TV, Bathroom (Lower Level)

description:
***DUE TO DROUGHT CONDITIONS AND EXTREMELY LOW WATER LEVELS, THE BOAT DOCK IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.***

Located on the lagoon with lake access,  just five minute drive to the Village, ten minute drive to Snow Summit, twelve minute drive to Bear Mountain.

Nestled on Mallard Lagoon, this two-in-one property has its own dock and beautiful tranquil water views. The two separate living spaces makes it ideal for multiple families or couples, separated by a two car garage that is not for tenant use.

The main house is two stories with reversed, open floor plan that faces the water with wrap-around deck for outdoor enjoyment and is on the water/lagoon side of the property. The Living Room has a large sofa, Wood Burning Fireplace, Flat Screen TV, Cable and Wood Floors.  The Kitchen features Bar Seating, Gas Stove, Oven, Microwave, Dishwasher, Pantry, Dining Area and Deck Access to enjoy the water view while grilling on the propane barbecue.  The main level of the home has two bedrooms, one with two queens and the other with a queen bed.  A full bathroom is in the hall. The lower level master suite features sitting area, TV, deck access and private bathroom with spa tub. 

The guest house is ideal for multiple families or groups looking for separate spaces with the convenience of being together at one property.  The guest house is located on the street side of the property.  The Living Room has Wood Floors, 3 Day Beds, a Trundle Bed, Fireplace, Flat Screen TV (no cable) and the Dining Area.  The Kitchen has a Full Size Refrigerator, Gas Stove, Microwave, Coffee Pot and Patio Access.  A Full Bathroom is on the main level.  Upstairs in the split loft are two sleeping areas, one side has a queen bed and the other side has three twin beds.  

Note: No cable TV in guest house.

***DUE TO DROUGHT CONDITIONS AND EXTREMELY LOW WATER LEVELS, THE BOAT DOCK IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.***

name: Burly Bear Lodge - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
It's time to get away to Burly Bear Lodge!  This mountain retreat is just minutes from Bear Mountain, grocery stores, restaurants and conveniences.  Situated on a large lot with plenty of mature trees, this 3 bedroom 3 bath cabin is perfect for your family vacation.

The living room features a knotty pine cathedral ceiling, lots of windows for natural light, a wood burning fireplace, flat screen TV with cable and DVD player and comfortable seating.  The kitchen is just steps away and is a home chef's dream with stainless steel appliances, a gas range, additional wall oven, microwave, dishwasher, Keurig coffee maker and lots of granite counter space with bar seating. The dining area has a table and chairs for a meal or game night with the large collection of board games and Legos! Head out to the back deck for relaxing in the fresh mountain air.  A stacked washer and dryer is available for your convenience.

Off a private hallway is the master suite with it's own wood burning fireplace, king bed, TV with smart WiFi DVD/Blu Ray player, 3/4 bathroom and access to the back deck.  Down another hallway is a 3/4 bathroom and two more bedrooms.  One bedroom has a queen bed, TV with smart WiFi DVD/Blu Ray. The last bedroom has a queen and full bed, TV with smart WiFi DVD/Blu Ray, access to a small private deck and full bathroom with claw foot tub with shower.

The beautiful front yard features a covered deck and larger deck area for kids to play, or let them run around the large yard. The deck includes a propane bbq for grilling meals.  For evening entertainment a pool table is available in the garage (no garage parking).  This cabin will surely become a family favorite with plenty of memories made!

Features: Quiet Neighborhood, Close to Slopes and Conveniences, Deck, Wood Burning Fireplace, Cable, Internet, DVD, Propane BBQ,  Pool Table, Stainless Steel Appliances, Granite Counters, Gas Range, Additional Wall Oven, Dishwasher, Keurig Coffee Maker, Microwave, Master Suite, Central Heat, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided
Note: Stairs required to access living area.  No ground level entrance.

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.
address: 143 Crystal Lake Road Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: California Dreamin' - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
California Dreamin’ is the perfect Big Bear getaway! Located close to The Village and the lake, it’s the ideal spot for your group! With modern rustic décor throughout this newly remodeled home, you’ll love your stay at California Dreamin’!

Upon entry, you’ll take in a gorgeous open floor plan with wood floors.  You’ll walk into a beautiful space including a dining area, a kitchen with bar seating, and a living area. There is also a Foosball table for some competitive fun! The dining area features a beautiful wooden table with bench seating for up to six people. Hanging above is a gorgeous antler chandelier, creating the perfect ambiance for the space. The stylish kitchen features all stainless steel appliances and comes equipped with all the essential cookware for your family chef to whip something up! The living area has beautiful comfy leather couches, a wood-burning fireplace, a Roku TV, cable, and a PlayStation!

Just off the living area and master bedroom is a deck with a propane grill and a table for six. Great for barbequing and enjoying our gorgeous Big Bear weather!

Leading to the bedrooms is a laundry area with a full-sized washer and dryer for your convenience.

The master bedroom is gorgeously decorated and features a king size bed, and a blu-ray player. The master bath is beautifully tiled throughout. Take a relaxing shower after a long day on the lake or slopes! The second bedroom  features a queen size bed. An ideal space to do all of your California Dreamin'. The third bedroom has bunk beds with a twin on top and a full bed on bottom. Featuring fun bear décor, it’s the perfect spot for little ones! All bedrooms are carpeted and contain a Roku TV.
 
Features: One Car Garage, Flat Screen TV’s, Internet, Close to The Village, Gas BBQ, Washer, Dryer, PS3, and a PlayStation!

name: Boulder Bay Chalet - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
***DUE TO DROUGHT CONDITIONS AND EXTREMELY LOW WATER LEVELS, THE BOAT DOCK IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.***

Enjoy the serene beauty of Boulder Bay in this wonderful cabin located directly across from the lake with sweeping views.  Located just minutes from conveniences and a short drive to The Village.

The sunken living room features plenty of seating in front of the gas fireplace and flat screen TV with Dish Network and DVD player.  Step out to the lower deck and enjoy lake views and fresh air.  The dining room and kitchen overlook the living area.  The kitchen has beautiful upgrades including granite counters, stainless steel appliances, gas range, microwave, coffee pot, dishwasher and large refrigerator.

Down the hallway is a 3/4 bathroom with large shower and a laundry room with two washers and two dryers.  Out to the back patio is the propane barbecue so you can grill up your favorites.  The first bedroom has two full beds, a sofa and TV with DVD player.

Upstairs are three more bedrooms and a full bathroom in the hall.  The master suite has a king bed, gas fireplace, TV with Dish Network and DVD player, and a private 3/4 bathroom with large shower and double sinks.  Step out to the upper deck and soak in the hot tub that's perfect for two.  The third bedroom  has a queen bed and TV with Dish Network and DVD player.  The last bedroom has two twin over twin bunks, perfect for the kids or kid at heart.

Your family and friends are sure to make lifetime memories at Boulder Bay Chalet!

***DUE TO DROUGHT CONDITIONS AND EXTREMELY LOW WATER LEVELS, THE BOAT DOCK IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.***

Destination Big Bear is not responsible for the level of water in the lake during the course of guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most up-to-date lake levels for lakefront properties.

name: Canvasback Chalet - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Suite: King, TV w/ Cable, Private Bathroom

description:
This beautifully finished, single level, newly built cabin is waiting for your family vacation.  Located just one block from Holloway's Marina for warm weather fun, and only a short drive to The Village, hiking trails and more!

Canvasback Chalet boasts an open floor plan with lots of space for everyone.  The dining room sits at the front of the house just steps away from the spacious, central kitchen with granite counters, stainless steel appliances, gas stove, microwave, traditional coffee pot, and dishwasher.  Head into the living room for family time on the extra large sofa and enjoy the gas fireplace, flat screen TV with cable and Blu-Ray player.  You are sure to love the back deck with peek-a-boo lake views, charcoal barbeque and seating to sit back and enjoy the fresh air.

The master suite is sure to please with a king bed, back deck access and TV with cable.  The private bathroom has a European flair with a claw foot tub for soaking, white marble style tiles and separate shower with glass surround.  Two more bedrooms and a full bathroom are off a small hall.  The first bedroom has a full bed and TV with cable.  The second bedroom has a queen bed and TV with cable.  A laundry room is available for your convenience.

The kids will love running around in the spacious back yard, or take a stroll or bring your bikes and explore the neighborhood and it's mostly flat streets.

Features:  Walk to Holloway's Marina and the Lake, Close to The Village, Gas Fireplace, Charcoal Barbeque, Deck, Granite Counters, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Stove, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Dishwasher, Flat Screen TV, Cable, Blu-Ray, Internet, Master Suite, Claw Foot Tub, Central Heat, Carpet, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Casablanca - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Beautiful cabin with pleasant decor and updated finishes. Enjoy extraordinary panoramic views of Summit Mountain and Bear Mountain Slopes from the main living areas, kitchen and bedrooms. Relax in the hot tub and take in the view. Just a short drive to Bear Mountain slopes and everything else Big Bear has to offer.

Enjoy the lush mountain views from the spacious living room with wood burning fireplace, or watch a show on the flat screen TV with cable, Apple TV and DVD.  A half bathroom is located upstairs for your convenience.  The kitchen has plenty of counter space and all the basic conveniences for a quick meal including gas stove, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot. Enjoy a family meal in the dining area with large windows and access to the deck with propane barbeque, table and chairs with panoramic views.

At night, retreat to one of three bedrooms on the lower level with shared full bathroom in the hall.  Plenty of sleeping space for 8 and the kids will love the bunk beds. The master bedroom has a private bathroom with extra large shower and access to the lower deck with hot tub.  It's a great family cabin!

Features: Fully Stocked Kitchen, Linens and Towels Provided, Wood Burning Fireplace, Open Floor Plan, Cathedral Ceilings, Incredible Panoramic Views, Propane BBQ, Board Games, TV's, DVD, Cable, Apple TV, Internet, Washer, Dryer

Note: The driveway is very steep and during the winter can be a challenge. Please make sure the driveway is safe to exit and remember to use salt to melt the ice and snow. If it has snowed recently or during your stay do not attempt to use the driveway without chains. If you need our help, please call us and we can help you at no charge.

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with quality interior design. Enjoy a pleasing and upscale decor, and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Caramel Cabin - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Caramel Cabin is a warm and welcoming cabin in a quiet neighborhood, just minutes from grocery stores, the resorts, restaurants, and conveniences.  It's pet friendly with fenced in back yard.  For the ultimate in relaxation soak in the hot tub!

The recessed living room is the perfect place for gathering and includes a sofa, recliners, rocking chairs and a wood-burning fireplace.  The TV is set up for streaming and watching Blu-Rays.  Laminate wood floors bring a cozy mountain feel throughout the cabin.  The dining room has a  table for four with additional seating at the breakfast bar.  Entice your guests with the smell of delicious food you can prepare in the kitchen stocked with gas stovetop, coffee pot, dishwasher, microwave and wall oven.  For your convenience a washer and dryer and full bathroom is located down the hall.

Out on the back deck you can soak up the sunshine or relax with a beverage while you grill on the propane barbecue.  The hot tub is the perfect place to end your day.

For a good night's sleep you can choose from three bedrooms.  The master bedroom has a queen bed and private 3/4 bathroom.  The second bedroom has a full and twin bed, while the third bedroom has a twin over twin bunk and desk.

Your family and friends will feel right at home in the mountains at this wonderful cabin!

Note: No garage access.  Always carry chains in the winter months.

Features: Hot Tub, Propane Barbecue, Wood Burning Fireplace, Close to Resorts and Conveniences, Walkable Neighborhood, Fenced Backyard, Laminate Wood Floors, Smart TV, Blu-Ray, Internet, Washer and Dryer, Stocked Kitchen, Master Bedroom, Towels and Linens Provided
address: 284 Santa Clara Blvd Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: Clearview Cabin - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Escape to Big Bear and get a clear view of the lake and surrounding mountains!  Within walking distance to Bear Mountain Resort for skiing, snowboarding and golf.  Just moments away from hiking and mountain biking trails!  This is a great option for year round adventure in the mountains.

This three story cabin sits on the side of the hill with unobstructed views from the living room, deck and master bedroom.  The cabin has been tastefully upgraded and features a wood burning fireplace, leather reclining sofa and love seat and flat screen TV with DirecTV and Blu-Ray player.  The kitchen has beautiful granite counters, tile back splash, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, gas range, microwave and coffee pot.  Corner bench seating is nice for a family meal or game night. The full bathroom is also on this level.

Step outside to the back deck and relax in the shade or grill on the propane barbecue.

Head downstairs to the family room with a futon for flexible lounge and sleeping space, large flat screen TV with DirecTV and Blu-Ray player, wine fridge and 3/4 bath with custom rolling barn-stlye door and spacious shower.

The two bedrooms are upstairs. The master bedroom has a king bed, TV with DirecTV and DVD player and small private deck for relaxing and enjoying the view.  The second bedroom has a queen bed and TV with DirecTV access.

NOTE: This cabin has an elevated parking pad with stairs leading down the the front door. No ground floor entrance. Always carry chains during winter months.

Features: Views of Big Bear Lake, Walking Distance to Bear Mountain, Close to Hiking Trails, Wood Burning Fireplace, Propane Barbecue, DirecTV, Internet, Upgraded Bathrooms, Upgraded Kitchen, Stainless Steel Appliances, Dishwasher, Microwave, Gas Stove, Coffee Pot, Towels and Linens Provided.

name: Cloud Catcher - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Suite: King, TV w/ Cable, Full Bathroom (Upper Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 3: Twin over Twin and Twin over Full Bunks (Main Level)

description:
Looking for a log cabin mountain getaway?  Cloud Catcher is a beautiful retreat perched high in the hills among the trees with mountain views, hot tub and log features throughout.  Walk to Bear Mountain, the zoo and golf course! You are so close to all Big Bear has to offer.

The main level is open and airy with a river rock, floor to ceiling wood burning fireplace, honey colored log walls, warm carpeting throughout and plenty of windows to let in natural light.  The living room has a sprawling comfortable sofa, and flat screen TV with Blu-Ray player and cable.  The dining area and kitchen are just steps away and features a breakfast bar, dishwasher, gas stove, microwave and coffee pot.  Open the sliding patio doors and step out to the back deck with propane barbeque.  You are sure to enjoy the view of mountains and mature trees from the hot tub or the security of parking in the two car garage with a Tesla charger (14-50 NEMA outlet. Any electric car with that standard outlet can charge.)

Down the main floor hallway is a washer and dryer, full bathroom and two cozy bedrooms.  The first bedroom has a queen bed and windows overlooking the yard. The second bedroom has two solid log bunk beds, one a twin over twin and the other is a twin over full.

The loft is sure to be popular and features huge windows overlooking the mountains, trees and a view of the clouds rolling by. A full size pool table and TV with cable will help pass the time when you aren't exploring the great outdoors. 

Escape to the master bedroom featuring a king size bed, tree views, TV with cable and private full bathroom.

Note: This cabin has an elevated living area with many stairs leading up to the front door.

Features: Tesla Charging Station, Hot Tub, Walk to Bear Mountain, Garage Parking, Pool Table, Wood Burning Fireplace, Flat Screen TV, Blu-Ray Player, Updated Furnishings, Propane Barbeque, Gas Stove, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Washer and Dryer, Ceiling Fans Throughout, Central Heat, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Cedar Pines Cabin - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Enjoy a relaxing vacation in the mountains at Cedar Pines Cabin, located less than 2 minutes drive from Bear Mountain Resort, the golf course and zoo!  Beautiful neighborhood for taking an evening walk or just relaxing in the back yard under the mature trees and fresh air.

The single story cabin features natural pine wood flooring throughout, a wood burning fireplace, updates and mountain decor which lends to the cozy cabin feel.  The living room has a sofa and loveseat for comfortable viewing of the flat screen TV with cable.  Gather around the dining table for a meal or game night.  The kitchen features stainless steel appliances including gas range, dishwasher, microwave (in a cupboard), and Keurig coffee maker.  The kids will love running around the spacious, fenced backyard which includes a horseshoe pit, bocce ball set and patio with propane heater, propane barbecue, seating and picnic table.

When evening comes, retreat to one of the three bedrooms located down the hall.  The master suite has a king bed and private full bathroom.  The second bedroom has a queen bed, and the third bedroom has a queen bed, futon and TV with DVD player.  A full bathroom is located in the fall for your convenience.

When the weather turns chilly, head into the converted garage for air hockey, bumper pool and checkers. There is also seating and a TV with cable to keep up with your favorite shows. 
NOTE: NO Washer/Dryer

name: Cienega Lakeview - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 1: King with Private Bathroom and Jetted Tub

description:
When you first arrive at this cabin rental, you will be intrigued by its unique exterior and interior design. Get the best of both worlds, with the modern amenities and a rustic location with beautiful views of Big Bear Lake.

Take full advantage of the lake view from the back deck of this cabin as you relax in the sunshine and grill a delicious meal on the propane BBQ. This cabin is the perfect size for entertaining your friends and family for some quality time in the mountains! 

In the evenings, come in and relax in front of the gas fireplace in the main living area with your favorite movies ready to watch! Don't forget the outdoor hot tub that is just waiting for you to take advantage of it. Perfect for soaking after a long day of Big Bear activities! Whether you want to relax or head out for some activities, this is the perfect home away from home for you!

Hop on the wifi and post pictures of your vacation here in Big Bear on social media for all of your friends and followers to share in your experience! Since you will love staying here so much, your friends will want to come with you next time! 

Features: 2 Car Garage, Gas Fireplace, Large Game Room with Pool Table, TV, Wet Bar, Outdoor Hot Tub, Wireless Internet, Lakeview, Beautiful Mountain Décor, High Ceilings, TV/VCR/DVD, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Dining for 12, Propane BBQ, Outdoor Dining, Beautiful Decks with Lake Views, Washer/Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Chalet Catalina - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Located in the heart of Big Bear, Chalet Catalina is perfect little cottage that will steal your own heart! 

This two story, newly updated home is the perfect getaway for you, your family and friends! Located near grocery stores, dining and a ton of Big Bear activities, Chalet Catalina will keep you close to all the action! This three bedroom, two bath home away from home has all the amenities you could ever need to make your vacation top notch. Don’t miss out on this little gem!
 
Enter into a gorgeous sitting area and immediately feel at home, surrounded by cute décor, gorgeous tile floors, and a wood burning stove. The sitting area features a beautiful leather sofa with a pull out queen size bed. Great for extra guests! The kitchen is just to the left and is equipped with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and bar seating! The kitchen has all the amenities for your group’s chef to whip delicious meals when you feel like dining in. With an open concept kitchen, your group can be relaxing, cooking, getting toasty by the fire and enjoy quality family time all at once! There is a dining table next to the kitchen with seating for six. Perfect for family meals or game night! 

Head into the living area featuring two leathers reclining chairs, a leather sofa with a queen pull out bed and a wood burning stove! Catch a movie or the big game on the large flat screen Roku TV equipped with cable, and an HD Blu Ray player. Just off the living area is the patio and deck, featuring a gazebo with a table and seating for four. The fenced back yard also includes a wooden swing for a couple of sweethearts, a propane grill, and extra seating for four. A great space to enjoy barbeques and dining al fresco! 

The first level also has a darling bedroom with a queen size bed, a smart TV with an Xbox 360! Just down the hall is a bathroom featuring tile throughout and a shower for your convenience.

Head upstairs to two cozy bedrooms and a cute bathroom! Both bedrooms feature queen size beds, side table dressers for storage, and beautiful wood floors. Perfect for your friends and family to stay comfy and relaxed! The bathroom has shelving and a shower for a nice steam after a long day of Big Bear fun!

If you want cute, comfy, cozy and a convenient location, Chalet Catalina the perfect place for you!

Features: Cable, Wifi, Blu Ray, Roku TV, Xbox 360, Close to Bear Mountain, Wood Floors, Tile Floors, Wood Burning Stoves, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Range, Propane Grill, Gazebo, Parking

name: Champlin's Cabin - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Enjoy slope views from the hot tub, large yard for the kids and a pool table at this family friendly cabin located in the upper Moonridge neighborhood of Big Bear!  With plenty of space, boat parking, and the amenities to make your vacation great, this cabin is sure to be a favorite for return trips all year round!

The single story, open and spacious great room centers around the wood burning fireplace and large screen TV with Dish Network.  There is plenty of seating for everyone with three leather sofas and two extra chairs.  There is a unique sunken area with a table and stools that overlooks the backyard and mountains beyond. The recessed dining room has a table and chairs for a family meal or game night.  One step up brings you into the kitchen with additional seating in the breakfast nook.  The kitchen is stocked with all the basics for preparing a meal and includes a gas range, microwave, coffee pot, and dishwasher.  From here you can step out to the side deck for grilling on the gas barbecue while the kids play in the yard.  The hot tub will be a favorite place to relax after a day full of adventure.

Off the living room is the game room with full size pool table and flat screen TV with dish access and plenty of windows looking out to the yard and slopes.  A hallway connects the main living space, game room and bedrooms and includes a full bathroom with double sinks and a separate room with the tub/shower and toilet.  A washer and dryer is also available for your convenience.

The master bedroom is large with plenty of room to spare and has a king bed, TV with dish access, access to the back yard, and a private bathroom.  The bathroom has double sinks and a separate room with large tub, shower, bide and toilet.  Three more bedrooms each have plenty of sleeping options with log queen over queen bunks.  One of the bedrooms has a Smart TV for streaming programing.
The garage is available for guest use. Two small sedans or one larger vehicle will fit. The garage also includes a ping-pong table!

This cabin has everything you need for an enjoyable vacation in Big Bear with family and friends.

NOTE:  Single story cabin with several sunken/raised areas of the home including the dining room, game room and kitchen.

Features: Slope Views, Hot Tub, Large Yard, Pull-Through Flat Parking, Boat Parking, Garage parking, Ping-pong, Wood Burning Fireplace, Gas Barbecue, Pool Table, Dish Network, Internet, Carpet, Central Heat, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided
