name: Cozy Bear's Den - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
An adorable three bedroom, two bath cabin with vintage accents. Walk to the lake and Boulder Bay Park in just a matter of minutes! Great location for summer fun and hiking trails.

Enjoy relaxing next to the gas stove fireplace in the open living room.  Play a game with the family at the dining table. The kids will love playing in the the flat backyard or try your luck at Foosball.  Pets are welcome but there are some restrictions.

Retreat to one of the three bedrooms after a day of mountain fun.  There is plenty of room for up to seven guests.

Features: Gas Burning Fireplace, Flat yard, Close to Lake, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Linens and Towels Provided, Charcoal Barbeque, Patio, One Car Parking Provided, Internet

Note:  The oven does not work- no baking. The stove top is functioning.

This cabin is one of the best deals for guests on a budget. The property may be showing a bit of wear and tear on the inside, but all of the basic furnishings are present. The property is ideal for those who value location instead of décor, are on a tight budget, or are simply less concerned with the appearance of the property or amenities.

name: Cowboy Chic - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
When you pull up in front of this cabin, the first thing you will notice is that the entire front of the cabin is largely made up of glass windows that let all of that beautiful mountain sunlight into your vacation cabin that will help make you feel perfectly at home.

When you walk in, you will be right back in the Wild West, but with the much loved luxuries that we’ve come to expect these days. You will have the best of both worlds with the large Jacuzzi outside to relax in, the huge flat screen TV in the living room, and the large comfortable beds to sleep in at night. With the open floor plan, you can be upstairs playing pool and watching TV on the new 32" TV that is connected to the living room programing, and still be connected to the rest of the family downstairs playing board games or watching TV.

And to make this cabin even more perfect for your family, there are many personal touches made by the homeowners that help you feel a connection to their family and their home, their way of making you feel like part of the family. They have repurposed the ladder from their children’s play set as a display piece in the living room, adding to the rustic, cowboy feel of the cabin. In addition to touches like this ladder, there are several board games available for your use that the family grew up playing.

With amenities like these, how can you not feel right at home here? Let us help make your vacation feel like your second home.

Note: Outdoor cameras are installed on the premises for security purposes only.

This cabin is not pet friendly. lf a pet is discovered on the premises, you may be charged a min. of $150 and a max of $250, if discovered by way of outdoor cameras.

Features: Pool Table, Outdoor Hot Tub for 6, Wood Burning Fireplace, WiFi and High Speed Internet, Genesis-Digital Surround Sound System with iPhone Dock, 55" Flat Screen HD/TV with Cable/DVR/HBO Movie Channels, DVD/CD Player, Heater, Ceiling Fan, Open Floor Plan, Rustic, Wild West/Cowboy Décor , Jacuzzi Jetted Bath Tub, Propane and Charcoal BBQ, Front & Back Deck, Patio Furniture, Dinning Table Seats 4, Kitchen Bar Seats 3 with Bar Stools, Board Games, Fully Equipped Kitchen, Large Lot, Seasonal Stream, Towels and Linens Provided.

name: Comfy Bear Cabin - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Twin over  Full Bunk, Full (Upper Level)

description:
Make your visit to Big Bear comfortable at Comfy Bear Cabin!  This fabulously updated two story cabin has been meticulously decorated and designed for the guest who wants all the conveniences of home with the stylish mountain flair of a luxury resort.

The entry level has a nice open feeling for gathering when it's dinner time with a table and chairs in front of the wood burning fireplace.  Catch up on your favorite cooking shows on the large TV with Roku.  The kitchen will bring out the gourmet chef in you as you whip up a tasty breakfast using one of the stainless steel appliances and a cup of coffee with your choice of Keurig or regular coffee maker.  Right out back you can enjoy the fresh air on the deck while grilling on the propane barbecue or just sip on a glass of wine in the lounge area.  Soak all your cares away in the hot tub under the stars!

Back inside you will find a full bathroom off the hallway on your way to the master suite.  Enjoy the comforts of the king bed while watching a movie on the TV with cable.  The closet is fit for royalty and has ample room for storing your vacation wardrobe and suitcases.  Through the closet is the bathroom with separate toilet and spa-worthy finishes.

Upstairs is the living room with plenty of entertainment options.  Relax on the sofa in front of the wood burning fireplace, watch TV with Roku and Blu-Ray or step out to the deck and watch the famous sunset over Big Bear.  Adults will appreciate the wet bar and pool table when evening arrives.  A full bathroom and stacked washer and dryer is also on this level.

Down a short hallway are two more bedrooms.  One has a king bed, and the second is perfect for kids or the kid-at-heart with a twin over full bunk, full bed and TV with Roku.

You might not want to leave once you get comfy at this luxury cabin in Big Bear!

Note: Driveway has a steep transition from the road.  High clearance vehicles recommended.

Features:  Updated Mountain Decor, Luxury Finishes, Wood Burning Fireplaces, Hot Tub, Pool Table, Propane Barbecue, Roku TV, Cable, Internet, Stainless Steel Appliances, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided
address: 373 Crystal Lake Road Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: Deer Canyon Retreat - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
New listing!!! First time on the rental market!

Deer Canyon Retreat is located on an easily accessible street in the popular Moonridge neighborhood, just 2-3 minutes from Bear Mountain Resort, the Zoo and Golf Course! Visiting for ski season? No problem, the flat-driveway has enough room to park three SUV's, making it a breeze to visit during winter.

From the moment you drive up to this wonderful mountain cabin surrounded by beautiful oak and pine trees, you’ll feel at home in the mountains with the wrap around deck that has benches in front and covered seating for those warmer, lazy days, and a charcoal barbecue. Enjoy dinner in the fresh mountain air, while using the outdoor dining furniture with seating for twelve.

As you enter this delightful, reverse floor plan cabin, you’ll feel the warmth of the natural wood walls and want to curl up in front of the wood burning stone fireplace. Vaulted wood ceilings and a skylight add spaciousness to the living room. There is ample and comfortable seating with two full couches and two leather chairs for viewing the large flat screen TV with cable. Stay connected with family and friends who couldn't make the trip with Wi-Fi. 

Just steps away, you'll find the kitchen with stainless steel appliances. It is fully equipped with all the basics to whip up a home cooked meal. Imagine filling Deer Canyon Retreat with the aroma of brewing coffee and warm cinnamon rolls in the morning or perhaps, a hearty beef stew dinner after a day on the slopes?  Take advantage of the gas range, microwave, coffee pot and dishwasher. The dining table seats 6 and is the perfect place for a fun game night or meal. A half bathroom is just around the corner off the hallway.

The main level has the master bedroom, or “Deer Room”, an oasis with a queen bed and luxury linens. Stay entertained with a flat screen television that includes Smart TV. The master bedroom includes a private deck, perfect for enjoying a glass of wine while taking in the spectacular night sky. An en suite full bathroom completes the master suite.

Downstairs there are two more spacious bedrooms and a shared full bathroom.

Bedroom two, or “Bear Room” has a wood beam ceiling and is furnished with a California King bed with quilts to keep you warm and cozy plus a Smart TV with cable.

The final bedroom, or “Moose Room” has a wood beam ceiling and is furnished with a Pennsylvania Dutch handmade log bunk bed consisting of 2 queen beds, a Smart TV and Foosball table for fun entertainment.  There is also a laundry room with washer and dryer for those longer stays.

From the lower level you can access the back patio with covered hot tub, the perfect way to soak away your aches and pains after a day full of adventure.  Kids will love exploring the yard. During winter, you'll find a great sledding hill right outside your door!

We know you’ll love this cabin so much that you’ll want to vacation here all-year round, year after year!  Welcome to Deer Canyon Retreat – you have found you new vacation home! 

Note: This cabin has wall heat with additional space heaters in the bedrooms.

Features: Minutes from Bear Mountain Resort, Flat Parking, Covered Deck, Hot Tub, Charcoal Barbecue, Mature Treed Lot, Cable w/ Premium Channels, Phone, Internet, Smart TVs, Wood Burning Fireplace, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Foosball Table, Wall Heat, Carpet, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations. Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with a few original features and updated appliances.

name: Destro's Lakefront - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 1: King with Private Bath, 42" Flat Screen , DVD/VCR (Upper Level)

description:
As of September 26, 2018, the water depth for dock use about 1 foot deep. Boats are not recommended but good access to shoreline for kayaks and canoes.

ABSOLUTELY NO BOAT OR HAULING TRAILERS TO BE PARKED OR BROUGHT ONTO THE PROPERTY INCLUDING BACKING INTO THE DRIVEWAY.     NO EXCEPTIONS!    (If you need additional parking and are bringing a trailer there is an open public parking lot provided by the city of Big Bear. Ask your booking agent for details)

Escape to Destro's Lakefront on the shore of Big Bear Lake with marina and mountain views from the multiple decks, yard, and boat dock.  Curl up in front of the fireplace with friends and family after a day full of adventure or head downstairs to the game room for a fun night of playing pool or shuffleboard.  This cabin has been lovingly decorated with southwest mountain decor and features beautiful log and stone accents throughout. 

The great room features a floor to ceiling natural stone wood burning fireplace and vaulted knotty pine ceiling with lake and mountain views from the wonderful wall of windows.  Enjoy lounging on the sofa while watching your favorite show on the flat screen TV with cable and DVD player.  A large dining room table is perfect for a meal or family game night. Step out to the back deck of this lakefront cabin and sit and watch the scenery for hours or grill on the propane barbecue. The kitchen is just steps away and features it's own fireplace, granite counters, stone tile floor, vintage inspired gas stove and refrigerator, coffee pot and microwave. A stacked washer and dryer is perfect for longer stays.

The main level has four of the five bedrooms.  Bedroom one has a queen bed and back deck access.  Bedroom two has a queen, log style bed. Bedrooms three and four each have a twin over full bunk bed.  Two bathrooms are located on the main level for easy access from any room.  Upstairs is the master suite with private deck overlooking the lake, 3/4 bathroom with extra spacious shower and double sinks, king bed and TV with DVD player.

Head downstairs for all the fun!  Challenge your fellow guests to a game of pool or shuffle board.  The stove style gas fireplace will keep you toasty while you watch TV.  A half bathroom is located on this level.  Step outside to the back yard and relax at the table and chairs, play a game of horseshoes or take a stroll down to the water's edge.  Destro`s is a place to live life, take it easy, eat, relax and enjoy your friends and family.

Note: During winter, 4Wheel/AWD drive and/or chains required. During summer, boat trailers cannot be parked on the property. If you are bringing a trailer, it may be parked at the public parking lot  located on Alden Rd just off Big Bear Blvd. Contact us for more details.

Lake levels vary throughout the year and boat docks availability is not guaranteed at the time of your arrival. Destination Big Bear is not responsible for the level of water in the lake during the course of guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most up-to-date lake levels for lakefront properties.

Features: Dog Friendly, Southwest Mountain Decor, Lakefront, Fireplace in Living and Game Room, Dining for 12, TV/DVD/Surround System, Wireless Internet, Pool Table, Side Tie Only Boat Dock,  BBQ, Washer/Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Day Dreamer - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Day Dreamer is a new-construction log cabin style home located in the desirable neighborhood of lower Moonridge. It's just minutes away from Bear Mountain Ski Resort and the Moonridge Alpine Zoo. Shops, restaurants, and Big Bear activities are less than a ten minute drive. Day Dreamer is in a quiet neighborhood, but close to all the action!

Park on the easy flat driveway and walk up a set of stairs to the entrance of the Day Dreamer. The is also one space available in the garage. The entry door is located on a large deck with views of the Bear Mountain Resort slopes! The deck features a natural gas bbq. Enjoy the fresh mountain air, while you grill yourself a delicious meal!

Enter the home and discover an open-plan living room with high ceilings and wood floors. Ceiling fans will keep you cool during the warm summer months. On a chilly winter night, you'll enjoy getting cozy in front of the gas fireplace. Entertainment is at hand with the flat-screen television with HDTV cable and Klipsch sound system. A Nest control system will keep the home at a comfortable temperature.

The ability to create a home cooked meal is one of the joys of staying in a rental cabin. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, and comes equip with all the tools you need to cook at home. Features of the kitchen include a microwave, Kuerig coffee maker, gas oven, and dishwasher.

Serve your meal at the farm house style wood table, with five chairs and a bench. Enjoy beautiful views of the front of the house as you dine. The breakfast bar has two stools for extra seating or a fun, casual option. 

No one wants to do laundry while on vacation, but should the need arise, side-by-side washer and dryers are located in the hall closet. 

The three bedrooms are also located in this hall. All three bedrooms have a unique style feature of one wood-panel wall, with the beds positioned near this wall, creating a framing effect. It adds a coziness to the room, blending a modern aesthetic with a cabin vibe.

The master bedroom has a king bed and ceiling fan. Access to the backyard is available through a sliding door. Keep yourself entertained with the flat-screen television and HDTV cable. The en suite full bathroom has double sinks.

The second bedroom has a queen bed, ceiling fan, and access to the backyard.

The third bedroom has a twin over twin bunk bed that is perfect for the little ones in your group. The window has views of the side of the house.
Additional sleeping space can be found in the living room on the sleeper sofa.

A full bathroom is located in the hall, for sharing between bedrooms two and three. It's in a location that's easy access from the living area and kitchen.

Be the first to enjoy this brand new home! Day Dreamer has mountain views and modern comforts. It's in a great location to experience Big Bear activities and is a beautiful home to make vacation memories.

Features: Mountain Views, New Construction, Garage Access, Deck, Natural Gas BBQ, Gas Fireplace, HDTV Cable, Klipsch Sound System, Nest Temperature Control, Microwave, Dishwasher, Granite Counters, Stainless Steel Appliances, Ceiling Fans, Keurig, Gas Oven, Washer and Dryer.

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Crestwood Manor - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
This wonderful five bedroom, four bathroom cabin has just about everything you would need to make your vacation memorable.  Enjoy private space with three master suites with attached bathrooms.

Everyone can gather in the very large great room and enjoy hanging out together. The dining room features a ten person dining table and opens up to the kitchen for extra bar seating. Enjoy watching TV on the huge TV with cable, DVD and VHS player plus a stereo. Take time out from all the fun to grill on the propane barbeque. This cabin is an entertainers delight!

Play a game of Foosball table or sit in the eight person hot tub while the kids enjoy playing in the fenced backyard. Perfect for kids and pets.

Plenty of room for parking and only a couple minutes or less to everything Big Bear has to offer! Just a 10 minute walk to Snow Summit! 

Note: Price reflects location, 3 on-suites, 5 bedrooms . Sauna is non operational. 

Features: TV’s, DVD Players, Stereo, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Linens and Towels Provided, No Laundry

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few  dated features or appliances.

name: Crystal Pines - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 4: 3 Twin over Twin Bunks (Upper Level-Through Converted Garage)

description:
This is a quiet neighborhood,  please be sure to re respectul of noise.

Book your mountain getaway at this classic mountain cabin escape surrounded by beautiful pine trees, sure to be enjoyed from its large front deck with peekaboo lake views.  This family friendly two level cabin is set in a quiet neighborhood just minutes from everything!

The focal point of this cabin is the center two sided rock wood and gas fireplace (one wood and one gas) that can be enjoyed in the living or dining room.  The vaulted wood ceilings open up to the upstairs walkway providing a wonderful open feeling along with the open concept below.  The living room is warm and inviting with comfortable sofa and chairs.  Tune into your favorite show on the TV with cable access or catch up with family and friends through internet with Wi-Fi.

The dining room has a large expandable table for a meal or game night. The kitchen has lots of counter space and has all the conveniences including a microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot. Step outside to the deck for relaxation and grilling on the charcoal barbeque.

A laundry room and full bathroom is on the main level, along with the first bedroom with Queen bed.  Upstairs you will find two more bedrooms, one with a queen bed and one with a king bed. A full bathroom is shared between them with additional hall access.

Through the kitchen you will find a mud room and half bath, as well as the game room with pool table.  Head up the back stairs to the bonus room complete with bunk beds, Foosball table, sofa and large flat screen TV with cable.  The kids will love having their own space when they aren't outside enjoying the large flat backyard! Families will also enjoy barbecuing on a 4 burner propane BBQ on the  newly built back patio   Bring your bikes and enjoy cycling around the  peaceful neighborhood.

Great location for summer fun in Big Bear!  Within walking distance to Pleasure Point Marina, minutes from Boulder Bay park a small convenience market and restaurant, and under three miles to the Village or hiking trails.

Note: Across the street from the home, there is a steep culvert. Please keep away and use caution especially with small children.

DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs!

Features: Walking Distance to The Lake, Cable, Internet w/ Wi-Fi, Pool Table, Foosball Table, Patio Furniture, Propane BBQ, Patio, Deck, Charcoal Barbeque, Wood and Gas Fireplace, Coffee Pot, Microwave, Dishwasher, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few dated features or appliances.

name: Eagle House - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 4: 2 Fulls, Twin over Full Bunk (Upper Level)

description:
***DUE TO DROUGHT CONDITIONS AND EXTREMELY LOW WATER LEVELS, THE BOAT DOCK IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.***

Relax and enjoy the spectacular views and amazing sunsets from the deck of this spacious Big Bear lakefront retreat. With four bedrooms, two and a half bathrooms as well as over 2,800 square feet of living space, there is plenty of room to lose yourself. Eagle House is located in the highly desirable area of Eagle Point, which is just a short drive to the Village and to the slopes! And walking distance to Meadow Park.  Enjoy lakeside living at it's finest. 

The formal living room features a sectional sofa to relax in front of the wood burning fireplace or put on a show on the flat screen TV equipped with cable. The formal dining area has seating for up to 8 guests. 

In the kitchen you will find newer modern appliances, an eat in area that seats up to 6 and deck access. Step out onto the deck to enjoy amazing lake views. Grill on the propane barbecue or relax in the 8 person hot tub. The deck is the perfect outdoor retreat with ample seating, lounge chairs to soak up the sun, or head down the stairs to walk out to the waters edge. 

The game room area has a pool table, wet bar and wood burning fireplace. Just off of the game room is the laundry room with a full size washer and dryer. Wrap around the hall to find a half bath.

Head upstairs where you will first be greeted by the master suite. Complete with a king size bed, marble hearth and gas fireplace. Watch a movie or your favorite show on the flatscreen TV and DVD player.  The room has deck access to enjoy the lake views and a full bathroom. 

Down the hall you will find a full bath and the second bedroom complete with a twin over full bunk and an additional 2 full size beds. Enjoy the flat screen TV and DVD/VCR combo.

The third bedroom features two queen size beds and deck access. The fourth bedroom has a queen and full and amazing lake views.

Note: DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

Lake levels vary throughout the year and boat docks availability  is  not guaranteed at the time of your arrival. Destination Big Bear is  not  responsible for the level of water in the lake during the course of   guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most up-to-date   lake levels for lakefront properties.

Features: Hot tub, Pool Table, Close to The Village, Lakefront, Propane Barbecue, Deck, Wood and Gas Fireplaces, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Dishwasher, Gas Range, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Carpet, Cable TV, WIFI, DVD players, VCR, Flat Screens TV's , Washer and Dryer, Central Heat,  Towels and Linens Provided

name: Drop Inn to Summit - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
If your looking for a ski-in and ski-out complex, mountain getaway at the base of Snow Summit Ski Resort and Adventure Park, then plan your next vacation to Drop Inn to Summit. Relax in your private outdoor spa while watching all the action on the slopes, winter and summer. Skiing, snowboarding, and mountain biking are all just steps away from the Summit Town Homes.

This reverse floor plan, two bedroom, three bath condo is modern and up to date. It has great slope views inside and out. The fully equipped and upgraded kitchen is beautiful with granite counter tops, dual ovens, and a dishwasher. There is extra seating at the bar with views of the slopes. The two bedrooms are on the lower entry level. The master has a full bath, flat screen TV with cable and internet, as well as an open floor plan to the kitchen, dining area, and full bathroom.

Drop Inn at Summit is centrally located just minutes from all Big Bear has to offer such as lake play at Meadow Park, the Village's shops, hiking, biking, and fishing. The possibilities are endless.

Note: Loft is not available to renters. We can only rent the 2 bedroom sleeping arrangements.  This cabin has a GAS ONLY fireplace, do not use wood.

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with high quality interior design. Enjoy a pleasing and upscale decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.
address: 861 Thrush Drive Unit #73 Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: Dream Catcher - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Full over Full Bunk, Twin Pullout

description:
Dream Catcher is the perfect home for guests who desire modern touches, but who also love a mountain cabin aesthetic. This home includes plenty of windows letting in natural light and providing guests with a front row seat to nature. Sit back with a hot mug of coffee and enjoy the winter snowfall or try to spy a Blue Jay perching in a nearby tree.

A beautiful property throughout, the first thing that you'll notice is the lush green grass and thoughtful landscaping. The property is surrounded by mature trees, which provide both privacy and the feeling of being in nature. The fenced backyard is a great bonus for guests with young children,  providing a secure place for kids to play. Your family will love the concreated/covered deck and the large gazebo. Many of the homes in Big Bear simply do not have such a safe and inviting yard.

When you enter Dream Catcher, you'll find yourself in a spacious, open-plan living area with high ceilings. Immediately, you'll notice the gas fireplace, which features a four-sided glass panel, allowing guests to enjoy the illumination from all sides. You can enjoy the fireplace while cooking in the kitchen! Imagine how cozy the home will feel when you have a fire burning in the fireplace and the fragrance of a hearty dinner being prepared wafts over from the kitchen.

Just off the living room, you'll find a chef's paradise. The kitchen is outfitted with Viking Professional stainless steel appliances (double ovens) and includes a spacious work-top, ready for any culinary endevour. Whether you're hosting a holiday dinner or whipping up a pancake breakfast, Dream Catcher's kitchen will meet your needs. The open plan living area, allows for the chef to be included in the living room action, as they are creating a meal. The layout of Dream Catcher is ideal for socializing.

The dining room nook is located off the kitchen and includes an eight-seat wood dining table sitting beneath an antler chandelier. Large windows line the dining room, providing plenty of light and beautiful views. If you require extra seating, the kitchen includes a breakfast bar with four stools; always a fun option for the kids in your group. A slider off of the dining room is the entry to a small deck outfitted with wooden Adirondak chairs. On warm evenings, this is a perfect area for adults to enjoy a pre-dinner cocktail. It's also a sunny spot in the afternoon, a great place to enjoy a book while taking in the clean mountain air.

Head upstairs and you'll find three bedrooms. The master bedroom well-appointed, with a king bed, flatscreen television, and sitting area with a couch. This room is airy and clean, with rustic decor: such as a carved-wood bedframe and bear art. The master includes an ensuite full-bath, with a separate jacuzzi tub. The jacuzzi tub is the perfect place to melt away aches after a day of hitting the ski slopes or trail hiking. Windows frame the tub, allowing you to double up on the relaxation by enjoying nature while you soak.

If you have children, the second bedroom will suit your family. Kids will feel like they're having a slumber party as they sleep on a bunk with two full beds and a twin pull-out. This room is not limited to families with kids, adults can fit in these beds too! This room has a lodge theme, with animal print wallpaper and a bass fish sign on the wall.

The third bedroom includes two twin beds and is decorated in shabby-chic, with plenty of storage space. The two smaller bedrooms include a shared full-bath located in the hall. The shared bath is cute with an autumn leaf theme.

The living room includes a sofa bed for an additional sleeping option.

Remember this is a pet free home. A great pick for those with pet allergies.

Dream Catcher is an ideal property for renters looking for a "home-away-from-home" to enjoy during their mountain escape. It is a beautiful, well-maintained home, with a thoughtful layout that lends itself to spending quality time with family and friends.

Features: Gas Fireplace, Beautiful Mountain Décor, High Ceilings, Viking Professional Appliances, Four-Sided Glass Fireplace, TV/VCR/DVD, Flat Screen TVs, DVD Player, Incredible Kitchen with Dinning for 8, Beautiful Decks, Fenced Backyard, Mountain Views, Towels and Linens Provided.

Note: This home does not feature a barbecue. Tenants will have to provide their own

name: Eagle Wings - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: Queen, Twin over Twin Bunk (Entry Level)

description:
Soar on Eagle Wings for your next Big Bear vacation at this pleasantly appointed cabin with peek-a-boo views of the lake from the upper deck and living room. Eagle Wings has a bit of Hollywood history— It was Cecil B.  DeMille’s lake house. DeMille founded Paramount Pictures. Situated near  the end of Inspiration Point, a peninsula of Boulder Bay, the cul-de-sac  has no through traffic. And the driveway is flat which makes snow  season in the mountains easier to access.

This reverse floor plan home welcomes you with a large entry with plenty of room to store your adventure gear.  The main living space is on the upper level and features a wood burning fireplace, power reclining sofa, Smart TV with DVD player, and a selection of movies.  The dining table has plenty of room for with additional seating at the kitchen counter.  The kitchen is stocked with all the basics and includes a gas range, dishwasher, coffee pot, microwave and toaster oven.  Step out to the deck for grilling on the propane barbecue or enjoy a cocktail while you watch the boats in the distance.

Just off the living room is a half bathroom and the master suite with king bed and full bathroom with large jetted jacuzzi tub, shower and double sinks.  Plenty of closet space is available for your suitcases and clothes.

Down on the entry level you will find more comfortable space to call home while you are away.  A family room with pull-out sofa, Smart TV with DVD, desks, and access to the front patio.  A kitchenette/wet bar is convenient for enjoying a cup of coffee in the morning and includes a coffee maker and microwave.  Just off the family room is a 3/4 bathroom, small game room with Foosball table, and bedroom with queen and twin over twin bunk.  Back through the entry and down the hallway is a full bathroom, access to the two car garage and laundry room, and last bedroom with two queen beds.

The backyard features a small dog run and an apple tree.

This cabin is a great option for your next family vacation!

Features: Lake View, Close To Boulder Bay, Wood Burning Fireplace, Smart TVs, DVD, Propane Barbecue, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Microwave, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Eagle Point Retreat - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Suite: King, TV with Cable, Full Bathroom, Private Deck (Upper Level)

description:
Hot Tub NOT available for use until after Labor Day holiday.

Great location for year round fun in Big Bear Lake! Only a few minutes drive to The Village, mountain resorts and the lake. Just a short walk to the shuttle bus to Snow Summit and Bear Mountain.  All the amenities you want for a great vacation with a cozy, cabin feel. Features a split level, open floor plan. This cabin is hard to beat for a family getaway!

The living room features comfortable seating on the leather sofas, a gas fireplace, and viewing entertainment on the flat screen TV with cable, DVD, and Blue Ray.  The room opens up to the kitchen with bar seating and the conveniences of a gas stove, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot. The dining area has deck access where you will find a patio table and chairs to relax on while sitting under the mature pine trees. Two small (camping size) propane barbeques are nice for grilling.

The whole family will get to have fun playing a game of pool in the main living room, or in the game room (garage) while playing ping pong and air hockey while watching TV with Cable or relaxing on the leather sofa. An indoor hot tub is perfect for year round relaxation.

Bedrooms are located up a short flight of stairs to the upper level.  The master suite has a private deck, TV with cable, attached full bathroom and king bed.  The second bedroom has a queen, and the third bedroom has two twin over twin bunks, perfect for the kids or kids at heart. A half bathroom is located on lower level and a full bathroom is just outside the bedrooms on the upper level.

You are renting a home with an interior spa. By signing the agreement, you are taking full responsibility for  your groups safety.

Features: Indoor Hot Tub, Wi-Fi  Internet, Cable, DVD, Blue Ray, Washer and Dryer, Pool Table, Ping Pong Table, Air Hockey, Gas Stove, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Partially Fenced Flat Yard, Towels and Linens Provided

DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs!

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with a few dated features or appliances.

name: Eden at the Lake - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 1: King with Private Bathroom & TV (Middle Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 2: King with Private Bathroom & TV (Middle Level)

description:
This large family orientated home is perfect for groups facilitating 4 spacious bedrooms for an occupancy of 16 guests. Located down a quiet road within walking distance to the lake and marina, it is the faultless location for some peace and quiet on your vacation. Many rooms are facilitated with a balcony with a peek-a-boo view of the lake and the boat docks along the shore.

The entry level provides access to the garage and back yard where you will find the hot tub to soak up the bubbles and to release those tight muscles and plenty of room for the kids to run and play. A ping pong table is in the garage for additional fun as well as a bathroom and laundry room.

One level up on the middle floor are 4 large bedrooms. Two master suites, each with a king bed have private bathrooms, TVs with cable and DVD players, and lake views. The third bedroom has a queen bed, access to the full hallway bathroom, and a deck. The last bedroom has two twin over full bunks and TV with DVD player.

The top floor features an open plan layout with entertainment for the whole family, entailing a full size pool table, a poker table and also a large television with cable to relax and watch. Prepare yourself a drink at the wet bar with all the necessities you will need to make the desired drink. Dine in with a home cooked meal within the dining area seating up to 8 guests.  The convertible bumper pool/poker table provides extra table seating or an evening of fun.  The kitchen has ample counter space with granite counters, gas range, dishwasher, microwave, and coffee pot.  When the cooler weather is here, relax on the large sofa and start up the wood fire to indulge in the warmth adding ambiance to the room that is decorated with a traditional Big Bear theme featuring decorations of sleds and detailed carved bears.  A half bathroom is also on this level.

Step out to the back covered deck and grill on the propane barbecue or just sit back and relax and admire the views.

Features: Open Floor Plan, Garage Parking, Walk to Lake and Marina, Cable, Internet, Hot Tub, Flat Screen TVs, Propane Barbeque, Pool Table, Poker Table, Washer & Dryer,  Wood Burning Fireplace, Tree and Lake views, Dishwasher, Gas Range, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Ping Pong Table, Towels and Linens Provided

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Falling Leaf Retreat - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: King and Twin over Twin Bunkbed, Fireplace (Upper Level)

description:
Falling Leaf Retreat is sure to make your mountain getaway one to remember. With peek-a-boo lake views, a hot tub and barbeque located on a quiet dead end street, this is the cabin your family will love.

The open, airy great room features a wood burning stove style fireplace, vaulted wood ceilings with skylight and ceiling fan, comfortable sofas, TV with cable or DVD, dining area, large open kitchen and separate mud room with laundry and sink. Step out to the wrap around deck from the dining area or mud room for easy access to the gas barbeque and hot tub.  A 3/4 bathroom is conveniently located off the living room.

Stay connected while preparing a snack or meal in the kitchen complete with gas stove, microwave, oven, coffee pot, dishwasher and breakfast bar.

In the back of the house you will find the master bedroom.  Sleep comfortably in the king bed while warming up with the wood burning fireplace.  Watch cable TV or DVD on the large flat screen or step outside on the deck and soak in the hot tub.  A full private bathroom makes the spacious suite complete.

Upstairs is two more large bedrooms and full bathroom off the hallway.  The first bedroom has a king and Twin over Twin bunk bed, wood burning fireplace, private deck and TV with cable or DVD.  The second bedroom has a queen bed and TV with DVD and a computer.

The garage features a dart board and pool table for additional fun. (Pictures Coming Soon)

Features: 3 Wood Burning Fireplaces, Hot Tub, Gas Barbeque, Laundry, Cable TV, Peek-A-Boo Lake Views, Decks, Quiet Street, Dishwasher, Gas Stove, Microwave, Internet, Pool Table, Towels and Linens Provided.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few dated features or appliances.

name: Forest Hollow - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Hot tub coming soon...

Enjoy a weekend in Big Bear at Forest Hollow!  This delightful cabin is close to marinas, hiking trails, restaurants and just minutes from everything Big Bear has to offer!

The living room features cathedral ceilings, floor to ceiling windows, wood floors, a river rock gas fireplace, comfortable seating and a large smart flat screen TV with cable and Netflix availabilty. Spend an evening playing bumper pool or try your luck at thepoker/pool table combo! Just around the corner is the spacious kitchen with breakfast table, bar seating and stainless steel appliances including gas range, microwave, coffee pot and dishwasher.  Enjoy relaxing on the back deck in the fresh mountain air.

Down a short hall is a 3/4 bathroom with large shower and first bedroom with a queen and twin over twin bunk.  Upstairs are two more bedrooms and a full bathroom.  The master bedroom has a king bed, TV and access to the back upper deck.  The last bedroom has a queen, twin over twin bunk and access to the back upper deck.

The kids will enjoy playing in the back yard or take a stroll through the neighborhood.  Family memories are sure to be made at Forest Hollow!

Features: Close to Marinas, Hiking Trails, Restaurants, Garage Parking, Gas Fireplace, Stainless Steel Gas BBQ, Flat Screen TVs, Internet, Bumper Pool, Poker/Pool Table Combo, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Range, Coffee Pot, Dishwasher, Microwave, Central Heat, Washer/Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.

name: Four Seasons Lakefront - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
As of September 26, 2018, the water depth for dock use is 4 feet to 8 feet deep. 

This sophisticated, lakefront mountain retreat combines luxury and comfort overlooking the water and mountains beyond.  There is room for everyone to spread out with 6 bedrooms, 6 bathrooms, 3 living spaces and a game room.

The main level has an intimate formal dining area with long table and plush chairs.  The living room feels open and bright with French doors leading out to the deck overlooking the water and high ceilings.  You won't want to venture far from the gas fireplace and warmth and comfort of the sofas while you watch a show on the TV with cable.  The kitchen completes the great room with granite counters, bar seating, stainless steel appliances including large side-by-side refrigerator, dishwasher, professional grade gas range with double oven and coffee pot.  Sip on a cup of coffee at the breakfast table while watching the boats and wildlife right in your backyard.  A half bathroom and laundry room are just down the hallway leading to the garage.  Savor the sunset over the lake from the deck while you grill on the propane barbecue.

The main level features the first bedroom suite with king bed, back deck access, and private bathroom with double sinks, soaking tub, shower and separate toilet room.

For an evening of entertainment head downstairs to the lower level.  The family room has a sofa for stretching out while watching the game on the big screen TV.  Spend your nights playing a game of poker, or try your luck on the pool table that sits in front of the fireplace and overlooks the lake.  A tasting room provides privacy for time spent conversing with friends while sharing your favorite bottle of wine.  A half bathroom is just off the living space.  Step out to the lower back patio and watch the kids explore the yard or head down to the water's edge. Two bedroom suites are on the lower level, each with lake views, a king bed and private full bathrooms.

Upstairs on the top level is more space for everyone to enjoy.  The loft looks down to the living room below and has lake views from the high windows.  Sit back and relax on the large wraparound sofa for comfortable viewing of the large screen TV with cable and DVD player. A large bedroom suite features a sitting area, king bed, lake views, and private bathroom with double sinks, and separate room with toilet and shower.  Across the way is another bedroom with king bed and lake views.  A full bathroom is in the hall that connects the spaces with a sitting area and the last bedroom with two twins and two sleeper sofas.

This warm and welcoming, lakefront home will surely provide the perfect retreat for your family vacation in Big Bear Lake.

Note: Lake levels vary throughout the year and boat docks availability is not guaranteed at the time of your arrival. Destination Big Bear is not responsible for the level of water in the lake during the course of guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most up-to-date lake levels for lakefront properties.

Features: Lakefront, Lake Views, Close to Marina, 3 Living Rooms, Sophisticated Decor, 2 Car Garage, Gas Fireplaces, Propane Barbecue, Gourmet Kitchen, Professional Gas Range, Double Oven, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Wireless Internet, Cable, Decks, Dock (side tie only when lake levels are high enough), Pool Table, Card Table, Central Heat, Washer & Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Escape to Fun - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Escape to Fun is a condo located just feet from the base of Snow Summit, making it an ideal rental for vacationers looking to enjoy the slopes in the winter, or mountain biking and hiking in the summer. It's just minutes to the main town, where you can enjoy Big Bear's many shops, restaurants, and activities. 

The exterior of the condo is painted a cheerful red with brown trim and parking is conveniently located directly in front of the unit. Walk up a set of ten steps to the front door, where you are greeted with a "Welcome to the Cabin" sign.

Step inside and turn to the closet on your left to discover a stacked washer and dryer. 

The open plan living area has high ceilings, a ceiling fan, and carpet. On the right, you'll find the kitchen, which is stocked with all the tools that you'll need to create a home-cooked meal. The kitchen has granite counter tops and a window with views of the front of the condo. Features of the kitchen include: microwave, dishwasher, electric can opener, gas range, and coffee pot. 

Serve your meals at the dining table which seats six. The breakfast bar, which seats four, is a fun option for the kids. 

You'll feel like you're at the cinema when watching your favorite movie on the reclining leather sofa. Your movie experience will be complete with the flat-screen television, surround sound, DVD player, and cable. Even though you're vacationing in the mountains, Wifi will keep you connected to friends back home. Take a peek in the cabinet and you'll discover more entertainment options: puzzles, board games, and small toys. Make sure to challenge your friends and family to a game on the mini air-hockey table. The wood-burning fireplace will fill the room with warmth and ambiance.

Need some fresh, mountain air? A sliding door with access to the deck is located near the dining table. Use the propane BBQ to grill a juicy steak for dinner.

Head downstairs to find three bedrooms and two bathrooms.

The master bedroom features a king bed, flat-screen television with cable, and a window with views of the complex. The master bedroom includes a full, en suite bathroom. 

The second bedroom features a queen bed and a window with views of the complex.

The third bedroom features a twin over twin bunk bed and is perfect for the kids. This room has a window with views of the front of the house. It also has a pocket door that is high, but does not reach the bottom of the floor, not providing complete privacy to the guests staying in this room. 

A full bathroom is located in the hall to be shared between the guests staying in the second and third bedrooms. 

Escape to Fun is a cozy condo in an ideal location. It's perfect for a small family or group. Make Escape to Fun the destination for your Big Bear vacation!

Features: Walk to Snow Summit, Wood-Burning Fireplace, Wifi, DVD Player, Cable, Mini Air Hockey Table, Games, Ceiling Fan, Deck, Propane BBQ, Microwave, Electric Can Opener, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Granite Counter Tops, Gas Range, Washer and Dryer.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.

name: Fox Canyon - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 1: King and Twin with a Full Bath (Master)
arrangements.Guest Room: Full over Full Bunk and Queen (Lower level)

description:
Nestled among the trees in the Fox Farm area just 2.2 miles from Bear Mountain, this home has a comfortable feel in a peaceful and quiet setting. Resting in a quiet neighborhood, it offers a great place for kids to play. Fox Canyon is a four bedroom, three bathroom house with a spa, deck, fenced yard.

This home has an open floor plan. The kitchen, dining and family room together give plenty of space for gatherings and holidays. The kitchen is fully equipped with new dishes, pots and pans and needed amenities. There is a dishwasher and laundry use. You can warm by the fire, relax with a book by the bay window or watch your favorite show on the flat screen TV. Internet, smart TV, and Roku are available.

On the upper level, the master bedroom has a king bed and a private bathroom. There is also a twin for extra sleeping space. Two guest rooms, both with queen beds share a full bath. On the lower level, the bonus room has a full over full pine log bunk bed and a queen. This room is great for kids and has a flat screen TV for movies and games.

There is a fenced in back yard. A large deck with a patio table and propane barbeque for grilling. Take in the mountain air or night skies in the outdoor spa. Watch the changing of the seasons with surrounding trees and beautifully landscaped yard. This home is just minutes from Bear Mountain Resort, the Moonridge Zoo, Snow Summit Resort, the Convention Center, Big Bear Lake and shopping in the Village.

Note: This home is NOT pet friendly. Any pets in home will result in loss of deposit.

name: Emerald Alps - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Emerald Alps has everything you want for a family retreat to Big Bear Lake: views, hot tub, barbeque, fireplace, Foosball and did we mention the view?  Plus it's just a short drive to Bear Mountain!

Perched high in the hills with views of the lake and mountains, this reverse floor plan cabin welcomes you with floor to ceiling windows, natural light, wood floors and vaulted ceilings.  The open and airy living room has an extra long wrap around sofa,  flat screen TV with sound bar, DVD player and online capabilities (no cable TV).  The wood burning fireplace will keep you cozy and warm on chilly winter nights.  The kitchen is open to the living room so you won't miss a thing while cooking or making a cup of coffee.  A full bathroom with tub/shower combo and stacked washer and dryer is conveniently located on the main level.

The upper level of the back deck has views of the lake, trees and mountains.  Enjoy your time grilling on the propane barbeque or just relaxing in the fresh air.

Downstairs you will find the two bedrooms.  The master bedroom has a queen bed, lake views, TV with DVD player and 3/4 bathroom.  The second bedroom has a full over full bunk bed, TV with DVD player, views and a Foosball table.  Lower deck access is in the hall so you can step outside to the hot tub.  This is cabin is sure to be a favorite destination for family vacations!

name: Fireside Family Resort - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Queen, Twin over Queen Bunk (Upper/Main Level)

description:
If you are looking for the best of Big Bear then look no further than Fireside Family Resort!  This cabin is the ultimate vacation destination with a private basketball court, sand volleyball court, hot tub, horseshoe pit, pool table, Foosball, barbecue, and so much more!

This split level cabin features an upper level great room with living room, kitchen and dining, as well as a family room.  The living room centers around the cozy wood burning fireplace that will add ambiance and warmth while you watch your favorite show or movie on the large flat screen TV with cable and DVD player.  Step over to the custom kitchen with knotty pine cabinets, granite counters and stainless steel appliances.  Preparing a meal will be a breeze with the professional grade gas range, microwave, dishwasher, coffee pot and Keurig machine.  There is plenty of dining space with a table for 8 and additional seating for 7 at the breakfast bar.  Just off the great room is the wraparound deck with seating and a propane barbecue.

The upper main level also has a comfortable family room with extra spacious sofa and TV with cable, as well as three bedrooms.  The first master bedroom has a king bed, TV with cable, and a private 3/4 bathroom with double sinks.  The next bedroom has a queen bed, and the third bedroom has a queen, twin over queen bunk, and TV with cable and DVD player.  In the hallway is a full bathroom.

Downstairs you will find three more bedrooms as well as the game room with a pool table, Foosball table, TV with cable, 3/4 bathroom and the laundry room.  The second master suite is sure to be a favorite with a king bed, dual seat reclining sofa, TV with cable, back deck access, and a private bathroom with jet tub, large shower, double sinks and TV with cable access.  The fifth bedroom has two queen beds, and the last bedroom has a full bed.  There is space for everyone to get a good nights sleep!

The back yard is the highlight of the cabin, especially in the spring, summer and fall!  Everyone will have a blast shooting hoops on the basketball court, or diving for a spiked ball on the sand volleyball court.  If taking it easy is what you are looking for, toss a few rounds of horseshoes or just sit back and soak away your troubles in the hot tub.  This cabin has something for everyone!

Features: Close to Grocery Stores and Conveniences, Basketball Court, Sand Volleyball Court, Pool Table, Foosball, Hot Tub, Horseshoe Pit, Garage Parking for 2, Flat Parking, Large Yard, Propane Barbecue, Wood Burning Fireplace, Wood Floors Throughout, Luxury Finishes, Stainless Steel Appliances, Professional Grade Gas Range, Dishwasher, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Keurig Machine, Cable, DVD, Internet,  2 Master Bedrooms, Central Heat, Ceiling Fans, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided.

name: Golden Oak Estate - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: 2 Twin Trundles, Twin over Queen Bunk (Upstairs)

description:
Golden Oak Estate is an incredible log style masterpiece located in the highly desirable Castle Glen Estates neighborhood. This stunning home features 3,400 of living space, gorgeous views of the mountains, and is just a short drive to all of Big Bear's shops, restaurants, and attractions.

Pull into the long driveway and park right next to the front entrance. A cheerful bear statue with a lamp is waiting to welcome you to Golden Oak Estate. It's just a few steps to the expansive front porch. Enjoy the mountain views and quiet neighborhood when you relax on the wood porch swing.

Enter the home to be greeted by thirty foot soaring ceilings, wood floors, and a spacious, open-plan living area. Enormous picture windows fill the room with natural light. The living room is so big, that it offers multiple seating arrangements, including plush chairs and a cozy couch. The stone wood-burning fireplace provides both warmth and ambiance on a chilly night. Watch your favorite movie on the flat-screen television with DirecTV, Blue-Ray player, and Polk audio system. 

The kitchen is a chef's dream with plenty of counter space and storage. It's perfect for hosting a holiday feast or an afternoon of baking delicious treats. The kitchen has beautiful granite counter tops, a center island, and stainless steel appliances. Enjoy views of the backyard while cooking. Features of the kitchen include, a microwave, coffee pot, rice cooker, gas oven, and dishwasher.

Golden Oak Estate offers three different dining tables, all located near the kitchen. The main dining table is wood and seats eight. A table for four is located next to the main dining table. On the other side of the room, you'll find a high-top table for four. Additionally, the breakfast bar has seats for four. This is a great home for entertaining and creating vacation memories.

Enter the back deck through a slider on the patio. Grill a juicy steak on your choice of a propane or charcoal bbq. Enjoy your meal al fresco on the patio dining table for four. Relax in the hot tub and soothe those sore muscles after a day on the slopes. The backyard is landscaped with a fish pond, a rock feature with a stream, and wood animal statues. Have a bit of old-fashion fun with the horseshoe pitch or bocce ball court.. The tiered backyard is a sanctuary, where you can enjoy nature.

On the first floor of the home, left of the main entrance, you will find a small office area with a desk. You will also find the master bedroom suite. The master bedroom features a king bed, high ceilings, and a ceiling fan. Enjoy a private deck and additional access to the front porch. Make your master suite feel extra cozy with the wood-burning fireplace. Stay entertained with the flat-screen television with Directv and DVD player. An en suite bathroom includes a soaking tub, double sinks, and a glass shower.

Next to the kitchen, there is a hall where you'll find a full bathroom. If the need to do laundry should arise, a side by side washer and dryer is also located in this hallway. Near the laundry room, there is an area with coat hooks and a bench, the perfect place to store your shoes and outdoor gear.

Head upstairs to discover a bonus living area. This space is a loft, overlooking the living room. Show off your musical talent on the grand piano. Lounge on the couch and chaise, while watching television or playing a game on the X-Box 360. A table with four chairs provides a great spot for playing a board game. Keep cool with the ceiling fan or head out on the deck with views of the backyard to take in the mountain air.

A 3/4 bathroom is located in the hall at the top of the stairs. This bathroom includes a glass walk-in shower and is to be shared by the three upstairs bedrooms.

The second bedroom has a twin over queen bunk and a twin trundle bed. It has a ceiling fan and private access to two decks, one with views of the backyard and the other with views of the side of the house.

The third bedroom has a queen and a twin bed. It has a ceiling fan and private access to two decks, one with views of the side of the house and the other with views of the front of the home.

The fourth bedroom has a twin over twin bunk bed. It has a ceiling fan and private deck access to the front of the house.

Golden Oak Estate is a grand home that is perfect for large families or groups. Make it your home to create precious vacation memories.

Features: Garage Parking for 3 Cars plus 3 Cars in Driveway, Linens and Towels Provided, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Two Blu Ray Players & Flat Screens TVs, Cable TV, WiFi, Toys and Games Provided, X-Box 360, Grand Piano, Internet, Furnished Deck, Propane Barbeque, Charcoal BBQ, Wood Floors, Granite Counter Tops, Recessed Lighting, Central Forced Heat, Ceiling Fans, Two Fireplaces, Washers/Dryer, Jacuzzi Tub, Dual Sinks, Mountain Views, Walking Distance to Lake and Stanfield Marsh Boardwalk, Large Lot with Waterfalls and Ponds
Note: Please stay on the marked path when using the tiered backyard.

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Fox Lookout - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
If you’re looking for the perfect family getaway set in an ideal location, Fox Lookout is the place for you! Located in a neighborhood near Bear Mountain, Fox Lookout will keep you and your group close to all the Big Bear action. Whether you’re wanting to hike, bike, ski, or golf, this is the ideal home away from home for you!

As soon as you walk in to this smart home, feel free to kick off your boots in the entry hall. The first level has an open concept featuring the living area with a beautiful, modern leather sofa as well as a chair with an ottoman. Relax near the wood burning fireplace or catch the big game on the large flat screen TV with Roku TV, cable, Wifi, and a Blu-Ray player! The dining area features seating for six and views of the slopes! Head out to the deck to the propane grill and whip up dinner for the whole gang! There is seating on the deck for two. Perfect for a morning cup of coffee or a sunset toast with a mountain view! The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, including a gas range, microwave, dishwasher and all you would need for a great family dinner night in. The kitchen also includes bar seating for three!

For your convenience, there is a stacked washer and dryer in the hallway leading to the bedrooms. Bedroom one features a full size bed and super cute décor! Bedroom two is perfect for the kiddos! It includes two twin size beds, a flat screen Roku TV for movie night, and an Xbox 360! There is a full bath complete with tub and shower as well.

On the second level, enjoy a friendly game of shuffleboard, a nice session on the yoga mat, or play a tune on the acoustic guitar. There is a futon for lounging with beautiful views of our ski slopes at Bear Mountain. There is a full size bathroom on the second level, as well as the master bedroom featuring a queen size bed, and a flat screen Roku TV with a DVD player.

The fenced back yard has a hot tub for a nice soak after a long day of Big Bear fun! 

Fox Lookout has everything you could ever need for an ideal vacation. Close to the popular Moonridge area, you’ll be close to coffee, dining, as well as the golf course, Bear Mountain, and the Big Bear Alpine Zoo! Whether you want to relax or stay busy with activities, this is the perfect place for you!

Features: Wink, Roku TV, Cable, Wifi, Xbox 360, Hot Tub, Stainless Steel Appliances, Shuffleboard, Wood Burning Fireplace, Propane Grill, Fenced Yard, Views of Ski Slopes, Deck, Close to Bear Mountain

name: Grand Lakefront Escape - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Twin over Full Bunk and Twin Trundle (Middle Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 5: Twin over Full Bunk and Twin Trundle (Lower Level)

description:
As of September 26, 2018, the water depth for dock use about 1 foot to 3 feet deep. 

If you are looking for property that has it all, then Grand Lakefront Escape is where you will want to stay!  This luxury home has a private movie theater, hot tub, game tables, seven bedrooms, is located right on the lake and of course, the views! 

This breathtaking, three story home has been crafted with the finest materials for a luxury experience in the mountains.  The main floor features cathedral ceilings, a gas fireplace with hand carved travertine marble surround, hardwood floors, rich accents and lake views through the dining area.  The living room has an oversized sofa for the family to gather in front of the gas fireplace and is perfect for holiday vacations to the lake.  The dining area offers a place to gather for meals at the European style solid wood table with access to the back deck and beautiful lake views.  The gourmet kitchen has an oversize island for meal preparation, stainless steel appliances, a 6 burner professional grade gas range with grill, griddle and double oven, microwave, coffee pot and dishwasher. This level also has a half bathroom. Enjoy the garage with parking, great for winter months.  

The back deck offers a hot tub with lake and starry night sky views, as well as a barbecue to enjoy while admiring the lake vista and taking in the fresh mountain air.  During the warmer months you can take advantage of the private dock with room for your personal watercraft or enjoy easy access to the nearby marina.

Head to the game room just a half level down for hours of entertainment possibilities.  Spend some time playing pool, a game of cards or Foosball.  A flat screen TV with DVD player will also keep you entertained.  If that doesn't suit the group then head down to the lowest level and into your own private 12 seat movie theater with surround sound and comfortable reclining seats with cup holders.  Bring your favorite DVD or Blu-Ray.  A full size fridge, microwave, granite counter top and sink make the theater room the place to be!

The first master suite is on the second level with a queen bed and bathroom worth writing home about!  It has a 20 jet twin steamer and Jacuzzi shower, washer and dryer and outdoor access.  The second level also has three more bedrooms, each with a flat screen TV and DVD player built in. One bedroom has a king with private bathroom, the next has a twin over full bunk and a twin with trundle.  The last bedroom on this level has a queen bed.

The lowest level has a cozy little library area and internet access for those who can't quite get away from work responsibilities, or maybe you just want to catch up with family and friends on your laptop.  This level has a fabulous master suite that is fit for a king.  The four poster king bed is the perfect place to relax while you enjoy the lake views and gas fireplace. The private bathroom has a sunken tub and separate shower. Step out to the deck and backyard where you can stroll through the beautiful landscaping with fenced yard for the kids, relax by the small pond or head down to the waters edge.  Two more bedrooms are on this level, one with a twin over full bunk and twin with trundle. The last bedroom is a unique experience and has been dubbed the "Roman Room" and features a king bed and mosaic tiled shower with overhead showerhead and jets.

Once you get to this cabin you might not ever want to leave! For the ultimate Big Bear Lake experience, Grand Lakefront Escape has it all!

Destination Big Bear is not responsible for the level of water in the lake during the course of guest's stay. This three bedroom, two bath rustic and functional home is just a 10 minute walk to Holloway's Marina and the lake. What a great place to gather with your friends and family to enjoy Big Bear. This home has a reverse floor plan with the main living area on the upper level that consists of an updated kitchen, cozy living room with wood burning fireplace, master bedroom and bath room.
