name: Grand Cameron Estate - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Bedroom: King, Twin Sleeper Sofa, Pack & Play (Upper Level)
arrangements.Kid's Bedroom: Twin over Twin Bunk, Twin with Trundle (Lower Level)

description:
Newly remodeled, 5 BR, gated 1.5 acre lake view estate and walk to the village with a new hot tub!

This spectacular tri-level home features hand-hewn log siding, 27’ vaulted ceilings, hardwood floors throughout, a home theatre, kids’ fun room, sleeping accommodations for up to 16+ and ample parking for 6 cars and boat trailer.

Completely fenced and gated for security, the Grand Cameron Estate offers unmatched access to all Big Bear’s amenities—4 to 6 minutes by car to Snow Summit and 10 minutes to Bear Mountain; 3 minutes by car to the lake and nearest marina and only a 5-minute walk to the Village center. (The owner provides a gate opener remote control that tenants will be   responsible for during stay. A replacement fee will be charged if gate   opener is lost or damaged.)

Inside you will find 3 levels, each with its own spacious deck, new outdoor hot tub and lake view.

From top to bottom:

Upper Floor 
Master Bedroom #1: 
Sleeps 2 in a pillow-top King-size bed along with a couch/bed suitable for a young child (2 “Pack ‘n Plays” are also available.) Of course, HDTV is provided. The private balcony/deck overlooking the lake adjoins the Master.

Master Bath: 
Enjoy virtually unlimited hot water thanks to a newly installed high-volume tankless water system capable of running 4 showers simultaneously! The master bath features double sinks, a whirlpool tub, and separate shower.

Loft: 
The loft overlooking the living, dining and kitchen areas below provides a superb view of the village and lake. Here you’ll find a full-size pool table, semi-circular wine bar, and an electronic keyboard. The loft has 2 double futons (sleeps 4) with an adjoining 1/2 bath.

Main Floor 
Kitchen: 
The gourmet island kitchen features stainless steel appliances including double ovens, microwave, a large capacity Keurig coffee maker, granite counter tops, and a 5-burner gas cooktop. It even has a separate built-in wine refrigerator.

Main Dining Area: 
Adjoining both the kitchen and living room, the open floor plan offers a semi-circular bay- windowed area with a 7’-round dining table with seating for 8. The table itself is a unique work of art. The base of the table is an inverted eucalyptus tree trunk supporting a 3/4” beveled glass top.

Extra Dining: 
An alcove area alongside the kitchen provides additional seating for 6 diners and the kitchen’s island bar adds 5 stools. Even an antique high-chair is included. In all, there is seating for up to 20 people!

Living Room: 
A 27’ vaulted log ceiling and a soaring stone wood-burning fireplace accent this spectacular gathering area. Cathedral windows overlook the village and lake beyond. A one-of-a kind hand-crafted wrought iron chandelier is suspended from the ceiling providing dimmable light from its 12 vintage sconces. A spacious outside deck, complete with gas and coal barbecues, opens up directly from the living room.

Main-floor Bedrooms: 
There are 2 bedrooms on the main floor each with a queen-size bed and a shared, full bathroom with shower. Both bedrooms have access to a common deck that faces the rear of the property, the village, and lake beyond.

Laundry Room: 
Just to the right of the entry hall and conveniently across from the two main floor bedrooms, you will find the laundry room with a washer and dryer.

Lower Floor 
Master BR #2: 
There are 2 queen-size beds with direct outside access. The bathroom associated with this bedroom is unique in that offers a combination shower and steam room with 8-person tiered seating. (This bathroom and steam shower can be accessed from a hall by all guests.)

Bunk-Bed BR: 
Up to 4 kids can sleep in the lower double bed and the upper and lower bunk beds. The associated bathroom also directly connects to the Fun Room.

Fun Room: 
Adjoining the bunkbed BR, kids and adults alike will enjoy comfortable TV viewing along with games, a “PacMan ” machine, and Foosball table.

Media Room: 
The state-of-the-art media room provides seating for 8 persons in reclining loungers tiered for unimpeded viewing of the 85” 4K UHD Sony TV. Incredible surround sound is delivered from a Sonos speaker system consisting of a center soundbar, woofer, and rear speakers. Dimmable column lighting along with track and cove lights enhance the experience. Also, the media room is heated and air conditioned.

General Features 
Inside: 
All flooring, with the exception of the bathroom floors, is hardwood. All 5 TV’s including the Media Room are HDTV’s utilizing DirecTV. (The DirecTV dish is heated to prevent signal loss during snowfall periods.) Hot water is provided via a high capacity tankless system. The entire property is fenced. The Village can be accessed either from the driveway entry or town-side gate. Security can be further enhanced by activating the in-home alarm system and/or the private entry gate. (See Destination Big Bear for particulars.)

name: Grand View Manor - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
If you are looking for the perfect place to kick back and enjoy the view, consider Grand View Manor! With extraordinary 270 degree views of Big Bear Lake, the beautiful mountains and the Village. The best views to watch the July 4th fireworks in town. Don't fight the traffic or attempt to find parking, just sit on the giant deck and enjoy your vacation. Just a 10 minute walk to the lake or the Village to enjoy shopping, a theater, entertainment, pubs and restaurants.

The homey cabin decor will make the whole family feel welcomed and comfortable.  Plenty of room to get together or find a private space to enjoy the peace and quiet of the mountain.  Sit back and relax next to one of the two fireplaces. One is wood burning and the other is gas. A few steps down from the entry way leads into an open living room, kitchen and a pool table under high ceilings and plenty of windows to enjoy the beautiful views! Separate laundry room off from the kitchen.

The master bedroom is located on the upper level with views of the lake and a private bathroom with jacuzzi bathtub along with two other bedrooms.

The lower level features a family room with ceiling fan for warmer weather.  Relax in the indoor hot tub room located on this level along with another bedroom and a bonus room.

There are multiple decks off the main living areas for your enjoyment and plenty of patio seating. Enjoy a barbeque or just sit back and star gaze!

Features: Cable, DVD Players, Flat Screen TV's, Internet, Great for Multiple Families, Hot Tub, Multiple Decks, Propane Barbeque, Garage Parking, Walk to Village, Over 3600 Square Foot, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Linens and Towels Provided

Note: DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

You are renting a home with an interior spa. By signing the agreement, you are taking full responsibility for  your groups safety.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few  dated features or appliances.

name: Gray Wolf Cabin - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Additional: 4 Twin Roll-Away Beds, Air Mattress (Lower Level)

description:
Situated in the perfect location for sweeping views of the slopes and surrounding mountains, Gray Wolf Cabin has it all!  Your family and friends will surly love the hot tub, game tables, fireplaces, gourmet kitchen and of course the views!

This cabin features a reverse floor plan and spacious great room with cathedral knotty pine ceilings, floor to ceiling windows, natural stone wood burning fireplace, two seating areas, cable TV, and brand new furnishings. The room transitions to the kitchen through the dining area.  The kitchen is a home chef's dream with two sinks, double oven, large gas cook top, wine fridge, dishwasher and huge refrigerator.  A Keurig coffee maker will make your mornings easier.  The gorgeous slab granite counters provides ample work space as well as additional seating.

The deck will be the highlight of your stay with amazing views, a hot tub and table and chairs for lounging in the fresh mountain air.  Kids will enjoy the backyard with mature trees and plenty of room to run around.  For dinner, grill on the propane barbecue.

The entry level has a half bathroom and front loading washer and dryer, convenient for longer stays.  The first master suite is also on this level and has a king bed and private full bathroom with jet tub, shower and double sinks.

For an evening of entertainment, head down to the lower level and play pool or shuffle board. Warm up by the gas fireplace, watch cable TV or prepare a cocktail at the wet bar.  Down the hall is a full bathroom and three more bedrooms.  The second master suite has a king bed, full bathroom with jet tub and double sinks.  The third bedroom has a queen bed, and the fourth bedroom has two twin over twin bunks.  There are also four twin roll-away beds for flexible sleeping arrangements, as well as a futon.

Book your Big Bear vacation at this luxury cabin!
 
Features: Slope Views, Hot Tub, Pool Table, Shuffle Board, Wood Burning Fireplace, Gas Fireplace, Deck, Propane Barbecue, Cable, Internet, Wood Floors, Gourmet Kitchen, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Stove Top, Double Oven, Dishwasher, Keurig Coffee Maker (no traditional coffee pot), Wine Fridge, 2 Sinks, Granite Counters, 2 Master Suites, Jet Tubs, Central Heat, Washer and Dryer,  Towels and Linens Provided

This is a luxury property which includes the finest furnishings, luxury building materials, and a highly consistent design theme. Luxury properties range from elegant and formal to relaxed and chic, but all appeal to guests who appreciate first-class accommodations with a designer flair.

name: Gypsy Dreams - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: Twin over Twin Bunk, Full Futon (Upper Level)

description:
Close to Bear Mountain and the new location of the Big Bear Zoo!

This adorable Big Bear home is like a gingerbread cottage, with the perfect wood accents and well manicured landscape. The prime setting to relax during your mountain getaway. Enter the home and you will find a kitchen breakfast nook with bench seating up to 6 guests.  The kitchen is well stocked with all of the amenities you will need including a gas range, microwave, dishwasher, fridge,  standard coffee maker and toaster. 

In the living room area you will find ample seating for all of your guests. Enjoy a fire in the wood burning fireplace or watch your favorite movie on the flatscreen TV. There is cable satellite and also a DVD player and stereo with CD player to enjoy your personal favorites.  Added to the living area is a bar height table for four. Perfect for a board game, or building a puzzle. 

To the left of the living area is a half bath and a stackable washer and dryer combo provided for your use. Head to the back yard to enjoy the well manicured fully fenced yard and deck area. 

Upstairs is where you will find all three bedrooms. Admire the wall to wall mural of beautiful Big Bear Lake at the top of the landing. To the right you will find the first bedroom complete with a Full size bed. The second bedroom is equipped with a Twin over Twin bunk and a Full size futon. There is a flatscreen TV wth DVD player.

Across the hall you will find a the Master bedroom with a King size bed and flatscreen TV. There is a pocket door adjoining the master to the homes full bathroom.

This home is Big Bear coziness at its best. It has all the right amenities to enjoy your vacation! 

Features: Central Heat, Wood Burning Fireplace, Fully Fenced Backyard, Flatscreen TVs, DVD Player, CD Player, Satellite Cable, Stackable Washer and Dryer, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Standard Coffee Maker, Toaster, Fridge, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Harmony Haus - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Suite: King, TV w/Cable, Full Bath (Upper Level)

description:
Find peace and Harmony in the mountains in this comfortably furnished cabin!  Centrally located for quick easy access to the resorts, The Village, lake and conveniences.

Spend your lazy days on the covered front porch listening to the birds and enjoying the breeze and fresh mountain air.  Step inside to the open floor plan living space.  The living room features a sofa, loveseat and chair for relaxing in front of the wood burning fireplace or watching your favorite shows on the flat screen TV with cable and DVD player.  Stay connected with complementary Wi-Fi.  The kitchen and dining area will make dinner time a favorite time.  There is plenty of prep space on the expansive granite counters and center island with breakfast bar seating.  The kitchen also features stainless steel appliances including gas range, microwave, dishwasher, coffee pot and wine fridge.

For entertainment and more relaxation you can head out to the garage for a game of pool, or out to the back deck for grilling on the propane barbecue or soaking in the large hot tub.  The main level has a laundry room and half bathroom for your convenience.

Upstairs is where you will get a good night's rest.  The master suite has a king bed, TV with cable, small private deck, and full ensuite bathroom.  The second bedroom has two queen beds and TV with cable.  The third bedroom has two twin over twin bunks and TV with cable.  A full bathroom off the hallway.

This cabin is sure to be a family favorite for your next vacation to Big Bear Lake!

Features: Close to Snow Summit, Centrally Located for Conveniences, Hot Tub, Deck, Pool Table, Cable, Internet, Wood Burning Fireplace, Flat Screen TVs, DVD, Stereo, Granite Counters, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Wine Fridge, Central Heat, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided.

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and mostly updated fixtures and appliances.
address: 646 Golden West Drive Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: Hearthside Haven - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Located in a quiet neighborhood, just minutes from the lake, Big Bear Village, and Snow Summit Ski resort, Hearthside Haven is a great cabin for a family vacation.

Parking is conveniently located just feet from the front door. Before you enter Hearthside Haven, you'll notice the enormous a-frame picture window at the front of the house, that fills the living room with natural light. Mature pine trees surround the property, providing privacy and creating a serene atmosphere.

High, wood-beam ceilings and the open-plan living area make the entry feel spacious. Notice the beautiful stone work on the wood-burning fire place. Snuggle up on the large, curved couch and watch a movie on the flat-screen television with a sound bar and Blue-ray player. You'll find a collection of family-friendly dvd's in a cabinet near the dining table. Use the vintage popcorn maker, found in the kitchen, to complete your movie night.

The kitchen features a unique curved island with four person breakfast bar. One of the best parts of renting a cabin, is enjoying a homemade meal with your family and friends. In the kitchen, you'll find all the basic tools that you'll need to whip up a home cooked meal. Features of the kitchen include, recessed lighting, microwave, dishwasher, gas stove, and a coffee pot. Next to the kitchen, you'll find a wood dining table with benches that can seat six.

Walk through the kitchen to discover an additional room at the back of the house. This room, with an a-frame picture window that is identical to the front of the house, includes a cozy reading chair and a four person circular table. On the table you'll find a basket of games and cards. This is the perfect spot for a poker night or perhaps a place to enjoy your morning coffee, while watching birds in the backyard.

Through this room, you can access the backyard. The backyard is fully fenced, creating a safe place for children to play. On the concrete deck, you'll find two plastic Adirondack chairs, a patio table set, and a propane bbq. Grill up a juicy steak and enjoy the fresh mountain air while dining al fresco. 

On the main level, you'll find all the bedrooms and bathrooms. Starting with the master bedroom, located furthest from the main entry door. The master bedroom features a king bed, ceiling fan, and television with Blu-ray player. This is a spacious bedroom, with a window that peaks to the side of the home. The master bedroom includes an en suite bathroom.

The second bedroom has a queen bed and a twin trundle bed. Access to the side of the house is available through a sliding door in the bedroom. For your entertainment, the second bedroom also includes a television with Blu-ray player.

The third bedroom includes a queen bed.

A "Jack and Jill" bathroom is located between the second and third bedrooms. This bathroom is accessible via a private entrance from both bedrooms and from the living room. This enormous bathroom includes a glass walk-in shower and double sinks.

Head upstairs to the loft for a bonus game room and relaxation space. The loft includes a pool table and a separate space with comfortable chairs for reading or playing games. Check out the jigsaw puzzle collection for a timeless activity that all generations can enjoy together. The A-frame picture window extends to the loft area, offering beautiful views of the backyard.

Hearthside Haven is cozy cabin that blends modern amenities with the style of a bygone era. It's ideally located close to many restaurants, shops, and Big Bear activities. Come create happy vacation memories at  Hearthside Haven!

Features: Wood-burning fireplace, Blu-ray Player, Propane BBQ, Pool Table, Fenced Yard, Great Location, Vintage Popcorn Maker, Microwave, Dishwasher, Gas Stove, and Coffee Pot.

This property is perfect for the guest who is looking for a cabin rental that won't break the bank. Generally simple decor and filled with basic furnishings and amenities that will meet most of your needs for an enjoyable vacation.

name: Hidden Oaks - Big Bear City, CA

arrangements.Master Suite: King, Full Bath, Wood Fireplace (Upper Level)

description:
This trendy, mountain oasis will make your stay in Big Bear memorable any time of year.  Whether you are escaping the heat of the desert in the summer or seeking out snow for your winter activities, Hidden Oaks will surely become your favorite place to stay.  Located a few minutes from Bear Mountain with views and a backyard of beautiful forest, kids and adults will enjoy the feeling of seclusion.

The living room features knotty pine cathedral ceilings, wood floors, floor to ceiling windows overlooking the trees beyond and a cozy wood burning fireplace.  If viewing entertainment is what you seek, there is a large flat screen TV with cable.  The large sofa has room for everyone.  The dining area is just steps away with a table for 6 plus extra seating at the breakfast bar.  The kitchen is stocked with all the basics and includes granite counters, stainless steel appliances including gas range, dishwasher, microwave, Keurig coffee maker and large refrigerator.  For a breath of fresh mountain air you can step out to the back deck with table seating and a propane barbecue.

Down the short hallway you will find a full bathroom, a washer and dryer, and the first bedroom with king bed.  Upstairs is the spacious master suite with a king bed, sitting area in front of the wood burning fireplace, small private deck, TV with cable and private full bathroom.

The kids and kid at heart will love the lower level family room that has a TV with cable, Foosball table, full bathroom, and two twin with twin trundle beds for flexible lounging and sleeping arrangements.  From here you can step out to the backyard for soaking in the hot tub or exploring the forest beyond.

No matter the season you can find your mountain bliss at Hidden Oaks in Big Bear!
NOTE: No mini fridge in lower level family room.

Features:  Forest Views and Backyard, Updated Furnishings and Features, Hot Tub, Foosball Table, Wood Floors, Carpet, Deck, Propane Barbecue, 2 Wood Burning Fireplaces, Cable, Internet, Updated Kitchen, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Microwave, Keurig Coffee Maker, Master Suite, Central Heat, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.
address: 1100 S Minton Rd Big Bear City, 92314

name: Fox Cottage - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Fox Cottage is a cozy two-story retreat located in the popular Fox Farm neighborhood. Convenience is key, as you are only minutes away from grocery stores, shops, and restaurants. Snow Summit, Bear Mountain, and the Big Bear Village, are all just a five-minute drive away. Location, location, location!

Speaking of convenience, parking at Fox Cottage is a long drive way that will allow you to park right at the front door. Enter the cabin through a bright red door that will take you to the living area of the home. The flooring is a mix of wood for high traffic areas and carpet for the living and bedrooms. 

Unwind in front of the wood burning fireplace in the living room and enjoy the entertainment system, which includes a flat screen television, DirecTv and Blu-Ray player. Peruse the DVD selection to find an old favorite or discover a new movie. You've probably picked a mountain vacation to escape the hustle and bustle, but with internet access, you're never far from civilization; if that's what you desire!

The kitchen keeps the cabin feel going with sloped knotty pine ceilings and wood counter tops. It's stocked with all of the basic tools to whip up a home cooked meal. Kitchen features include a microwave, coffee pot, and dishwasher. Speaking of eating, the back deck includes a barbecue for grilling up a meal. Seating isn't a problem, with both a kitchen breakfast bar and a four person dining table.

No one wants to do laundry on vacation, but it's always nice to have the option if needed or if you're planning an extended visit. A washer and dryer is located adjacent to the kitchen.

On the bottom level of the home, you'll also find a full size bathroom.

When it's finally time to sleep, head upstairs to find two bedrooms and a full, Jack and Jill style shared bathroom. The master bedroom includes a king bed and a television with cable. The second bedroom has a queen size bed that is located near a window, so that guests sleeping in this room can also enjoy views of nature. Additional sleeping space can be found on the sofa bed in the living room.

Walk outside and take in the fresh mountain air! The backyard, where you'll find the barbeque, is fenced has a concrete deck. 

Fox Cottage is the perfect home for a family or small group that is seeking a cozy retreat in a convenient location. 

Features: Wood Burning Fireplace, DirecTV, Blu-Ray, Barbecue, Washer & Dryer, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances

name: Hidden Treasure - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Discover Hidden Treasure in Big Bear!  This well appointed cabin is located minutes from Boulder Bay, Pleasure Point Marina, and convenience stores, and includes a hot tub!

This 2,400 sqft, 3 bedroom, 3 bath cabin welcomes you with an open and airy great room with wood floors, two sitting areas, wood burning fireplace and TV with cable.  Challenge each other to a game on the multi-video game table! The back deck will be calling your name with it's large hot tub, sitting area and propane barbecue. Past the deck you will find another hidden treasure. the game room!  You  won’t get bored playing pool, Foosball, mini basketball game and board  games!! Also in game room is flat screen TV and DVDs!

Just off the living room is the dining room and kitchen with granite counters, stainless steel appliances including gas range, dishwasher, microwave, toaster oven and coffee pot.  A laundry room and garage access with TESLA charging is just off the kitchen for your convenience.  A full bathroom is also on this level.

The master suite is on the main level and is your own private retreat with queen memory foam bed, TV with streaming, and full bathroom.  Upstairs in the loft there is a sofa for lounging, a 3/4 bathroom and two more bedrooms, each with a queen memory foam bed.

Enjoy your stay in Big Bear at this fabulous cabin!
 
NOTE: Game room is outside entrance only.

Features: Hot Tub, Game Room with Pool Table, Foosball Table, Mini Basketball, & Board Games, Close to Boulder Bay and Marina, Garage w/ TESLA charging, Propane Barbecue, Wood Fireplace, Wood Floors in Living Room, Carpet in Bedrooms, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Cable, Internet, Memory Foam Mattresses, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Heron Hideaway - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Tucked back from the shore of Big Bear Lake with peek-a-boo lake views, this cabin combines the feeling of a mountain getaway with the comforts of home.  Enjoy beautifully updated kitchen and bathrooms, pool table, and a sunken lounge area in front of the wood burning fireplace.

The main level features an open and airy living room with vaulted knotty pine and beam ceilings that opens to the loft above.  Sit back and relax in front of the wood burning fireplace with a sunken lounge as you admire natures beauty through the floor to ceiling windows. The leather sofas are the perfect spot for watching DirecTV or Blu-Ray on the large flat screen. Sit down to a family meal at the large dining table.  The kitchen has been beautifully remodeled with granite counters, tile back splash, stainless steel appliances including gas range, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot.  The back deck has a table and chairs to enjoy your morning coffee in the fresh air, or grill up dinner on the propane barbecue.

Off the hallway on the main level you will find a laundry room, full bathroom and two bedrooms.  The first bedroom has a queen bed and twin with twin trundle, while the second bedroom has a queen.  Upstairs in the loft you will find more sleeping arrangements and a central 3/4 bathroom with double sinks and room with shower and toilet.  Take your pick between a king or queen bed, and step outside on the small deck for more peek-a-boo lake views and sunshine. The last bedroom is on this level with a king bed and private bathroom with a jet tub and shower.  

Features: Peek-A-Boo Lake Views, Pool Table, Propane Barbecue, Wood Burning Fireplace, DirecTV, Blu-Ray Player, Updated Kitchen, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Deck, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

The home is near full time residents,  please be respectful... Sound does carry in the mountains. This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, upgraded kitchen and bath, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features.

name: Hawks Nest - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bonus Room: Trundle with Twin Bed Underneath (Main Level)

description:
Very nice three bedroom plus bonus room, two bath single level cabin just a 10 minute walk to Snow Summit Resort! Enjoy the slopes in the winter and the scenic chair lift for biking/hiking in the summer months.  Just a short drive to the Village where there are shops and restaurants or walk to Big Bear Blvd for a tasty meal.

Beautifully decorated interior with comfortable furnishings and tasteful cabin accents throughout. This cabin is perfect for couples, families and singles.

Enjoy a dip in the large hot tub or playing horseshoes in the large fenced backyard that is great for kids and pets. Cozy up next to the gas burning fireplace or enjoy a game of pool and watch your favorite sports team on the large flat panel TV in the game room.

The open floor plan is perfect for those who want to enjoy each others company and features beautiful wood floors and ceiling. The kitchen is stocked with all the basics with breakfast bar seating, large fridge and sliding patio doors to easily enjoy the outdoors.

The bedrooms each enjoy patio doors, comfortable beds, and the bunk bedroom offers a flat panel DVD player for entertainment if the kids want to be alone.

Rent this cabin and Summit Enchantment right next door for larger parties!

Features: Flat screen TV, Cable, Internet, DVD Players, Gas Fireplace, Outdoor Kitchen with Covered Picnic Area for Use During the Summer, Natural Gas BBQ, Butterfly/Bird Garden, Large Deck Off the Back, Walk to Snow Summit, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Linens and Towels Provided, Horseshoes, Pool Table, Hot Tub, Washer and Dryer
 
Reviews:
"Photos do not do this place justice! It was so nice and open inside! This did not feel like anyone's second home because it had absolutely everything we needed. Super well equipped kitchen (blender, crockpot, dishwasher, pots and pans!) we cooked up a feast every night we were there! "Bonus Room" has a day bed/trundle and is between 1 bedroom and the converted garage game room. This easily worked as 4th bedroom for us. Living room and open concept kitchen was spacious and great for everyone to hang out in! Would definitely stay again!"  Jamie (March 2017)

"Great location! We comfortably stayed with 6 people and could have had a few more! this cabin is walking distance to Snow Summit and is clean and welcoming. Hot tub after snowboarding is a great addition! Open floor plan in the living room/kitchen keeps the whole group together. Highly recommend!"  Ashley (December 2016)

DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

name: Hilltop Haven - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Enjoy a relaxed weekend in the mountains at this traditional Big Bear cabin.  Located in the Moonridge neighborhood with views of the surrounding mountains and lake.  Soak away your cares in the hot tub, or spend your evenings playing Foosball or the brand new 60-game PacMan console game table!

The living room features a natural stone front wood burning fireplace, views and large flat screen TV with cable.  The kitchen is just steps away and includes a gas range, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot.  Gather around the table for a family meal or game night.  The deck has a propane barbecue for grilling up your favorites.  There is also a half bathroom for your convenience. 

Take your pick of one of the three bedrooms for a good night's sleep, each with a TV and cable.  The middle level has two bedrooms, a full bathroom and laundry.   The master bedroom has access to a large, covered deck, a private 3/4 bathroom and TV with cable.  The second bedroom has a queen bed and TV with cable.  Down on the lowest level is a bedroom with a queen and TV with cable.  The main area has a Foosball table and Ms. Pac Man game, as well as TV with cable and 2 twin over twin bunks and access to the backyard where you will find the hot tub.

This is a great cabin for your next Big Bear Lake vacation!

Features: Views, Hot Tub, Foosball, Brand New 60-Game PacMan Console Game Table, Propane Barbecue, Flat Screen TVs, Laundry, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Howling Wolf Lodge - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Looking for a luxury cabin with rustic features and a mountain feel?  Then book your stay at Howling Wolf Lodge with views of Bear Mountain.

The living room features a knotty pine ceiling that opens up to the loft and is highlighted by the floor to ceiling windows and natural stone wood burning fireplace. A mining car log holder adds a bit of whimsy to the space.  Sit back and watch your favorite shows or a movie on the flat screen TV with cable.  The dining area and kitchen open up to the space so everyone can stay connected.  The kitchen has beautiful granite counters, a copper sink, gas stove, microwave, coffee pot and dishwasher.  The laundry room is just around the corner and has access to the side patio with a hot tub for soaking your stress away.  If the mood should hit, pull the propane barbecue out of the garage and grill up your favorites.

Off the main floor hallway you will find a half bathroom and the master suite with king bed, TV with cable and gorgeous bathroom with unique copper soaking tub, separate shower and double sinks.  Spend some time in the loft playing shuffle board.  A full bathroom and two more bedrooms are also upstairs that each have a queen and full bed, as well as TV with cable.

This fantastic cabin is sure to please the whole family for a wonderful getaway in Big Bear Lake!

Features:  Slope Views, Hot Tub, Wood Burning Fireplace, Propane Barbecue, Deck, Cable, Internet, Shuffleboard Table, Granite Counters, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Master Suite, Central Heat, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided
 
This is a luxury property which includes the finest furnishings, luxury building materials, and a highly consistent design theme. Luxury properties range from elegant and formal to relaxed and chic, but all appeal to guests who appreciate first-class accommodations with a designer flair.

name: Highwood Acres - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Get away for the weekend at Highwood Acres, situated back from the road on a large lot with views of Castle Glen and the unique natural rock landscape.  This 5 bedroom, reverse floor plan cabin has plenty of room for everyone!  The entry level features a beautiful entryway leading to the kitchen, living room and three of the bedrooms off a quiet hallway.

The living room is highlighted by the large windows, wood burning fireplace and knotty pine vaulted ceilings throughout the great space.  Enjoy an evening of watching TV with cable and DVD player.  The spacious kitchen is a home chef's dream with expansive granite counters, stainless steel appliances, a professional grade gas range, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot. Have a seat at the table or pull up to the breakfast bar.  The dining area connects the kitchen to the living room and also features large windows with views of the trees and boulders beyond.  Step out to the back deck for a breath of fresh mountain air.  The front deck has a nice covered seating area, propane barbecue and large hot tub for relaxing after a day full of adventure.

The entry level has a large master suite with back deck access, gas fireplace, king bed, TV with cable, and private bathroom with double sinks, and shower.  Bedroom two has a queen bed, and bedroom three has a king bed and TV with cable.  A full bathroom is nearby in the hallway.

Downstairs is the family room with seating, back deck and yard access, wood burning stove, TV with cable and DVD player and a pool table.  A highlight of the space is the beautiful bar with stained glass and wood carvings.  A 3/4 bathroom and washer and dryer are on this level for your convenience.  Two more bedrooms can be found through a small hallway.  One bedroom has two queen over queen bunks, TV with cable and a gas fireplace.  The last bedroom has a king bed and TV with cable.

There is so much room for everyone at Highwood Acres!

Features: Large Yard, Flat Driveway, Close to the Convention Center, Hot Tub, Pool Table, Propane Barbecue, Wood and Gas Fireplaces, Cable, Gourmet Kitchen, Granite Counters, Stainless Steel Appliances, Large Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided. 
Driveway to this home is shared with the home to the right behind the  garage. Please park on left side of driveway as you face the house. Tenants do not have access to the garage.  Behind the garage there is a separate home on a legal lot that has its own driveway directly parallel to this homes driveway.
The master jacuzzi is not for tenant use.

name: Hummingbear Lodge - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: Queen, Twin over Twin Bunk (Upper Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 4: Twin over Twin Bunk, 2 Twins (Lower Level)

description:
Great family cabin, centrally located for your getaway to Big Bear Lake!  Walk to Meadow Park and the lake, just a short drive to the slopes and The Village.

This split-level home is situated on a quiet cul-de-sac on a large lot with plenty of running around room, basketball hoop and deck with hot tub.  The fun continues inside in the lower level game room with a Foosball table, TV with cable and a Play Station. This level has a laundry room, 3/4 bathroom and bedroom with twin over twin bunk and two twin beds.

The main level living room has vaulted ceilings with lots of windows to let in the natural light.  A corner wood burning fireplace will keep you toasty while lounging on the large sofa watching cable TV or a movie on the Blue Ray player with sound bar.  The dining room has plenty of seating for a meal or family game night.  The kitchen is updated with stainless steel appliances and is stocked with all the basics with a gas stove, coffee pot, dishwasher, large refrigerator and deck access for grilling on the propane barbeque.

The upper level is where you will retreat for the night.  The master bedroom has a king bed and private full bathroom.  The next bedroom has a queen bed and twin over twin bunk.  The last bedroom has a queen bed and nook with classic style rocking chair and sky lights.  A 3/4 bathroom is conveniently located in the hall.

name: Indigo Moon - Big Bear City, CA

arrangements.Master Suite: King, Full Bathroom, TV w/ Cable

description:
If it's time for a mountain getaway, then Indigo Moon is just what you are looking for!  Located in the upper Moonridge neighborhood of Big Bear, just minutes from Bear Mountain, this single story cabin with elevated living space has all the comforts of home. It features desirable cabin accents, including a knotty pine vaulted ceiling, wood floors in the main living space, a large deck for outdoor relaxation, and a outdoor hot tub.

The open floor plan is perfect for family gatherings, with a large living room with plenty of couch seating, a large flat screen TV, cable, and a DVD player and wood burning fireplace for those chilly winter nights. The dining area has a beautiful log style table and chairs with additional seating at the breakfast bar.  Enjoy the expansive kitchen counter space while you prepare a meal or light snack.  The kitchen is stocked with all the basics, including a gas stove, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker and side-by-side refrigerator. Step out to the back deck for grilling on the charcoal barbeque or sit back in the shade of the mature trees.  Challenge each other to some friendly competition with a game of horseshoes! Soak in the hot tub under the stars after a long day of Big Bear fun!

When night falls, retreat to one of the three bedrooms.  The master suite has a private full bathroom, king bed and TV with cable access. The second bedroom has a queen bed and TV with cable.  The third bedroom has a twin over full bunk and separate twin bed.  A full bathroom is located in the hall as well as a washer and dryer for your convenience.

Fond memories are sure to be made during your stay in Big Bear Lake at Indigo Moon!

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing and desirable amenities.

description:
This wonderful custom log home within a half mile of Snow Summit Ski Resort is comfortable and cozy with upscale mountain decor. Perfect for couples, families or small groups.

The cozy living area with its soaring ceiling, wood floors, spectacular log interior and beautiful gas rock fireplace is warm and welcoming after a day on the slopes or at the lake. Listen to your favorite music on the brand-new stereo system with streaming online services. Extensive log style accents and mountain style decor throughout this home capture the true mountain feeling. The living room flows into the dining and kitchen areas for a great room feel. The kitchen features beautiful wood cabinetry and upgraded appliances, such as a Breville Smart Countertop Oven, keeping the warm and welcoming atmosphere of the rest of this home while offering every amenity. The loft upstairs has Foosball and pool table with windows capturing the tree views.

This home is a perfect welcome to Big Bear at its best.  After a day on the slopes or at the lake, relax and enjoy the views from the multiple decks or from the brand new June 2018 Hot Springs outdoor hot tub with seating for 6, located just off the back deck. There is endless stargazing here at night in the mountains. Keep in touch with this home's wireless internet access.

The main level master bedroom is warm and inviting with it's own river rock fireplace, private deck, California King size bed, separate bathroom access, and flat screen TV. The second and third bedrooms are upstairs off of the loft. The second bedroom features a full size bed while the third bedroom features a twin bunk bed, a single twin bed and also has new flat screen TV.

This home is ideally located only a half mile from Snow Summit Resort in one direction and half a mile from the lake the other direction. A perfect walk!  And you are less than five minutes from the Village. With such a great location, you'll truly appreciate having everything nearby while feeling tucked away in your mountain log home.

Features:  Deck, Hot Tub, Large Yard, Internet, Stereo with Streaming Services, Breville Smart Counter Top Oven, Pool Table, Foosball Table, Propane BBQ, Gas Fireplace, Log Home Accents, Central Location, Towels and Linens Provided

Note: The home has stairs or a fairly steep hill climb to access the property.

name: Into The Woods - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Bedroom/Loft: King, Twin over Full Bunk, Bathroom (Upper Level)

description:
Retreat to the mountains and go "Into The Woods" This traditional Big Bear cabin sits right at the National Forest for nature watching and strolling through the trees.  Located just minutes from Bear Mountain Resort and conveniences.  You'll feel like you've gotten away from it all while being close to everything!

The main level features wood floors and knotty pine walls and ceiling creating warmth and that mountain cabin feel you are looking for.  The floor to ceiling windows and sliding door overlook the back deck and natural beauty of the forest beyond.  The great room brings everyone together with the living room featuring a wood burning fireplace and TV with cable, XBox, and a sound bar. The dining area has a table with room for 6 with extra seating at the kitchen counter.  The kitchen has all the upgrades you are looking for with granite counters and stainless steel appliances including gas range, dishwasher, microwave, and coffee pot.

Step outside to the back deck and enjoy the fresh mountain air while you relax on the swing or outdoor hot tub and grill on the propane barbecue.

The main floor has two bedrooms, each with a queen bed.  A full bathroom and washer and dryer are also on the main level.  Upstairs in the open loft is the master bedroom with king bed, twin over full bunk, and a bathroom with a stand up shower.

This is a great cabin for a family getaway, any time of year!

Note: You will need a four wheel drive vehicle in the winter time to get to this cabin!

name: Johnson Family Den - Big Bear Lake , CA

arrangements.Master Suite: King, Full Bath, TV w/ Cable

description:
From our family to yours, you will love the open airy, mountain comfort of Johnson Family Den!  Located just steps from the resort shuttle lot, minutes from Snow Summit, and a quick drive to the grocery stores, the Village and lake!

The great room will wow you with it's knotty pine cathedral ceilings, beautiful windows with plenty of natural light, wood floors and luxury finishes.  The living room focuses around the cozy gas only fireplace and large flat screen TV with cable and Blu-Ray player.  Spend an evening playing pool or gather around the dining table for a game of cards or family meal.  The kitchen features expansive granite counter tops, bar seating, stainless steel appliances including gas range, dishwasher, microwave, coffee pot and Keurig machine.  For extended stays, take advantage of the washer and dryer located down the hallway on your way to the garage with 2 parking spots.

For time well spent outdoors, head out to the back deck with natural gas barbecue, seating and a large hot tub with hard cover gazebo which offers both privacy and cover from the elements.

Down the hallway you will find the three bedrooms and a full bathroom.  The master suite has a king bed, TV with cable and DVD player, access to the back deck, and a private on-suite bathroom with corner tub, shower, double sinks and separate toilet room.  The second bedroom has a king bed and TV with cable.  The last bedroom has a queen, twin over twin bunk and TV with cable.

Your family trip to Big Bear will surely be memorable for all the right reasons when you stay at this beautiful mountain retreat!

name: Knotty by Nature - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
When you arrive to this property that is within walking distance (just 400 yards away) to Bear Mountain Resort, Big Bear Alpine Zoo, and Bear Mountain Golf Course, you will be happy you booked! A long driveway leading you to a real Big Bear cabin. A perfect destination to get away any time of year. Enjoy the peace and quiet!

The first floor is beautifully decorated with hardwood floors throughout. A large flat screen TV and blu-ray player are located in the living room, which also features a wood burning fireplace, a leather loveseat with a matching leather sofa that includes a pullout bed.

The kitchen has gorgeous granite countertops and all you need to prepare dinner for a lovely night in. Stainless steel appliances throughout including a gas cook top, microwave, coffee maker and toaster oven as well as a conventional oven for your convenience. The dining area has seating for six and features a beautiful Big Bear-themed light fixture. Just off of the dining area is a deck with expansive forest views and a propane grill. Perfect for summer barbeques! During the winter season the kids can enjoy the snow play area which is within a few steps of the cabin!

The bedroom on the first level features mountain views and a queen bed. Just outside the door will be the master bath with a shower, tub and gorgeous stonework on the walls. Upstairs, bedroom two has a queen size bed with beautiful wood throughout, mountain views and a flat screen TV. A deck is just off bedroom two for even more views, enjoying our amazing weather and some star gazing! A half bath is conveniently located between bedroom two and bedroom three. The super cute third bedroom has two twin beds and is perfect for the little ones with bright colors and décor!

Knotty by Nature is the perfect family getaway!

Features: Flat Screen TVs, Wood Burning Fireplace, Decks, Gas range BBQ, Parking, Carpeted Floors, Walk to Bear Mountain, Spacious Yard (not fenced), Stainless Steel Appliances, Blu-Ray, Wood Floors, Mountain Views

name: Lake House of Love - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Lake House of Love is a beautiful home located in a quiet neighborhood near Metcalf Bay. This home has recently been renovated and is filled with modern upgrades. Mature pine trees surround the property.

You'll be greeted by a woodpecker door knocker at the front entrance of this charming, cornflower blue home. Enter the house to find yourself in the open-plan living area. Wood floors and recessed lighting are featured throughout the property. Relax on the sofa and listen to your favorite music on the Bose sound system. A flat-screen television with Roku provides additional entertainment.

The kitchen features a large marble island, which doubles-up as a dining table that seats six. The island includes an oversize and extra deep stainless steel sink. The island makes the kitchen a wonderful place to share delicious creations with family and friends. Other kitchen features include a gas stove, granite counter tops, blender, dishwasher, microwave, and coffee pot. Sliding barn doors are a beautiful way to conceal storage areas near the kitchen.

A half-bath is located near the kitchen.

A patio sliding door located adjacent to the kitchen, provides easy access to the fabulous deck. You'll love this space for outdoor entertaining. You'll feel like a professional chef with the Lion Gourmet BBQ. The deck includes custom, built-in wood benches and lounge areas. A string of outdoor lights completes the festive atmosphere. Have a BBQ and enjoy this wonderful outdoor space!

When its time for bed, head upstairs for your choice of two bedrooms, both with en suite bathrooms.

The master bedroom includes a king bed and a flat screen television. Enjoy the fresh mountain air from your private balcony that includes comfortable chairs and views of the front of the house. From this balcony and the master bedroom windows, you will have beautiful peek-a-boo views of the lake. The en suite master bathroom is a true oasis. Take a relaxing bath in the elegant claw-foot bath tub. This throughly modern bathroom does include one touch to remind you that you're in the mountains; a antler horn chandelier that hangs over the bathtub. The newly remodeled shower features a beautiful stone surface and a rain-style showerhead. There is plenty of room to get ready with his and hers double-sinks. The toilet is in its own room for additional privacy. 

The second bedroom has a queen bed and television. A private deck provides views of the side of the house. The remodeled 3/4 bathroom includes a modern stone and glass shower.

Lake House of Love features a guest house, located behind the main house. The  guest house is a great bonus for large groups, including multiple-family vacations.

Enter the lower level of the guest house through sliding glass doors to find an open-plan living area. This area includes tiled floor, wood-paneled walls, and a ceiling fan. The kitchen area has a small stove, a mini-fridge, and a sink. You'll find seating for meals around the breakfast bar, that includes five chairs. Entertainment is at hand with the flat-screen television and wifi. Warm up with the wood-burning fireplace. Play a friendly game of pool with family and friends. This downstairs space including a full-sized mattress and full bathroom.

Use an exterior set of steps to access the upstairs portion of the guest house. This area has sloped, high ceilings and allows for plenty of natural light with large windows positioned in the ceilings. The upstairs area includes two twin beds, one queen bed, and a 1/2 bath. There is also a plush reading chair for relaxing.

Lake House of Love is a beautiful, modern home that is located close to the lake. It is just a short, eight minute drive from all the shops and restaurants in town. It's a great pick for people who enjoy entertaining and desire a home with modern upgrades.

Features: Decks, Close to Lake, Boat Parking, Claw-Foot Tub, Roku, Wifi, Bose Sound System, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Blender, Lion Gourmet BBQ, Granite Counter Top, Pool Table, Extra Guest House

description:
This family friendly mountain retreat is sure to become a favorite getaway for your trips to Big Bear!  Located just minutes from Bear Mountain, the Zoo, Golf Course, Convention Center and more!  This cabin has great features including a fenced front yard, deck, open floor plan and desired upgrades throughout.

The main level boasts vaulted wood ceilings with beam accents bringing that cozy mountain feeling to your stay.  The living room has comfortable seating on the leather sofa, love seat and recliner in front of the wood burning fireplace and large flat screen Smart TV with cable and DVD player.  The space transitions through the dining room that features a log style dining table for 8.  The kitchen has everything you need for a weekend away including expansive granite counters with bar seating, stainless steel appliances, gas range, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot.  Enjoy the convenience of a washer and dryer and half bathroom.

Step outside for fresh mountain air while you relax on the deck or grill on the natural gas barbecue.  Kids will love exploring the yard with large natural boulders.

The main floor also has the master bedroom with private full on-suite bathroom.  Take comfort in the king bed while watching TV with cable.  Upstairs in the loft is a futon for flexible sleeping and lounging arrangements.  The second and third bedrooms each have queen beds and access to the shared upper level deck overlooking the front yard.  A 3/4 bathroom is in the hall.

When it's time to escape to the mountain, Kuma House is the perfect place to call home away from home!

Spend your Big Bear vacation in a cozy cabin with traditional features.  Knotty pine walls, vaulted ceilings, wood floors and a wood fireplace remind you that you are truly in the mountains.  Located only a few steps from Snow Summit, you can spend your time on the slopes or mountain bike trails and then come back to the cabin and soak in the hot tub.  Challenge friends and family to a game of pool in the converted garage or just sit back and relax under the mature trees on the spacious deck.

name: Knotty and Nice - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
This is a NON pet friendly property, the home owner is allergic. If we find you have violated this rule your deposit will be affected! 
Whether you are coming up to Big Bear Lake for skiing and snowboarding or a leisurely round of golf, Knotty and Nice is the perfect location for your getaway.  Located right on the golf course and just a few minute walk to Bear Mountain and the Zoo.  This villa features rustic cabin decor, brick floors, a reverse floor plan and upgraded amenities.

The spacious entry way has a laundry room and two bedroom suites.  The first bedroom has a log style king bed, TV with cable and DVD player, lower deck access and private full bathroom.  The second bedroom has a queen bed, TV with cable and DVD player, lower deck access and private full bathroom.

The upper level has a wonderful open and airy feel with a convenient half bathroom. Step into the game room and challenge each other on one of the 3 video game consoles.  The living room area has a wood burning fireplace, two pull-out sofas, flat screen TV with cable and DVD player and wall to wall windows to enjoy the view.  The log style dining table is ready for a family meal or game night with one of the provided board games.  The kitchen is just steps away with stainless steel appliances, gas stove, microwave, coffee pot, dishwasher and bar seating.

name: Lakefront at the Village - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
The community dock is maintained by the condo association and water   depths are unknown. Lake levels vary throughout the year and boat docks   availability is not guaranteed at the time of your arrival. Destination   Big Bear is not responsible for the level of water in the lake during   the course of guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most   up-to-date lake levels for lakefront properties.

With incredible lake views and a short walk to Big Bear Village, make Lakefront at the Village the ideal home for your mountain vacation. Lakefront at the Village is an upgraded condo in a small complex located right on the lake. The condo complex features a community hot tub and pool (open seasonally.)

Enter Lakefront at the Village through a door next to an attached garage and head upstairs to the main living level of the home. This main level features an open plan living area. Pull back the living room blinds to reveal panoramic views of Big Bear Lake and deck access which includes a table with three chairs and a gas BBQ. This is the perfect place to take in the lake views, while enjoying a grilled dinner or your morning cup of coffee. You'll also find a staircase that will take you down to a path accessing the lake.

Cuddle up on the leather couch or reclining chair and watch your favorite movie on the flat-screen television with HDTV Cable and  Blu Ray Player. Use the Wifi to jump on social media and share pictures of the amazing sunset over the lake. A beautiful crystal rock gas fireplace adds warmth and a modern aesthetic to the room. Recessed lighting and ceiling fans are additional features of the living room.

If the weather is too chilly to enjoy a meal on the balcony, a six person wood dining table and seating for four at an adjacent breakfast bar provide plenty of indoor dining space. Keep those blinds open to continue enjoying the lake views.

The kitchen includes stainless steel appliances and a beautiful granite counter top. Creating a home cooked meal during your vacation is one of the joys of staying in a rental home. The kitchen features include a gas stove, microwave, dishwasher, and coffee pot. 

The main level includes a 3/4 bath for your convenience.

Heading upstairs at night, you'll want to take a moment to walk outside to the balcony and enjoy the brilliant nighttime star display.At daybreak, you'll notice a cute stained-glass window featuring a family of bears taking a boat ride on the lake.

The master bedroom is located upstairs, at the end of the hallway. It includes a king bed and  a flat-screen television with HDTV cable for your entertainment. A ceiling fan will keep you cool in the warm summer months when you'll also enjoy using the sunbeds located on a private balcony with lake views.

The master bedroom has its own entrance to the upstairs bathroom which also has an additional entrance from the hallway. It is in a "Jack and Jill" style, with multiple doors and entrances, making it the bathroom for both the master and second bedroom.

The second bedroom features a queen bed, television with HDTV, and a private balcony that has views of the front car park.

No one wants to do laundry while on vacation, but should the need arise, you'll find a stacked washer and dryer in the upstairs hall closet.

Additional sleeping space can be found with the pull-out queen sofa bed in the living room.

Lakefront at the Village is right on the lake, includes upgraded amenities, and is walking distance to all the action in Big Bear Village. It's a gem of a condo for your Big Bear vacation.

name: Lakeside Landing - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
A hidden gem in Big Bear!  This lakeside cabin blends modern with mountain charm.  Just steps from the marina, lake and only minutes from the Village.

The covered front entrance welcomes you and protects you and your gear from the elements.  Step inside to the entryway with coat rack and access to the laundry room, full bathroom, kitchen and bedrooms.

A surprise awaits as you walk through the beautifully updated kitchen with solid stone counters, gas range, microwave and dishwasher.  Brew up your morning coffee on the Keurig machine to enjoy in the living room or deck.  The wall of windows brings the outdoors in with views of the lake and marina.  The living room is complete with sofa and TV with AppleTV, DirecTV and Blu-Ray.  The dining table has room for 6 for your shared meals or game night.  Behind the curtain is a queen bed and 3/4 bathroom.

The back deck is sure to be a favorite gathering place with seating and propane barbecue.  Take a stroll to the water's edge or walk over to the marina and rent a boat or kayak.  Kids will love playing in the large yard or building a snowman.

The two bedrooms provide your choice of sleeping options.  The first bedroom has a king bed, TV with DirecTV and streaming, and lake views.  The other bedroom has two twin beds and TV with DirecTV.

This cabin will leave you loving Big Bear even more!

Note: Driveway is long.  Always carry chains in the winter months.  No Fireplace.

description:
This spacious four bedroom cabin with three full baths features a game room with high-end competition pool table, Foosball table, enormous picture window looking over the scenic forest, and huge 3D flat screen TV plus 3D Blue Ray player. This provides the perfect space for the kids to have their own room while the adults relax in the great room on the main level. That is if the adults don’t commandeer this room for themselves.

The updated kitchen has granite counters, stainless steel appliances and nice accent lighting. The great room has its own oversized 3D flat screen TV so everyone has a place to watch their favorite movie or show.

Enjoy the great outdoors on the double lot with its own picnic table and hillside that is custom made for snow sledding. That means no driving or hiking and mom and dad can hang out with warm drinks on one of the decks or stay nice and cozy inside by the wood burning fireplace.

Grill up some tasty food on the out door natural gas barbeque.

 The master suite has its own private 3/4 bath, king bed and deck access.  The second bedroom has a queen and twin.  A full bathroom is in the hall.  Downstairs are two more bedrooms, one with a full and twin over twin bunk, the last one with a queen and twin.  A bathroom and laundry room is also on this level. 

This is the complete retreat cabin in the preferred Moonridge neighborhood near the ski resorts. Come up to Big Bear and make memories for a lifetime in Lazy Bear Lodge.
