description:
Enjoy amazing 4th of July firework views while staying cool with air conditioning!

Fantastic log home just perfect for your Big Bear Lake getaway, any time of year! Relax in the hot tub, play a game of pool or just lounge on the sofa and watch TV.

This beautiful home is set back from the road with a large landscaped yard and a welcoming front porch with plenty of chairs for lazy days. The country cabin decor completes the mountain setting with floor to ceiling windows that fill the open living space with natural light.  The river rock wood burning fireplace will keep you cozy during winter months.  Head upstairs to the loft with peek-a-boo lake views, pool table, sleeper-sofa, large flat screen TV with cable, Wii, small bar and half bathroom.

The kitchen is newly updated and complete with gas stove, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot.  The quaint dining area is a great place to have a meal or game night. A full bathroom and a laundry room is just down the hall with access to the back yard and deck with hot tub, lounge chairs and your choice of propane or charcoal grill.

The spacious master suite has TV with cable and DVD, as well as a private bathroom with double sink, jacuzzi tub and separate shower.  The second and third bedrooms have queen beds and TVs with cable.

Make a new family vacation tradition at Lakeview Escape!

Features: Lake Views, Wood Burning Fireplace, Flat Screen TVs, Cable, Internet, Hot Tub, Fenced Yard, Pool Table, Propane and Charcoal Barbeques, Master Suite, Gas Stove, Dishwasher, Microwave, Ceiling Fans, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Lakeview Paradise - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
If you are looking for gorgeous views of Big Bear Lake, Lakeview Paradise is the perfect getaway for you! Located near The Village and Big Bear Marina, this property will keep you close to all the action! Enjoy a soak in the hot tub in the fenced back yard at the end of a long day of fun. Lakeview Paradise is a great place to enjoy all Big Bear has to offer for you and your family and friends!

The front deck features lake views, a propane grill and outdoor seating for 4. Perfect for summer barbeques! Head inside to an open floor plan including dining with seating for six, a large kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances and beautiful wood floors, and a living area with a flat screen TV.

The master bedroom has views of the deck and features a queen size bed and a wood burning fireplace, as well as a door accessing the back yard. The second bedroom also has a queen size bed, a flat screen TV, and a full bath with a tub a shower. Comfy and private for your guests! The third bedroom is perfect for the little ones, featuring a twin over full bunk bed! In the hall just outside is a full bath for convenience.

With convenience and great views, Lakeview Paradise makes the perfect summer getaway!

Features: Lake Views, Flat Screen TVs, WiFi, Propane BBQ, Deck, Close to the Village, Close to Marinas, Large Kitchen With Wood Floors, Hot Tub, Fenced Back Yard

name: Larks Nest - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Loft: Twin over Full Bunk, Twin w/ Twin Trundle (Loft)

description:
The “Boulder Bay” neighborhood in Big Bear Lake has a fitting name, and Larks Nest is a perfect example of that. You can stand outside of this cabin and look in any direction to see huge boulders, pine trees and plenty of blue sky.  Located just a moment's ride from the lake and Boulder Bay park, conveniences and hiking trails. Larks Nest has been thoughtfully updated and includes everything you need for a wonderful vacation in the mountains.  The highlight of the cabin is the wall of floor to ceiling windows that bring the outdoors in.  

The entry level features the game room with pool table, comfortable sofas, wet bar with beautiful log counter top, and TV with cable access.  Turn on the electric fireplace heater for ambiance.  Down the hall you will find a bedroom with queen bed, as well as a full bathroom and laundry room.

The main living space is one floor up.  The great room has a central wood burning stove style fireplace and mirrored wall that gives the sense of being surrounded by nature.  The dining table has room for everyone.  The updated kitchen features granite counters, gas range, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot.  Step out to the front deck and relax in the shade under the mature pine trees.  Down the hall is a 3/4 bathroom with natural stone shower surround.  Head out to the back deck for grilling on the propane barbecue or soak in the hot tub.  Kids will love exploring the large boulders that surround the property.  A bedroom with queen bed and back deck access is also on this level.

The upstairs loft offers more comfortable living and sleeping options with a twin over full bunk, twin with twin trundle, TV with cable, small private deck and 3/4 bathroom.

Features: Close to Boulder Bay Park, the Lake and Hiking Trails, Deck, Propane Barbecue, Hot Tub, Pool Table, Cable,  DVD Players, Wood Burning Fireplace, Updated Kitchen, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Central Heat, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided.   Home does not have internet

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Loggy - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: 2 Queens with TV for DVD's only (Upper Level)

description:
Relax on the porch swing or one of three large decks in this true mountain "Loggy" cabin with plenty of parking.  Just three minutes to Bear Mountain Resort, Moonridge Zoo, the golf course, hiking and biking trails, and many other things Big Bear has to offer!

Beautiful log and wood vaulted ceilings and the open floor plan are welcoming and inviting, the perfect place to warm up after a day on the slopes or just relax on the large sofa and watch TV in front of the fireplace. The kitchen has plenty of room to cook a nice meal with fantastic views and access to the deck with a hot tub and natural gas BBQ! 

Four bedrooms offer sleeping space for everyone, three bedrooms upstairs and one bedroom is located on the main level.  Extra sleeping accommodations can be made on the couch.

Have some indoor fun in the game room playing a game of pool table.  The kids are sure to enjoy the wall mural and decorative fireplace.  Or head outside and have fun sledding. The cabin is pet friendly.

Make your vacation destination Big Bear Lake for family fun!

Features: Wi-Fi, Natural Gas BBQ, Boat Parking, RV Parking, Sledding, Close to Slopes, Flat Screens, Dishwasher, Washer, Dryer, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Linens and Towels Provided, Natural Gas Barbeque, Dish TV, DVD Player

Note: Sometimes Charter's internet goes up and down. This home is in a woodsy area.  One of the rails on the pool table is just a bit soft so if you are pool shark beware.

DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

This property is perfect for the guest who is looking for a cabin rental that won't break the bank. Generally simple decor and filled with basic furnishings and amenities that will meet most of your needs for an enjoyable vacation.

name: Lodestone Lodge - Big Bear City, CA

arrangements.Other: Queen/Sleeper Sofa (Lower Level) / Twin over Full Bunk

description:
No Smoking!

Modern meets the mountain in this luxury log cabin located in beautiful Moonridge.  No detail was ignored when designing this dream home.  The kitchen features expansive granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances and tile back splash that will make preparing a meal a joy.  You might get distracted by the mountain views while dining with family and friends at the rustic dining table that seats 8.  Extra seating is provided at the counter and is convenient for a quick snack or chatting with the cook. The open concept floor plan has comfortable seating for TV viewing on the large flat screen with cable and DVD.  The wood fireplace has an updated feel with glass door front surrounded by natural stone and hidden treasures. Log cabin features include log window frames, walls, corrugated aluminum walls and wood floors. Read a book under a natural tree trunk beam that brings the outdoors in.  A half bath with modern metal tiles is just off the living room in the hallway.

Step out onto the large deck with hot tub, seating, gas grill and panoramic views.

Downstairs is a separate living space with sleeper sofa, Foosball table, large flat screen TV, cable and fireplace style heater.  A large bathroom with tub and two pedestal sinks completes the suite.  You can even step out onto the small covered deck for a breath of fresh air or toss in a load of laundry in the separate laundry room.

When night comes, retreat to one of three bedrooms located on the main floor. The spacious master suite has private access to the back deck with panoramic views, king 4 poster bed and its own bathroom. The two additional bedrooms both have fabulous queen beds and tasteful decor.  A beautiful bathroom is located off the hall with double sink and granite counter top and river rock tub surround.

This cabin is one you need to see for yourself!

Features: Luxury Finishes, Foosball Table, Granite Counter Tops, Stainless Steel Appliances, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Gas Stove, Dishwasher, Propane Grill, Hot Tub, Wood Fireplace, Flat Screen TVs, Cable, DVD, Internet, Wood Floors, Decks, Log Home Accents, Master Suite, Laundry, Linens and Towels Provided, Designated Ski/Snowboard Storage, Three Flat-Panel TVs: Living Room, Master Bedroom, Downstairs Bedroom/Game Space, Downstairs TV Cable Ready for Guests to Attach their Own Game Systems, Three Kitchen Ovens: Regular, Convection, Microwave

This is a luxury property which includes the finest furnishings, luxury building materials, and a highly consistent design theme. Luxury properties range from elegant and formal to relaxed and chic, but all appeal to guests who appreciate first-class accommodations with a designer flair.
address: 573 Villa Grove Avenue Big Bear City, 92314

name: Lakefront Paradise - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
The community dock is maintained by the condo association and water depths are unknown. Lake levels vary throughout the year and boat docks availability is not guaranteed at the time of your arrival. Destination Big Bear is not responsible for the level of water in the lake during the course of guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most up-to-date lake levels for lakefront properties.

Lakefront Paradise is a cozy condo for the vacationer who desires comfort, convenience, and panoramic views of the lake. Location is key and this condo is a short, two-minute walk from the restaurants and shops of Big Bear Village. If hitting the slopes or hiking is on your itinerary, you'll find those activities a mere ten minute drive from Lakefront Paradise.

Lakefront Paradise is located on the upper two floors above a studio apartment. You'll enter the condo and walk up an internal set of stairs that will lead you to the kitchen area of an long, open plan living space with wood floors. 

In the kitchen, you'll find everything thing that you need to whip up a home-cooked meal. The kitchen features tile countertops and dark wood cabinets. It includes a dishwasher, microwave, coffee pot and gas oven. Meal time seating will not be a problem, as Lakefront Paradise offer the fun option of a breakfast bar with stools or the more traditional option of a six-seat dining table, located adjacent to the kitchen.
Grill a juicy steak for dinner on the barbecue located on the entry level patio,

The living room is your entertainment center, complete with a flat-screen television, cable, internet, and X-box player. Cuddle up on the plush sofa and warm up with the gas fireplace. Just off of the living room is access to a deck with views of the lake. Enjoy your morning coffee or an evening cocktail while sitting on the deck and taking in the majestic views.

For your convenience, you'll find a full bathroom on the living level of the house.

When it's time to sleep, head upstairs to find two bedrooms. The master bedroom features a king bed that faces a patio with lake views. This private balcony has a outdoor furniture set and is the perfect oasis to enjoy a private view of the lake. The master also includes a television with cable and a blu-ray player. If you have a baby in your group, you'll find a crib in the Master Bedroom. Please note, that bedding is not provided for the crib.

The second bedroom includes a king bed and a television with cable. Additional sleeping space can be found in the living area with a pull-out sofa. 

The master and second bedrooms share a full bathroom in the hallway. If you're visiting for an extended stay, you'll appreciate the convenience of having a washer and dryer, which is also located in the upstairs hallway.

Lakefront Paradise has additional shared amenities that are part of the condo complex. These include a hot tub and  swimming pool ( open seasonally).

Stunning views, excellent amenities, and proximity to local activities make Lakefront Paradise a true gem of a home for your Big Bear holiday. 

Features: Lake Views, Walking Distance to Village, Wood Floors, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Cable, Blu Ray Player, X-Box, Gas Fireplace, BBQ, Hot Tub, Pool (seasonal), Washer & Dryer.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations. Generally features comfortable furnishings, desirable amenities with possibly a few original features or appliances.
address: 40670 Big Bear Blvd #209 Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: Los Pinos - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Los Pinos, true to its name, is an adorable two-story cabin surrounded by many mature pine trees. You'll hear birds sing while you breathe in fresh air and relax in this wonderful mountain retreat.

Drive your vehicle right up to the front entrance for easy loading and unloading. As you walk up a small set of stairs to the front door, notice the detailing of the heart-cut outs in the covered wood deck. It's reminiscent of a fairy tale cottage.

Enter Los Pinos to find yourself in the cozy living room. The wood-burning fireplace provides both ambiance and warmth on a cool, mountain night. In the summer, you'll appreciate the ceiling fan to keep the living area cool. Watch your favorite movie or television program on the flat-screen television with cable.

Make yourself truly feel at home by whipping up a home-cooked meal in the kitchen, stocked with all of the basics to create your favorite meals. Imagine fueling up for your day of skiing with a warm batch of blueberry pancakes or filling Los Pinos with the mouth-watering scent of a homemade lasagna to feast on after a day of hiking. Kitchen features include a microwave, gas oven, coffee pot and dishwasher. Enjoy your meal in the adjacent dining room with two tables: one table for four and a smaller, two-seater table.

When it's time for bed, head upstairs, where you can choose from three bedrooms. All three bedrooms include windows with lovely forest views and plush carpet. The master bedroom includes a queen bed and television. If you are a family with kids, you'll love the second bedroom, which includes a twin over full bunk bed and children's toys to keep the little ones entertained. The third bedroom features a queen bed.

The bedrooms share a full-size bathroom located off the upstairs hallway. Don't fear that your entire group will have to share a single bathroom while getting ready in the morning, an additional full-size bathroom is located on the first level of the home.

Head down a small set of interior stairs from the kitchen to a garage converted to a bonus game room! Have a competitive game of Foosball or pool or enjoy a poker night. Watch the big game on the television with cable. The game room is sure to be a favorite Los Pinos hang-out for both kids and adults alike.

Los Pinos is the perfect cabin for your family vacation in Big Bear. Enjoy forest views, several entertainment options, and the creature comforts of home.

Features: Cable, Foosball, Pool Table, Poker Table, Wood-Burning Fireplace, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Gas Oven, Deck, Charcoal BBQ.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations. Generally features comfortable furnishings, desirable amenities, with possible a few original features or appliances.

name: Luxury in the Woods - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Brand new build,  never on rental program before. Be the first to experience this incredible home. 10 minute drive to ski slopes, and a 5 minute walk to great hiking trails.

Luxury in the Woods, with its beautiful stacked-stone exterior and double-door entrance is an elegant home in the desirable neighborhood of Upper-Moonridge. Ease and luxury are apparent as you pull into the flat, circular drive-way and park just steps from the front door.

Enter Luxury in the Woods to find yourself in the living room. Large windows provide plenty of both natural light and scenic mountain views. The high ceilings with large wood-beams make the living room feel spacious. Immediately you'll notice a unique gas fireplace, which is located in the middle of the room and has glass on either side, making it a feature that can be enjoyed from both the living room and dining room, located directly behind the fireplace. The stacked stone decor from the exterior of the house is continued in the living room, with the same look used for the fireplace and sidewall. 

Snuggle up on the leather couch and watch the latest football game or your favorite movie on the flat-screen television mounted above the fireplace. Entertainment is at hand with Smart TV and cable. Pour a glass of wine or mix your favorite cocktail at the built-in wet bar. 

Hardwood floors and ceiling fans can be found throughout Luxury in the Woods. A half-bath is conveniently located near the living room, on the left side when you enter the home. 

Nothing makes a vacation rental feel more like a home than a home cooked meal. Located adjacent to the living room, the kitchen is both stylish and modern. It features stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops and oak cabinets. Cooking for a large group? Meal preparation will be a breeze with a six-burner range, double ovens, and over-sized refrigerator. The counter top space is expansive and includes a center island. Kitchen features include: coffee pot, toaster oven, electric kettle, microwave and dishwasher. 

The dining room is a grand space to enjoy your meals. It features a wood table with seating for eight, high ceilings, and several windows that afford beautiful forest views. The gas fireplace provides both warmth and ambiance while dining. A nearby breakfast bar provides additional seating, always a fun option for kids or a quick bite. 

Enjoying nature and soaking in the mountain air are a huge part of any Big Bear vacation. Through the dining room, you'll find access to the large deck. Grill a juicy steak on the barbecue. The hot tub is the perfect place to unwind after a day on the slopes or spent hiking through the San Bernardino mountains.  Make sure to walk outside at night for a spectacular star show that you won't find in the city. 

No one wants to do laundry while on vacation, but should the need arise, a laundry room with side-by-side washer and dryer is located on the main level next to the garage.

When it comes time to sleep, Luxury in the Woods has four bedrooms, all located on the main level. 

The master bedroom is the only bedroom located on the left side of the house, near the kitchen. This location affords privacy, turning the master bedroom into an oasis. The master bedroom includes a king  bed, flat-screen television with Smart TV and Cable. The en suite bathroom is the place to be pampered. Take a relaxing bath in the jet tub or enjoy a spa experience with the multiple shower heads, including a rain style shower head. The master bathroom features double sinks and a make-up vanity. All of the bathrooms in the house have heated floors, a great feature during the ski season!

The three additional bedrooms are located on the opposite side of the house, to the right of the entry door. The bedrooms are all located along one long hallway and all feature en suite bathrooms. 

A romantic, four-poster king bed is located in the second bedroom. This room also features private deck access, which joins with the main deck, allowing for easy access to the hot tub! The bathroom is 3/4, with a walk-in shower.

The third bedroom has a queen bed and 3/4 bathroom with a walk-in shower.

The fourth bedroom has two full beds, forest views and a full-size bathroom. 

In search of a quiet spot to read your favorite book or play a board game? Located on the same hallway as the guest bedrooms, you'll find a reading and relaxation room. You will have noticed the turreted roof and unusual-shaped room when you drove up to Luxury in the Woods and once inside, you will see how this is the perfect room to take a break. Its many windows allow for plenty of natural light. It's a great spot to unplug and enjoy simple pleasures.

Head down a staircase just off the living room to discover the game room. This is sure to be a favorite gathering spot with a plethora of entertainment options. Pull up a seat at the high-top table with four chairs for a game of poker. Try your hand at a game of Darts or Crokinole. Perhaps a competitive game of Shuffleboard or Foosball? Binge watch a television show on the flat-screen TV with Smart TV, PS4 and Cable. Or maybe just take a nap on the enormous couch. Bunk bed provide an additional sleeping option. A full-size bathroom, wet bar, and access to a lower, concrete deck are additional features of the game room. 

If you have little ones in your group, you'll appreciate the fully-fenced, over-sized backyard. It's a safe way to allow children to play outside and enjoy nature. Speaking of nature, just a short walk down the road and you'll find the start of a four mile hiking trail that takes you on a loop through the San Bernardino forest. 

Luxury in the Woods is a gorgeous home that is bursting with amenities. Its peaceful location is ideal for a serene vacation, but should you want to explore, it is just a short drive to all of the restaurants, shops, and Big Bear activities. Luxury in the Woods is the perfect home to make precious vacation memories.

Note: Please be sure sleeping arrangements work for your group. This home does have a city set occupnacy of 16 guests but does not sleep 16 guest in beds.

Features: Shuffle Board Table, Gas fireplace, Ceiling fans, Heated bathroom floors, Wood floors, Smart TV, Cable, Game room, Shuffleboard, Reading Room, Fenced Yard, Deck, Hot tub, BBQ, Oversize refrigerator, Six-burner stove, Double oven, Coffee Pot, Electric Kettle, Microwave, Dishwasher, Spa Tub, Wet bar, Washer and Dryer.
 
This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.
address: 1659 Angels Camp Road Big Bear City, 92314

name: Maple Bear - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: Twin over Twin Bunk, Twin w/ Twin Trundle with Shared 3/4 Bath (Entry Level)

description:
Your family will love to stay at Maple Bear, a private, newly remodeled home located one block from Summit Boulevard. Just a short walk to the Snow Summit Ski Resort, with hiking trails and the sky chair in the warmer months and winter activities including tubing and skiing.

This reverse floor plan cabin has wonderful unique features,  beautiful bathroom, kitchen and flooring updates and a fabulous landscaped backyard for the kids.  The first two bedrooms are on the entry level, the first one with a queen bed and access to the 3/4 Jack-and-Jill bathroom.  The second bedroom is great for the kids or kid at heart with a twin over twin bunk, twin with twin trundle, small air hockey table, TV with cable and access to the 3/4 shared bathroom.

Head upstairs to the main living space with gorgeous natural grain wood flooring.  Your are sure to notice the unique hexagonal shape of this portion of the cabin with skylights in the peaked roof creating a harmonious relationship with the surrounding natural beauty of the mature trees.  There is plenty of room for everyone on the large wraparound sofa in front of the wood burning fireplace and flat screen TV with cable.  Step out to the front deck and relax under the shade of the mature trees.  The kitchen has been beautifully updated with poured stone counter tops, stainless steel appliances including a gas range, dishwasher, coffee pot and microwave.  Small children will be excited to have their own playroom right off the kitchen.  A half bath is close by for your convenience.

Through the vestibule which connects the upper living spaces and front deck you will find two more bedrooms.  One bedroom has a king bed and full bathroom with separate tub and shower.  The last bedroom has a queen bed and 3/4 bathroom with back deck access.  For an evening of fun, head down to the game room with pool table, TV with cable, mini fridge, as well as the washer and dryer.

The nicely landscaped backyard is sure to be a highlight of your stay.  Enjoy soaking in the hot tub after a day full of adventure, or barbecuing on the propane grill on the dedicated cement patio with picnic table and shade cover.  Your visit to Big Bear Lake is sure to be memorable at Maple Bear when you are enjoying the great outdoors.

Note: Absolutely no parties! This is a family home in a private and quiet neighborhood. Please be respectful. City code officers have the right to evict you if they receive a noise complaint.

Features: Walking Distance to Snow Summit, Hot Tub, Propane Barbecue, Child Playroom, Pool Table, Air Hockey, Updated Kitchen and Baths, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Wood Floors, Carpet, Flat Screen TV, Cable, Internet, Central Heat, Decks, Large Landscaped Yard, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided.
This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Let It Go - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Den: Twin over Twin Bunk, Full Futon

description:
Let it go as the entire family unwinds at this Disney themed home!  Walk to the Village from this forested mountain retreat backing to the national forest! The kids are sure to never want to leave once they are welcomed by Elsa and the others in their whimsical bedroom getaway.

Entering into this custom built home you will find a sitting room complete with custom window seating overlooking the stately weathervane just outside. Provided for your enjoyment are a flat screen satellite TV, WiFi and outdoor deck access. Moving through the french doors you enter the main area of the home, complete with a wood burning fireplace, flat screen TV, VCR, a powder room and open beam woodwork ceilings.

The dining room will sure to be the gathering place. The custom burlwood countertop and free standing cast iron wood burning stove make for a true cabin experience. You won't need much to cook something up in this home, most everything is provided in this well stocked kitchen.

Head downstairs to get your rest. The first bedroom features a king size bed and an antique vanity. There is also a full size bathroom off the hall that has been beautifully upgraded complete with an embellished copper sink, extensive tile work and new fixtures.

The second bedroom features a king size bed and faux fireplace heater. Completing the space is a hotel standard clothing rack and open beam woodwork ceiling.

In the third bedroom you will find a queen size bed and full size closet.
The den area can be used as a fourth bedroom and has an open concept with a twin over twin bunk and full size futon. Guests are sure to stay entertained on the large roulette game table! Also provided in this space are a pack and play and high chair for your smallest visitors, with a full-sized washer and dryer provided for your convenience.

Throughout the home you will find custom stained glass artwork placed in windows and skylights adding an artistic touch to this grand, rustic styled cabin. The custom woodwork is something to be appreciated in this home. You are sure to stay warm with central heat throughout the home.

Head out back through the landing on the stairs. You will find a gas barbecue, custom gazebo and an expansive forested yard. You will find various pines, oak trees and wild manzanita, providing a true Big Bear experience.

Note: The backyard playhouse is not on this home's property. Please no trespassing.

Features: Forested Views, Close to Village and Conveniences, Gas Barbecue, Central Heat, Wood Burning Fireplaces, Satellite TV, Internet, Gas Stove, Standard Coffee Maker, Dishwasher, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Mary's Lake Cabin - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Bedroom: Queen with Private Bath and Deck

description:
Mary's Cabin is a 1,300 square foot house one block from beautiful Boulder Bay Park. It has two bedrooms, two and a half bathrooms, and a recreation room with an extra bed. 

Enjoy a glass of wine on the deck and take in sweeping views of the tree-lined mountains and a peak of the lake! Walk to Blanca and Pierre's Restaurant for a hearty breakfast, just 1.5 blocks away. Next door, pick up some firewood and provisions. Rent a kayak or bike only one block from the cabin! If you're there to ski and don't want to deal with parking, take the local area public bus half a block away and get to the slopes. Snow Summit and Bear Mountain are a 10-minute drive, and the Village is 5 minutes away. The trailhead to the popular Castle Rock trail is 1 mile away, which offers some of the best views of Big Bear Lake. Jump into the lake, just a block away! Mary's Cabin is in the perfect location to enjoy all that Big Bear Lake has to offer, yet feels secluded and private. After coming home from your busy day of local activities, lounge on the deck or hot tub and take in the chirping sounds of blue jays, keep an eye out for scampering chipmunks, and breathe in the fresh pine mountain air. 

The house itself was recently remodeled and tastefully decorated. The master bedroom has a queen bed and private bathroom. Wake up to spectacular views of the mountain from the master bedroom's large glass doors leading to the deck. The second bedroom has a twin-over-full bunk bed, its own fireplace, and a separate bathroom. 

Complimentary high-speed wi-fi included. Get the living room fireplace going while playing some board games with your loved ones or watch a movie. In addition to the living room, there is a downstairs rec room with a third bathroom. This rec room has an additional kitchenette with a small fridge where you can stock your favorite beverages while you play pool or ping pong, or relax and watch TV. The house is fully stocked for entertainment, with board and card games, and two flatscreen smart TVs that have Hulu with live TV streaming, and thousands of movies and shows on demand. Laundry machine on site. The kitchen is fully stocked with appliances and wares to cook to your heart's desire. Serve your meals on the rustic wood dining room table with surrounding views of Boulder Bay.

Well-behaved pets welcome! There is a fully fenced in yard for your dog to roam. 

Mary's Cabin is your home away from home; a cozy cabin with modern conveniences, close to year-round activities at Big Bear Lake.
address: 718 Blue Jay Rd Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: Moose Creek Lodge - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: Twin over Full Bunk Bed, with Twin Trundle

description:
Located in the desirable Fox Farm neighborhood, Moose Creek Lodge is a charming, single-story, log-cabin style home. As you pull up to the driveway, you'll notice mature pine tree and beautiful landscaping. A statue of a bear holding a lantern is on hand to welcome you home. 

The front door is located up a short set of stairs. A pair of inviting chairs on the front porch beckon you to relax and take in the quiet neighborhood.

Enter Moose Creek Lodge to find yourself in the open-plan living room with high, wood-beam ceilings. The majority of the home features carpet, with wood flooring in the kitchen and front entry. 

The living room is on your left. On a chilly evening, use the wood-burning fireplace to fill your cabin with warmth and ambiance. Curl up on the couch and watch your favorite movie on the flat-screen television, which includes a Roku with Netflix and DVD Player. Moose Creek Lodge has a large selection of board games for every age, located in the cabinet under the television. A Nintendo Classic console will delight video game lovers. Get competitive with a game on the Foosball table located next to the dining area.

Creating a home-cooked meal is one of the joys of staying in a rental cabin. Imagine filling Moose Creek Lodge with the aroma of freshly brewed coffee and warm pancakes in the morning. The kitchen is spacious and wll-equipped with all the essentials that you'll need to whip up a home-made meal. The kitchen features a large, tiled island with bar seating for four. Other features of the kitchen include: gas oven and oven, microwave, dishwasher, electric can-opener, coffee maker, electric kettle, wine chiller, toaster oven, crockpot, blender, rice cooker, hand mixer, and griddler/Panini press.

Sitting under a moose-themed chandelier, you'll find a six person dining table. Keeping with the name of the home, moose themed items are sprinkled throughout the cabin.

Open the sliding glass door next to the dining table to access the back deck. Use the propane bbq to grill up a juicy steak and use the outdoor table to dine alfresco. This is a great spot to take in the fresh mountain air and watch local wildlife, such as Blue Jays fly between the trees.

Walk down the hall to the right of the main entry door to find all of the bedrooms and bathrooms.

The master bedroom suite can be found at the back of the hall on the left. The master has a king bed, two large closets, and private access to the back deck. High ceilings lend to the spaciousness of the room and a ceiling fan will keep you cool in the summer months. The en suite bathroom includes double sinks, a separate shower, and a relaxing Jacuzzi tub.

The second bedroom is perfect for kids, but big enough to be a comfortable room for adults. It includes a twin over full bunk bed with a pull out twin trubdle, closet, rocking chair, and dresser. The cabinet in the closet is filled with jigsaw puzzles. This room also has a flat-screen television which includes a Roku with Netflix and DVD Player. The window overlooking the back deck allows for plenty of natural light.

The third bedroom is large with both a queen and a full bed. This room has a dresser, closet, and features views of the side yard.

A full-size bathroom is located in the hall, closest to the front entrance. This bathroom is to be shared between the guests in the second and third bedrooms, but is also close to the common areas. This bathroom also includes a side-by-side washer and dryer.

Additional sleeping space can be found on the living room sofa bed. 

Moose Creek Lodge is a cozy cabin that is centrally located to Big Bear's shops, restaurants, and activities.

Please note that this home has a steep driveway and guests with low-profile cars should use caution. Parking is available inside the garage and outside along the paved side of the cabin.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.

name: Moonlight Ridge - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Bedroom: King with Private Full Bath (Mid Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 3: Queen and Twin over Twin Bunk (Mid Level)

description:
Leave your cares behind when you head off for this private mountain retreat which feels deep in the forest yet is close to everything! Relax and enjoy the tranquility of ski slope views, explore the 1/3 of an acre wooded property, or venture out to Bear Mountain Big Bear Mountain Golf Course and the Alpine Zoo which are all located within a 3-minute drive. Only a few extra minutes gets you to Snow Summit, Big Bear lake, and the adorable Village shops and restaurants!

The main level has an open floor plan with dining area and living room featuring a wood burning fireplace, extra large wrap-around couch, a flat screen TV, DVD player, high ceilings, and large windows with mountain and ski slope views. The modern kitchen is well equipped with stainless steel appliances and everything you need to make your stay comfortable including direct access to a large deck for a breath of fresh mountain air and propane barbecue so you can enjoy a meal in the great outdoors. This level also has a powder room.

Down one level you will find two full bathrooms and three spacious bedrooms. The master suite has a king bed, private sitting area with flatscreen TV, DVD player, attached (and newly remodeled) full bathroom with tub and extra large shower, and its own private balcony with gorgeous tree top views. The roomy second bedroom has a queen bed, access to the laundry room and its own access to the great outdoors. This room also contains 2 extra sleeping cots for larger groups. A cozy third bedroom features a queen bed and twin over twin bunks, perfect for an entire family to share! 

On the ground-level you will find a large and private game room which can also serve as a 4th bedroom for bigger groups. This floor includes a sleeper sofa (queen), 4th bathroom, flat screen TV, Foosball table, darts, retro video arcade nook, and its own fireplace. Close the door for complete privacy! It also features slider access to a spacious patio area and gorgeous forest-like backyard - fun to explore in both the summer and winter! 

Features: 3 Flat Screen TV's, 2 DVD Players, High Speed Wireless Internet, Cable, Refrigerator, Dishwasher, Gas Range, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Wood Burning Fireplace, Wood Burning Stove, Foosball Table, Arcade, Darts, Washer & Dryer, Games, Walk in Closet, Fenced Side Yard Off Bedroom 2, Beautiful Ski Slope Views, and 1/3 acre backyard forest for exploring.

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with high quality interior design. Enjoy a pleasing and upscale decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Majestic Views - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: King and Twin over Twin Trundle (Upper Level)

description:
Welcome to Majestic Views, the perfect escape from it all with the most extraordinary views of the golf course, lake and mountains!

Enjoy the fantastic great room where the kitchen and living area open up to each other with expansive views and a comfortable deck to take in the breathtaking surroundings. Revel in star gazing from the porch swing or warming up to the gas fire pit.

The living room and kitchen have vaulted ceilings with beautiful wood beams and knotty pine throughout. Sit back and relax next to the large rock gas fireplace or watch your favorite movie on the flat screen TV with cable and DVD player.  The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, granite counters, a dishwasher, Keurig coffee maker, and all the basic amenities.

Downstairs (via indoor spiral staircase) you can challenge each other on the Foosball table, if you don't get distracted by the incredible views, or relax on the sleeper sofa and watch TV with cable. There is a 3/4 bathroom off of the game room for your convenience.  

At the end of the day you can catch some zz's in one of the three bedrooms. The main level has two bedrooms, both with queen beds.  A full bathroom is close by off the hallway as well as a stacked washer and dryer.  Upstairs is a wonderful master suite with a small private deck, amazing views, a king bed, twin with twin trundle and private bathroom.

name: Moose Trax - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Moose Trax is a charming, two-story home tucked in a quiet neighborhood on Boulder Bay. It is located walking distance to the lake and local hiking trail. By car, you're just a few minutes from restaurants, shops, and other local activities.

Parking is on a gravel driveway immediately in front of the home. Walk just four steps up to the front door and enter to find yourself in the mud room. This is the perfect place to store your outdoor gear, before entering the cozy house. Carpet covers the first level of the home.

Moose Trax has a reverse floor-plan, with the bedrooms located on the first level. The master bedroom features a queen bed, television with HDTV cable, and access to a private patio. Head outside and enjoy the fresh mountain air. The second bedroom features a queen bed, television with HDTV cable, and a window with views of the front of the house. 

The two bedrooms share a full bathroom that is located in the hall. This bathroom has a pocket door separating the sink from the toilet and shower, making it easy for multiple people to get ready at the same time. Need to do laundry? A side-by-side washer and dryer can be found in this bathroom.

Head upstairs for the open-plan living area with wood floors. This room contains several windows of various sizes and styles that fill the area with tons of natural light and provide beautiful views of the tree filled neighborhood.

Turn right at the top of the stairs to find a sliding door that leads to the deck. The deck is a relaxing place to enjoy the serene neighborhood, while reading a book or having a glass of wine. Use the propane BBQ to grill a juicy steak for dinner.

The kitchen is stocked with all the tools you'll need to whip up a home cooked meal. Bear themed cabinet pulls add a delightful, woodsy touch. The kitchen has stainless steel appliances and a small, rolling island. Features of the kitchen include: microwave, gas range, dishwasher, and coffee pot. Note that the refrigerator is smaller than a standard size. Serve your meal at the tall dining table that seats three (with two extra stools available).

On a chilly winter day, you'll love using the wood-burning fireplace for both warmth and ambiance. Curl up on the couch and watch your favorite movie on the flat-screen television with HDTV cable and DVD player. For additional sleeping, the couch makes into a full size bed. Even though you're on a mountain vacation, you'll easily be able to stay in touch with Wifi. 

Moose Trax is a great home for a small family or group. It's in a peaceful location, yet not far from the action. Make Moose Trax the destination for your Big Bear vacation!

Features: Wood-Burning Fireplace, HDTV Cable, DVD Player, Wifi, Propane BBQ, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Gas Range, Washer and Dryer.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.

name: Moose Haven - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Moose Haven will become your haven in Big Bear!  Located on a quiet dead-end street just minutes from Snow Summit and the Village.This traditional style Big Bear cabin features log accents, mountain decor and beautiful mature trees. Towne Trail is located at the end of the street! This is a moderate 3 mile hike. Great for families!

The living room opens up to the dining and kitchen for an open feeling that is highlighted by the natural log cathedral ceiling and walls.  Nights are sure to be spent together in front of the wood burning fireplace and flat screen TV with cable and DVD player. Curl up with your favorite book in the nook that has two leather chairs. Whether you are on vacation for the holidays or just a weekend away, the dining table has room for six with four additional seats at the counter.  The kitchen has ample space for preparing a family meal and includes a gas range, microwave, dishwasher, and Keurig coffee maker.  Just off the kitchen is a small patio with the propane barbecue for grilling your favorite cut of steak.

Down the hallway you will find a full bathroom and the three bedrooms.  The spacious master suite is all the way at the end of the hall and has access to the back deck for a quiet morning spent outdoors.  The bedroom has a log style king bed, gas fireplace, full bathroom with separate toilet and shower room.  A cupboard with board games will keep you entertained.  "Moose Room" is the second bedroom and lives up to it's name with stylish moose themed decor and a full bed.  "Twig Room" is the last bedroom and features a custom queen log bed.

Enjoy playing in the snow in the large back yard. Garage is available for washer and dryer use only (no parking available in the garage).

Enjoy time with family and friends at Moose Haven!

Features: Close to Snow Summit and the Village, Quiet Street, Log Cabin Features, Foosball, Mountain Decor, Wood Burning and Gas Fireplaces, Deck, Mature Trees, Propane Barbecue, Cable, Internet, DVD, Gas Range, Keurig Coffee Maker, Foosball, Microwave, Dishwasher, Carpet, Ceiling Fans, Central Heat, Single Story, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.

name: Moose Meadows - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
If you’re looking for a cozy family getaway near the lake, Moose Meadows is the place for you!  Located in Big Bear West, this little hideaway keeps you close to all the Big Bear action!

The first level is open concept featuring the kitchen, living area, and two separate dining areas. Perfect for gathering family and friends around the table! The kitchen and dining areas have wood floors throughout. Upon entry, you will see the first dining area with seating for six. Head into the kitchen equipped with a gas range, microwave, coffee maker, and toaster oven. Great for those dinner nights in! The living area includes plenty of comfy seating, a wood burning fireplace, and a large flat screen TV.  The second dining area has seating for six and looks out onto the deck and features a 2000 multi arcade machine. Just off the second dining area is a laundry room with a stacked washer and dryer for your convenience.

Bedroom one is on the first level and features a king size bed and plenty of storage.  Also on the first level is a newly remodeled bath with a beautiful tiled shower and sink with granite countertops.

On the second level is a private bedroom with two queen size beds and a flat screen TV. There is also a children’s drawing area, as well as a full bath including tub and shower.

Head outside to the deck featuring a propane grill and dine al fresco!  There is seating for eight around the picnic table. Great for game time, a morning cup of coffee, or sunset toasts! There is also a horse shoe pit just off the deck for a little friendly competition.

Moose Meadows is in an ideal location if you want to be near the lake, the Village and marinas!

Features:  Near The Lake, Propane Grill, Flat Screen TVs, Deck, Horse Shoe Pit, Laundry, Wifi, Gas Range, Two Dining Areas

name: Mountain Crest Getaway - Big Bear City, CA

arrangements.Master: King, Twin w/ Twin Trundle (Upper Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 2: Twin over Twin Bunk, Full (Entry Level)

description:
Come on up to Big Bear and stay at Mountain Crest Getaway, a three bedroom, two bath, reverse floor plan cabin located in upper Moonridge.  Enjoy mountain and slope views from the upper level deck and master suite.

The entry level features the game room with pool table and flat screen TV with cable.  One bedroom has a twin over twin bunk and full bed.  The other bedroom has a queen over queen bunk bed.  A full bathroom and laundry room are on this level for your convenience.

Head upstairs to the main living area.  The open floor plan has a large living room area with gas fireplace and flat screen TV with cable.  The dining area has views of the mountains and the kitchen is just steps away with gas range, microwave, coffee pot, dishwasher and solid surface counter tops.  Step out to the small front or large back deck for a breath of crisp mountain air.  The master suite is down the hall and has mountain and slope views, king bed and twin with twin trundle.  The full bathroom has hallway and bedroom access and has double sinks, shower, and private toilet room.  Enjoy the surrounding tree views from the jet tub alcove while you soak the day away.

name: Mountain Jewel - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
If you are looking for a cabin with all the comforts of home, close to grocery stores and the lake, then you will love staying at this Mountain Jewel!  Just minutes from everything for four seasons of fun in Big Bear.  The cabin features an elevated living space with a welcoming covered deck, flat parking, and a fenced back yard the kids will love to explore with plenty of mature trees for shade and mountain ambiance.

Step inside to the inviting living room that features knotty pine vaulted ceilings, comfortable seating, a corner river rock gas log fireplace, and flat screen TV with cable and Blu-Ray. This is the perfect space for sharing old family memories and making new ones. The dining and kitchen are just steps away with wood floors, a table with seating for 8, and two extra seats at the counter.  The kitchen is stocked with all the basics for preparing a meal and includes a gas range, microwave, coffee pot, Keurig, and dishwasher.  Off the living room you will find a half bathroom with washer and dryer and access to the back deck.

Up the stairs are three bedrooms and a full bathroom.  The master suite has a king bed, futon, TV with cable, and a 3/4 bathroom with double sinks.  The second bedroom has a queen bed and futon.  The last bedroom has a queen bed.
Enjoy tons of entertainment in the garage converted game room featuring a pool table, Foosball table, card/game table, and additional small TVs w/ DVD and VHS players!

You might not want to leave once you experience time in this cabin in Big Bear Lake!

Note: No ground level entrance to main living space.  No garage access.

name: Mountain Paradise - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Find your bliss at Mountain Paradise!  A well appointed log cabin located just minutes from the slopes, grocery stores, the convention center and lake!

The open and spacious great room features a sitting area with sofas and a TV with Roku, as well as the main living room with cathedral ceilings, knotty pine throughout, a wood burning fireplace and a flat screen TV with DVD player.  The kitchen is just steps away and has ample counter space for preparing a meal or pulling up to the bar seating for a morning cup of coffee or snack.  The kitchen is well stocked and includes a gas range, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot.  You can gather at the dining table for a game of cards or a dinner together.

The backyard is perfect for the kids to run and play with lots of flat space under the mature pine trees.  Relax in the shade on the deck or grill on the propane barbecue.

Back inside and down the hallway you will find the washer and dryer, a full bathroom and three bedrooms.  The master suite has a queen bed, TV and private bathroom with separate toilet room, soaker tub, shower and double sinks.  The second bedroom has a queen bed, and the third bedroom has a twin over twin bunk and twin bed.

This cabin is a great option for families and friends who want to feel like they have found paradise in the mountains!

name: Northwoods Cabin - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Tucked up in the mountains of Upper Moonridge, Northwoods Cabin is a three-level cabin surrounded by beautiful pine trees. Located close to Bear Mountain Ski Resort and just a short drive to local restaurants, shops, and activities.

Park on a long, flat driveway and walk just four steps down to enter the front door. Pause to admire the two bears that are etched into a panel of glass in the front door. Mendocino Mountainside is filled with nature and cabin decor.

Enter the home to find a full-size bathroom immediately on your left. No one likes to do laundry while on vacation, but if the need should arise, you'll find a side-by-side washer and dryer in the closet in this bathroom.

The entry level of the home features wood flooring.

Continued down the hall on the entry level to the open-plan living area. On your right, you'll find a recently remodeled kitchen. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, a subway tile back splash, and a glittering, granite counter top. The kitchen is spacious and a wonderful place to create home cooked meals. Other features of the kitchen include: gas range, microwave, coffee pot, and dishwasher.

Serve your meals at the six person wood dining table located adjacent to the kitchen. Kids will love the fun option of dining at the breakfast bar, which seats two.

The living area is spacious with two couches and two comfortable chairs. Relax in front of the wood-burning fireplace with a brick facade. The fireplace will fill the home with warmth and ambiance on chilly days. A ceiling fan will keep you cool on warm days. Watch your favorite movie or the latest sporting event on the flat-screen television with HDTV or enjoy chanllenging frineds and family on the pool table. You may be in the mountains, but you'll easily be able to stay in touch with wifi and a Bose bluetooth speaker system. Use the telescope to get a closer look at the spectacular night sky. A sliding glass door to the deck is located in the living room. Enjoy views of nature and take in fresh mountain air from the deck or your favortie meal on the propane BBQ.

A set of stairs to the lower level is next to the front door of the house. Head downstairs to find the master and second bedroom. The master bedroom has a king bed, carpeting, and a television with a DVD player.  It also includes an en suite full bathroom that is shared with the second bedroom. The second bedroom has a set of full over full bunks and wood flooring. Please note that to access the Master Bedroom, you must walk through the second bedroom.
 
On the upper level you'll find a full size bathroom and two bedrooms. The rooms on the upper level (except for the bathroom) have carpeting. The third bedroom has sloping wood ceilings and a queen bed. This room has views of the side of the house. The fourth bedroom is great for families who want to have their young kids nearby. It features a bunk with a full bed on top and a queen bed beneath. This room includes children's books, and two windows with views of the side and front of the house.

The upper level has a loft living area with a couch and cozy chair. The loft has a bookcase filled with children's games and books. This area is sure to be popular with the young children in your group. Additional sleeping space can be found with the queen size sofa bed.

Northwoods Cabin is a great cabin for vacationeers who are seeking a nature retreat that is still close to all of the action.

name: Nature's Dream - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Great mountain home walking distance to Bear Mountain's slopes, the golf course, and the Moonridge Zoo. This beautiful cabin has the best views in town with panoramas of the lake, mountain, valley, and forest!  Just 7 minute walk to Skyline and 2N10 trailheads for hiking and mountain biking.

Knotty pine is featured throughout along with wood floors. The huge picture windows bring the outdoors in, creating a wonderful mountain cabin experience. The expansive decks overlook the fabulous vistas while the private covered hot tub with views is perfect for relaxing any time of year.

The main level features a living room with vaulted ceiling, leather furniture, a dining area with table and bench seating, wood burning fireplace and upgraded kitchen with two stoves, granite counters and stainless steel appliances. A bedroom with queen bed and a separate full bathroom are also on the main level.

Downstairs are two more bedrooms with TVs, one with queen bed and the other with twin and twin over full bunk bed and deck access.  Upstairs is the master bedroom with king bed and flat screen TV.

There are views from every room!

name: Open Air - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Open Air is a single-level home located in the desirable Moonridge neighborhood. It's just a short, ten-minute walk to the Big Bear Alpine Zoo, Bear Mountain Resort, and the golf course. This property is ideally located for both summer and winter activities in Big Bear.

The living room, kitchen, and dining nook are open plan. This entire living space is surrounded by large windows that provide plenty of natural light and views of nature. Get outside and into the fresh mountain air through the living room slider that leads out to a large deck. The deck includes Adirondack chairs and a charcoal BBQ: grill up a feast and enjoy nature!    

The kitchen is fully stocked, and features both a microwave and dishwasher. The kitchen includes plenty of countertop space and is perfect for guests who enjoy making meals at home. Adjacent to the kitchen is a dining table for four and the kitchen island has a breakfast bar with additional seating. 

Relax in the living room and watch a movie on the flat screen TV with cable/DVD player. When it's chilly outside, nothing is cozier than having a wood burning fireplace. 

Open Air has three bedrooms and sleeps five. All rooms include TV's with cable access and have a woodsy decor. The master bedroom features an en suite bathroom and queen bed. The second bedroom has a full bed and the third bedroom includes twin beds. 

This property includes the convenience of a washer and dry.

Features: Flat Screen TV, DVD Player, Washer/Dryer, Linens & Towels Provided, Dishwasher, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Charcoal Barbeque, Internet, Cable TV
 This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few dated features or appliances.

name: Mountain Spirit - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Full of mountain spirit, this home lives up to its name!  

Approaching this cabin you're warmly welcomed to an ideal rustic look with rich wood exterior and river rock accents. Upon entering, you're surrounded by pine. Extensive wood accents with mountain style decor throughout capture the true mountain feel. The living room opens up to the dining and kitchen areas for a great room ambience. This living room area has ample seating for all of your guests as you relax in front of the gas log fireplace and enjoy the crackling of a fire. The custom carved mantle is truly a piece of art. An array of windows allow everyone to enjoy plenty of natural sunlight. Watch the flat screen TV by streaming from your device on the home's WIFI or bring your favorite DVD's. There is also a Foosball table to provide hours of entertainment!

The dining area includes a large rustic style table with seating for six and additional seating at the kitchen counter/bar for three. From the dining room you will find deck access. Step right outside to grill on the propane barbecue while enjoying the great outdoors from the home's expansive deck. There is also a lower deck area with lounge chairs for those who want to soak up the sun. The backyard is completely fenced so the youngest of your group are completely safe to run and play.
The kitchen is well appointed with modern appliances, including a dishwasher, microwave, gas range/oven and fridge. There is also a standard coffee maker provided. Enjoy the custom carved cornice and woodwork from all areas. This home has been very well cared for, showing pride of ownership throughout.

Down the hall you will find the master suite, with a king size bed, flat screen TV, cable and deck access. The master bath area has a large jetted bathtub and shower stall. The first bedroom has a twin over full bunk with flat screen TV and across the hall is the third bedroom with a queen size bed which also has a flat screen TV. At the end of the hall you will find garage access for parking and the laundry area with full size washer and dryer provided. 

Note: This home's driveway has a steep downhill pitch. We recommend having tire chains or four wheel drive during the winter months to park in the driveway or access the garage. 

Features: Large Fenced Backyard, Deck, Propane BBQ, Gas Log Fireplace, Flatscreen TVs, DVD Player, WIFI, Central Heat, Modern Appliances, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Osito's Retreat - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Vacation in style at this beautiful townhouse that is an easy walk to the lake just minutes from Boulder Bay, marinas, Alpine Slide, and the Village!  The complex has two  			swimming pools (closed during the winter), two spas, two tennis courts and a boat dock for day  			use dependent on lake level.

Located in a quiet community, this retreat boasts wood floors, updated kitchen and bathrooms, and a wood burning fireplace.  The living room features comfortable sofa and love seat in front of the fireplace and flat screen TV with Roku and DVD player.  You can stay close to the group while sharing memories of old and new while cooking in the kitchen that has a gas range, microwave and dishwasher.  Step out to the back deck for grilling on the propane barbecue or relaxing at the table and chairs for lunch or evening glass of wine.

Down the hallway you will find a stacked washer and dryer, 3/4 bathroom and two bedrooms. The master bedroom has a queen bed, desk, TV with Blu-Ray and Roku, and a private full bathroom with a jetted Jacuzzi bathtub. The second bedroom has a queen bed and Roku TV and DVD player.

Upstairs is a great place for the kids or kid at heart. This divided bonus room has 4 twins, and two TV's with Roku.

The entire downstairs is handicap accessible! There is plenty of room for everyone!

Note: Lake levels vary throughout the year and boat docks  availability is not guaranteed at the time of your arrival. Destination  Big Bear is not responsible for the level of water in the lake during  the course of guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most  up-to-date lake levels for lakefront properties.

Features: Wood Floors, Wood Burning Fireplace, Roku TV, DVD, Propane Barbecue, Updated Kitchen and Bath, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Deck, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Mountain View Lodge - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 1: Queen, Twin over Full Bunk (Lower Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 3: Queen and a Full Bed (Upper Level)

description:
A wonderful cabin for a family or group, you will appreciate the location and features in this mountain getaway.  Just a short distance to Bear Mountain, the Alpine Zoo and golf course.

This two story getaway has a game room on the lower entry level with pool table that can also be switched to ping-pong, or challenge someone to a game of Foosball or air hockey. Relax in front of the wood burning fireplace while watching TV on the flat screen or lounging on the sofa or daybed. The lower level has a large bedroom with queen bed, twin over full bunk and attached large bathroom.

Upstairs is an open concept living room with wood burning fireplace, modern furnishings, flat screen TV and a deck with tree views.  The kitchen has everything you will need with stainless steel appliances, gas stove, dishwasher, microwave and nice seating area for meals or game night.  Step out onto the deck and soak in the hot tub. Enjoy tree views as well as views of Bear Mountain Ski Slopes.  The backyard is completely fenced, ideal for your kids and pets.

Upstairs is a full bathroom conveniently located in the hall and two bedrooms.  One bedroom has a king bed and small private deck.  The second bedroom has one queen and one full bed and a flat screen TV.

Note: DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.
