name: Mountain Top Views - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3/Game Room: Twin over Twin, Twin over Full Bunk (Lower Level)

description:
If you are looking for mountain top views then this is the perfect cabin for you!  This reverse floor plan cabin is situated high in the hills of upper Moonridge to take advantage of the slope views from the deck and hot tub!

The upper level is open and airy and features floor to ceiling windows that highlight the vista beyond.  The knotty pine walls and cathedral ceiling provide a cozy mountain feel, especially as you curl up in front of the wood burning fireplace while watching your favorite show or movie on the flat screen TV with cable and DVD player.  The kitchen has a festive flair and includes a gas range, dishwasher, microwave and coffee pot.  Step out on the deck for grilling on the propane barbecue or just relaxing and enjoying the view.

The first bedroom is on this level and has a queen bed, back deck and yard access and private 3/4 bathroom. Sleeping accommodations continue up in the loft with a queen and king bed, private 3/4 bathroom and small back deck.

For fun and games, the lower entry level is where the kids and kid at heart will want to be.  Spend a few hours playing Foosball or watch TV with cable and DVD player.  An electric fireplace heater adds ambiance and warmth to the space.  When night falls take your pick of a twin over twin and twin over full bunk beds.  Step outside and ease your tired muscles in the hot tub. A stacked washer and dryer is available for your use and is perfect for longer stays.

This is a great option for a Big Bear vacation for family and friends!

NOTE: This cabin has a steep road to driveway transition.  High clearance vehicles recommended.  Always carry chains in the winter months as roads can get icy.  NO SWING SET

Features: Slope Views, Hot Tub, Propane Barbecue, Decks, Flat Screen TV, Cable, Internet, DVD Players, Wood Burning Fireplace, Foosball Table, Gas Range, Microwave, Coffee Pot,  Dishwasher, Stacked Washer and Dryer, Central Heat, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.

name: Papoose Shores - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Bedroom: King and Twin over Twin Bunk (Upper Level)

description:
As of September 26, 2018, the water depth for dock use about 2 feet to 2.5 feet deep; however due to low lake levels, boats cannot access all the way to the dock. Dock is note directly in front of home. Please see photos of accessing the dock. Be respectful and stay off docks that do not belong to this property.

Enjoy spectacular, unobstructed views of the lake from this beautiful, four bedroom with bonus sleeping area off master. It is lakefront and located in the highly sought after Papoose Bay with private boat dock.

Set back from the road, the lighted covered walkway leads back to the house from the garage to the three story house with open main floor plan. Gorgeous wood beamed ceilings stretch from living room to kitchen. The living room has a wood/gas fireplace with natural rock surround and flat screen TV with cable. The kitchen has custom cabinets with matching refrigerator, lots of storage and gas stove top, stacked double oven, dishwasher, microwave and coffee pot. The dining area has fabulous views of the lake.  A large deck with a Natural gas barbeque grill is perfect for spending warm days and nights relaxing in the fresh air.  The game room has an air hockey table (air does not work) and a washer and dryer.  A full bathroom is also on this level.

Upstairs is the large master suite with king bed, wood burning fireplace, TV with cable, and separate office with bunk beds for additional sleeping space. The master bath has tumbled travertine tile, spa tub but the jets do not work and separate shower. A private deck with french doors overlooks the lake.

Three lower level bedrooms ensure a quiet place to rest after a long day of fun. Two of the bedrooms have glass French doors opening to the covered deck with hot tub and access to the backyard and dock.  All of the bedrooms have queen beds, and one has two queen beds.  A full bathroom with double sinks is in the hallway.

Note: Lake levels vary throughout the year and boat docks availability is not guaranteed at the time of your arrival. Destination Big Bear is not responsible for the level of water in the lake during the course of guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most up-to-date lake levels for lakefront properties.

Features: Lakefront, Hot Tub, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Dishwasher, Double Oven, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Internet, Cable TV, Flat Screen TV, Wood Burning Fireplaces, Natural Gas BBQ, Decks, Great Views, Hot Tub, Air Hockey Table (Air Mechanism Out of Order), All Rooms except Game Room have Lake Views, Linens and Towels Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few dated features or appliances.

name: Ponderosa by the Lake - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Queen, Twin over Full Bunk, 3/4 Bath (Main Level)

description:
Ponderosa By The Lake can be your next home away from home in the mountains and Big Bear Lake!  Located just minutes from the lake and marina for summer fun on the water.  A short drive gets you to sledding and to the resorts for winter adventure!

This sprawling family cabin boasts plenty of mountain charm with wood floors, a gas fireplace, log furnishings and views of the beautiful trees and peek-a-boo views of the lake.  The large living room sofa is comfortable for those wanting to watch the flat screen TV with Dish satellite and DVD.  The log dining table has room for 6 with additional seating in the glass-surrounded breakfast nook that feels like you are eating outdoors. The kitchen is stocked with all the basics for preparing a meal and includes a glass top electric range, microwave, dishwasher, toaster oven, regular coffee maker and Keurig machine. If mountain air is what you crave, step out to the covered patio with seating and ceiling fans, a private hot tub, and barbecues with propane and charcoal options. Kids will enjoy playing catch or building a snowman in the flat front yard.

Just off the kitchen is the family room with wood burning fireplace, pull-out sofa, love seat and access to the patio and a 3/4 bathroom.  Down the main floor hallway you will find a full bathroom that is shared with the first bedroom.  This bedroom has a queen bed and TV with DVD player.  Further down the hall is the second bedroom with king bed and access to the 3/4 bath that is shared with the family room.

For those who are looking for entertainment you can step through the connecting hallway to the family room that is perfect for storing all of your winter gear.  From here you can also head into the garage game room with card table, pool table, air hockey and washer and dryer.  The third bedroom is also off this hall and includes a queen bed, twin over full bunk, TV with DVD player and private 3/4 bath.

Upstairs is even more sleeping and lounging space!  A sitting area has a TV with Dish satellite and DVD player.  A full bathroom is convenient next to the sleeping side of the room.  Two twin beds and two futons complete the space.  Just off the common room is a private bedroom with a twin bed, queen, and vanity with sink.

This cabin has all of the amenities that your family and friends will love!

Features: Close to Marina, Gas and Wood Fireplaces, Hot Tub, Barbecues, Peek-A-Boo Lake Views, Outdoor Seating, Game Room, Wood Floors, Stocked Kitchen, Electric Range, Keurig Coffee Maker, Regular Coffee Maker, Microwave, Dishwasher, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Rebel Ridge Lodge - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: Full, Twin w/ Twin Trundle (Main Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 3: King, Full, Twin w/ Twin Trundle, Full Bath (Upper Level)

description:
Located in the coveted neighborhood of Castle Glen Estates, right on the peak of Rebel Ridge, this cabin is the perfect blend of rustic log cabin, cozy mountain decor and all the comforts of home.  Just a few minutes drive to grocery stores, restaurants and the slopes.

The cabin features a wonderfully open floor plan with knotty pine walls and features, vaulted ceilings, and plenty of windows for natural light and enjoying the peek-a-boo slope views.  You will surly stay warm and cozy in front of the floor to ceiling river rock gas fireplace.  The dining room has a large table for a meal or game night with extra seating at the breakfast bar.  The kitchen is stocked with all the basics and includes a gas range, dishwasher, refrigerator, microwave and coffee pot.  Step out to the back deck for a breath of fresh mountain air and views of Baldwin Lake, mountains and slopes while you soak in the hot tub. Enoy the view and deck  while grilling on the Propane BBQ grill. 

Down the main floor hallway you will find a washer and dryer, full bathroom and two bedrooms.  Bedroom one has two full beds, and bedroom two has a full bed and twin with twin trundle.

The loft is the place for gathering together to watch your favorite show on the large flat screen with cable.  A built in desk is convenient for those needing to stay in touch with work or for the kids to finish homework.  The third bedroom is also on the upper level and has a king bed, full bed, twin with twin trundle, and full bathroom with double sinks.

This cabin is sure to become a favorite vacation destination for your family and friends!

NOTE: Pets Negotiable

Features: Mountain/Slope Views, Gas Fireplace, Hot Tub, Cable, Internet, Deck, Propane BBQ grill Garage Parking, Carpet, Central Heat, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Redwood Retreat - Big Bear City, CA
description:
You are in for a treat at Redwood Retreat!  This home combines comfortable furnishings and amenities with the mountain ambiance you are looking for.  Located in a quiet neighborhood just minutes from conveniences, Bear Mountain and the convention center.

The living room, dining and kitchen are together under the cathedral ceilings with plenty of windows for natural light.  The living room focuses around the wood burning fireplace, perfect for those chilly mountain nights.  Relax on the sofa and watch your favorite show or movie on the large flat screen TV with DirecTV and DVD player.  Stay connected with complementary Wi-Fi.  The dining area has seating for 6 with additional seating for 4 at the counter.  There is ample counter space for preparing a meal for the family and entertaining during the holidays in the kitchen which includes a gas range, dishwasher, microwave and coffee pot.  Take in some fresh air on the back deck with natural gas barbecue.  Soak in the hot tub under the stars!  Kids will love running around the fenced backyard with mature trees and plenty of space for a game of catch.

Down the hallway you will find a full bathroom, washer and dryer, and the three bedrooms.  The master bedroom has a king bed, access to the back deck and hot tub, TV with DirecTV and private 3/4 bathroom with double sinks and corner shower.  Bedroom two has a queen bed and bedroom three has 2 twin beds.

This cabin is the perfect retreat for your family and friends in Big Bear!

Features:  Close to Bear Mountain and Conveniences, Quiet Neighborhood, Hot Tub, Nice Yard, Deck, Natural Gas Barbecue, DirecTV, DVD, Internet, Wood Burning Fireplace, Updated Furnishings, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Microwave, Master Suite, Washer and Dryer, Central Heat, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.
address: 1217 Redwood Drive Big Bear City, CA 92314

name: Out of Dodge Lodge - Big Bear City, CA
description:
If it's time to "get out of Dodge" then we have the perfect place for your family vacation!  Located high in the Moonridge neighborhood, this cabin boasts amazing views of the lake, ski slope mountain and golf course below.

The grand entry is the center of this large cabin and is sure to be the hub of the evening entertainment.  Enjoy the amazing views while playing a game of pool or turn on the TV and watch your favorite show or movie on cable or Blu-Ray player.  Off the entry you can head into the kitchen featuring expansive granite counters, electric flat stovetop, stacked oven and microwave, dishwasher, coffee pot and side-by-side refrigerator.  Extra seating is at the breakfast bar.  The dining area has a gas fireplace to enjoy while sharing a meal or game night.  Step out to the deck for grilling on the propane barbecue.  A laundry room is available for your convenience.

Back through the entry hall you will access the living room with more of those amazing views, deck access, a large wrap-around sofa and wood burning fireplace to enjoy on those chilly nights.  Pass the time watching TV with cable and Blu-Ray player while you try your luck at Foosball.  A corner wet bar with small sink is ready for cocktail making (no fridge).  Step outside and enjoy the fresh mountain air while soaking in the hot tub, located in a covered gazebo on ground level.  It's perfect for relaxing after a day full of adventure.

A bedroom is on the main level and has a king and twin bed, TV with cable and Blu-Ray player.  A 3/4 bathroom is located in the hall.  Upstairs you will find three more spacious bedrooms and a full bathroom.  The master bedroom features a private deck, TV with cable and Blu-Ray player and 3/4 bathroom with double sinks. Enjoy lake views from the log style king bed or full bed.  The next bedroom has a queen and twin bed, TV with cable and Blu-Ray player.  The last bedroom has two twin over queen log style bunk beds, TV with cable and Blu-Ray player.
NOTE: No basketball hoop

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

Features: Lake, Mountain and Golf Course Views, Large Deck, Pool Table, Foosball Table, Hot Tub, Ceiling Fans Throughout, Flat Screen TVs, Cable and Blu-Ray Players in Every Room, Internet, Wood Burning Fireplace, Gas Fireplace, Propane Barbecue, Granite Counters, Electric Stove Top, Microwave, Oven, Coffee Pot, Dishwasher, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Resting Falcon - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Find peace and quiet on your next Big Bear Lake vacation at Resting Falcon! Perched high among the trees this is the perfect cabin for your next family getaway if you are looking for rest, relaxation and a little fun!  Spend your days on the back deck, play a game of pool, Foosball or soak in the hot tub. Fresh mountain air and sunshine await!  Just a short drive to Bear Mountain and the Moonridge shops and restaurants.

This cabin is nice and homey and decorated with mountain and vintage accents.  Enjoy the wood burning fireplace, comfortable sofa, large flat screen smart TV featuring Netflix and also a Blu-Ray player. Challenge your friends and family to a game of pool.  The kitchen has a pass through window so everyone can stay connected while cooking on the gas stove or sipping a cup of coffee at the breakfast bar.  The kitchen is stocked with all the basics and includes a microwave, Keurig coffee maker and dishwasher.  The dining area has table and chairs plus a corner wood burning fireplace, ideal for a meal or cozy game night.  Step out to the back deck for grilling on the propane barbecue or hanging out under the mature pine trees in the hot tub. Bring your horseshoes and head down to the back yard for an afternoon game.  

The downstairs master bedroom has a queen bed and TV and a Blu-Ray player. A full bathroom with stacked washer and dryer are also on the main level.

Upstairs is the loft overlooking the living room with a Foosball table as well as the two bedrooms with floor to ceiling windows and private decks.  One bedroom has a king bed, private deck and mountain views, the second bedroom has a twin over full bunk bed, private deck and TV. A full bath is also upstairs for your convenience.

Features: Close to Bear Mountain, 2 Wood Burning Fireplaces, Hot Tub, Stocked Kitchen, Keurig Coffee Maker, Microwave, Dishwasher, Blu-Ray Player in Each Room, Internet, Pool Table, Foosball Table (not pictured), Propane Barbeque, Flat Screen TV, Deck, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations. Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, and possibly a few dated features or appliances.
address: 581 Villa Grove Ave. Big Bear City, 92314

name: Pampered Bear - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Bedroom: Cal King, Two Twin over Twin Bunks (bottom floor)

description:
Get ready to be pampered with stellar amenities and spectacular views in this custom built log sided home in the highly sought after Castle Glen Estates! Bring along your dogs because this home is dog friendly!

This home is nothing short of amazing with no detail overlooked. Once you enter the property you will be amazed at the high vaulted ceilings, expansive wood work and all the right touches of decor.

The dining room area has a large farm style table with seating for 8 and a large side table perfect for board games. Hop on up to the extensive granite bar and keep the chef company with the well-appointed kitchen featuring a side by side refrigerator with water and ice maker, standard coffee maker, gas range with oven, microwave oven,  a large picture window that allows for direct sunlight and an Azpen Innovation multi use charging and docking station.

The living room area has two large seating areas for your relaxation, with one large sectional sofa to enjoy the wood burning fireplace, cable TV, WIFI and a large flatscreen smart TV.  On the opposite side of the great room you will find an additional seating area perfect for a group gathering.

Down the hall you will find a laundry closet equipped with a full size washer/dryer and one full bath.

The first bedroom has a full size bed and a flat screen smart TV. The second bedroom has a California king bed and also features a flat screen smart TV.  At the end of the hall is the Master Suite with a queen size bed, flat screen smart TV. fireplace and entrance with deck access. The master bath features a soaking tub, stand alone shower and private toilet area.

Head downstairs to enjoy a game of pool on the custom pool table or a competitive game of Foosball.  There is a seating area perfect for a card game and this room also features a wet bar. Step out onto the deck and enjoy the large 8 person hot tub.

The downstairs area features a second master suite with an open concept, complete with a California king size bed and two twin over twin bunks, gas fireplace, soaking tub and a large walk-in closet perfect for unloading all of your weekend luggage.

The expansive decking for this home will allow for you to enjoy the gorgeous views enjoyed only by few other homes here in Big Bear. Grab a seat on one of the custom built chairs and enjoy a cookout with the propane grill.

Features: Majestic Mountain Views, Luxury Finishes, Close to Lake and Conveniences, Hot Tub, Pool Table, Foosball Table, Propane Barbecue, Wood and Gas Fireplaces, Cable, Internet, Stainless Steel Appliances, Microwave, Standard Coffee Maker, Master Suite, Laundry Area, Pet Friendly, Towels and Linens Provided.

name: Pine Place Cabin - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Pine Place Cabin is a cheery, welcoming cabin located close to the lake and minutes to the ski slopes, biking, and hiking trails. It features wood floors throughout and a wood-burning fireplace. Enjoy peek-a-boo lake views from the fenced yard and front bedroom. 

The living room has an oversize sofa situated in front of the flat screen smart TV. The open-concept kitchen features a table for 4 and a fantastic 1909 cast-iron antique stove that has been turned into a dry-bar, a gas range, microwave, good size refrigerator, a coffee pot and Keurig coffee maker. Step out to the back deck and grill on the propane barbecue or sit back on one of the steamer-style lounge chairs for relaxing in the shade, stargazing, or taking in one of Big Bear's beautiful sunsets. Sip wine or coffee and watch boats go by from the cozy Adirondack chairs in the yard.

When night falls, there are three bedrooms to choose from for a good night's sleep. Bedroom one has a queen bed and Smart TV with streaming capabilities. Bedroom two has a queen bed and TV with Smart DVD player for watching movies or accessing Netflix or Hulu. Bedroom three has a twin bed and lake views. A full bathroom is centrally located off the living room.

Features: Peek-a-boo lake views, short walk to lake or marina, 10-minute drive to Snow Summit, 5-minute drive to The Village, hiking trails nearby, board games, fenced yard, pet-friendly, propane barbecue, wood burning fireplace, wood floors, flat screen TV, Internet, Smart TV, Smart DVD, Gas Range, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Keurig, Deck, Central Heat, Towels and Linens Provided

This charming vintage cabin is perfect for couples or families looking for a simple getaway to Big Bear, close to the lake, village, slopes, and hiking with pleasant and well-appointed accommodations. Features comfortable furnishings and desirable amenities, and much of the original 1939 character has been preserved for a truly cozy escape. Follow Pine Place Cabin on Instagram @pineplacecabin.

name: Running Bear - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
A rustic lodge setting with the comfortable feeling of your own home, Running Bear welcomes you the moment you walk through the door.

This luxury home is located in a quiet court, nestled in the pines, in one of Big Bear’s most sought after neighborhoods. Even better, it’s only minutes away from Snow Summit Resort.

A beautifully landscaped yard surrounds the house with its natural wood siding and brick columns adding to the mountain cabin feel on a much higher level. The kids will enjoy escaping into the tree house located in the fenced backyard!

Able to sleep up to thirteen, this five bedroom, two and a half bathroom home with native yet western woodsy decor, accommodates a large family with all needed amenities. Wooden walls, Aztec patterns and fur rugs add warmth and coziness to a very spacious area.

A fully equipped kitchen offers a large refrigerator paneled with pine, matching the much desired cabinet and counter space, along with a center island to prepare meals for several people.

The family room circles a rock wood burning fireplace where you can snuggle up, share stories or just relax and watch TV.

Upstairs you can take in the amazing views while enjoying a game of bumper pool/poker table and a game of pool on a regular seven foot pool table, or relax at your own bar and enjoy a movie on the flat screen.

The master bedroom speaks for itself when you enter the room. With a fireplace, his and her restrooms, double sided entry, glass shower and a “claw footed” tub. This room feels like a small cabin on it’s own, on the opposite side of the home from the other bedrooms to ensure privacy.

Enjoy the mountains surroundings and beauty from the large deck, fenced backyard or while cooking on the natural gas barbeque. Tucked in the corner, among the trees, a hot tub offers tranquility under the stars, possibly catching a glimpse of a Running Bear!

Features: Outdoor Hot Tub, Cable TV, Flat Screen TVs, DVD Player, Internet, Pool Table, 2 Family Areas, Flat Fenced Yard, Dishwasher, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Linens and Towels Provided, Cathedral Ceilings, Natural Gas Barbeque, Washer, Dryer

Note: Tenant must supply their own propane tank for the outdoor heater at their own cost.

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

name: Scenic Summit - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Escape to this skier’s, boarder’s and mountain biker’s haven! Snow Summit is just a short walk away so whether you enjoy winter sports or riding the trails in summer, you aren’t far from the lift in this conveniently located condo.

On the main level you will find a fully stocked kitchen with an adjacent dining area and powder room. Next is the living room where you can curl up in front of the wood burning fireplace when the weather is chilly or step out and grill on the electric BBQ which is just outside on the deck and prepare your feast after a day on the mountain trails. There is also a flat screen TV with cable and internet for your convenience.

Upstairs, you will find the master bedroom with a flatscreen TV and an alcove.  The next bedroom also has a flatscreen TV and access to a private balcony.  There is a roomy, full bath upstairs.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few  original features or appliances.

name: Silver Moon Lodge - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Silver Moon Lodge is a cozy cabin located in the quiet neighborhood of lower Moonridge. The location is ideal, just minutes away from Bear Mountain Ski Resort and the Moonridge Alpine Zoo. You will be less than a ten minute drive from all the restaurants, shops, and Big Bear activities.

The concrete driveway allows you to park directly in front of Silver Moon Lodge. Exterior style details include a vintage lantern, a wagon wheel, and antlers. Enter the home to find beautiful wood-floors throughout. The owners kindly request that you remove your shoes while enjoying their home and there is ample space to store shoes in the front entry. Coat hooks are also in the entry.

To the left of the entry, there is a 3/4 bathroom with a stone shower. Outdoor touches, like an antler chandelier and a wood vanity give the bathroom a cabin feel. The brick wall behind the vanity, is part of the fireplace, which you will see when you enter the open-plan living area.

The wood-burning brick fireplace will warm up Silver Moon Lodge on chilly winter nights. The brick fireplace adds charm to the room, which also features wood paneled walls, and high, sloped ceilings.

If the need to do laundry should arise, you'll find a side-by-side washer and dryer in the closet across from the fireplace.

Part of the joy of staying in a rental cabin, is the ability to create a home cooked meal. Imagine filling Silver Moon Lodge with the rich aroma of freshly brewed coffee and hearty chocolate chip pancakes. In the kitchen, you'll find all the basic tools to whip up a homemade meal. Features of the kitchen include stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, a microwave, dishwasher, coffee pot, coffee grinder, gas range, and blender.

Enjoy your meal at the adjacent wood dining table, which has four chairs and a long bench. The nearby window will give you views of the side yard as you dine. Extra seating for two can be found at the breakfast bar, located next to the dining table.

The living room is your entertainment hub. Watch your favorite movie on the flat-screen television with a dvd player and Bose sound system. Silver Moon Lodge has a large selection of dvd's for all ages and in a range of genres. Curl up on the couch or relax in the reclining chair and have a movie night. You may be on a mountain vacation, but you can easily stay connected with Wifi. 

Access to a fully-fenced side yard and small deck is found off of the living room.

Through the living room, you'll find the master bedroom. The master bedroom has sloped ceilings, a king bed, and a large dresser. Windows provide natural light and views of the back yard. The en suite bathroom is an oasis with a relaxing, soaking tub. Enjoy the modern glass shower and beautiful stone vanity with sink.

The second and third bedrooms are located to the left of the main entry door. They share the previously mentioned bathroom that is located to the left of the entry.

The second bedroom has a queen bed, a rustic bear-themed hanging light, and a large dresser. A window provides views of the front of the house.

The third bedroom is great for both kids and adults, with a spacious, full over full bunk. This room has a ceiling fan and private deck access. The deck features a four person high-top table and a propane bbq. Grill a juicy steak or bbq chicken for dinner and enjoy your meal al fresco in the fresh mountain air. 

Silver Moon Lodge is a comfortable cabin with several upgraded amenities and wood floors that is conveniently located to all of Big Bear's attractions. It's the perfect cabin for a small group or family. Make Silver Moon Lodge the destination for your next Big Bear vacation.

Features: Fully-fenced Yard, Propane BBQ, Deck, Wood-burning Fireplace, Ceiling Fan, DVD player, Bose Sound System, Wifi, Microwave, Gas Range, Coffee Pot, Coffee Grinder, Blender, Dishwasher, Washer and Dryer.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.
address: 876 Silver Tip Drive Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: Simply Serene - Big Bear City, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Twin over Full Bunk, Twin Trundle (Upper Level)
arrangements.Bonus Suite: Queen, Twin over Twin Bunk, Twin Pull-Out, 3/4 Bath (Lower Level)

description:
Get away for a weekend, or even a week and experience the Simply Serene setting of this wonderful cabin in the mountains that features two living spaces.  Decorated in a cozy, modern cabin theme, you will love the floor to ceiling natural stone wood burning fireplace, wood accents and floor to ceiling windows that let in plenty of natural light.  The living room has a flat screen TV with cable for all your favorite television viewing.

Gather your friends and family around the dining room table for a meal or fun game night.  The kitchen has additional seating at the counter, as well as stainless steel appliances, granite counters, gas range, microwave, Keurig coffee maker, and dishwasher.  The back deck is the ideal place to enjoy the fresh mountain air while you grill on the propane barbecue or just relax at the table and chairs.

The main level also has the master bedroom with a king bed, TV with cable, full bathroom, and deck access with views of the mountains.  Upstairs are two more bedrooms, a full bath, and a desk in the open loft area where you can catch up on work or write a postcard.  One bedroom has a queen bed, futon, TV with cable, and small private deck.  The last bedroom has a twin over full bunk, twin trundle, half bathroom and small private deck.

The ground level bonus suite with separate entrance is perfect for friends and family who want to be close but have their own private space.  The suite features a sofa with a twin pull-out bed, TV, mini fridge, Keurig coffee maker, 3/4 bathroom, twin over twin bunk, and queen bed.

This is a great cabin for your next trip to Big Bear Lake with your family and friends!

Note: Main living space is elevated and requires stairs.  Bonus suite is ground level with separate outdoor entrance.

Features: Wood Burning Fireplace, Propane Barbecue, Deck, Mountain Views, Cable, Internet, Updated Kitchen, Stainless Steel Appliances, Granite Counters, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Keurig Coffee Maker, Microwave, Central Heat, Bonus Suite, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with updated features and appliances.

name: Right at Home - Big Bear City, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 1: King with Half Bath and Flatscreen TV with Cable

description:
You'll feel Right At Home in this comfortable 2 bedroom, 1.5 bathroom cabin located on a quiet mountain road in upper Moonridge.  Enjoy beautiful tree and mountain views on the expansive covered front porch or snuggle up by the fire in the open living room with wood burning stove fireplace.

The cabin has updated furnishings with plenty of comfortable seating on the new futon, couch or love seat and a large flatscreen TV with cable or DVD/Blueray player. The open kitchen area features a gas stove, full sized refrigerator and dining table for gathering.  The cabin has plenty of windows for natural light, ceiling fans and gas heat.

Sleep soundly in one of two roomy bedrooms featuring lovely cabin decor.  The first bedroom has private porch access,  a half bathroom and cozy king sized bed with solid log frame.  The second bedroom has a queen bed and full bathroom.

The kids will love playing in the fully fenced, mostly flat yard under the gorgeous large trees while you kick back and relax after a day of mountain fun.

address: 743 Villa Grove Avenue Big Bear City, 92314

name: Single Story Gibralter Lakefront - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bonus Suite: 2 Queens with 3/4 Bath (Detached from Main House)

description:
***DUE TO DROUGHT CONDITIONS AND EXTREMELY LOW WATER LEVELS, THE BOAT DOCK IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.***

Live out your lakefront dreams at this beautiful, well appointed home in Big Bear!  Overlooking the marina, close to the Village, restaurants and more. Watch the fireworks right off the porch! No need to drive anywhere! 
 
This sprawling single story home boasts lake views, a wood burning fireplace, wood floors, TV with Blu-Ray, and pool table.  There is plenty of seating on the sofas where you can share memories old and new with family and friends.  The kitchen features stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, gas range, microwave, oven and two sinks.  The long dining table has room for 10.  If grilling is more your style, step out to the back patio and light up the gas grill while you enjoy the lake views.  There are plenty of seating options outdoors as well. Back inside your evening entertainment includes a pool table, board games and wet bar.  A 3/4 bathroom is just off the game room.

The spacious master bedroom is located in it's own section of the house for added privacy.  It features a king bed, lake views and patio access, double vanity, and private rooms for the toilet, and one for the soaking tub and shower.

Down a separate hallway are three more bedrooms, a full bathroom and laundry.  Two bedrooms have queen beds and the last bedroom has two twins and a twin trundle.

For a bit more privacy you can stay in the bonus suite located just steps away from the main house.  It includes two queen beds, a corner gas fireplace, sun room, wet bar with mini fridge and 3/4 bathroom.

This home is the perfect lakeside getaway for your next trip to Big Bear Lake!

Note: No cable.

***DUE TO DROUGHT CONDITIONS AND EXTREMELY LOW WATER LEVELS, THE BOAT DOCK IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.***

Lake levels vary throughout the year and boat docks availability  is not guaranteed at the time of your arrival. Destination Big Bear is  not responsible for the level of water in the lake during the course of  guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most up-to-date  lake levels for lakefront properties.

Features:  Lakefront, Gas Grill, Wood Burning Fireplace, Fenced Back Yard, Wood Floors, TV, Blu-Ray, Internet, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Range, Microwave, Pool Table, Board Games, Master Suite, Separate Bonus Suite, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Ski View Chalet - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Prime location and expansive ski slope views provide for the perfect mountain retreat!

Nestled between the oaks and next to the national forest, walk to the Bear Mountain Ski Resort or hike one of the many trails.  Step inside this immaculate, well-cared for mountain home. The living room area features expansive picture windows to soak up the sun and slope views. Sit on the sectional sofa and enjoy a fire with the unique freestanding wood burning fireplace. The living room also features a flat screen TV, DVD player, cable TV and an audio receiver with surround sound for your listening enjoyment.  There you will also find a large telescope to enjoy nights gazing at the stars!

The open concept dining room and kitchen area feature a large dining table to seat up to 8 guests and a large bar height counter. The well-appointed kitchen offers full-size newer appliances including a mirowave oven, standard coffee pot and gas range with oven.

Head down the hall where you will find the first bedroom which includes a twin over full size bunk and an air hockey game table and deck access. There is plenty of space to enjoy this home and all it has to offer!  Back down the hall you will find two large separate bathrooms with custom ultra bright sky lights and a large laundry room.

The large master bedroom at the end of the hall provides plenty of extra space to relax, with a separate seating area and gas fireplace to enjoy. The master bathroom features a soaking bathtub and large standing shower.

Head out onto the large wrap around deck to enjoy the 8 person hot tub or grill on the charcoal BBQ. 

With the park-like setting outdoors with oak trees, pines and manzanita setting the landscape, you are sure to enjoy this ideal mountain getaway!

Features: Central Location, Charcoal BBQ, Internet, Wood Burning and Gas Fireplaces, Laundry Room, Telescope, Park-Like Setting, Slope Views, Standard Coffee Maker, Modern Appliances, Master Suite, Air Hockey Table, Towels and Linens Provided.

name: Snow Summit Condo - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
A beautiful 3-bedroom home with reserved parking located at the base of Snow Summit Ski Resort. Located the corner of Summit Blvd and Switzerland Drive, you are perhaps a 200 yard walk to the nearest lift. Inside the home is beautiful new flooring, new appliances in the kitchen and great viewing balcony with BBQ and ski racks. Home offers a fully equipped kitchen, washer and dryer and televisions in each bedroom--one of which is a loft. X-Box provided for fun!

Two en suite bedrooms are located on first floor near laundry closet. Both have cable to televisions. Upstairs is lovely great room with fireplace, sofa bed with new mattress, beautiful ceiling fan, TV + X-Box, viewing deck with bar stools, BBQ and ski racks. On third floor is loft with queen and twin bed plus television. A very special treat are the TWO PARKING SPACES dedicated especially for our guests!

We offer full use of our special mountain home and ask that you treat it as kindly as you would your own!

The two marked parking spaces are located east of the building and are reserved for Unit 1. Unauthorized users will be towed.

name: Skyfox Cabin - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Much desired Fox Farm location for this woodsy mountain retreat.   

The cabin boasts wood features throughout, including vaulted T & G wood beamed ceilings and lots of glass providing a spacious feel. The wood burning fireplace will keep you cozy in the winter as well as add that desired mountain ambiance you crave.    

In the living room enjoy watching your favorite programming on the TV with cable or play a game of pool.    

The updated kitchen with room for additional dining is just steps away with granite counters. A toaster oven, microwave, coffee pot and stacked laundry unit that sits just outside of the kitchen are all provided for your convenience.  

From the living room you can step out to one of the two large decks perfect for grilling on the propane barbecue or relaxing at the table and chairs. This deck also has a nice view of the fully fenced backyard.  

There are 3 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms including jetted tub, plus a large double loft area with additional room for sleeping . Downstairs you will find accommodations for a good night's sleep, 2 spacious bedrooms with lots of wood accents and attached patio/decking with access to the rear yard and a his and hers bathroom. The master bedroom has a king bed and a large TV. The second bedroom is equipped with a queen size mattress and also has a large TV. The loft upstairs has sleeping options with a full and a twin bed. There is a full bathroom located off of the loft.  

This cabin has peak-a-boo ski slope views and is centrally-located & convenient to all of Big Bear's attractions.     This cabin is a great choice for your next vacation in Big Bear!   

Features: Wood Accents, Pool Table, Propane Barbecue, Wood Burning Fireplace, Cable, Internet, Updated Kitchen, Master Suite, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Snowed In - Big Bear City, CA

arrangements.Master Bedroom: King, Twin over Twin Bunk, Twin Roll Away (Upper Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 2: Queen, Twin over Twin Bunk (Upper Level)

description:
You won't mind getting Snowed In at this mountain getaway!  Located close to restaurants and conveniences and boasts a large, gated lot with mature trees!

The cabin has been lovingly decorated with cozy mountain decor to give you getaway feel! Stay warm and toasty in the large living room while relaxing in front of the wood burning fireplace.  Watch your favorite movie on the flat screen TV with Sling TV with Roku, Blu-Ray player and large DVD movie selection. The kitchen is right around the corner and  includes a gas stove, microwave, traditional coffee pot, Keurig machine and dishwasher while enjoying a meal on the new dining table.  Step outside to the back deck with table and chairs and charcoal barbecue and watch the kids explore the large flat lot.  A full bathroom is located on the main level.

When night falls retreat to the upstairs.  The spacious master bedroom has a wood burning fireplace, 3/4 bathroom, smart television with Netflix and Sling TV. The room also features a king bed, twin over twin bunk and additional twin roll-away. The second bedroom has a queen bed and twin over twin bunk, and TV with streaming and a Play Station 3.  Plenty of options for everyone to get a good night's sleep.

Features: 2 Wood Burning Fireplaces, New Dining and Coffee Table, Flat Screen TV, Sling TV, Internet, Blu-Ray, DVD Movie Selection, Gas Stove, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Keurig Machine, Dishwasher, Large Yard, Charcoal Barbecue, Deck, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.
address: 916 W. Robinhood Blvd Big Bear City, 92314

name: Sugar Pine Chalet - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Sugar Pine Chalet is a great two bedroom mountain home located in the Upper Moonridge area. Relax under the stars, or catch some rays on the wrap around deck. Parents and children will love the privacy of the large fenced backyard. Grill up your favorite summer meal on the charcoal barbecue or relax in the hot tub. 

The upper, entry level has an open floor plan adjoining the kitchen, dining area and living room. A mix of Western and Native American motif bring a true, rustic feeling to the cabin. The living room has  plenty of seating in front of the wood burning fireplace and flat screen TV with cable and DVD player. Enjoy family time together while cooking or enjoying a meal. The kitchen is stocked with all the basics including a gas range, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot. A stacked washer and dryer is available for your convenience.

Down the hallway you will find a full bathroom and two bedrooms. The master has a king bed, built in fireplace, TV with cable and a private 3/4 bathroom. The second bedroom has a queen bed. Both bedrooms have tempurpedic mattresses and access to the upper back deck, the perfect place to enjoy your morning cup of coffee.

There is plenty of fun to be had in the lower level family room. This is a big game room with a pool table, TV with cable, wooden floors and old, saloon style feeling. This level is also equipped with a sleeper sofa and full bathroom.

Features:Pool Table, Hot Tub, Wood Burning Fireplace, Wi-Fi, Cable, DVD, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Laundry, Fenced Yard, Wrap Around Deck, Charcoal BBQ, Towels and Linens Provided

address: 731 Villa Grove Avenue Big Bear City, 92314

name: Starway to Heaven - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: Twin over Twin Bunk, Queen, Pack-n-Play

description:
If you are coming to the mountains to see the stars, then Starway to Heaven has the view for you!  This cute cabin is situated on a large open lot, and just a few minutes walk to Moonridge shops, coffee, restaurants, Bear Mountain and the golf driving range, great for any season in Big Bear! 

The living room is highlighted by the corner wood burning fireplace and vaulted ceilings.  Relax on the sofa and watch your favorite movie on the large flat screen TV with DVD player (no cable) or surf the internet.  Gather around the dining table for game night or family meal.  The kitchen is nice and open and stocked with all the basics including gas stove, dishwasher, microwave and coffee pot.  The back yard and deck is just steps away through the sliding glass doors.  You are sure to enjoy the stargazing from the open back yard or grill on the charcoal barbeque.  This property is dog friendly with a fenced back yard.

Two bedrooms, a washer and dryer, and a full bathroom are off a hallway.  The first bedroom has a twin over twin bunk and queen bed. There is also a pack-n-play located in the closet.   The master suite has a king bed, TV with DVD player and private 3/4 bathroom.

Features: Large Flat Lot, Foosball Table, Open Space for Stargazing, Close to Bear Mountain, Walk to Golf Driving Range, Charcoal Barbeque, Central Heat, Washer and Dryer, Flat Screen TV, Internet, Wood Burning Fireplace, Master Suite, Gas Stove, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Deck, Towels and Linens Provided.
Note: No Cable. Internet only.

This property is perfect for the guest who is looking for a cabin rental that won't break the bank. Generally simple decor and filled with basic furnishings and amenities that will meet most of your needs for an enjoyable vacation.

name: Starlight Chalet - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Starlight Chalet is a charming home located in the quiet neighborhood of Upper Moonridge.

Walk down a short set of stairs to enter Starlight Chalet. When you enter the home, you'll find the living room on the left. Relax on the plush couch and warm up by the wood-burning fireplace. Watch your favorite movie on the flat screen television. The high wood ceilings and many windows make the living area feel spacious.

Access to a long deck with forest views is through a slider in the living room. You'll feel the serenity of a Big Bear vacation as you are visited by local birds, while enjoying the fresh mountain air. Use the BBQ to grill a juicy steak.

Adjacent to the living room, is the kitchen. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances and all the basic equipment to whip up a home cooked meal. Imagine creating a batch of french toast to fuel your day of skiing or a hearty spaghetti dinner to recharge after an afternoon of hiking. Large glass doors provide forest views as you eat at the four person bistro dining table.

A bathroom for the main level of the house is located near the front door.

When it's time for bed, just walk downstairs to find Starlight Chalet's two bedrooms. The master bedroom has a king bed with a flat screen television for entertainment. The second bedroom has a queen size bed. Both bedrooms share a 3/4 bathroom located in the hall.

Starlight Chalet is located close to Bear Mountain Ski Resort and the Moonridge Alpine Zoo. It's just a short, ten minute drive to the shops and restaurants in town. Starlight Chalet is a cozy home that's surrounded by beautiful trees and mountain views, a great home for your Big Bear vacation.

Features: Mountain Views, Wood-Burning Fireplace, BBQ, Stainless Steel Appliances.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.

name: Snuggle Inn - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bonus Suite: Twin over Full Bunk, TV w/ Cable, Full Bathroom

description:
Escape to the mountains and Snuggle Inn!  This cozy, vintage cabin is on a beautiful lot with mature trees, close to Bear Mountain, Snow Summit, hiking and mountain bike trails and features a main house and separate bonus guest suite.

The main house has a great room and cozy wood accents.  The living area has a sleeper sofa for flexible lounging options, wood burning fireplace and flat screen TV with cable and DVD player.  You will love all the natural afternoon light.  The dining area has a tall table with seating for 6.  The kitchen has all the comforts of home with gas stove, dishwasher, microwave, Keurig coffee maker and a coffee pot so you can make just a cup or a whole pot!  The full bathroom has ample counter space and tub/shower combo.  Of course, you might not want to leave the romantic bedroom.  Snuggle in and stay warm and toasty in the log style king bed while you enjoy the wood burning fireplace and watch cable TV.

Just a few steps away across the back deck is the bonus suite, perfect for couples or those who want to stay close while having their own space.  The bonus suite has a twin over full bunk bed, TV with cable access and full bathroom.  A front loading washer and dryer is perfect for longer stays.  The main house and guest suite have their own water heaters so everyone can enjoy a hot shower after a day out enjoying nature.

Spend some time outside grilling on the propane barbeque or soaking in the hot tub.  The front and back deck are perfect for sitting and relaxing under the trees.

Note: The bonus suite entrance is located off the back deck just a few steps from the main house.  Homeowner has firewood available for a small fee you can pay for at the cabin (cash only).

Features: Close to Bear Mountain, Close to Hiking and Mountain Bike Trails, Easy Parking, Fenced Yard, 2 Wood Burning Fireplace, Hot Tub, Propane Barbecue, Mature Trees, Flat Screen TV, Cable, DVD, Internet, Gas Stove, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Bonus Suite, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few original features or appliances.

name: Spruce Hollow - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Spruce Hollow is a charming and quaint two level, A-frame style cabin with two bedrooms and one and a half baths.

Sit back and relax in the outdoor hot tub and star gaze above. Close to Bear Mountain slopes, less than 1 mile, with ski slope and mountain views! The soaring floor to ceiling front windows let you take in the feel of the mountains and give you beautiful secluded treed view.

Enjoy sitting next to the wood burning fireplace while watching a movie on the flat screen TV. The kitchen is cozy and equipped with a small dining table and a microwave.

The first bedroom is located downstairs with a queen size bed, TV/DVD/iPod dock and a full bath. By going up the spiral staircase in the living room, you will find the second bedroom with a queen size bed, TV/DVD/iPod dock and a private half bath.
Note: No washer and dryer. This property is perfect for the guest who is looking for a cabin rental that won't break the bank. Generally simple decor and filled with basic furnishings and amenities that will meet most of your needs for an enjoyable vacation.

Features: Internet, Cable TV, DVD Players, 2 Levels, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Linens and Towels Provided, Hot Tub, Views, Charcoal Barbeque

name: Summit Lodge - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 4: 2 Queens, Twin over Twin Bunk (Upper Level)

description:
Whether you are coming to Big Bear Lake for a weekend or a holiday getaway, Summit Lodge will give you that luxury cabin in the mountains feel you are looking for.  Located in the coveted Summit Estates neighborhood between Bear Mountain and Snow Summit, this cabin has an open floor plan filled with natural light, gorgeous log walls and accents and plenty of room to spread out or gather together.  Beautifully decorated with cozy furnishings, cathedral ceilings, a loft with Foosball and pool table, surrounded by mature trees and a private back yard with hot tub and patio.

The main level features a large dining area and living room with built in desk for your laptop to surf the internet on upgraded Wi-Fi, 65 in. Smart HDTV with streaming capabilities and a Sonos 5.1 home theater surround sound system, wood burning fireplace, and fabulous floor to ceiling windows. The kitchen has expansive granite counters, large refrigerator, professional grade gas range, microwave and dishwasher.  A poker table is ready for a late night game.

The main level has three bedrooms including a large master suite with king bed, Smart TV with cable, blue-ray, and streaming capabilities, and large private bathroom with corner Jacuzzi tub and separate shower.  The second and third bedrooms each have a queen bed and Smart TV with streaming capabilities and a Blu-Ray player.  Off the hall is a bathroom with large shower for your convenience.  A stacked washer and dryer is available.

Upstairs in the loft you can play a game of pool or Foosball while watching the Smart TV with cable, streaming capabilities, and Blu-Ray player. A queen pull-out couch is perfect for lounging.  The fourth bedroom features 2 queen beds and a twin over twin bunk bed.  2 additional twin roll-aways are tucked away in the closet for additional sleeping arrangements. The bathroom is complete with double sink and large shower.

Outside you can relax on the front deck with your morning coffee and enjoy the mountain air in the rocking chairs or retreat to the backyard and soak in the hot tub, grill on the propane barbeque or lounge on the patio under the beautiful mature trees. The fenced backyard provides both privacy and security for the kids and dogs  The fun doesn't stop there!  You may even want to head into the garage for a game of ping-pong.
See fun photos taken at the cabin and comments from families like yours on Facebook at www.facebook.com/SummitLodgeBigBear

Features: A/C, Master Suite, Hot Tub, Pool Table, Foosball Table, Ping-Pong, Propane Barbeque, Private Backyard, Wood Burning Fireplace, Professional Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Smart HDTVs, Blue-Ray and DVD, Internet, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided
This is a luxury property which includes the finest furnishings, luxury building materials, and a highly consistent design theme. Luxury properties range from elegant and formal to relaxed and chic, but all appeal to guests who appreciate first-class accommodations with a designer flair.

DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs!

NOTE: The driveway is very steep. Please remember to bring chains during the winter months.

name: Summit Enchantment - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
This unique single story home is located on a tree-lined street and only three blocks to Snow Summit Resort, walking distance to the Village and the lake for all year round activities. Enjoy the convenience of a single level home with no steps to clime, all bedrooms on one level, and a walk in shower!

The home is tastefully decorated with updated furnishings and brand new mattresses for your enjoyment and comfort. Great option for guests looking for a home with no stairs (one small step into home/4 steps to ground in back yard from raised deck).

The hardwood floors open the spacious great room for entertaining and gathering. Relax in front of the brick fireplace. The kitchen boasts beautiful rustic alder wood kitchen cabinets with one of a kind and unique granite counter tops, Verde wild sea that was excavated from the ocean. All brand new stainless steel appliances. Samsung front load washer and dryer.

The home features a giant deck for enjoying the outdoors, includes charcoal barbeque; sipping your morning coffee while watching your kids playing in the oversized fully fenced backyard.  At night, unwind under the stars and soak in the six persons hot tub after having fun at the slopes.

This newly remodeled home is also equipped with internet, both wireless and wired for quick, uninterrupted connections, a new flat-screen HDTV and a DVD player.

A new game room is recently completed with cable TV and a brand new pool table to provide you a second entertainment area.

Other distinguished features of this house includes a covered front porch, rain gutters, wide paved walkway and plenty of convenient parking spaces. This home will not disappoint the most discerning traveler.

Note: For larger parties, rent this one and Hawks Nest right next door.

DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Summit Woods - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: Twin over Full Bunk, Twin (Main Level)

description:
Your vacation in the mountains will feel like you are deep in the woods, yet just minutes from everything in Big Bear!  Centrally located for easy access to the resorts, Village, lake and restaurants.  You will love the log construction, floor to ceiling stone wood burning fireplace, vaulted ceilings, and rustic furnishings.

The living room has a large flat screen TV with streaming and comfortable sofas for gathering.  The dining area and kitchen are just steps away and overlook the great room.  The dining table has room for 6 with 3 additional seats at the breakfast bar.  The kitchen is stocked and complete with stainless steel appliances including gas range, dishwasher, microwave, coffee pot and toaster oven.  If grilling is more your style then head out to the back deck with seating and a propane barbecue.  Kids will love exploring the back yard that has plenty of flat space for a game of catch or building a snowman.

The main level has two bedrooms, the laundry room and full bathroom down a short hallway.  The first bedroom has a queen bed and TV.  The second bedroom has a twin over full bunk and twin bed.

Head upstairs for a few hours of fun at the Foosball table while you hang out in the loft that has a sofa, twin bed with twin trundle and TV with cable.  The third bedroom is also upstairs and has a queen bed, TV and full bathroom with large tub just outside the door.

This cabin is perfect for family and friends to gather any time of year!  Book your stay in Big Bear!

Note: Driveway has a steep transition from the road.  Use caution.  High clearance vehicles recommended.

Features:  Log Cabin Construction, Centrally Located, Deck, Propane Barbecue, Wood Fireplace, Foosball Table, TVs with Streaming and Cable, Stainless Steel Appliances, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Summit Rock - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: Twin over Full Bunk, Twin (Upper Level)

description:
Escape to this skier’s, boarder’s and mountain biker’s haven! Snow  Summit is just a short walk away so whether you enjoy winter sports or  riding the trails in summer, you aren’t far from the lift in this  conveniently located condo.

This unique getaway features a stone wall, bar sink and retro video game  table in the living room.  Get cozy by lighting a fire in the wood  stove while you watch TV with DVD and cable. Through a short hallway is a  half bathroom, stairway to the upper level and kitchen and dining room.  The kitchen is stocked with all the basics and includes electric range,  dishwasher, microwave and coffee pot. The back deck is where you will  find a hot tub and propane grill.  There is plenty of seating at the  dining table for a good meal or game of cards with additional seating at  the counter.  A futon provides comfortable lounging or sleeping space.

Upstairs, you will find the washer and dryer and a full bathroom off the  hallway. The master bedroom has a private deck, queen bed, and TV with  cable.  The second bedroom has a twin over full bunk,twin bed and TV  with cable.

You won't find a better location for all of your Big Bear adventures!

Note: One parking spot in front of the garage and the other parking is in front. Parking is unassigned along the street in designated area for the condo complex.

Features: Walk to Snow Summit, Cable, Internet, Flat Screen TVs, Hot  Tub, Wood Stove Fireplace, Propane Bar-B-Que, Electric Range,  Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Microwave, Washer and Dryer, Linens and Towels  Provided
address: 569 Summit Blvd Unit #2 Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: Sun Terrace - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Sun Terrace is your mountain getaway whether you are looking for a quick weekend getaway or spending some time at the slopes!  Located in the coveted Castle Glen Estates neighborhood, this cabin combines luxury with mountain charm.  Enjoy being just a few minutes from grocery stores, lake access and the resorts! 

The moment you open the door you will fall in love with the wide open space of the great room that is brought together by the knotty pine wood walls and vaulted ceiling.  The living room is warm and cozy, especially once you get a fire going in the wood burning fireplace.  Gather around and watch your favorite shows or a movie with cable TV.  The dining area is perfect for a family meal or reading the morning paper with a cup of coffee.  The charming kitchen has plenty of counter space with bar seating and has all the amenities you will need for meal planning and includes granite counters, gas range, dishwasher, coffee pot and microwave.

Step out to the front covered porch and enjoy the fresh mountain air, or head out to the back deck for grilling on the propane barbecue and soaking up some sun.

Down the hallway you will find all the bedrooms, a bathroom and laundry room.  The master bedroom has a log style king bed, TV with cable, and access to the front deck.  The private on-suite bathroom has a large tub and separate shower.  The next bedroom has a queen bed, and the last bedroom has two twin beds.

Features:  2 Car Garage, Wood Burning Fireplace, Mountain Decor, Close to Conveniences, Lake and Resort, Cable, Internet, Propane Barbecue, Granite Counters, Gas Range, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Dishwasher, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided
address: 42456 Golden Oak Road Big Bear Lake, 92315

name: Swanson's Family Cabin - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Additional: Twin mattress in closet of Bedroom 3, Queen mattress in closet of Game Room

description:
If you are looking for a peaceful getaway with plenty of space for you and your family, then consider Swanson's Family Cabin!  Located in a quiet neighborhood just minutes from everything, this cabin is tucked away on a dead-end street surrounded by lovely mature trees.

This cabin features the main house and a separate game room.  The living room is bright and welcoming with comfortable sofas, a large flat screen TV with cable, and a wood burning fireplace for chilly nights.  The kitchen is just around the corner and has been beautifully updated with granite counters, glass tile backsplash, stainless steel appliances, gas range, microwave, dishwasher and a Keurig coffee maker.  A table and chairs is perfect for a meal.

Down the hallway you will find a full bathroom, laundry room, and three bedrooms.  The master bedroom has a log style king bed and private full bathroom.  The second bedroom has two full beds, and the third bedroom has a queen bed.

Outside across the deck is the game room with a pool table, darts, large flat screen TV, cable, DVD player and a full bathroom.  Sleeping accommodations can be arranged on the twin daybed or small twin futon.

The deck is sure to be a favorite spot to relax in the shade or grill on the propane barbecue.  Take a leisurely stroll around the peaceful neighborhood for a bit of fresh air.  This cabin is going to be a family favorite!

Features:  Pool Table, Wood Burning Fireplace, Flat Screen TVs, Cable, Internet, DVD, Updated Kitchen, Stainless Steel Appliances, Keurig Coffee Maker, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Laminate Wood Floors, Carpet, Deck, Propane Barbecue, Wall Heating, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with updated features and appliances.

name: The Antlers - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
***DUE TO DROUGHT CONDITIONS AND EXTREMELY LOW WATER LEVELS, THE BOAT DOCK IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.***

If you're looking to stay at a home that will truly make you feel like you’re staying in the San Bernardino Mountains, The Antlers is the place to be. The Antlers is a cozy lakefront cabin that has superb views of the lake and mountains year round! These great panoramic views can be seen from nearly every room in the house.

Walk up the front steps and before you enter the house through the kitchen, take a peek around the front deck to see your lake view. Prepare to be wowed. The deck has a gas BBQ and is ideally located off of the kitchen, making it a breeze to grill up dinner. If the weather is warm, enjoy your meal on the deck, which has a large outdoor dining table. Imagine enjoying a family BBQ with blue skies and blue water in the background.

Enter the house to find the kitchen, which has all of the basics that you will need to enjoy a home-cooked meal. If it's chilly outside, you can still enjoy dining with a lake view from a interior table thoughtfully positioned next to the window.

The living room is cozy with a wood-burning rock fireplace and plush couches. Relax and be entertained with cable television, a DVD/VCR player, and wireless internet. 

The Antlers sleeps six: This includes a king bed on the main level, plus a full and two twins upstairs. If you're looking for a property with classic cabin decor, The Antlers fits the bill. It's the perfect cabin for a vacation away from the hustle and bustle of the city.

 If you want to head out and explore the town, The Antlers is just over half a mile from The Village and the nearest marina! The Antlers is located in a quiet neighborhood, has spectacular views, yet is convenient to local restaurants and activities. It's a great home for a escape to the lake!

***DUE TO DROUGHT CONDITIONS AND EXTREMELY LOW WATER LEVELS, THE BOAT DOCK IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.***

Note: Lake levels vary throughout the year and boat docks availability is not guaranteed at the time of your arrival. Destination Big Bear is not responsible for the level of water in the lake during the course of guest's stay. Please contact us to inquire about the most up-to-date lake levels for lakefront properties.

Features: Lakefront, Landscaped Outdoor Setting, Full Kitchen, No Dishwasher, , Wood Burning Fireplace, TV, DVD/VCR Player, Gas BBQ, Wireless Internet Access, Cable,  Towels and Linens Provided

name: Sweet Mountain Escape - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Your mountain getaway just got a little sweeter at Sweet Mountain Escape!  This cabin is perfect for those who want a simple vacation with desired amenities like a hot tub, wood burning fireplace and barbecue!  Just minutes from hiking trails, the Alpine Slide, and the Village.

The open floor plan gives the cabin an open and airy feeling.  The living room is complete with sofa, love seat, mini Foosball table, TV with Roku and a cozy wood burning fireplace for those chilly winter nights.  The dining area has room for six.  The kitchen has been updated in a quaint cottage style with granite counters, gas range, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot.  Just around the corner is the washer and dryer and access to the back yard and covered patio where you can store all your winter adventure gear.

Head through the back hallway where you will find a full bathroom and three bedrooms.  The master bedroom has a king bed, TV with Roku, private 3/4 bathroom and access to the back deck where you will find the hot tub.  The second bedroom has a queen and TV with Roku.  The last bedroom has two twin beds and TV with Roku.

If the outdoors is where you want to spend your time, you can take your pick of the front covered porch or the back deck with seating, the propane barbecue, a nice yard for kids to explore and the hot tub.

This cabin is a great place to call home on your next Big Bear vacation, so make it a Sweet Mountain Escape!

Note: No cable.

Features:  Close to Alpine Slide, Hiking Trails and The Village, Hot Tub, Wood Burning Fireplace, Propane Barbecue, Deck, Covered Patio, Roku Streaming TV, Internet, Mini Foosball Table, Granite Counters, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Central Heat, Carpet, Flat Parking, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, upgraded kitchen and bath, with a few original features.

name: The Bear Cave - Big Bear City, CA
description:
The Bear Cave is your hibernation destination and is everything you and your family is looking for in a vacation rental in Big Bear Lake!  This custom built luxury log cabin has wood floors, wood fireplace, vaulted ceilings, beautiful kitchen, hot tub and game room.  So much space for everyone to enjoy with rustic log features and modern conveniences. Close to Bear Mountain with only a 3 minute drive!

The great room has floor to ceiling windows with peek-a-boo views of the slopes.  The wraparound reclining sofa is perfect for watching a movie on the 70 inch TV with Blu-Ray player, Netflix or tune into your favorite show on the cable with HBO and Showtime.  The wood burning river rock fireplace will keep you warm and cozy in the winter months while ceiling fans throughout provides a cool breeze in the summer.  The spacious kitchen area has granite counters, stainless steel appliances, breakfast bar seating, dishwasher, traditional coffee pot, Keurig coffee maker, microwave and gas stove.  Set the dining table for a meal or gather around for a game night.

The back deck features a charcoal barbecue grill, seating and a hot tub for soaking after a fun day on the slopes or hiking trails.

A hallway connects the three bedrooms, laundry and 3/4 bathroom with roomy walk-in shower and glass bowl sink.  The master suite has a king and twin sized log framed bed as well as access to the back deck and TV with cable.  The master bathroom has a jet tub, separate shower and double copper bowl style sinks.  The second bedroom has a private 3/4 bathroom with glass bowl sink, corner shower and adult friendly queen over queen bunk bed. The third bedroom has a queen bed with memory foam mattress and a twin.  Plenty of room for everyone!

Head downstairs where the family is sure to love the "cave" complete with pool table, casino Blackjack table, recliners and TV with cable TV. To make your game room experience more enjoyable there is a wireless home theater surround sound system with Bluetooth so you can listen to your favorite music on your own device.

Note: This cabin is located in a neighborhood that may require chains to access when snow or ice is present and has a fairly steep driveway. Always carry chains in the winter months.

Features: Hot Tub, Pool Table, Casino Blackjack Table, Wood Floors, Custom Log Features, Cable, Internet, DVD Player, Granite Counters, Stainless Steel Appliances, Coffee Pot,  Keurig Coffee Maker, Microwave, Dishwasher, Wood Burning Fireplace, Charcoal Barbecue, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This is a luxury property which includes the finest furnishings, luxury building materials, and a highly consistent design theme. Luxury properties range from elegant and formal to relaxed and chic, but all appeal to guests who appreciate first-class accommodations with a designer flair.
address: 1275 San Pasqual Drive Big Bear City, 92315

name: The Cozy Cubby - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Twin, Twin over Full, Twin Trundle

description:
This home is located in a quiet neighborhood,  please be respectful and aware that any loud noise could result in eviction.

Spend your days in Big Bear on the slopes enjoying the sun and fresh mountain air. At night, retreat to this open, airy cabin located near Snow Summit on a beautiful treed lot with a hot tub, wood burning fireplace and Foosball table.

Gather in the living room and warm your toes by the corner wood burning fireplace while watching cable TV, surfing the internet or playing a game of Foosball.  The kitchen has table and chairs with bench seating, gas stove, refrigerator, microwave, coffee pot and opens up to the living room. Step out onto the expansive covered back deck and grill on the propane barbeque or enjoy an evening under the stars soaking in the hot tub.  The kids will love playing in the large, flat fenced in backyard under the towering pine trees, or playing a game of ping-pong or corn hole.

Off the hallway you will find 3 bedrooms and a nice full bathroom with tub, as well as the laundry.  The master bedroom has a full bathroom, flat screen TV with cable and king sized bed.  Two more spacious bedrooms ensure everyone will get a good night's sleep. The second bedroom has a queen, and the third bedroom has a twin, twin over full bunk and twin trundle.

For a weekend family getaway, you can't beat this cabin for location and amenities!

Features: Close to Snow Summit, Hot Tub, Propane Barbecue, Wood burning Fireplace, Vaulted Ceilings, Foosball Table, Central Heat, Master Suite with Full Bathroom, Large Covered Deck, Foosball Table, Corn Hole, Flat Fenced Yard, Flat Parking, Gas Stove, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Flat Screen TV, Cable, Internet, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few  original features or appliances.

name: The Den at Bear Mtn - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bonus Suite: Queen Bed, Twin Daybed w/ Twin Trundle (Lower Level, Under Garage)

description:
You’ll feel right at home in this custom log home that is just a few minutes to Bear Mountain. The beauty of the log walls and ceilings, bamboo floors, and rock gas fireplace lets you know you’re in the mountains. The cozy great room with living, dining area and kitchen are meant for comfort and perfect for keeping the whole family connected. Gather around the living room with it's comfortable sofas, large flat screen TV and gas fireplace. You won't be able to get enough of the beautiful mature trees seen from almost every window. The kitchen is stocked with all the basics and includes a gas stove, microwave, coffee pot, dishwasher and breakfast bar seating.  The dining table has plenty of room for eight people.  

Step out to the back deck and soak in the large hot tub while you count the stars.  In the mood for a little fun?  Head down to the lower level where you will find the natural gas barbeque and game room (outside entrance only) with wall to wall windows looking out into the woods!  You might find yourself spending hours playing a game of pool or ping pong, a game of cards or just watching the large flat screen TV. A full bathroom is available for your comfort.

When you are ready to retire for the night, take your pick of three bedrooms.  The first bedroom is on the main level with a queen bed and TV. Upstairs you will find two more bedrooms, both with TVs, one with a full bed and one with a twin over full bunk and futon. A full bathroom and separate laundry room is located on the main level, and a 3/4 bathroom is upstairs for easy access from the bedrooms.

Need extra space?  This cabin also features a separate suite with private entrance, perfect for parents or multiple couples.  The bonus suite features a living room with twin day bed with trundle, a kitchenette, 3/4 bathroom, flat screen TV and fireplace heater for ambiance and extra warmth (central heat is also available) and separate bedroom with a queen bed.

Features: Close to Bear Mountain, Hot Tub, Forest Views, Deck, Natural Gas BBQ, Bamboo Floors, Central Heat, Gas Fireplace, Ceiling Fans Throughout, Large Flat Screen TVs, Gas Stove, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Dishwasher, Game Room (outside entrance), Pool/Ping Pong Table, Bonus Suite (separate entrance), Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided
