name: Tehama Hama - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 2: Queen, Twin over Full Bunk (Upper Level)
arrangements.Game Room: Full and Twin Pull-Out Sofas (Upper Level)

description:
If you are wanting to be close to Bear Mountain in a cabin with all the amenities, then consider Tehama Hama!  Only a 1 mile to Bear Mountain for four seasons of fun with skiing, snowboarding, golf and the zoo!

This comfortable cabin features a large main living space with plenty of seating including two full size couches, a love seat and a lazy boy. It also features a corner wood burning fireplace, a new curved 65” Samsung smart 4K TV with Blu-Ray player and Premium Cable with HBO, Cinemax, Showtime, and more. When you want to stay in touch, enjoy complimentary internet and VOIP phone with unlimited calling in the USA/Canada/Mexico. The kitchen is just steps away past the dining area that will seat your whole family.  The kitchen has ample counter space, gas range, microwave, coffee pot and dishwasher.  For grilling on the propane barbecue or just relaxing in the fresh air, step out to the back deck that has peek-a-boo views of the slopes.  A full bathroom is also on the entry level for your convenience.

For fun and entertainment, head up to the game room which has a pool table, dart board and multi-game table for checkers, chess, poker and more!  Watch the Smart TV or your favorite movie on the Blu-Ray player.  There is also a full size pull-out sofa and additional twin pull-out sofa for flexible sleeping and lounging.  The upper level has one bedroom that includes a queen bed, twin over full bunk, and TV with DVD and DirecTV access.

Downstairs are two more bedrooms.  The master bedroom has a king bed, TV with DVD player, and a private 3/4 bath.  The last bedroom has a queen bed and TV with DVD player.  The laundry room is also on this level and is nice for longer stays.  Outside on the patio is the hot tub that is sure to be a favorite spot after a day full of adventure!

This cabin has it all for your stay in Big Bear!

name: The Rusthy Bear - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Although we all live hectic and busy lives, family finds the time to come together, relax, and make new memories.  We have the perfect place to make those memories. The Rusthy Bear Cabin lies in the heart of Big Bear Lake. Located within minutes of restaurants, 3 minute drive to grocery stores, 15 minute walk to the lake and easy access to the mountain slopes, Rusthy Bear Cabin offers a pleasant stay for all ages year-round. Enjoy this comfortable, inviting, and cozy gathering place in hopes that you will make your own unforgettable family memories at The Rusthy Bear Cabin.

The open concept of the living room and kitchen is highlighted by the knotty pine cathedral ceiling with window views of the mature trees that surround the cabin.  The living room area has a wrap-around reclining sofa for the ultimate comfortable viewing of the large flat screen TV with streaming capabilities. When the weather gets cold you can get a cozy fire started in the wood burning stove style fireplace.  The slab wood breakfast bar peninsula offers seating for dining.  The kitchen has all the basics for preparing a meal and features stainless steel appliances, gas range, dishwasher, microwave and coffee pot.  Through a small hallway off the kitchen is the laundry, a full bathroom and a bedroom with two twin over full bunk beds.

Upstairs in the loft you can curl up with a good book on the futon or seating area with beautiful views of the trees and living room below.  The upstairs bedroom has a king bed and Smart TV for streaming viewing of your favorite shows.

Kids will love playing in the yard among the trees while the adults relax on the deck or gill on the propane barbecue.  This neighborhood is ideal for an evening stroll or take a 15 minute walk to the lake and Alpine Pedal Path.

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: The Tree House - Big Bear City, CA
description:
This pleasantly appointed cabin is perfect for your mountain getaway!  Whether you are looking for a cozy place to call home during ski season, or need a place to park your mountain bike during the summer, this cabin has what you are looking for.  Located in the upper Moonridge neighborhood just 2 miles from Bear Mountain and less than 10 minutes from the grocery stores, you will appreciate the feeling of getting away while still being close to it all.

The reverse floor plan welcomes you into the spacious main living area with tile floors, knotty pine vaulted ceiling and stained glass accents.  The living room features a large sofa with plenty of room for everyone to curl up in front of the wood burning fireplace while watching TV with cable and DVD player.  Stay connected with complementary Wi-Fi. The Foosball table will keep the kids entertained while the adults gather around the dining table for a meal or game of cards.  The kitchen has been completed with granite counters and a vintage flair with fully modern appliances with a retro-look including refrigerator, dishwasher, gas range, microwave and coffee pot.  A half bathroom is also on this level for your convenience.  Step out to the back deck and enjoy the lush, tree views while relaxing on the porch swing or soaking in the hot tub.

Downstairs you will find the two bedrooms, each with their own bathroom.  Turn up the romance in the master bedroom by starting a fire in the wood burning fireplace, snuggle into the king bed and watch TV with cable and DVD player.  Enjoy a private bathroom with marble tile tub surround and a washer and dryer. A built in desk overlooking the forested back yard is ideal for working on your laptop. The second bedroom has two full beds, cozy window seat and a private 3/4 bathroom.  A small covered deck is accessible in the hall with more tree views.

Features: 2 Miles from Bear Mountain, Flat Parking, Hot Tub, Foosball Table, Deck, Tree Views, 2 Wood Burning Fireplaces, Desirable Upgrades, Cable, Internet, DVD, Granite Counters, Modern Retro-Looking Appliances, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Master Suite, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided.

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: The Goggle Tan Condo - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Twin over Twin over Twin, Small Trundle in Closet

description:
This wonderful winter getaway that provides a cozy modern feel is just  steps from the slopes at Snow Summit and ski in and ski out on a powder day, approximately 50 yards to chair lift 4 that  accesses the bunny slope, and approximately 100 yards from the ski resort's  Starbucks and main eatery that serves amazing breakfast burritos! See  the snowcats maintaining the slopes at night from your windows. When it  snows, enjoy skiing down to the back of the condo and into the condo  complex. No need to hassle resort parking! 

An open floor plan connecting the kitchen, dining room, living room and deck with propane BBQ is perfect for entertaining.

This split level condo comes with a laundry machine and also has Cable TV and free internet.

An  all natural stone wood burning fireplace will keep you toasty while  relaxing and enjoying the 80s arcade game table with 61 two player games  to choose from.  The cozy living room provides ample seating for the  whole group.  The ski-themed decor will have you itching to get out on  the slopes!

The updated kitchen with modern countertops,  cabinets, and flooring is equipped with a breakfast bar and plenty of  seating that opens up into the dining room with a dining room table and  additional seating.

Downstairs you will find 3 bedrooms and 2  bathrooms. The master bedroom has a king size bed. The second bedroom  provides a queen size bed.  The 3rd bedroom is equipped with triple bunk  beds! (Twin over Twin over Twin, Small Trundle in Closet)

Look no further than this updated modern condo just steps away from Snow Summit's winter and summer fun!

Features:  Steps to the Slopes, Modern Amenities, Wood Burning Fireplace, Propane BBQ, Cable TV, Internet, Retro Arcade Game Console, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Village and Beyond - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 1: Twin Over Full Bunk, Full (Lower Level)

description:
Village and Beyond is your ideal Big Bear vacation spot! This two- story home is near Snow Summit and the Village, keeping you close to all the action! Whether you’re going to the spa or hiking, biking, or dining, this is the ideal getaway for you and your friends and family! Nestled in a quiet forest neighborhood, Village and Beyond offers all the amenities you need for your home away from home!

The first level features a cozy living area with a wood burning fireplace and a flat screen TV with cable. Opening up to the dining area which seats 6, and the kitchen equipped with anything you need for a dinner night in! Just off the kitchen is a large deck with a propane grill and a picnic table. Perfect for barbeques and dining al fresco! There is a full size washer and dryer in the hall leading to the bedrooms for your convenience. The first bedroom is perfect for the little ones in your crew! It features a twin over full bunk and a separate full bed, and a flat screen TV with cable! There is also a full bath with a tub and shower as well as a guest bedroom featuring a queen size bed. Cozy and convenient for your family and guests!  Upstairs features a loft bedroom with a queen bed, a full bath and a game room with a Foosball table for some friendly competition!
 
If location, convenience, and fun are what you’re looking for, Village and Beyond is the perfect place for you! 

Features: Close to Snow Summit, Near the Village, Wood Burning Fireplace, Foosball Table, Propane Grill, Flat Screen TVs, Cable, WiFi, Full Size Washer and Dryer, Foosball Table, Deck, Microwave, Coffee Maker, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Timberline Lodge - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 1: King with Private Bath & Jetted Tub (Upper)

description:
Timberline Lodge is perfect for families that want to escape the everyday chaos and retreat to the Forest. This four bedroom, three bathroom cabin features a master suite with Jetted Tub, a gameroom with a pool table and a hot tub. A backyard full of mature trees and hiking trails through the San Bernadino National Forest.
The entry level has a living room equipped with a wood burning fire place, flatscreen TV with DVD player and cable. The kitchen features a stove, dishwasher, blender, microwave and all basic necessities to cook a tasteful meal. The backslider from the dining area leads you to the deck where you can enjoy the hot tub and star gaze or take off on a hike into the National Forest. The bedroom with a queen bed is located on the main level with access to the game room and a slider to outside.
The gameroom is where you can find everyone lounging around or kicking a few back, playing pool after a day at the slopes. The gameroom has outdoor access to back deck and spa.
You might have to toss a coin to determine who gets the master suite located upstairs. The master suite has a flatscreen TV with cable, a king sized bed, and private bathroom with Jetted Tub.

Features: Secluded Location, Backs to National Forest, Minutes Away from Bear Mountain Ski Resort, Hiking Trails, , Game Room with Pool Table, Wood-Burning Fireplace in Living Room, Beautiful Kitchen, 52" Plasma TV in Loft, DVD/VCR Player with Cable, Internet Access, Great Decks, Outdoor Hot Tub, Patio Furniture, Propane BBQ, Washer & Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided.

name: Welcome Inn - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: 2 Twins (set together to form a King), 1/2 Bath (Upper Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 5: King, Twin w/Twin Trundle, 3/4 Bath (Upper Level)

description:
Welcome to Big Bear!  This 5 bedroom 7 bathroom cabin is perfect for a family weekend away.  With lots of space for everyone, a bathroom in every bedroom, internet, game tables, tucked away in a quiet neighborhood just minutes from everything.

The main level features vaulted ceilings, walls of windows to let in natural light and plenty of seating for everyone while sharing memories of old and new.  A flat screen TV has DVD player and DirecTV access.  Just off the living room is a game room with small pool table and chess/checker table for the intellectually inclined.  The back deck overlooks the hillside leading up to Castle Glen Estates.  Enjoy the view and fresh air while you grill on the propane barbecue. The dining area has a custom made extra large table to seat everyone.  The kitchen has all the basics with gas stove, microwave, coffee pot, dishwasher and center island for meal prep or buffet style service. The main level has a half bathroom in the hall, and a washer and dryer just off the kitchen.

The first bedroom is located on the main level and has a king bed, crib, changing table, TV with DirecTV, 3/4 bathroom with double sink, separate toilet and large shower.

Upstairs you will find four more bedrooms as well as a full bathroom with tub in the hallway.  Bedroom two has a queen bed, 3/4 bathroom and TV with DVD player.  Bedroom three has two twin beds set together to form a king, half bathroom and TV with DVD player.  Bedroom four has a king bed, 3/4 bathroom and TV with DVD player.  Bedroom five has a king bed, twin with twin trundle, 3/4 bathroom and TV with DVD player.

For a few hours of fun, head downstairs to the game room with a ping pong table or head outside and shoot a few baskets.  A second entrance to the house is located on this level and is convenient for winter with a large entry for gear storage (no garage access).

Features: Quiet Neighborhood, Close to Grocery Stores, Propane Barbecue, Deck, Internet, DirecTV, DVD Players, Bathrooms In All Bedrooms, Crib, Game Tables, Gas Stove, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Dishwasher, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Whispering Bear Lodge - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Whispering Bear Lodge is nestled above the beautiful Big Bear Valley in a quiet neighborhood. It has peek-a-boo ski slope views of Snow Summit and Bear Mountain Resorts. A spacious treed lot offers horseshoes and a bench swing under the pines to enjoy the mountain surroundings.

This 4 bedroom, 2 bath plus a bonus home has plenty to offer for the whole family. The entry level game room has a pool table, Foosball table, flat screen TV with cable, DVD player and Xbox 360. There is a private wet bar and a gas fireplace, a great place to unwind. Sleeping arrangements on this level are a queen and a twin room, a twin over full bunk bed room, and bonus room with pull out couch. Laundry use is available to guests.

The upper level family room is great for movies, sports and games. It also has a flat screen TV, cable, DVD player and Xbox 360 to occupy the kids, or the kids at heart. The whole family can watch a movie on the wrap around couch while warming by the gas fireplace. The kitchen and dining area have an open floor plan with great space. Kitchen comes fully equipped with needed amenities, dishwasher and plenty of counter space. There is extra seating at the bar. The master bedroom has a king bed, flat screen TV and large closet space. The guest room has a queen and a twin.

Access the deck from the upper level and take in the views. Grill up your favorite food on the propane barbeque and enjoy an outdoor meal. Soak in the sun or gaze at the stars while soaking in the outdoor hot tub. Plan your mountain getaway at Whispering Bear Lodge.

name: Ursa Manor - Big Bear City, CA

arrangements.Master Bedroom: Queen and Twin Roll Out with Memory Foam (Main Level)
arrangements.Bedroom 2: Twin over Full Bunk and Twin Trundle (Main Level)

description:
This home does not accept pets. Absolutely no smoking in the house/game room. 

Centrally located, this single story three bedroom, three bath home is 6,800 ft. above sea level and short drive to the Village; the main hub for shopping, dining, and entertainment. For the outdoor enthusiast, there is plenty to keep you busy. Winter skiing and snowboarding at Bear Mountain and Snow Summit Ski Resorts are just a short drive away with tubing /summer go-karts a ¼ mile away. Opportunities abound for athletes and sportsmen during the spring through fall at Big Bear Lake and Bakers Pond Wildlife Habitat. Lake activities include fishing, kayaking, water skiing, and great summer group activities at swim and ski beaches. The surrounding San Bernardino National Forrest offers family friendly cycling, mountain biking and hiking, The property has nearby access to the Alpine Pedal Path and the Pacific Crest trail as well as diverse rock climbing and bouldering opportunities throughout the Big Bear Valley with classic routes and rock features including Holcomb Valley.

This custom award winning home has great architectural personality designed with rounded rooms and vaulted ceilings. It is in a quiet neighborhood with a cul-de-sac on a level lot. With an open floor plan, the kitchen and adjacent living room are blended into a single, large gathering space where guests can interact during a visit. With a table for 10 to sit down and share a meal, the spacious kitchen offers plenty of counter space for cooking and is fully equipped including a 36” professional gas range, appliances and a dishwasher. Warm by the wood burning fireplaces or watch your favorite shows on the flat screen TVs. DVD/Blu-Ray, cable and internet included.  A separate game room with a pool table and a laundry room is available for use. 

The master bedroom is a secluded retreat with a queen bed, a twin memory foam roll out bed, a private bathroom with his/hers sinks and a separate TV. The guest room has a queen size bed. The kid’s bedroom has a twin over full bunk bed and a twin pull out trundle, allowing four to sleep in this room. A queen size memory foam foldout bed is available in the living room.

Take in the fresh air, watch the night sky and relax in the outdoor spa. Grill up some summer fun on the gas barbeque and soak in the sun on the large deck. The vacant, treed lot next door gives added privacy and opportunities for a static line and winter snow play. 

Features: Pool Table, Quiet Level Lot, Cable, Internet, Flat Screen TVs, DVD/Blu-Ray Player, Stereo System, Dishwasher, Gas BBQ, Spa, Laundry. 

*Not certified* This home is handicap friendly with a single story configuration and wide doorways.

DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! If you move the pool table, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

name: Time Well Spent - Big Bear City, CA
description:
A/C available!

Big family?  Perfect cabin!  Your vacation to Big Bear will be Time Well Spent in this beautiful, spacious cabin that features two living/family rooms, five bedrooms, a game room and so much more!

The living room features a sofa and love seat for comfortable viewing of the large flat screen TV with cable and Blu-Ray.  Stay connected with complementary internet.  The living room flows through the dining room and into the kitchen which boasts plenty of counter space for buffet style serving or just making a quick snack. Cooking will be a breeze with a full complement of appliances including a gas stove top, oven, microwave, dishwasher, coffee pot, Keurig coffee maker and other various small electrics.  For grilling on the propane barbecue, step out to the side deck just off the main living space.  The laundry room is ideal for longer stays.

Down the hallway is a half bathroom and the family room which features a large sofa, TV with cable (not pictured), and a 3/4 bathroom.  The first bedroom is attached and has two twin over queen bunk beds.  The second bedroom is down the other hallway and has a queen and a king bed and private 3/4 bathroom.

Head upstairs where you will find the game room complete with pool table, shuffleboard, Foosball, darts, casino style card table, and a flat screen TV with cable. The sofa flips out to a full bed for flexible sleeping and lounging space, and a full bathroom is right around the corner.  This level also has three bedrooms.  One bedroom has a king bed and private full bathroom.  The next bedroom has a king bed, and the last bedroom has two twin over full bunk beds.
Head to the garage, where you'll find a ping-pong table.

This cabin is ideal for your next family trip to Big Bear!

Note: No fireplace.

Features:  Multiple Living Spaces, 2 Car Garage, A/C, Flat Parking, Propane Barbecue, Deck, Cable, Internet, Blu-Ray, Pool Table, Darts, Shuffleboard, Foosball, Ping-Ping, Card Table, Gas Stove Top, Oven, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Keurig Coffee Maker, Bar Seating, Dining Table, Wood Floors, Carpet, Central Heat, Ceiling Fans, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture, fixtures and appliances.
address: 721 E Mountain View Blvd Big Bear City, 92314

name: Water Views - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bonus Room: Twin with Pullout Twin, Twin over Full Bunk (Lower Level)

description:
Bring the whole gang! There is enough room for everyone in this expansive "Waterview Shores" custom built home. This home is not shy with the architecture.  Dramatic vaulted open beam ceilings and floor to ceiling picture windows are the focal point to the main living area.

Enter into the home and you will be impressed with the formal dining area with seating for eight. You are sure to enjoy the setting with expansive leaded glass artwork. In the kitchen area you will find updated newer appliances, a standard coffee maker and a separate breakfast nook area  with seating for six and peekaboo windows to enjoy the morning sunlight.

Just off of the entrance you will also find a bedroom with a Queen bed, flat screen TV, DVD player and deck access. There is also a half bath just outside the door.

The living room area is perfect for entertaining your guests with a flatscreen smart TV, DVD player and WIFI internet access provided to stream your devices. Relax on the oversized sofa in front of the gas fireplace, or mix a few drinks at the homes wet bar complete with mini fridge. The living area provides deck access to step out and enjoy the view or grill on one of the two barbecues provided, a charcoal grill and propane grill and enough outdoor seating for everyone.

Off of the main living area is a bedroom providing a Queen bed, deck access TV and DVD player.

Above the living area you will find a master bedroom with a Queen bed, freestanding wood burning fireplace, deck access and a full size bathroom.

Head upstairs to find a seating area, a full size bathroom and the second master bedroom suite. The master bedroom suite offers a half bath, wood burning fireplace, TV, VCR and DVD player. This room also offers deck access and a private office overlooking the homes living quarters.

With four floors and three split levels this home offers enough space and privacy for the entire group. Head downstairs where you will find the bonus room. This room offers a full size bathroom, a twin bed with a pullout twin, a twin over Queen bunk and access to the homes game room.

The game room offers a pool table, air hockey table, electric fireplace and a separate table perfect for building a puzzle or a game of cards. There is also a full size futon for the guest who wants to relax in front of the flatscreen TV with DVD player.

On the ground floor you will find a half bath, laundry room with full size washer and dryer and garage access.

Note: During the winter season, 4 wheel drive and chains are required to access the driveway for this home.

Features: Lake Access,  Lake Views, Propane Barbecue, Charcoal Barbecue, Pool table, Air Hockey Table, Gas Fireplace, Wood Burning Fireplaces, Electric Fireplace, Wood Floors, Granite Counters, Coffee Pot, Dishwasher, Microwave, Central Heat, WIFI internet, Washer and Dryer, Garage Access, Towels and Linens Provided

name: Willow Cottage - Big Bear Lake, CA
description:
Enjoy comfort in the mountains at Willow Cottage.  This cabin exudes warmth with it's mountain decor, knotty pine accents throughout, wood burning fireplace and family friendly atmosphere.  Located just 2 minutes from Bear Mountain for skiing, golfing and the zoo, or walk to the Moonridge shuttle stop for easy access to winter adventure.

The open floor plan includes the living room, dining and kitchen.  The living room is highlighted by the wood burning fireplace and TV with cable and DVD player.  The dining area has a table for 6 with extra seating at the breakfast bar.  The kitchen is ready for preparing a snack or family meal and includes ample counter space, gas range, microwave, dishwasher and coffee pot.  For outdoor cooking, step out to the front deck for grilling on the propane barbecue.

Down the hallway you will find a full bathroom, three bedrooms and a washer and dryer.  The master bedroom has a king bed, private 3/4 bathroom, TV with cable and Blu-Ray player, and access to the back deck, a great place for an evening glass of wine.  The second bedroom has a queen bed, TV with DVD player and access to the back deck.  The third bedroom has a twin over full bunk and TV with DVD player.

This cabin is sure to be a favorite place to call home on your next Big Bear vacation.

Features: 2 Minutes to Bear Mountain, Walking Distance to Resort Shuttle, Flat Parking, Propane Barbecue, Deck, Wood Burning Fireplace, Mountain Decor, Cable, DVD, Internet, Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Pot, Carpet, Central Heat, Ceiling Fans, Washer and Dryer, Towels and Linens Provided

This property is perfect for guests who value newer construction or completely remodeled homes with tasteful interior design. Enjoy a pleasing modern or cabin themed decor, newer furniture and updated fixtures and appliances.

name: Zin and Bear It - Big Bear City, CA
description:
Perfect little cabin for a weekend in the mountains in any season!

Walking distance to the sledding hill and Convention Center in Big Bear City, this clean and cozy cabin will have you snuggling up next to the new gas fireplace with a glass of wine and tunes playing through the sound system, watching a movie on one of the two flat screen TVs equipped with a Roku featuring Netflix and Sling TV featuring 25 TV channels! Hang in the open and airy loft for a game of Foosball or a board game. Enjoy grilling in the outdoors with your choice of propane or charcoal barbecues!

"Zin & Bear It" is just a short drive from the slopes of both Bear Mountain and Snow Summit resorts as well as the Village. Nestled in a quiet neighborhood amongst the trees, the cabin has a spacious living area and two bedrooms downstairs, a bedroom and a loft upstairs, a full bathroom on each floor, a fully-equipped kitchen, and a laundry room with full-size washer and dryer. Kids will love the bunk beds and parents will love the privacy and space of the large bedroom upstairs; two families will enjoy that each has its own floor.

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few  dated features or appliances.

name: Wintersets Inn - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Bedroom 3: Twin over Full Bunk, Full Size Futon (Lower Level)

description:
Walk to Snow Summit Resort. It has many amenities to list including over 3,000 sqft of living space to enjoy.  Enter into the home through the mudroom with full size washer and dryer included for your use.

To the right you will find the main living area, with floor to ceiling windows, expansive woodwork and custom rock wall wood burning fireplace. This home is all about the entertainment. The flow of the main living area provides for a space where everyone can be a part of no matter what they are enjoying. Shuffleboard table and a pub table are provided to the left of the fireplace.  Enjoy a movie or your favorite show on the flat screen TV with cable, or stream your device on the homes WIFI. To the right you will find a pool table and a full wet bar. The dining area has a custom farmhouse style table with seating for eight.

The custom cook's kitchen, has been upgraded with custom cabinetry, soapstone countertops, stainless steel appliances to include a dishwasher, microwave, oversized fridge/freezer combo, five burner gas range and wall oven. There is also a standard coffee pot provided for your use and a custom drop in farmhouse style sink. 

Magnificent windows look out onto the deck and forest in the back. The master bedroom is a unique loft allowing you to enjoy the large living room windows and the view onto the forest with plenty of light with a Queen size bed, and a Queen size sofa sleeper.  There is a half bath provided with a steam shower and private restroom area.

Downstairs you will find three bedrooms. First bedroom one has a Queen bed, down the hall bedroom two has a Queen bed and bedroom three has a Twin over Full bunk and a Full size Futon with a flat screen TV and cable. In the hall you will find a full bathroom with deck access that leads outside

Relax and enjoy the eight person hot tub on the deck, with outside speaker system. Grill up your favorites on the propane barbecue.  The pine trees that surround the home are sure to provide the perfect Big Bear getaway. The expansive wraparound deck provides plenty of space for your outdoor entertaining. Sit by the lighted blockwall at night, or enjoy a drink at the pub table. The kids are sure to enjoy the custom built outdoor playhouse.  Wintersets Inn is nestled in cul-de-sac, creating a very private feel.

Note: This property is located in a tree lined quiet culdesac neighborhood, although we want our guests to enjoy the outdoor setting of this home, including the outdoor playhouse, we ask that you respect the neighboring properties. 

Features:  Washer/Dryer, Central Heat, Cathedral Ceilings, Wood Throughout,  Dishwasher,  Cable TV, WIFI,  Wood Burning Fireplace, Propane Barbeque, Large Yard, Hot Tub, Culdesac, Shuffleboard, Bumper Pool Table/Card Table Combo, Pool Table, Outdoor Playhouse, Towels and Linens Provided

This cabin is perfect for vacationers seeking pleasant and  well-appointed accommodations.  Generally features comfortable  furnishing, desirable amenities, with possibly a few  dated features or  appliances.

name: Windsong Retreat - Big Bear Lake, CA

arrangements.Master Suite: 2 Queens with Gas Fireplace, Jacuzzi Tub and Dual Sinks (Upper Level)

description:
Bask in the beauty of Windsong Retreat, where the views are spectacular and the accommodations are stellar.

Upon entering, the home features an open floor plan beautifully furnished with you in mind. Relax with seating for eight around the beautiful stone wood burning fireplace while enjoying your favorite cable or Blue Ray on the large flat screen, viewable from the kitchen and dining area with seating for ten. High ceilings and a loft view add to the charm of the main living area.

Enjoy the convenience of the kitchen which includes a gas stove top, granite counter tops, and stainless appliances. Adjacent to the kitchen is a breakfast nook where you can start your day basking in panoramic views of the mountain. Step outside on the large deck with seating, barbeque grill and spacious hot tub.

Wood floors through out, along with knotty pine accents creates a high end cabin feel that you’ll remember for years to come.

This spacious cabin has six bedrooms and can accommodate 16 guests. Downstairs consists of a bedroom with two full bunk beds and toys for children to enjoy. Also on this level, a gorgeous suite with a king bed, full bath, dual sinks and whirlpool tub and deck access.

On the upper level is a luxurious game room with a pool table that converts into a ping-pong table. This spacious loft area accommodates seating for 8, where you can also enjoy large flatscreen TV entertainment, numerous board games, and a panoramic view of the beautiful Castle Glen Estates neighborhood.

Upstairs you’ll delight in the master suite which includes two queen beds, deck access with comfortable seating for six around a stone covered gas fireplace. The master suite provides tranquility and pleasure while you indulge in the state of the art jacuzzi tub and lake views, also featured are double sinks in this spacious bathroom. In the additional upstairs bedrooms your guests will enjoy a full bed, full bath; dual sinks, lake view, deck access, a queen bed with fish lover’s décor and another queen bed.

Features: Garage Parking for 3 Cars plus 3 Cars in Driveway, Linens and Towels Provided, Fully Stocked Kitchen, Game Room, Pool Table, Two Blue Ray & Flat Screens, Cable TV, WiFi, Toys and Games Provided, Furnished Deck, Propane Barbeque, Wood Floors Throughout, Granite Counter Tops, Recessed Lighting, Central Forced Heat, Ceiling Fans, Two Fireplaces, Washers/Dryers, Jacuzzi Tub, Dual Sinks, Lake/Mountain Views, Walking Distance to Lake and Stanfield Marsh Boardwalk, Wheelchair Accessible

Note: Whirpool jacuzzi in master bathroom temporarily unavailable.

DO NOT MOVE THE POOL TABLE! IF YOU MOVE THE POOL TABLE, your full deposit will be forfeited and any amounts over that for additional repairs.

This is a luxury property which includes the finest furnishings, luxury building materials, and a highly consistent design theme. Luxury properties range from elegant and formal to relaxed and chic, but all appeal to guests who appreciate first-class accommodations with a designer flair.
